tika-s0501t:12: Yena yā racitā netti, yena sā anumoditā;
tika-s0501t:29_0: Tattha yassa sikkhattayasaṅgahassa navaṅgassa satthusāsanavarassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0501t:29_1: yaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ kātukāmo, tassa nettippakaraṇassa nissayaṃ visayabhūtaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:29_2: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā salokapālena tilokena sadā pūjetabbassa ceva namassitabbassa
tika-s0501t:29_3: ca naruttamassa satthuno sāsanavaraṃ vidūheva ñātabbaṃ. Etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ tāva dassento
tika-s0501t:29_4: taṃjanakena, taṃvijānakavidūhi ca niyametuṃ, ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanañca kātuṃ –
tika-s0501t:30: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t:31: Tasseta sāsanavaraṃ, vidūhi ñeyyaṃ naravarassā”ti. – paṭhamagāthamāha;
tika-s0501t:32_0: Imāya hi paṭhamagāthāya “etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ ñeyya”nti ettakameva ekantato karaṇavisesabhāvena
tika-s0501t:32_2: Ekantādhippetasāsanavarameva nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya saṃvaṇṇetabbattā visayaṃ teneva vakkhati aṭṭhakathācariyo –
tika-s0501t:33: “Etaṃ idāni amhehi vibhajitabbahāranayapaṭṭhānavicāraṇavisayabhūtaṃ sāsanaṃ ādikalyāṇatādiguṇasampattiyā varaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya paṇḍitavedanīyamevā”ti ca,
tika-s0501t:34_0: “Etaṃ tividhampi ‘sāsanavara’nti padena saṅgaṇhitvā tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ, taṃ itaresaṃ
tika-s0501t:34_1: adhigamūpāyoti sabbasāsanamūlabhūtaṃ, attano pakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtaṃ pariyattisāsanamevā”ti ca,
tika-s0501t:35: “Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘sāsanavaraṃ vidūhi ñeyya’nti, tattha nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya visayabhūtaṃ pariyattidhammameva pakārantarena niyametvā dassetu”nti ca.
tika-s0501t:36_0: Tattha pariyattisāsanassāpi mūlaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbasāsanamūlabhūta”nti. Etena
tika-s0501t:36_1: kammasādhanenapi adhippetatthe siddhe nānāvidhasādhakavacanaṃ nānāvādānaṃ anokāsakaraṇatthāya
tika-s0501t:36_2: kataṃ. Svākkhātatādidhammaguṇā pana sāsanassa visesadesakanaravarasaddena vā paridīpakatthabhāvena
tika-s0501t:36_3: vā dīpitā avinābhāvato. Sāsanavarassa pana janakasambandhipekkhattā “naravarassā”ti
tika-s0501t:36_4: vuttaṃ. Tena ca aggapuggalo sāsanavarajanako vācakatthasambandhibhāvena vutto. Anaññasādhāraṇamahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇavisesā
tika-s0501t:36_5: pana janakasambandhibhūtassa narassa visesakenavarasaddena vā paridīpakatthabhāvena vā dīpito.
tika-s0501t:37_0: Kiṃ nu so sāsanavarajanako naravaro paramatthova, udāhu pūjanīyo ceva namassanīyo
tika-s0501t:37_1: cāti vuttaṃ “yaṃ loko…pe… namassati cā”ti, tena sāsanavarajanako naravaro paramatthova
tika-s0501t:37_2: na hoti, atha kho salokapālena lokena sadā sabbakālesu pūjanīyo ceva namassanīyo
tika-s0501t:38_0: Ettha ca pūjananamassanacetanāvācakena vā pūjananamassanasaddena phalūpacārattho
tika-s0501t:38_2: namassanīyabhāvo ca dīpakatthabhāvena pariggahetvā dīpito. Tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo
tika-s0501t:38_3: “bhagavato sadevakassa lokassa pūjanīyavandanīyabhāvo, aggapuggalabhāvo ca vuccamāno
tika-s0501t:39_0: Tādisassa naravarassa tādisaṃ sāsanavaraṃ kiṃ yena kenaci viññeyyanti vuttaṃ “vidūhī”ti.
tika-s0501t:39_1: Tena tipiṭakadharā ariyabhūtā paṇḍitā vācakatthabhāvena gahitā, suppaṭipannatādisaṅghaguṇā
tika-s0501t:39_2: pana vandadhātuvacanena vā dīpakatthabhāvena vā dīpitāti. Evaṃ pariggahetvā dīpite
tika-s0501t:39_4: katvā”ti vakkhati, na gāthāya niravasesatthe. Tattha evanti evaṃ sāsanavaradassanabhūtāya
tika-s0501t:39_5: paṭhamagāthāyāti atthova daṭṭhabbo. Apare panācariyā “imāya paṭhamagāthāya ekantato
tika-s0501t:39_6: adhippetānādhippetavacanāni ceva vācakatthadīpakatthavisesāni ca suṭṭhu avicāretvā
tika-s0501t:39_8: nissāya sātisayaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṃ kātuṃ ‘yaṃ lokotyādimāhā’ti ca sātisayaratanattayaguṇe
tika-s0501t:39_9: dassento ‘yaṃ lokotyādimāhā’ti” ca vadanti. Tesaṃ vādo amhākaṃ nakkhamati. Kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:39_10: pana mayā heṭṭhā vuttānusārena ñātabbanti ayaṃ padānukkamānurūpānusandhyattho.
tika-s0501t:40_0: Atha vā ekaṃ samayaṃ jambuvanasaṇḍe nisīditvā sissānaṃ hitaṃ cintento, attano abhinīhārasampattiṃ
tika-s0501t:40_1: passanto, sammāsambuddhena pasaṃsito, mahākaccāyano satthārā anumoditaṃ sāsanāyattaṃ
tika-s0501t:40_3: loko”tyādimāha. Yadi evaṃ yathāvuttappakāraṃ nettippakaraṇabhūtaṃ soḷasahārātyādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:40_4: ārabhitabbaṃ, taṃ anārabhitvā kasmā nettippakaraṇato bahibhūtaṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:40_5: ārabhitabbaṃ, seyyathāpi ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ byākareyya, labujaṃ puṭṭho ambaṃ byākareyya,
tika-s0501t:40_6: evameva nettippakaraṇamārabhanto aññaṃ ārabhatīti? Tathāpi yassa yathāvuttassa sāsanavarassa
tika-s0501t:40_7: atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ yaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ kātukāmo yassa nettippakaraṇassa visayabhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:40_8: saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ, saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā taṃ sāsanavaraṃ tāva dassento taṃjanakena,
tika-s0501t:40_9: taṃvijānakavidūhi ca niyametuṃ, ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanañca kātuṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t:41: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t:43_0: Niggahitalopaṃ katvā racitā gāthā ariyāsāmaññalakkhaṇena sampannā. Kathaṃ? Pubbaḍḍhe
tika-s0501t:43_1: tiṃsa mattā, aparaḍḍhe sattavīsa mattā. Sampiṇḍitā sattapaññāsa mattāva bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:43_2: Akkharānaṃ pana imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ sattatiṃsa. Tesu garukkharā vīsati, lahukkharā sattarasa
tika-s0501t:44_0: Tattha niddesattho aṭṭhakathānusārena vijānitabbo. Salokapālo sabbo sattaloko sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:44_1: sabbaññutaññāṇādianekaguṇānussaraṇena vā pūjetabbapūjanena vā paṭipattipūjanena vā
tika-s0501t:44_2: sadā sabbakālesu sakkaccaṃ yaṃ naravaraṃ pūjayate ceva namassati ca, tassa pūjetabbassa
tika-s0501t:44_3: ceva namassitabbassa ca satthuno naravarassa tilokaggassa mayā saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:44_4: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā vidūheva ñeyyaṃ ñātabbaṃ. Nipuṇañāṇagocaraṃ etaṃ mayā buddhiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:44_5: ṭhapitaṃ sāsanavaraṃ mayā ārabhitabbassa nettippakaraṇassa visayanti paṭhamaṃ jānitabbaṃ
tika-s0501t:44_6: dassetvā tassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūtaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ ahaṃ ārabhissāmi, taṃ tumhe
tika-s0501t:44_7: sādhavo suṇātha manasi karothāti samudāyayojanā, avayavayojanāpi kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:45_0: Kathaṃ? “Salokapālo loko”ti visesanavisesitabbabhāvena yojanā. Lokapālo vajjetvā
tika-s0501t:45_1: avaseso loko ca na hoti, atha kho lokapālasahito lokoti viseseti. “Loko pūjayate
tika-s0501t:45_2: ceva namassati cā”ti kattukārakaākhyātakiriyābhāvena yojanā “yo karoti, sa kattā”ti
tika-s0501t:45_3: vuttattā. Yo loko kārako, so kattā hotu. Yo loko pūjayate ceva namassati ca, kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:45_4: so kattāti? “Yo karoti, sa kattā”ti suttassa “yo karoti kiriyaṃ nipphādeti, so kiriyānipphādako
tika-s0501t:45_5: kattā”ti atthasambhavato sayanabhuñjanādisabbakiriyānipphādako kattāyeva hoti. Ayañca
tika-s0501t:45_6: loko pūjananamassanakiriyānipphādakoyevāti. Kathaṃ ayaṃ loko kiriyānipphādakoti?
tika-s0501t:45_7: “Loko”ti sattapaññattiyā paramatthato avijjamānāyapi paññāpetabbo santāne pavattamāno
tika-s0501t:45_8: hadayavatthunissito cittuppādo gahetabbo, so yathārahaṃ hetādhipatisahajātādipaccayena
tika-s0501t:45_9: paccayo nipphādako bhave. Evaṃ lokassa kattukārakabhāvo vijānitabboti paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena
tika-s0501t:45_10: yojanā. Esa nayo tīsu piṭakesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0501t:46_0: “Yaṃ naravaraṃ pūjayate ceva namassati cā”ti kammakārakaākhyātakiriyābhāvena yojanā
tika-s0501t:46_1: “yaṃ karoti, taṃ kamma”nti vuttattā. Yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ kammaṃ hotu. Yaṃ pūjayati
tika-s0501t:46_2: ceva namassati ca, kathaṃ taṃ kammanti? “Yaṃ karoti, taṃ kamma”nti suttassa “yaṃ
tika-s0501t:46_3: karoti kiriyāya sambajjhati, kiriyāya sambajjhitabbaṃ kamma”nti atthasambhavato karaṇavācakavacanīyādisabbakiriyāya
tika-s0501t:46_4: sambajjhitabbaṃ kammaṃ hotveva. Ayañca naravaro pūjananamassanakiriyāya vācakavacanīyabhāvena
tika-s0501t:46_5: sambajjhitabboyevāti. Kathaṃ ayaṃ naravaro vacanīyoti? Pūjananamassanacetanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0501t:46_6: naravaro vacanīyo, cetanā vācakā, evaṃ vācakavacitabbabhāvo hotveva. “Yaṃ naravara”nti
tika-s0501t:46_7: paññattiyā paramatthato avijjamānāyapi paññāpetabbo santānavasena pavattamāno lokiyalokuttaraguṇasahito
tika-s0501t:46_8: khandhapañcako vutto, so ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, cetanā paccayuppannāti paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena
tika-s0501t:46_9: yojanā. Esa nayo tīsu piṭakesu evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0501t:47_0: “Tassa naravarassā”ti visesanavisesitabbabhāvena yojanā. Naravaro nāma nimantitabbādiko
tika-s0501t:47_1: na hoti, atha kho pūjetabbo namassitabbo evāti viseseti. Tassa pūjetabbassa ceva
tika-s0501t:47_2: namassitabbassa ca naravarassa sāsanavaranti jaññajanakabhāvena yojanā. Sāsanavaraṃ
tika-s0501t:47_3: nāma paccekabuddhasāvakabuddharājarājādīnaṃ sāsanavaraṃ na hoti, pūjetabbassa ceva
tika-s0501t:47_4: namassitabbassa ca naravarassa tilokasseva sāsanavaranti niyameti.
tika-s0501t:48_0: “Vidūhi ñeyya”nti kattukārakakitakiriyābhāvena yojanā. Kattubhāvo heṭṭhā vuttova.
tika-s0501t:48_1: “Vidūhī”ti sattapaññattiyā paramatthato avijjamānāyapi paññāpetabbo santāne pavattamāno
tika-s0501t:48_2: sāsanavare sammohadhaṃsakañāṇasahito hadayavatthunissito cittuppādo vutto, so yathārahaṃ
tika-s0501t:48_3: hetādhipatisahajātādipaccayena paccayo nipphādako bhave. Ñā-itidhātuyā atthabhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:48_4: ñāṇaṃ paccayuppannaṃ nipphādeyyaṃ bhave, evaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena yojanā.
tika-s0501t:49: “Ñeyyaṃ sāsanavara”nti visesanavisesyabhāvena yojanā. Sāsanavaraṃ nāma na yena kenaci ñeyyaṃ, atha kho vidūheva saṇhasukhumañāṇena ñeyyaṃ sāsanavaranti viseseti.
tika-s0501t:50_0: “Etaṃ sāsanavara”nti visesanavisesyabhāvena yojanā. Sāsanavaraṃ nāma mayā buddhiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:50_1: aṭṭhapitaṃ appavattetabbaṃ hoti, mayā idāni nettippakaraṇassa visayabhāvena buddhiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:50_2: viparivattamānaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pavattetabbaṃ sāsanavaranti viseseti. Etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ
tika-s0501t:50_3: nettippakaraṇassa visayanti yojanā kātabbā. Tenāha “etaṃ idāni amhehi vibhajitabbahāranayapaṭṭhānavicāraṇavisayabhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:50_4: sāsana”nti. Iccevaṃ nettiyā paṭhamagāthāya saṅkhepena yojanattho samatto.
tika-s0501t:51_0: Tattha yanti aniyamanaravarassa satthuno vācakaṃ payogavantasabbanāmaṃ. Aniyamo ca
tika-s0501t:51_1: pūjananamassanakiriyāya aniyamitattā vutto, na naravarato aññasattassa sambhavatoti.
tika-s0501t:51_2: Esa nayo sesāniyatesupi tīsu piṭakesu. Lokiyanti ettha puññāpuññāni, tabbipāko cāti
tika-s0501t:51_3: loko.Ettha sattanikāye puññāpuññāni lokiyanti pavattanti, tabbipāko ca lokiyati pavattati,
tika-s0501t:51_4: iti sattanikāyassa puññāpuññānaṃ, tabbipākassa ca pavattanassa ādhārabhāvato “etthā”tipadena
tika-s0501t:51_5: niddiṭṭho sattanikāyo lokonāma. Pūjayateti viggahavirahitaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ, sakkaccaṃ pūjanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0501t:52_0: Lokaṃ pālentīti lokapālā, puññāpuññānañceva tabbipākassa ca pavattanādhārattā lokā
tika-s0501t:52_1: ca. Ke te? Cattāro mahārājāno, indayamavaruṇakuverā vā, khattiyacatumahārājasakkasuyāmasantusitasunimmitaparanimmitavasavattimahābrahmādayo
tika-s0501t:52_3: saha lokapālehi yo vattatīti salokapālo. Atha vā ye hirottappā lokaṃ pālenti, iti
tika-s0501t:52_4: pālanato te hirottappā lokapālā. Tenāha bhagavā “dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ
tika-s0501t:52_5: pālentī”ti. Lokapālehi hirottappehi samannāgato loko salokapālo nāma. Hirottappasampanno
tika-s0501t:52_6: hi sappuriso loko sakkaccaṃ sadā sabbakālesu pūjayati ceva namassati ca pāpahirijigucchanato,
tika-s0501t:53_0: Aññe pana pūjentā namassantāpi kadāciyeva pūjenti namassanti, na sabbadāti. Sadāti
tika-s0501t:53_2: viggahavirahitaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ, sakkaccaṃ namassanaṃ karoti. Tassetāti ettha tassāti
tika-s0501t:53_3: niyamavācakaṃ payogavantasabbanāmaṃ viggahavirahitameva. Niyamo ca pūjananamassanakiriyāya
tika-s0501t:53_4: visesito. Tasmā tassa pūjananamassanakiriyāya niyamitabbassa pūjetabbassa namassitabbassa
tika-s0501t:53_5: naravarassāti attho yuttova. Sesaniyamesu aññesupi eseva nayo. Etanti ācariyena vibhajitabbahāranayapaṭṭhānavicāraṇavisayabhūtassa
tika-s0501t:54_0: Sāsati etenāti sāsanaṃ, etena navavidhasuttantena, navavidhasuttantasahitena vā varena
tika-s0501t:54_2: yathārahaṃ satte sāsati anusāsati vineti. Iti sāsanānusāsanakiriyānusārena veneyyasattānaṃ
tika-s0501t:54_4: navavidhasuttantasahitaṃ vā varaṃ sabbaṃ sāsanaṃ nāma. Navavidhasuttantadesanāya
tika-s0501t:54_5: hi veneyyānaṃ jānanaṃ purimajānanena pacchimajānanaṃ, jānanena paṭipajjanena pacchimapaṭipajjanena
tika-s0501t:54_6: adhigamo, purimādhigamena pacchimādhigamo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo
tika-s0501t:54_7: paññā saddhāya sīlassa sutassa cāgassa paññāyā”ti ca “paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ
tika-s0501t:54_8: paṭhamassa jhānassa”tyādi ca. Sāsadhātuyā desanāsaddo ca taṃjanako desanāñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo
tika-s0501t:54_10: kāraṇūpacārattho, “etenā”ti padena vuttāya sāsanabhūtāya nāmapaññattiyā karaṇasattisaṅkhātā
tika-s0501t:54_11: upanissayapaccayasatti phalūpacārattho. Iti-saddopi tameva nāmapaññattiyā upanissayapaccayasattiṃ
tika-s0501t:54_12: hetubhāvena parāmasati, tassā sattiyā ādhārabhūtā nāmapaññatti yu-paccayattho. Eseva
tika-s0501t:55_0: Ekantaniyyānaṭṭhena, anaññasādhāraṇaguṇatāya ca uttamaṭṭhena varaṃ uttamaṃ, pariyattisāsanamhi
tika-s0501t:55_1: phalaniyyādanato, magganiyyānahetubhāvato ca niyyānaṭṭhena, sāvakādīhi ajaniyattā
tika-s0501t:55_2: asādhāraṇaṭṭhena ca uttamaṭṭhena varaṃ, varitabbanti vā varaṃ. Yathāvuttassa sāsanassa
tika-s0501t:55_3: paṇḍitehi abhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya varitabbattā patthetabbattā sāsanavaraṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t:55_4: yathāvuttaṭṭhena vā sāsanañca taṃ varañcāti sāsanavaraṃ. Ca-saddena sattibhedaṃ,
tika-s0501t:56_0: Vidantīti vidū. Ye paṇḍitā yathāsabhāvato kammakammaphalāni, kusalādibhede ca dhamme
tika-s0501t:56_1: vidanti, iti vidanato te paṇḍitā vidū nāma, tehi. Ñātabbanti ñeyyaṃ. Ñā-dhātuyā nippariyāyato
tika-s0501t:56_2: ārammaṇikaṃ ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ṭhānūpacārato sāsanavarassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo dassito,
tika-s0501t:56_3: iti-saddena ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo parāmasito. Tassa iti-saddena parāmasitabbassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa
tika-s0501t:56_4: ādhāraṃ sāsanavaraṃ ṇya-paccayatthoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ arahatīti vā ñeyyaṃ, vidūnaṃ
tika-s0501t:56_5: ñāṇaṃ jānanaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena arahatīti attho. Imasmiṃ naye taddhitapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:57_0: Narati netīti naro. Yo puriso attānaṃ itthīnaṃ uccaṭṭhānaṃ narati neti, iti naranato
tika-s0501t:57_1: nayanato so puriso naro nāma. So hi puttabhūtopi mātuyā pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, kaniṭṭhabhātubhūtopi
tika-s0501t:57_2: jeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Atha vā naritabbo netabboti naro. So hi jātakālato
tika-s0501t:57_3: paṭṭhāya yāva attano sabhāvena attānaṃ dhāretuṃ samattho na hoti, tāva parehi netabbo,
tika-s0501t:57_4: na tathā añño tiracchānādikoti. Ettha pana satthuvisayatāya narati veneyyasatteti
tika-s0501t:57_5: naroti attho adhippeto. Satthā hi satte apāyādito sugatiṃ vā maggaphalanibbānaṃ vā
tika-s0501t:57_6: netīti. Sabbaññutaññāṇādianekaguṇasamannāgatattā varo uttamo, varitabbo patthetabboti
tika-s0501t:57_7: vā varo, tilokaggo. Pakatiyā uccaṭṭhānaṭṭho naro guṇuttamena samannāgato varo, naro
tika-s0501t:57_8: ca so varo cāti naravaro. Ca-ta-saddānaṃ atthabhedo vuttova, visesanaparapadasamāsoyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:57_9: Yena vuttaṃ “aggapuggalassāti attho”ti. Aññe pana “narānaṃ, naresu vā varoti naravaro”ti
tika-s0501t:57_10: vadanti, taṃ vacanaṃ “aggapuggalassāti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati maññe.
tika-s0501t:57_11: Tassa naravarassāti. Iccevaṃ nettippakaraṇassa ādigāthāya samāsena ca vacanattho samatto.
tika-s0501t:58_0: Sarūpattho yojanatthavacanatthānusārena vijānitabbo. Tathāpi visuṃ suṭṭhu jānanatthāya
tika-s0501t:58_2: salokapālena lokena pūjetabbo ceva namassitabbo ca sāsanavaradesako tilokaggo sarūpattho.
tika-s0501t:58_4: Lokasaddo ekavacanayuttopi jātisaddattā niravasesato satte saṅgaṇhāti yathā “mahājano”ti.
tika-s0501t:59_0: Pūjayateti ettha pūjanakiriyāya mukhyato pūjanasaṅkhāto pūjentānaṃ cittuppādo sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t:59_1: phalūpacārena taṃcittuppādassa ārammaṇapakatūpanissayabhūtā vuttappakārā sabbe buddhaguṇā
tika-s0501t:59_2: sarūpatthā. Te-vibhattipaccayassa pūjanakiriyāsādhako vuttappakāro loko ca sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t:59_3: evaṃ sati atthabhedābhāvato dvīsu vācakesu ekova vācako vattabbo, kasmā ekasmiṃ atthe
tika-s0501t:59_4: dve vācakā vuttāti? Nāyaṃ doso dvinnaṃ vācakānaṃ sāmaññavisesavācakattā. Lokasaddo
tika-s0501t:59_5: hi pūjanakiriyāsādhako, aññakiriyāsādhako ca vadatīti sāmaññavācako ca hoti. Pūjayate-saddo
tika-s0501t:59_7: Tasmā pūjayate-saddo lokasaddassa sarūpattho, pūjanakiriyāsādhako ca na aññakiriyāsādhakoti
tika-s0501t:59_8: niyameti. Lokasaddo ca pūjayatesaddassa sarūpattho pūjanakiriyāsādhako. Loko pana
tika-s0501t:59_9: pūjanakiriyāsādhako itthipurisatiracchānādikoti niyameti. Tīsu piṭakesu aññesupi
tika-s0501t:60_1: ca sattanikāyo sarūpattho. “Sadā”ti padassa rattidivasakālo atītabhagavato dharamānakālo
tika-s0501t:60_2: tato parakālo abhinīhārato yāva sāsanantaradhānā kālo tato parakālo sarūpattho. So
tika-s0501t:60_3: pana anāgatabuddhuppajjanakālo atītasammāsambuddhe idāni pūjayanti namassanti viya
tika-s0501t:60_4: pūjayissati ceva namassissati ca. Namassatīti ettha namassanakiriyāya mukhyato namassanasaṅkhāto
tika-s0501t:60_6: vuttappakārā sabbe buddhaguṇā sarūpattho. Ti-vibhattipaccayassa namassanakiriyāsādhako
tika-s0501t:60_7: yathāvuttasattanikāyo loko ca sarūpattho, atthabhedābhāvepi dvinnaṃ vācakānaṃ pavattabhāvo
tika-s0501t:60_8: heṭṭhā vuttova. “Cā”ti padassa idhekacco pūjentopi na namassati, namassantopi na
tika-s0501t:60_9: pūjeti ca, ayaṃ pana sattanikāyo loko pūjayati ceva namassati cāti samuccayattho sarūpattho.
tika-s0501t:61_0: Tassāti ettha taṃ-saddassa sabbaññutaññāṇādianekaguṇasamannāgato pūjetabbo namassitabbo
tika-s0501t:61_1: tilokaggo satthā sarūpattho, chaṭṭhīvibhattiyā janakassa naravarassa jaññena sāsanavarena
tika-s0501t:61_2: sambandho padhānasarūpattho, jaññasāsanavarassa janakena naravarena sambandho apadhānasarūpattho.
tika-s0501t:61_3: Tīsu piṭakesu evarūpesu aññesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0501t:62_1: sarūpattho. “Sāsanavara”nti padassāpi tameva sarūpattho, etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhabhedena
tika-s0501t:62_3: ca visesato adhippetaṃ tassa mūlabhūtabhāvato vinayasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu bahūpakārena dassitoti
tika-s0501t:62_4: amhehi na vattabbo. Vadantopi aññaṃ racitabbaṃ racituṃ asamatthova hutvā vadatīti gahitabbo vadeyya.
tika-s0501t:63_0: Taṃ pana pariyattisāsanaṃ vimuttirasavasena ekavidhaṃ, dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:63_4: Ettha ca desanā desakādhīnā, sāsanaṃ sāsitabbāyattaṃ, kathā kathetabbatthāpekkhāti
tika-s0501t:63_5: viseso. Dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo, aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti
tika-s0501t:63_16: evamādibahuvidhaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ nettippakaraṇassa visesato visayaṃ. Tassa visayabhāve
tika-s0501t:63_17: sati paṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanadvayampi tammūlakattā visayaṃ hoti pariyāyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:64_2: sarūpattho. “Ñeyya”nti padassa tādisehi vidūhi saṇhasukhumañāṇādinā vijānitabbaṃ
tika-s0501t:64_4: janako anekaguṇasampanno tilokaggo sarūpattho. Iccevaṃ nettiyā ādigāthāya sarūpattho
tika-s0501t:65_0: Evaṃ tassā anusandhyādīnaṃ jānitabbabhāve satipi ajānanto viya pucchitvā dosaṃ āropetvā
tika-s0501t:65_1: parihāravasenāpi gambhīrādhippāyassa anākulassa visesajānanaṃ bhavissati. Tasmā pucchitvā
tika-s0501t:65_2: dosaṃ ropetvā parihāravasena gambhīrādhippāyaṃ sampiṇḍetvā kathayissaṃ. Amhākācariya
tika-s0501t:65_3: kimatthaṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādimāha? Nettippakaraṇaṃ kātuṃ. Evaṃ sati nettippakaraṇabhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:65_4: “soḷasahārā netti”tyādikaṃ eva vattabbaṃ, kasmā taṃ avatvā tato nettippakaraṇato
tika-s0501t:65_5: aññaṃ “yaṃ loko pūjayate”tyādimāha. Seyyathāpi samuddaṃ gacchanto himavantaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t:65_6: himavantaṃ gacchanto samuddaṃ gacchati, evameva nettippakaraṇaṃ karonto sāsanavaradassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:65_7: karotīti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi yassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ kātukāmo taṃ sāsanavaraṃ
tika-s0501t:65_8: paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādimāha. Evaṃ sati “etaṃ sāsanavara”nti ettakameva
tika-s0501t:65_9: vattabbaṃ, kasmā “yaṃ loko”tyādi vuttanti? Taṃ sāsanavaraṃ janakena naravarena niyametvā
tika-s0501t:65_10: thometuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathāpi “tassa naravarassā”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ, kasmā “yaṃ loko”tyādi
tika-s0501t:65_11: vuttanti? Taṃ janakaṃ naravaraṃ lokapālena lokaseṭṭhena saddhiṃ sabbena lokena pūjanīyanamassanīyabhāvena
tika-s0501t:65_12: thometuṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādi vuttaṃ. Pūjentāpi vanditvā pūjenti, tasmā “pūjayate”ti ettakameva
tika-s0501t:65_13: vattabbanti? Tathāpi keci kesañci pūjāsakkārādīni karontāpi tesaṃ apākaṭaguṇatāya
tika-s0501t:65_14: namakkāraṃ na karonti. Evaṃ bhagavato yathābhūtaabbhuggatasaddatāya pana bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0501t:65_15: pūjetvāpi vandatiyevāti dassetuṃ “namassati cā”ti vuttaṃ. Pūjento, namassanto ca
tika-s0501t:65_16: na kadāciyeva, atha kho sabbakālanti dassetuṃ “sadā”ti vuttaṃ. Tādisassa naravarassa
tika-s0501t:65_17: tādisaṃ sāsanavaraṃ saṇhasukhumañāṇasampannehi vidūheva sukhumañāṇeneva ñeyyanti
tika-s0501t:66_0: Ettha ca “pūjayate, namassatī”ti etehi pūjananamassanakiriyāya hetubhūtā sabbaññutaññāṇādayo
tika-s0501t:66_1: aneke lokiyalokuttaraguṇā pakāsitā honti te guṇe āgamma sabbalokassa pūjananamassanacetanāya
tika-s0501t:66_2: pavattanato. Tesu hi kiñci sarūpato, kiñci anumānato sāriputtattherādayo anussaranti,
tika-s0501t:66_3: pūjenti, namassanti. Tena vuttaṃ “anussaretha sambuddha”nti. Ekadesaguṇāpi pūjārahā
tika-s0501t:66_4: namassanārahā, kasmā sabbepi guṇā pakāsitāti? Sabbaguṇadassanena bodhisambhārasambharaṇamahākaruṇāyogasaṅkhātahetuñāṇapahāna-
tika-s0501t:66_6: pakārasampadāvasena thomanā dassitā. Tena attahitapaṭipatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca
tika-s0501t:66_8: vijjāsampatti ca attādhipatitā, dhammādhipatitā ca lokanāthaattanāthatā ca pubbakārikataññutā
tika-s0501t:66_9: ca aparantapatā, anattantapatā ca buddhakaraṇadhammabuddhabhāvasiddhi ca paratāraṇaattatāraṇañca
tika-s0501t:66_10: sattānuggahacittatā, dhammavirattacittatā ca pakāsitā bhavanti. Tena sabbappakārena
tika-s0501t:66_12: pakāseti. Tena pūjanakanamassanakānaṃ yathicchitabbapayojanasampatti pakāsitāti sabbaguṇā pakāsitāti.
tika-s0501t:67_0: Ādikalyāṇatādiguṇasampattiyā varaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ, nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya paṇḍitavedanīyañca,
tika-s0501t:67_1: tasmā “varaṃ ñeyya”nti vacanehi svākkhātatādayo sabbe dhammaguṇā pakāsitā. Ariyasaccapaṭivedhena
tika-s0501t:67_2: samugghātakilesasammohāyeva paramatthato paṇḍitā bālyādisamatikkamanato, tasmā bhāvitalokuttaramaggā,
tika-s0501t:67_3: sacchikatasāmaññaphalā ca puggalā visesato “vidū”ti vuccanti. Te hi yathāvuttasāsanavaraṃ
tika-s0501t:67_4: aviparītato ñātuṃ, netuñca saparasantāne sakkuṇanti. Tasmā ye suppaṭipannatādayo
tika-s0501t:67_5: anekehi suttapadehi saṃvaṇṇitā, te ariyasaṅghaguṇāpi niravasesato “vidūhī”ti padena
tika-s0501t:67_6: pakāsitāti. Evaṃ nettiyā paṭhamagāthāya “etaṃ sāsanavara”nti padena sāsanattayaṃ
tika-s0501t:67_7: saṅgaṇhitvā tattha itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ adhigamūpāyabhāvato sabbasāsanamūlabhūtassa,
tika-s0501t:67_8: attano nettippakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtassa pariyattisāsanavarassa dassanamukhena
tika-s0501t:67_9: sabbe ratanattayaguṇāpi thomanāvasena nayatova pakāsitā honti. Nayato hi dassitā
tika-s0501t:67_10: sabbe guṇā niravasesā gahitā bhavanti, na sarūpato. Tenāha bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā paññavantānaṃ
tika-s0501t:70_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha buddhadhammāti buddhaguṇā. Amhākaṃ pana yāvajīvaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpane
tika-s0501t:70_1: atiussāhantānampi sarūpato nīharitvā dassetuṃ asamatthabhāvo pageva paṇḍitehi veditabboti.
tika-s0501t:72: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t:74: Niggahitalopavasena vuttāya gāthāya saṅkhepena kathito anusandhyādiko samattoti.
tika-s0501t:75: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, sa lokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t:76: Taṃ tassa sāsanavaraṃ, vidūhi ñeyyaṃ naravarassā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:77_0: Gāthaṃ apare paṭhanti. Tassāpi anusandhyattho vuttanayova. Yojanattho pana viseso.
tika-s0501t:77_1: Tattha hi salokapālo loko yassa satthuno naravarassa yaṃ sāsanavaraṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:77_2: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā pūjayate ceva namassati ca, tassa lokapālassa satthuno taṃ
tika-s0501t:77_3: pūjetabbaṃ, namassitabbañca vidūheva viññātabbaṃ, etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ nettippakaraṇassa
tika-s0501t:77_4: visayanti gahetabbanti yojanā. Yojanākāropi heṭṭhā vuttanayova.
tika-s0501t:78_0: Viggahatthopi viseso. Imasmiñhi naye lokaṃ pālentīti lokapālā, yathāvuttacatumahārājādayo.
tika-s0501t:78_1: Tehi lokapālehi sahitaṃ sabbalokaṃ pāleti lokagganāyakattāti lokapāloti bhagavāpi
tika-s0501t:78_2: lokapālasaddena vutto. So hi “tassā”ti ettha taṃ-saddena parāmasīyati, tasmā tassa
tika-s0501t:78_3: lokapālassa satthuno naravarassāti attho gahito. Yadi evaṃ lokapālo guṇībhūto apadhāno
tika-s0501t:78_4: padhānabhūtaṃ lokaṃ visesetvā vinivatto, kathaṃ taṃ-saddena parāmasīyatīti? Lokavisesako
tika-s0501t:78_6: viya parāmasīyatīti. Bhagavā sāsanavarassa sāmibhāvena gahito. Kathaṃ sāsanavarassa
tika-s0501t:78_7: sāmī bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ pūjayatīti? Na cāyaṃ virodho. Buddhā hi bhagavanto dhammagaruno,
tika-s0501t:78_8: te sabbakālaṃ dhammamapacayamānāva viharantīti. Buddhānañhi dhammagarudhammāpacayamānabhāvo
tika-s0501t:78_9: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ…pe… tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti
tika-s0501t:78_10: vutto, tasmā lokapālo bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ pūjayatīti daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ sati lokapālo
tika-s0501t:78_11: bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ pūjayatīti attho yutto hotu, kathaṃ lokapālo bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ
tika-s0501t:78_12: namassatīti yuttoti? Yuttova “namassatī”ti padassa garukaraṇena tanninnapoṇapabbhāroti
tika-s0501t:78_13: atthassāpi labbhanato. Bhagavā hi dhammagarutāya sabbakālaṃ dhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena
tika-s0501t:78_14: viharatīti. Vuttañhetaṃ “yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”tiādi. Sesamettha heṭṭhā
tika-s0501t:78_15: vuttanayena vā saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayena vā ñātabbanti amhehi na vitthārīyati.
tika-s0501t:79_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “sāsanavara”nti padena tividhampi sāsanaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā tattha
tika-s0501t:79_1: pariyattisāsanameva attano nettippakaraṇassa visayaṃ niyametvā dassento “dvādasa
tika-s0501t:79_2: padāni”tyādimāha. Atha vā paṭhamagāthāya ratanattayathomanena saha nettippakaraṇatāvisayaṃ
tika-s0501t:79_3: sāsanavaraṃ ācariyena dassitaṃ, “tassa sāsanavaraṃ kiṃ sabbaṃyeva nettippakaraṇassa
tika-s0501t:79_4: visayaṃ, udāhu pariyattisāsanamevā”ti pucchitabbattā pariyattisāsanabhūtaṃ suttamevāti
tika-s0501t:79_5: dassento “dvādasa padāni sutta”ntiādimāha. Tattha “sāsanavara”nti sāmaññena vuttampi
tika-s0501t:79_6: pariyattisuttameva sāsanavaranti gahetabbanti attho. “Taṃ pana katividha”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:79_7: “dvādasa padānī”ti vuttaṃ, saṅkhepato pabhedena dvādasavidhanti attho. Pabhedato
tika-s0501t:79_8: dvādasavidhampi byañjanapadaatthapadato pana duvidhamevāti dassetuṃ “taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca
tika-s0501t:79_9: attho cā”ti vuttaṃ. “Tasmiṃ dvaye ekameva sarūpato nettippakaraṇassa visayanti viññeyyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:79_10: udāhu ubhaya”nti pucchitabbattā ubhayanti dassetuṃ “taṃ viññeyyaṃ ubhaya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:79_11: Vacanavacanīyabhāvena sambandhe yasmiṃ byañjane, atthe ca “sutta”nti vohāro pavatto,
tika-s0501t:79_12: taṃ ubhayaṃ sarūpato nettippakaraṇassa visayanti viññeyyanti attho. “Kinti viññeyya”nti
tika-s0501t:79_13: vattabbattā “ko attho, byañjanaṃ katama”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – chabyañjanapadachaatthapadabhedena
tika-s0501t:79_15: mama nettippakaraṇassa visayaṃ sāsanavaranti ñātabbaṃ. Sarūpato pucchitvā atthapadaṃ,
tika-s0501t:80_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “sāsanavara”nti vuttassa suttassa pariyattibhāvañceva atthapadabyañjanapadabhāvena
tika-s0501t:80_1: veditabbattañca dassetvā idāni tassa suttassa pavicayūpāyaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ padatthavibhāgena
tika-s0501t:80_2: dassetuṃ “soḷasahārā”tyādimāha. Atha vā dutiyagāthāya nettippakaraṇassa visayaṃ sāsanavaraṃ
tika-s0501t:80_3: niyametvā dassitaṃ, “netti nāma katamā, katividhā”ti pucchitabbattā nettināma ettikāti
tika-s0501t:80_4: saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “soḷasahārā”tyādimāha. Tattha tassa sāsanassa suttassa atthapariyeṭṭhi
tika-s0501t:80_5: nettisaṃvaṇṇanā mayā mahākaccāyanena niddiṭṭhā netti nāma soḷasahārasamudāyā pañcanayasamudāyā
tika-s0501t:81_0: Te hārādayo kenaṭṭhena netti nāma? Veneyyasatte ariyadhammaṃ netīti nettīti evamādi
tika-s0501t:81_1: attho saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttova. Imāya tatiyagāthāyapi “mahākaccānena niddiṭṭhā”ti pāṭho
tika-s0501t:81_2: sundaro. “Mahākaccāyanena niddiṭṭhā”ti vā pāṭho, na sundaro. Lakkhaṇañhi mayā heṭṭhā
tika-s0501t:81_3: vuttanti. “Soḷasahārādisamudāyā nettī”ti vuttā, te hārā suttassa byañjanavicayo vā
tika-s0501t:81_4: honti, atthavicayo vā, nayā ca byañjanavicayo vā honti, atthavicayo vāti vicāraṇāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:81_5: sati “ime imassa vicayo”ti niyametvā dassetuṃ “hārā byañjanavicayo”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0501t:81_6: hārā suttassa byañjanavicayo honti, na atthavicayo soḷasahārānaṃ mūlapadaniddhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:81_7: vajjetvā byañjanamukheneva saṃvaṇṇanābhāvato. Tayo pana nayā suttassa atthavicayo
tika-s0501t:82_0: “Taṃ ubhayaṃ sutte saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena kenaci katthaciyeva yojetabbaṃ, udāhu sabbathā
tika-s0501t:82_1: sabbattha yojita”nti pucchitabbabhāvato taṃ ubhayaṃ sabbattha suttesu sabbathā yojitanti
tika-s0501t:82_2: dassetuṃ “ubhayaṃ pariggahīta”nti vuttaṃ. Hārā ceva nayā ca ubhayaṃ suttassa atthaniddhāraṇavasena
tika-s0501t:82_3: parito samantato gahitaṃ sabbathā suttesu yojitanti.
tika-s0501t:83_0: “Hārādisamudāyabhūtaṃ nettisaṅkhātaṃ suttaṃ kathaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetī”ti
tika-s0501t:83_1: vattabbabhāvato vuttaṃ “vuccati suttaṃ yathāsutta”nti. Nettisaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāsuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:83_2: saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttānurūpaṃ yathā yena yena desanāhārena vā aññena vā saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:83_3: tena tena vuccati saṃvaṇṇetīti attho. Atha vā “nettisaṅkhātaṃ suttaṃ kittakaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ
tika-s0501t:83_4: suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetī”ti vattabbabhāvato vuttaṃ “vuccati suttaṃ yathāsutta”nti. Tattha
tika-s0501t:83_5: yathāsuttaṃ yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ nettisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0501t:83_6: suttaṃ vuccati vadati assādādīnavadassanavasena saṃvaṇṇetīti. Tena vuttaṃ “nettinayena
tika-s0501t:83_7: hi saṃvaṇṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nāma suttaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-s0501t:84_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ suttaṃ nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya saṃvaṇṇitaṃ, sā saṃvaṇṇetabbā
tika-s0501t:84_1: desanā ca viññeyyā, udāhu desitabbañcā”ti vattabbabhāvato “yā ceva desanā”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t:84_2: Yā ceva desanā pāḷi saṃvaṇṇitā, sā ca, tāya desanāya desitaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ, tañca
tika-s0501t:84_3: ubhayaṃ vimuttāyatanadesanāsīsena paricayaṃ karontehi ekantena viññeyyaṃ ubhayasseva
tika-s0501t:84_5: sādhetabbe sādhetabbassa vijānanassa hetubhūtā katamā anupubbī”ti pucchitabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:84_6: vuttaṃ “tatrā”tyādi. Tattha tatra vijānane sādhetabbe suttādinavaṅgassa sāsanassa
tika-s0501t:84_7: atthapariyesanā atthavicāraṇā hāranayānaṃ ayaṃ anupubbī vijānanassa sādhetabbassa
tika-s0501t:84_8: hetubhūtā anupubbī nāmāti attho. Atha vā tassa ubhayassa vijānane sādhetabbe suttādinavaṅgassa
tika-s0501t:84_9: sāsanassa atthapariyesanāya atthavicāraṇāya ayaṃ anupubbī vijānanassa sādhetabbassa
tika-s0501t:84_10: hetubhūtā anupubbī nāmāti. Atha vā vakkhamānāya hāranayānupubbiyā navavidhasuttantapariyesanā
tika-s0501t:84_11: vijānanassa hetubhūtāti veditabbā. Tenākāreneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tidhā vuttāti.
tika-s0501t:87_0: 1. Evaṃ saṅgahavārena saṅkhepato dassite hārādayo idāni vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tattha
tika-s0501t:87_1: katame soḷasa hārā”tiādidesanā āraddhā. Atha vā soḷasahārādisamudāyā netti nāma mayā
tika-s0501t:87_2: mahākaccānena niddiṭṭhāti vuttā, “katame te soḷasa hārā”ti pucchitabbattā vuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:87_3: “tattha soḷasa hārā”tyādi. Tattha tatthāti tesu soḷasahārādīsu. Desanā hāro, vicayo
tika-s0501t:87_4: hāro…pe… sāmāropano hāroti ime soḷasa hārāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0501t:88_0: Tattha sabbasādhāraṇattā hārapadassa vacanattho paṭhamaṃ vattabbo. Kenaṭṭhena hārāti?
tika-s0501t:88_1: Harīyanti etehīti hārā. Etehi saṃvaṇṇanāvisesehi saṃvaṇṇiyesu suttageyyādīsu aññāṇasaṃsayavipallāsā
tika-s0501t:88_2: harīyanti, iti aññāṇādiharaṇakāraṇattā “etehī”ti padena niddiṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇanāvisesā
tika-s0501t:88_3: hārā nāma, hara-dhātuyā ācariyassa vacībhedasaddo, taṃsamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo ca
tika-s0501t:88_6: phalūpacārattho, iti-saddena sā upanissayapaccayasattiyeva parāmasīyati. Taṃsattisampannā
tika-s0501t:88_7: saṃvaṇṇanāvisesā ṇa-paccayatthā honti. Esa nayo evarūpesu ṭhānesupi. Vitthāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto eva.
tika-s0501t:89_0: Asādhāraṇato pana desīyati etāyāti desanā. Etāya saṃvaṇṇanāya saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttattho
tika-s0501t:89_1: desīyati saṃvaṇṇīyati saṃvaṇṇanānusārena ñāpīyati, iti ñāpanakāraṇattā “etāyā”ti
tika-s0501t:89_2: padena niddiṭṭhā visesasaṃvaṇṇanā desanā nāma, na pāḷidesanā, pāḷidesanāya saṃvaṇṇetabbasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvena
tika-s0501t:89_3: sahacaraṇato vā desanā. Kiñcāpi aññe hārā desanāpāḷisaṅkhātassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato
tika-s0501t:89_4: desanāya sahacārino honti, ayaṃ pana hāro yebhuyyena yathārutavaseneva viññāyamānattā
tika-s0501t:89_5: pāḷidesanāya saha caratīti vattabbataṃ arahati, na tathā pare. Na hi assādādīnavanissaraṇādisandassanalakkhaṇarahitā
tika-s0501t:90_0: Viciyanti etenāti vicayo. Etena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena sutte padapañhādayo viciyanti,
tika-s0501t:90_1: iti vicāraṇakāraṇattā so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vicayo nāma. Katvatthādhikaraṇatthāpi labbhanti.
tika-s0501t:91_0: Yuttāyutti vicārīyati etāyāti yutti. Etāya visesasaṃvaṇṇanāya sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ bhūmigocarānaṃ
tika-s0501t:91_1: yuttāyutti vicārīyati, iti vicāraṇakāraṇattā “etāyā”ti padena niddiṭṭhā visesasaṃvaṇṇanā
tika-s0501t:91_2: yutti nāma. Idha uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo, yuttiyā vicāraṇā, vicāraṇīyabhāvena sahacaraṇato
tika-s0501t:91_3: vā yutti. Sabbahārānaṃ bhūmigocarānaṃ yuttāyuttivicāraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso yutti hāro.
tika-s0501t:92_0: Padati pavatteti phalaṃ etenāti padaṃ, kāraṇaṃ. Ṭhanti tiṭṭhanti ettha phalāni tadāyattavuttitāyāti
tika-s0501t:92_1: ṭhānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ. Padañca taṃ ṭhānañcāti padaṭṭhānaṃ, āsannakāraṇaṃ. Sutte āgatadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:92_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ vicārīyati etāyāti padaṭṭhānā, visesasaṃvaṇṇanā, vicāraṇalopova, sutte
tika-s0501t:92_3: āgatadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānānaṃ, tesañca padaṭṭhānānaṃ vicāraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso padaṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0501t:93_0: Sutte avuttāpi samānalakkhaṇā dhammā lakkhīyanti etena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesenāti lakkhaṇo,
tika-s0501t:93_1: sutte vuttena dhammena samānalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ avuttānampi niddhāraṇalakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t:94_0: Sutte dassiyamānā nibbacanādayo cattāropi viyūhīyanti vibhāgena sampiṇḍīyanti ettha,
tika-s0501t:94_1: etena vāti byūho, catunnaṃ nibbacanādīnaṃ byūho catubyūho. Nibbacanādhippāyabyañjanānañceva
tika-s0501t:94_2: desanānidānassa ca pubbāparena saddhiṃ sandassanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0501t:95_0: Desanāya gahitadhammena sabhāgā, visabhāgā ca dhammā āvaṭṭīyanti ettha, etena vāti
tika-s0501t:95_1: āvaṭṭo, desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvaṭṭanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso āvaṭṭo hāro.
tika-s0501t:96: Asādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ saṃkilesadhamme, vodānadhamme ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato, padaṭṭhānato, bhūmito ca vibhajanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vibhatti hāro.
tika-s0501t:97: Sutte niddiṭṭhā dhammā paṭipakkhavasena parivattīyanti iminā, ettha vāti parivatto, sutte niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parivattano hāro.
tika-s0501t:98_0: Sutte vuttassa ekasseva atthassa vācakaṃ vividhaṃ vacanaṃ ettha saṃvaṇṇanāviseseti
tika-s0501t:98_1: vivacanaṃ, vivacanameva vevacanaṃ, sutte vutte ekasmiṃ atthe anekapariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t:99: Sutte vuttā atthā pakārehi ñāpīyanti iminā, ettha vāti paññatti, ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpetabbākāralakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso paññatti hāro.
tika-s0501t:100: Suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsu otarīyanti anuppavesīyanti ettha, etena vāti otaraṇo, paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0501t:101: Sutte padapadatthapañhārambhā sodhīyanti samādhīyanti ettha, etena vāti sodhano, sutte padapadatthapañhārambhānaṃ sodhanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sodhano hāro.
tika-s0501t:102_0: Sāmaññavisesabhūtā dhammā vinā vikappena adhiṭṭhīyanti anuppavattīyanti ettha, etena
tika-s0501t:102_1: vāti adhiṭṭhāno, suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikappanavasena sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t:103_0: Yo hetu ceva paccayo ca phalaṃ parikaroti abhisaṅkharoti, iti so hetu ceva paccayo
tika-s0501t:103_1: ca parikkhāro, yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso taṃ parikkhāraṃ hetuñceva paccayañca ācikkhati,
tika-s0501t:103_2: iti so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parikkhāro nāma. Sutte āgatadhammānaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte
tika-s0501t:103_3: hetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0501t:104_0: Sutte āgatadhammā padaṭṭhānādimukhena samāropīyanti ettha, etena vāti samāropano,
tika-s0501t:104_2: samāropano hāro. Bhāvasādhanavasenāpi sabbattha vacanattho vattabboti tassāpi vasena
tika-s0501t:105_0: “Tattha katame soḷasa hārā desanā”tyādinā hārasarūpaṃ vuttaṃ, kimatthaṃ “tassānugīti”tyādi
tika-s0501t:105_1: vuttanti? Anugītigāthāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ puna “tassānugīti desanā vicayo yutti”tyādi
tika-s0501t:105_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti hāruddesassa. Anugītīti anu pacchā gāyanagāthā. Pañcadasoti
tika-s0501t:105_3: pañcadasamo. Soḷasoti soḷasamo. Atthato asaṃkiṇṇāti desanādipadatthato lakkhaṇatthato
tika-s0501t:105_4: saṅkarato rahitā. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so ca nesaṃ asaṅkaro lakkhaṇaniddese
tika-s0501t:105_5: supākaṭo hotī”ti. Sesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānusārena ñātabbanti. “Keci hārā kehici hārehi saṃkiṇṇā
tika-s0501t:105_6: viya dissanti, kasmā asaṃkiṇṇāti ñātabba”nti vattabbattā vuttaṃ “etesañcevā”tiādi.
tika-s0501t:105_7: Tattha etesañceva bhavatīti etesaṃ soḷasannaṃ hārānaṃ yathā yenākārena asaṅkaro hoti,
tika-s0501t:105_8: tathā asaṅkarākārena bhavati. Ayati pavattati nayavibhattīti ayā, vitthārena ayāti
tika-s0501t:105_9: vitthāratayā, ta-kāro missakadosāpagamatthāya āgato, nayavibhattivisesavacanaṃ. Nayena
tika-s0501t:105_10: ñāyena vibhatti nayavibhatti, na pañcanayavibhattāhārānaṃ vitthārena pavattā ñāyavibhatti
tika-s0501t:105_11: tathā asaṅkarākārena bhavati tasmiṃ asaṃkiṇṇāti ñātabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:106_0: 2. Soḷasa hārā sarūpato vuttā, amhehi ca viññātā, “katame pañca nayā”ti vattabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:106_1: tathā pucchitvā sarūpato uddisituṃ “tattha katame pañca nayā”tyādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:106_2: pana “evaṃ hāre uddisitvā idāni naye uddisituṃ ‘tattha katame’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:106_3: “Tattha nayanti saṃkilese, vodāne ca vibhāgato ñāpentīti nayā, nīyanti vā tāni ettha,
tika-s0501t:106_4: etehi vāti nayā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārena vacanattho vutto. Nī-dhātuyā nandiyāvaṭṭādinayānusārena
tika-s0501t:106_5: saṃkilese, vodāne ca ālambitvā pavatto ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo mukhyattho, nandiyāvaṭṭādinayānaṃ
tika-s0501t:106_6: upanissayapaccayasatti phalūpacārato gahitā, iti-saddo taṃ phalūpacārato gahitasattiṃ
tika-s0501t:107_0: Taṇhāavijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttassa, samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa suttassa
tika-s0501t:107_1: catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo. Tattha
tika-s0501t:107_2: catusaccanti taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhavamūlattā samudayasaccaṃ, avasesā tebhūmakā dhammā
tika-s0501t:107_3: dukkhasaccaṃ, samathavipassanā maggasaccaṃ, tena pattabbā asaṅkhatadhātu nirodhasaccanti.
tika-s0501t:108_0: Tīhi avayavehi lobhādīhi saṃkilesapakkhe, tīhi avayavehi alobhādīhi ca vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:108_1: pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo, akusalamūlehi saṃkilesapakkhassa, kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa
tika-s0501t:109_0: Sīhassa bhagavato vikkīḷitaṃ ettha nayeti sīhavikkīḷito, subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi
tika-s0501t:110_0: Atthanayattayadisābhāvena kusalādidhammānaṃ ālocanaṃ disālocanaṃ. Tassa tassa atthanayassa
tika-s0501t:110_1: yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesu ye vodānādayo, saṃkilesikā ca tassa
tika-s0501t:110_2: tassa nayassa disābhūtā dhammā suttato niddhāretvā kathitā, tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:110_3: citteneva “ayaṃ paṭhamā disā, ayaṃ dutiyā disā”tiādinā ālocanaṃ disālocanaṃ.
tika-s0501t:111: Tathā ālocitānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthanayattayayojane samānayanato aṅkuso viyāti aṅkuso, tassa tassa nayassa disābhūtānaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ samānayanaṃ aṅkuso nayo.
tika-s0501t:112_0: Lañjetīti lañjako. Yo nayo suttatthaṃ lañjeti pakāseti, iti lañjanato pakāsanato
tika-s0501t:112_1: so nayo lañjako nāma, nayo ca so lañjako cāti nayalañjako. Nayalañjako paṭhamo nandiyāvaṭṭo
tika-s0501t:112_2: nāma, nayalañjako dutiyo tipukkhalo nāma, nayalañjako tatiyo sīhavikkīḷito nāmāti yojetabbo.
tika-s0501t:113: Uggatānaṃ visesena uggatoti uttamo, taṃ uttamaṃ. Gatāti ñātā, matāti attho. “Matā”ti vā pāṭho. Sesamettha vuttanayānusārenapi saṃvaṇṇanānusārenapi jānitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:115_1: kakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇaṃ paramatthasabhāvo. Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – yasmiṃ bhinne,
tika-s0501t:115_2: itarāpohe vā cittena kate na tathā buddhi, idaṃ sammutisaccaṃ yathā ghaṭe, sasambhārajale
tika-s0501t:116_0: Vacane ghaṭakathalaāpajalakaddamādisaṅkhātaṃ samūhādiṃ upādāya lokassa pubbe ghaṭakathalaāpajalakaddamādisaṅketasiddhā
tika-s0501t:116_3: “Yadi evaṃ ghaṭādike abhinne vā āpādike vā anurūpena ūnabhāvena appavattamāne vā
tika-s0501t:116_4: sati sammutibhāvo hotu, bhinne vā ūne vā kathaṃ sammutibhāvo bhaveyya, pathavīphassādīnampi
tika-s0501t:116_5: bhijjamānattā, kakkhaḷaphusanādīnañca pathavīphassādīhi anaññattā kathaṃ paramatthasabhāvo
tika-s0501t:116_6: bhaveyya, katamena saṅkhepena atthena sammutisabhāvo, paramatthasabhāvo ca amhehi
tika-s0501t:116_7: jānitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “ayañhettha saṅkhepo”tiādimāha. Tattha etthāti etesu
tika-s0501t:116_8: sammutisabhāvaparamatthasabhāvesu ayaṃ nayo vuccamāno saṅkhepo attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:117_0: Yasmiṃ ghaṭādike bhinne sati tato ghaṭādito itaro kathalādibhāvo cittena pubbe katena
tika-s0501t:117_1: yathā yena kathalādivohārena bhavati, yasmiṃ āpādike sambhārajalādike ūnabhāvena
tika-s0501t:117_2: pavattamāne sati vā tato āpādito itaro kaddamādibhāvo cittena pubbe katena yathā
tika-s0501t:117_3: yena kaddamādivohārena bhavati, tathā tena vohārena buddhi kathalādisabhāvajānanaṃ
tika-s0501t:117_4: kaddamādisabhāvajānanaṃ bhavati, idaṃ abhinne ghaṭādikaṃ vā bhinne kathalādikaṃ vā
tika-s0501t:117_5: anūne āpādikaṃ vā ūne kaddamādikaṃ vā sabbaṃ sammutisaccaṃ hotveva. “Kaddamasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:117_6: bhinne, kaddamasmiṃ ūne vā sati itaro sammutisabhāvo”ti pucchitabbabhāvato “ghaṭe,
tika-s0501t:118_0: Sammutisaccasabhāvo tumhehi vutto, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo paramatthasaccasabhāvo”ti
tika-s0501t:118_2: itarassa phusanādilakkhaṇassa asambhavato, phassādīnañca phusanādilakkhaṇato itarassa
tika-s0501t:118_4: hotvevāti imasmiṃ saṅkhepatthe gahite koci virodho natthīti adhippāyoti.
tika-s0501t:119_0: 3. Pañca nayā sarūpato ācariyena uddiṭṭhā, amhehi ca viññātā, “yāni padāni aṭṭhārasa
tika-s0501t:119_1: mūlapadāni uddiṭṭhāni, katamāni tānī”ti pucchitabbattā tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha
tika-s0501t:119_2: katamāni aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni”tyādimāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ nayepi uddisitvā
tika-s0501t:119_3: idāni mūlapadāni uddisituṃ ‘tattha katamānī’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha kusalāni
tika-s0501t:119_4: nava padāni, akusalāni nava padāni aṭṭhārasa mūlapadānīti daṭṭhabbānīti yojanā. Mūlanti
tika-s0501t:119_5: patiṭṭhahanti etehi nayā, patiṭṭhānavibhāgā cāti mūlāni, padanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha
tika-s0501t:119_6: nayā, paṭṭhānavibhāgā, adhigamā cāti padāni, vuttappakāraṭṭhena mūlāni ca tāni padāni
tika-s0501t:119_7: cāti mūlapadāni. Kucchite pāpadhamme salayantīti kusalāni, kuse rāgādayo lunantīti
tika-s0501t:119_8: kusalāni, kusā viya lunantīti kusalāni, kusena ñāṇena lātabbāni pavattetabbānīti
tika-s0501t:119_9: kusalāni. Kusalānaṃ paṭipakkhānīti akusalāni a-saddo cettha paṭipakkhatthoti.
tika-s0501t:120_0: Nava padāni kusalāni, nava padāni akusalānīti gaṇanaparicchedato, jātibhedato ca
tika-s0501t:120_1: uddiṭṭhāni, “katamāni tānī”ti pucchitabbattā nava padāni akusalāni paccāsattinyāyena
tika-s0501t:120_2: sarūpato dassetuṃ “katamāni nava padāni akusalānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –
tika-s0501t:121: “Evaṃ gaṇanaparicchedato, jātibhedato ca mūlapadāni dassetvā idāni sarūpato dassento saṃkilesapakkhaṃyeva paṭhamaṃ uddisati ‘taṇhā’tiādinā”ti –
tika-s0501t:122_0: Vuttaṃ. Tattha rūpādike khandhe tasati paritasatīti taṇhā. Avindiyaṃ kāyaduccaritādiṃ
tika-s0501t:122_1: vindatīti avijjā, vindiyaṃ kāyasucaritādiṃ na vindatīti avijjā, vijjāya paṭipakkhāti
tika-s0501t:122_2: vā avijjā. Lubbhanti tenāti lobho, lubbhatīti vā lobho, lubbhanaṃ vā lobho. Dosamohesupi
tika-s0501t:122_3: eseva nayo. Asubhe rūpakkhandhādike “subha”nti pavattā saññā subhasaññā. Dukkhadukkhādike
tika-s0501t:122_4: “sukha”nti pavattā saññā sukhasaññā. Anicce saṅkhāradhamme “nicca”nti pavattā saññā
tika-s0501t:122_5: niccasaññā. Anattasabhāvesu cakkhādīsu khandhesu “attā”ti pavattā saññā attasaññā.
tika-s0501t:122_6: Yatthāti yesu padesu sabbo akusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati, tāni padāni
tika-s0501t:122_7: akusalānīti yojanā. Saṅgahaṃ gaṇanaṃ. Samosaraṇaṃ samāropanaṃ.
tika-s0501t:123_0: Paccanīkadhamme uddhaccādike nīvaraṇe sameti vūpasameti tadaṅgavikkhambhanavasenāti
tika-s0501t:123_1: samatho. Saṅkhāre aniccādīhi vividhehi ākārehi passatīti vipassanā. Lobhassa paṭipakkho
tika-s0501t:123_2: alobho. Dosassa paṭipakkho adoso. Mohassa paṭipakkho amoho. Etthāpi a-saddo paṭipakkhattho,
tika-s0501t:123_3: na abhāvatthādikoti adhippāyo. Asubhe rūpakkhandhādike, cakkhādimhi vā “asubha”nti
tika-s0501t:123_8: khandhe, cakkhādimhi vā “anattā”ti pavattā saññāpadhānacittuppādā anattasaññā, visesato
tika-s0501t:123_9: dhammānupassanāsatipadhānaṃ. Paññāsatisīsena hi pavattā ayaṃ desanā. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:123_10: bhagavatā “kathañca, bhikkhave, satibalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ? Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu, ettha
tika-s0501t:123_11: satibalaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti. Yatthāti yesu padesu sabbo kusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:124_0: Uddānanti uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ, saṅgahavacananti attho. Uddāne avutte sati
tika-s0501t:124_1: heṭṭhā vuttassa atthassa vippakiṇṇabhāvo dinno viya bhaveyya, tasmā vippakiṇṇabhāvassa
tika-s0501t:124_2: nivāraṇatthaṃ uddānanti adhippāyo. Caturo ca vipallāsāti subhasukhaniccaattasaññā.
tika-s0501t:124_3: Kilesā bhavanti ettha navapadesūti bhūmī, kilesānaṃ bhūmīti kilesabhūmī, kilesapavattanaṭṭhānāni
tika-s0501t:125: Caturo satipaṭṭhānāti asubhadukkhaaniccaanattasaññā. Indriyabhūmīti saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācanindriyānaṃ bhūmī pavattanaṭṭhānāni samosaraṇaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0501t:126_0: Navahi kusalapadehi kusalapakkhā yujjanti yojīyanti, navahi akusalapadehi akusalapakkhā
tika-s0501t:126_1: yujjanti yojīyanti. Navahi kusalapadehi saha kusalapakkhā yujjanti yujjantā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:126_2: navahi akusalapadehi saha akusalapakkhā yujjanti yujjantā bhavantīti uddesavāre vuttāvaseso
tika-s0501t:131_0: 4. Hārādīsu samudāyassa nettippakaraṇassa uddeso uddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo
tika-s0501t:131_1: niddeso”ti pucchitabbattā uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṃ “tattha saṅkhepato nettī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:131_2: āraddhaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṃ ‘tattha saṅkhepato’tiādi
tika-s0501t:131_3: āraddha”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ “tattha katame soḷasa hārā? Desanā vicayo”tiādiuddesapāṭhe.
tika-s0501t:131_4: Saṅkhepatoti samāsato. Nettīti nettippakaraṇaṃ. Kittitāti kathitā, idāni niddesato
tika-s0501t:135_0: Gāthāyaṃ yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena sutte āgatā assādopi ādīnavatā ādīnavopi nissaraṇampi
tika-s0501t:135_1: phalampi upāyopi yogīnaṃ atthāya bhagavato āṇattipi ime dhammā dassitā saṃvaṇṇitā
tika-s0501t:135_2: saṃvaṇṇanāvasena ñāpitā, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:136_0: Vacanatthādayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato vuttāva, tasmā kiñcimattameva kathessāmi.
tika-s0501t:136_1: Assādīyateti assādo, ko so? Sukhaṃ, somanassaṃ, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtā pañcupādānakkhandhā
tika-s0501t:136_2: ca. Assādeti etāyāti vā assādo, ko so? Taṇhā, vipallāsā ca. Vipallāsavasena hi ekacce
tika-s0501t:137_0: Ābhusaṃ kammena dīnaṃ dukkhādi hutvā vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo, dukkhādi. Atha vā
tika-s0501t:137_1: ativiya ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ hutvā vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo, kapaṇamanusso, tathābhāvā
tika-s0501t:138: Nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, ariyamaggo. Nissaratīti vā nissaraṇaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Nissaraṇabhedo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ bahudhā vuttova.
tika-s0501t:139_0: Phalati pavattatīti phalaṃ, desanāya phalaṃ. Yadipi desanā phalanipphādikā na hoti,
tika-s0501t:139_1: tathāpi bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā puññasambhārā sambhavanti, puññasambhārahetuto
tika-s0501t:139_2: phalaṃ pavattaṃ, tasmā desanāya phalaṃ nāmāti. Katamaṃ taṃ? Devamanussesu āyuvaṇṇasukhabalayasaparivāraadhipateyyaupadhisampatticakkavattisiridevarajja-
tika-s0501t:140_0: Paccayasāmaggiṃ upagantvā ayati pavattati phalaṃ etenāti upāyo, ko so? Ariyamaggassa
tika-s0501t:140_1: pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. Purimā paṭipadā hi pacchimāya paṭipadāya adhigamūpāyo, paramparāya
tika-s0501t:140_2: magganibbānādhigamassa ca upāyo. Keci “maggopi upāyo”ti vadanti, tesaṃ matena nibbānameva
tika-s0501t:140_3: nissaraṇanti vuttaṃ siyā. “Te pahāya tare oghanti idaṃ nissaraṇa”nti pana ariyamaggassa
tika-s0501t:140_4: nissaraṇabhāvaṃ vakkhati, tasmā kesañci vādo na gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:141: Āṇattīti āṇārahassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ hitasiddhiyā “evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjāhi, micchāpaṭipattiṃ mā paṭipajjāhī”ti vidhānaṃ āṇāṭhapanaṃ āṇatti nāma.
tika-s0501t:142_0: Yujjanti payujjanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāsūti yogino, veneyyā, tesaṃ yogīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:142_1: atthāyāti vacanasesaṃ nīharitvā yojanā kātabbā. Sutte āgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ assādādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:142_2: ekadesāgatānampi nīharitvā sabbesaṃ vibhajanasaṃvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhāroti niddesato
tika-s0501t:142_3: gahetabbo, so ca vibhajanākāro desanāhāravibhaṅge āgamissatīti idha na dassitoti.
tika-s0501t:143: Desanāhāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo vicayahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:145: “Yaṃ pucchitañca vissajjitañca, suttassa yā ca anugīti.
tika-s0501t:146: Suttassa yo pavicayo, hāro vicayoti niddiṭṭho”ti. –
tika-s0501t:147_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha suttassa yaṃ pucchitañca yā pucchā vicayamānā ca suttassa yaṃ
tika-s0501t:147_1: vissajjitañca yā vissajjanā vicayamānā ca suttassa yo padādivicayo, assādādivicayo
tika-s0501t:147_2: ca atthi, te vuttappakārā vicayamānā pucchādayo yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena viciyanti,
tika-s0501t:147_3: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vicayo hāroti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:148: Pucchīyate pucchitaṃ. Vissajjīyate vissajjitanti bhāvasādhanattho daṭṭhabbo, na kammasādhanattho. Tena vuttaṃ ṭīkāyaṃ “bhāvatthe toti āha – ‘vissajjitanti vissajjanā”’ti.
tika-s0501t:149: “Suttassā”ti niyamitattā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ na gahetabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. So vicayo hāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttova. Kathaṃ? –
tika-s0501t:150_0: “Ayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā
tika-s0501t:150_1: sattādhiṭṭhānā dhammādhiṭṭhānā ekādhiṭṭhānā anekādhiṭṭhānā sammutivisayā paramatthavisayā
tika-s0501t:150_3: vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sāvasesaṃ
tika-s0501t:150_4: niravasesaṃ sauttaraṃ niruttaraṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttara”ntiādinā vissajjanavicayo.
tika-s0501t:151_0: “Ayaṃ pucchā iminā sameti, etena na sametī”ti pucchitatthaṃ ānetvā, vicayo pubbenāparaṃ
tika-s0501t:151_1: saṃsanditvā ca vicayo pubbāparavicayo. “Ayaṃ anugīti vuttatthasaṅgahā avuttatthasaṅgahā
tika-s0501t:151_5: sabbesañca dvāvīsatiyā tikesu, dvācattālīsādhike ca dukasate labbhamānapadavasena
tika-s0501t:152_1: aniccatādīnaṃ ādiantavantatāya aniccantikatāya ca “aniccā”tiādinā sabbesañca lokiyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:152_5: Phalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsuttadesanāya sādhetabbaphalassa tadupāyassa tattha tattha suttavidhivacanassa
tika-s0501t:155_0: “Cakkhu anicca”nti puṭṭhe “āma, cakkhu aniccamevā”ti ekantato vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:155_3: kusala”nti puṭṭhe “kiṃ anavajjaṭṭho kusalattho, udāhu sukhavipākaṭṭho”ti paṭipucchitvā
tika-s0501t:155_4: vissajjanaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṃ, “sassato attā, asassato vā”ti vutte “abyākatameta”ntiādinā
tika-s0501t:155_5: avissajjanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ, “kiṃ panete ‘kusalā’ti vā ‘dhammā’ti vā ekatthā, udāhu nānatthā”ti
tika-s0501t:155_6: idaṃ pucchanaṃ sāvasesaṃ. Vissajjanassa pana sāvasesato veneyyajjhāsayavasena desanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:155_7: veditabbā. Apāṭihīrakaṃ sauttaraṃ sappāṭihīrakaṃ niruttaraṃ, sesaṃ vicayahāraniddese suviññeyyamevāti –
tika-s0501t:156: Vuttova. Saṃvaṇṇanāsu vutto attho anākulo pākaṭo yatipotehi viññāto, so sabbattha amhehi na vibhattoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:157: Vicayahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo yuttihāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:159: “Sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ, yā bhūmī yo ca gocaro tesaṃ.
tika-s0501t:161_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha sabbesaṃ soḷasannaṃ hārānaṃ yā bhūmi pavattanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ byañjanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:161_1: yo gocaro suttattho ca atthi, tesaṃ bhūmisaṅkhātabyañjanagocarasaṅkhātasuttatthānaṃ
tika-s0501t:161_2: yā yuttāyuttaparikkhā yuttāyuttīnaṃ vicāraṇā saṃvaṇṇanā katā, so yuttiayuttiparikkhāvicāraṇasaṅkhāto
tika-s0501t:162_0: Tesaṃ hārānaṃ bhūmibhūtassa sutte āgatassa byañjanassa yuttibhāvo duvidho sabhāvaniruttibhāvo,
tika-s0501t:162_1: adhippetatthavācakabhāvo ca. Gocarabhūtassa pana sutte āgatassa yuttibhāvo suttavinayadhammatāhi
tika-s0501t:163: Yuttihāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo padaṭṭhānahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:165: “Dhammaṃ deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:166: Iti yāva sabbadhammā, eso hāro padaṭṭhāno”ti. –
tika-s0501t:167_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha dhammanti yaṃ kiñci kusalādidhammaṃ sutte jino deseti, tassa
tika-s0501t:167_1: sutte jinena desitassa kusalādidhammassa yañca padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ, taṃ taṃ
tika-s0501t:167_2: padaṭṭhānañcāti evaṃ vuttanayena yāva yattakā sabbe dhammā sutte jinena desitā, tattakānaṃ
tika-s0501t:167_3: sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ yañca padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ, tassa ca padaṭṭhānassa yañca
tika-s0501t:167_4: padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ, taṃ taṃ padaṭṭhānañca, iti evaṃ vuttanayena yāva yattakā
tika-s0501t:167_5: sabbe padaṭṭhānadhammā niddhāretabbāva, tattakāni sabbāni dhammapadaṭṭhānāni yathānurūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:167_6: niddhāretvā yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena kathitāni, eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “padaṭṭhāno hāro”ti
tika-s0501t:168_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ, abyākatassa dhammassa yathārahaṃ kusalākusalābyākatā padaṭṭhānantiādinā niddhāretabbanti.
tika-s0501t:169: Padaṭṭhānahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo lakkhaṇahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:172: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:173_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha ekadhamme sutte bhagavatā vuttamhi, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niddhārite
tika-s0501t:173_1: vā sati tena dhammena ye keci dhammā ekalakkhaṇā bhavanti, sabbe te dhammā sutte
tika-s0501t:173_2: sarūpato avuttāpi samānalakkhaṇatāya saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena ānetvā yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena
tika-s0501t:173_3: vuttā bhavanti, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “lakkhaṇo nāma hāro”ti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:174_0: Ekaṃ samānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti ekalakkhaṇā, samānalakkhaṇā, sahacāritāya vā samānakiccatāya
tika-s0501t:174_1: vā samānahetutāya vā samānaphalatāya vā samānārammaṇatāya vā avuttāpi niddhāritāti.
tika-s0501t:174_3: saññāya sahagatā dhammā niddhāritā. “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”tiādīsu samānakiccatā,
tika-s0501t:174_6: niddhāritā, “rūpaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjatī”tiādīsu samānārammaṇatāya
tika-s0501t:174_7: taṃsampayuttā vedanādayopi niddhāritā, niddhāretvā vattabbāti atthoti. Vitthāro vibhaṅgavāre āgamissati.
tika-s0501t:175: Lakkhaṇo hāro niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo catubyūho hāro”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:179_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha neruttaṃ suttapadanibbacanañca buddhānaṃ tassa tassa suttassa
tika-s0501t:179_1: desakānaṃ, sāvakānaṃ vā adhippāyo ca atthabyañjanena byañjanamukhena desanānidānañca
tika-s0501t:179_2: pubbāparena anusandhi ca ete niruttādayo yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena vibhāvīyanti, eso
tika-s0501t:179_3: saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “catubyūho hāro”ti niddiṭṭho. Desanāpavattinimittaṃ desakassa ajjhāsayādi
tika-s0501t:179_4: desanānidānaṃ nāma. Catubyūhahārassa bahuvisayattā vibhaṅge lakkhaṇasampattiṃ katvā kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t:180: Catubyūhahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo āvaṭṭahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:183: Āvaṭṭati paṭipakkhe, āvaṭṭo nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t:184_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha parakkamadhātuādīnaṃ padaṭṭhāne ekamhi ārambhadhātuādike desanāruḷhe
tika-s0501t:184_1: sati visabhāgatāya vā sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati, desanāya sarūpato aggahaṇena
tika-s0501t:184_2: vā sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati, yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena pariyesitvā yojento desanaṃ
tika-s0501t:184_3: pamādādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūte kosajjādike paṭipakkhe āvaṭṭati āvaṭṭāpeti, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:185_0: “Paṭipakkhe”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, sesepi sabhāge āvaṭṭanato. Na hi ārambhadhātuādike
tika-s0501t:185_1: desanāruḷhe sati tappaṭipakkhe kosajjādikeyeva desanaṃ āvaṭṭeti, atha kho avasesavīriyārambhādikepi desanaṃ āvaṭṭetīti.
tika-s0501t:186: Āvaṭṭahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo vibhattihāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:190_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha kusalādivasena anekavidhaṃ sabhāvadhammañca dānasīlādipadaṭṭhānañca
tika-s0501t:190_1: “dassanabhūmi bhāvanābhūmī”ti evamādikaṃ bhūmiñca sādhāraṇe ca asādhāraṇe ca yena
tika-s0501t:190_2: saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena vibhajate, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “vibhatti hāro”ti neyyoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:191_0: “Imasmiṃ sutte vuttā kusalā vāsanābhāgiyā, imasmiṃ sutte vuttā kusalā nibbedhabhāgiyā”tyādinā,
tika-s0501t:191_1: “imasmiṃ sutte vuttā akusalā kilesabhāgiyā”tyādinā dhammañca, “idaṃ sīlaṃ imassa
tika-s0501t:191_2: mahaggatavisesassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ sīlaṃ idaṃ jhānaṃ imassa lokuttarassa padaṭṭhāna”ntyādinā
tika-s0501t:191_5: sādhāraṇe ca, “kāmarāgabyāpādā anāgāmiarahantānaṃ asādhāraṇā”tyādinā asādhāraṇe ca
tika-s0501t:191_6: yena vibhajati, so vibhatti hāro nāmātiādinā vitthāretvā vibhajanākāro gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:192: Vibhattihāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo parivattanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:196_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha sutte bhāvite bhāvitabbe kusale anavajjadhamme niddiṭṭhe kathite,
tika-s0501t:196_1: saṃvaṇṇite vā pahīne pahātabbe akusale sāvajjadhamme niddiṭṭhe kathite, saṃvaṇṇite
tika-s0501t:196_2: vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhe viparītadhamme yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena parivattati
tika-s0501t:196_3: parivatteti, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “parivattano hāro nāmā”ti veditabboti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:197_1: vā pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa pāṇātipāto pahīno”tiādinā ca “bhuñjitabbā kāmā …pe… kāmehi
tika-s0501t:197_2: veramaṇī tesaṃ adhammo”tiādinā ca paṭipakkhe parivattanabhāvaṃ vibhaṅgavāre vakkhatīti na vitthāritā.
tika-s0501t:198: Parivattanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo vevacanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:201: Yo jānāti suttavidū, vevacano nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t:202_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha ekadhammassa padatthassa sutte vuttāni tu vuttāni eva, bahūni
tika-s0501t:202_1: tu bahūni eva vevacanāni yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena yo suttavidū jānāti, jānitvā ekasmiṃyeva
tika-s0501t:202_2: padatthe yojeti, tassa suttaviduno so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “vevacano nāma hāro”ti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:203_0: Ettha ca yo so-saddā asamānatthā ca hontīti “yo suttavidū”ti vatvā “so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso”ti
tika-s0501t:203_1: vuttanti. “Bhagavā”ti padassa ekasmiṃyeva atthe bhagavati “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho
tika-s0501t:203_2: vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0501t:203_3: buddho bhagavā, phalanipphattigato vesārajjappatto adhigatapaṭisambhido catuyogavippahīno
tika-s0501t:203_5: bandhanātīto ganthaviniveṭhano ajjhāsayavītivatto bhinnandhakāro cakkhumā lokadhammasamatikkanto
tika-s0501t:203_6: anurodhavirodhavippayutto iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu dhammesu asaṅkhepagato bandhanātivatto ṭhapitasaṅgāmo
tika-s0501t:203_7: abhikkantataro ukkādharo ālokakaro pajjotakaro tamonudo raṇañjaho aparimāṇavaṇṇo
tika-s0501t:203_8: appameyyavaṇṇo asaṅkheyyavaṇṇo ābhaṅkaro pabhaṅkaro dhammobhāsapajjotakaro”ti evamādīni
tika-s0501t:203_9: bahūni vevacanāni yojitāni. Vitthāro vibhaṅgavāre āgamissati.
tika-s0501t:204: Vevacanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo paññattihāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:207: So ākāro ñeyyo, paññattī nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t:208_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha bhagavā ekaṃ khandhādidhammaṃ vividhāhi nikkhepappabhavapaññattādīhi
tika-s0501t:208_1: paññattīhi yena paññāpetabbākārena deseti, so paññāpetabbākāro yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena
tika-s0501t:208_2: vibhāvito, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “paññatti hāro nāmā”ti ñeyyoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:209_2: ekapadatthasseva paññāpetabbākāravibhāvanālakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso paññatti hāro nāmāti.
tika-s0501t:210: Tattha “idaṃ dukkha”nti ayaṃ paññatti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ, channaṃ dhātūnaṃ, aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ, dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ, dasannaṃ indriyānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti.
tika-s0501t:211_0: “Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0501t:211_1: tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷhaṃ. Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ viruḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa
tika-s0501t:211_2: avakkanti. Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhī”ti
tika-s0501t:211_3: evamādi pabhavapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa cāti.
tika-s0501t:212_0: “Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī, natthi taṇhā”ti evamādi
tika-s0501t:212_2: sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassā”ti ca “nikkhepapaññatti sutamayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti
tika-s0501t:213: Paṇṇattihāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo otaraṇahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:216: Etehi otarati yo, otaraṇo nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t:217_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha yo paṭiccasamuppādo ca ye indriyakhandhā ca yāni dhātuāyatanāni
tika-s0501t:217_2: sutte āgatapadatthamukhena niddhāriyamānehi ca yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso otarati ogāhati
tika-s0501t:217_3: paṭiccasamuppādādike tattha vācakavasena, tattha ñāpakavasena vā anupavisati, so
tika-s0501t:218: Tattha indriyakhandhāti indriyāni ca khandhā cāti indriyakhandhā. Dhātuāyatanāti dhātuyo ca āyatanāni ca dhātuāyatanā. Kathaṃ otaraṇo? “Uddhaṃ adho sabbadhi vippamutto”tiādi pāṭho.
tika-s0501t:219: Uddhanti rūpadhātu ca arūpadhātu ca. Adhoti kāmadhātu. Sabbadhi vippamuttoti tedhātuke ayaṃ asekkhāvimutti. Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni, ayaṃ indriyehi otaraṇā.
tika-s0501t:220: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti, ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādehi otaraṇā.
tika-s0501t:221: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena, ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇā.
tika-s0501t:222: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā, ayaṃ dhātūhi otaraṇā.
tika-s0501t:223: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ, ayaṃ āyatanehi otaraṇāti evamādīhi vibhaṅge āgamissatīti.
tika-s0501t:224: Otaraṇahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo sodhanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:228_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ āruḷhe pañhe ñātumicchite atthe bhagavatā vissajjanagāthāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:228_1: vissajjitamhi yaṃ suttatthaṃ ārabbha adhikicca sā gāthā pucchitā pucchanatthāya ṭhapitā,
tika-s0501t:228_2: tassa suttatthassa yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena suddhāsuddhaparikkhā vicāraṇā bhave, so
tika-s0501t:229_0: Kathaṃ? “Avijjāya nivuto loko”ti padaṃ sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito. “Vivicchā pamādā
tika-s0501t:229_1: nappakāsatī”ti padaṃ sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito. “Jappābhilepanaṃ brūmī”ti padaṃ
tika-s0501t:229_2: sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito. “Dukkhamassa mahabbhaya”nti padañca sodhitaṃ, ārambho
tika-s0501t:229_3: ca sodhitoti. Evaṃ padādīnaṃ sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāro hāro sodhano nāma. Vitthārato
tika-s0501t:230: Sodhanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo adhiṭṭhānahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:233: Te na vikappayitabbā, eso hāro adhiṭṭhāno”ti. –
tika-s0501t:234_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha ye dukkhasaccādayo dhammā ekattatāya sāmaññenapi ca vemattatāya
tika-s0501t:234_1: visesenapi niddiṭṭhā, yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena niddiṭṭhā dukkhasaccādayo dhammā na
tika-s0501t:234_3: viya apekkhāsiddhito ca, eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso adhiṭṭhāno hāroti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:235_0: Tattha ekattatāyāti ekassa samānassa bhāvo ekattaṃ, ekattameva ekattatā, tāya. Ekasaddo
tika-s0501t:235_1: cettha samānatthavācako, na saṅkhyāvācakoti. Vemattatāyāti visiṭṭhā mattā vimattā,
tika-s0501t:235_2: vimattā eva vemattaṃ, vemattassa bhāvo vemattatā, tāya. Yathā hi “ajja sve”ti vuccamānā
tika-s0501t:235_3: kālavisesā anavaṭṭhitā bhavanti, “purimā disā, pacchimā disā”ti vuccamānā disāvisesā,
tika-s0501t:235_4: evaṃ sāmaññavisesā ca atthassa sabhāvāti. Tathā hi “idaṃ dukkha”nti vuccamānaṃ jātiādiṃ
tika-s0501t:235_5: apekkhāya sāmaññaṃ samānampi saccāpekkhāya viseso hoti. Esa nayo samudayasaccādīsupīti.
tika-s0501t:235_6: “Dukkha”nti ekattatā. “Jāti dukkhā, jarā dukkhā, maraṇaṃ dukkha”nti evamādi vemattatā.
tika-s0501t:236: Adhiṭṭhānahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo parikkhārahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:240_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha avijjādikā ye paccayadhammā saṅkhārādikaṃ yaṃ phaladhammaṃ paccayā
tika-s0501t:240_1: sahajātapaccayena paramparato paramparapaccayabhāvena janayanti, tassa saṅkhārādiphalassa
tika-s0501t:240_2: paccayaṃ parikkhārabhūtaṃ purimuppannaṃ avijjādikaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ janakaṃ hetuṃ, ayonisomanasikārādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:240_3: sādhāraṇaṃ paccayahetuñca avakaḍḍhayitvā suttato niddhāretvā yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:240_4: parikkhārasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvena pavatto, eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parikkhāro hāro nāmāti
tika-s0501t:240_5: atthayojanā. Avijjādayo hi avijjādīnaṃ asādhāraṇahetū bhavanti, ayonisomanasikārādayo
tika-s0501t:241: Parikkhārahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo samāropanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:243: “Ye dhammā yaṃmūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā.
tika-s0501t:245_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha ye sīlādayo dhammā yaṃmūlā yesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ mūlā, te sīlādayo
tika-s0501t:245_1: dhammā tesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena samāropayitabbā,
tika-s0501t:245_3: ekatthā samānatthāti buddhamuninā pakāsitā, te rāga…pe… tikkamanādisaddā aññamaññavevacanabhāvena
tika-s0501t:245_4: samāropayitabbā, eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso samāropano hāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:246_0: Ettha ca sīlādikkhandhattayassa pariyāyantaravibhāvanāpāripūrī kathitā, bhāvanāpāripūrī
tika-s0501t:246_1: ca pahātabbassa pahānena hotīti bhāvanāsamāropanapahānasamāropanāpi dassitāti catubbidho
tika-s0501t:247_0: Tattha kāyikasucaritaṃ, vācasikasucaritañca sīlakkhandho, manosucarite anabhijjhā,
tika-s0501t:247_1: abyāpādo ca samādhikkhandho, sammādiṭṭhi paññākkhandho. Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandhassa
tika-s0501t:247_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ, samādhikkhandho paññākkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlakkhandho, samādhikkhandho
tika-s0501t:247_3: ca samathassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, paññākkhandho vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Samatho rāgavirāgacetovimuttiyā
tika-s0501t:247_4: padaṭṭhānaṃ, vipassanā avijjāvirāgapaññāvimuttiyā padaṭṭhānanti evamādi padaṭṭhānasamāropano.
tika-s0501t:247_5: Rāgavirāgā cetovimutti sekkhaphalaṃ, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti asekkhaphalaṃ, idaṃ
tika-s0501t:247_6: vevacanaṃ. Rāgavirāgā cetovimutti anāgāmiphalaṃ, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti aggaphalaṃ
tika-s0501t:247_7: arahattaṃ, idaṃ vevacanaṃ. Rāgavirāgā cetovimutti kāmadhātusamatikkamanaṃ, avijjāvirāgā
tika-s0501t:247_8: cetovimutti tedhātusamatikkamanaṃ, idaṃ vevacanaṃ. Paññindriyaṃ, paññābalaṃ, adhipaññāsikkhā,
tika-s0501t:247_9: paññākkhandhoti evamādi vevacananti evamādi vevacanasamāropano. Kāye kāyānupassino
tika-s0501t:247_10: viharato cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu
tika-s0501t:247_11: cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu
tika-s0501t:247_12: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti evamādi bhāvanāsamāropano. Kāye kāyānupassī
tika-s0501t:247_13: viharanto asubhe “subha”nti vipallāsaṃ pajahati, kabaḷīkāro cassa āhāro pariññaṃ
tika-s0501t:247_14: gacchati, kāmupādānena ca anupādāno bhavati, kāmayogena ca visaṃyutto bhavati, abhijjhākāyaganthena
tika-s0501t:247_15: ca vippayujjati, kāmāsavena ca anāsavo bhavati, kāmoghañca uttiṇṇo bhavati, rāgasallena
tika-s0501t:247_16: ca visallo bhavati, rūpūpikā cassa viññāṇaṭṭhiti pariññaṃ gacchati, rūpadhātuyaṃ
tika-s0501t:247_17: cassa rāgo pahīno bhavati, na ca chandāgatiṃ gacchati, vedanāsūti evamādi pahānasamāropanoti
tika-s0501t:251_0: 17. Hāraniddesā niddiṭṭhā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katame nayaniddesā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:251_1: “taṇhañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā evaṃ uddesakkameneva hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisituṃ
tika-s0501t:251_2: “taṇhañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sutte āgataṃ taṇhañca avijjañca
tika-s0501t:251_3: atthato niddhāraṇavasena gahitaṃ taṇhañca avijjañca saṃkilesapakkhaṃ neti, sutte
tika-s0501t:251_4: āgatena samathena, sutte āgatāya vipassanāya atthato niddhāraṇavasena vā gahitena
tika-s0501t:251_5: samathena, gahitāya vipassanāya vodānapakkhaṃ neti, nayanto ca saccehi yojetvā neti,
tika-s0501t:251_6: ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāviseso so nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:252_0: Ettha ca atthanayassa bhūmi, saṃvaṇṇanā ca gāthāyaṃ “nayo”ti vuttā, tasmā “saṃvaṇṇanāviseso”ti
tika-s0501t:252_1: vuttaṃ. Na hi atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanā, catusaccapaṭivedhassa anurūpo pubbabhāge anugāhaṇanayo
tika-s0501t:252_2: atthanayova. Tassa pana atthanayassa yā saṃvaṇṇanā ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ vasena taṇhādimukhena
tika-s0501t:252_3: nayabhūmiracanā pavattā, tassa saṃvaṇṇanāva nayavohāro katoti vitthārato hārasampāte āgamissati.
tika-s0501t:253: Nandiyāvaṭṭanayaniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo tipukkhalanayaniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:255: “Yo akusale samūlehi, neti kusale ca kusalamūlehi.
tika-s0501t:256: Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ, tipukkhalaṃ taṃ nayaṃ āhū”ti. –
tika-s0501t:257_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso akusale samūlehi attano akusalassa tīhi lobhādīhi
tika-s0501t:257_1: mūlehi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ neti, kusale ca kusalamūlehi tīhi alobhādīhi vodānapakkhaṃ
tika-s0501t:257_2: neti, nayanto ca bhūtaṃ kusalākusalaṃ neti, na abhūtaṃ māyāmarīciādayo viya, tathaṃ
tika-s0501t:257_3: kusalākusalaṃ neti, na ghaṭādayo viya sammutisaccamattaṃ, avitathaṃ kusalākusalaṃ
tika-s0501t:257_4: neti, na vitathaṃ. Kusalākusalānaṃ sabhāvato vijjamānattā bhūtā paramatthasaccattā
tika-s0501t:257_5: tathā, akusalassa iṭṭhavipākatābhāvato, kusalassa ca aniṭṭhavipākatābhāvato vipāke
tika-s0501t:257_6: sati avisaṃvādakattā avitathā bhavanti, kusalākusalā hi etesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ “bhūtaṃ, tathaṃ,
tika-s0501t:258_0: Atha vā akusalamūlehi akusalāni, kusalamūlehi ca kusalāni nayanto ayaṃ nayo bhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:258_1: tathaṃ avitathaṃ neti cattāri saccāni niddhāretvā yojeti. Dukkhādīni hi bādhakādibhāvato
tika-s0501t:258_2: aññathābhāvābhāvena bhūtāni, saccasabhāvattā tathāni, avisaṃvādanato avitathāni.
tika-s0501t:258_3: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathānī”ti
tika-s0501t:258_4: saṃ. ni. 5.1090; paṭi. ma. 2.8). Akusalādisuttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:258_5: taṃ saṃvaṇṇanāvisesaṃ tipukkhalaṃ nayanti āhūti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:259: Tattha tīhi hetūhi pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo akusalādiko atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanāvisesoti ṭhānūpacārato tipukkhalanayo nāmāti. Vitthāro pana hārasampāte āgamissati.
tika-s0501t:260: Tipukkhalanayaniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo sīhavikkīḷitanayaniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:264_0: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sutte vuttehi vipallāsehi kilese saṃkilesapakkhaṃ
tika-s0501t:264_1: neti, sutte vuttehi indriyehi saddhamme vodānapakkhaṃ neti, etaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāvisesaṃ
tika-s0501t:264_2: nayavidū saddhammanayakovidā, atthanayakusalā eva vā sīhavikkīḷitaṃ nayanti āhūti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:265_0: Tattha vipallāsehīti asubhe subhaṃ, dukkhe sukhaṃ, anicce niccaṃ, anattani attāti
tika-s0501t:265_1: catūhi vipallāsehi. Indriyehīti saddhādīhi indriyehi. Saddhammeti paṭipattipaṭivedhasaddhamme.
tika-s0501t:265_2: Sesamettha vuttanayameva. Vitthāro pana hārasampāte āgamissatīti.
tika-s0501t:266: Sīhavikkīḷitanayaniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo disālocananayaniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:268: “Veyyākaraṇesu hi ye, kusalākusalā tahiṃ tahiṃ vuttā.
tika-s0501t:269: Manasā volokayate, taṃ khu disālocanaṃ āhū”ti. –
tika-s0501t:270_0: Gāthā vuttā. “Sīhalocanaṃ āhū”ti pāṭho likhito, so pana na therassa pāṭhoti daṭṭhabbo
tika-s0501t:270_1: bhinnalakkhaṇattā. Tattha tahiṃ tahiṃ veyyākaraṇesu ye kusalākusalā nayassa disābhūtā
tika-s0501t:270_2: dhammā vuttā, te kusalākusale nayassa disābhūtadhamme abahi abbhantaraṃ citte eva
tika-s0501t:270_3: yaṃ olokanaṃ karoti, taṃ olokanaṃ khu olokanaṃ eva disālocananti āhūti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:271_0: Tattha veyyākaraṇesūti tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesu.
tika-s0501t:271_1: Kusalāti vodāniyā. Akusalāti saṃkilesikā. Vuttāti suttato niddhāretvā kathitā. Olokayateti
tika-s0501t:271_2: te kusalādidhamme citteneva “ayaṃ paṭhamā disā, ayaṃ dutiyā disā”tiādinā tassa tassa
tika-s0501t:271_3: nayassa disābhāvena upaparikkhati, vicāretīti attho. Khūti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto,
tika-s0501t:271_4: tena disālocananayo koci atthaviseso na hotīti dassetīti.
tika-s0501t:272_0: 21. Disālocananayaniddeso niddiṭṭho. Amhehi ca ñāto. “Katamo aṅkusanayaniddeso”ti
tika-s0501t:272_1: pucchitabbattā “oloketvā”tiādigāthā vuttā. Tattha taṃtaṃnayadisābhūte sabbe kusalākusale
tika-s0501t:272_2: disālocanena oloketvā ukkhipiya suttato uddharitvā yaṃ samāneti yaṃ samānayanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t:272_3: ayaṃ samānayanasaṅkhāto nayo aṅkuso nayo nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t:273_0: Ettha ca aṅkuso nāma hatthīnaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ānayanakāraṇabhūto vajirādimayo tikkhaggo
tika-s0501t:273_1: ujuvaṅkabhūto dabbasambhāraviseso, ayampi nayo aṅkuso viyāti atthena aṅkuso. Etena
tika-s0501t:273_2: hi nayena icchitaṃ suttatthaṃ nayatīti. Mukhyato pana aṅke vijjhanaṭṭhāne uddhaṭo
tika-s0501t:273_3: asati anto pavisatīti aṅkuso. Aṅkasaddūpapadaupubbaasadhātu apaccayoti. Ayampi nayo
tika-s0501t:274: Soḷasa hāraniddesā ceva pañca nayaniddesā ca ācariyena niddiṭṭhā. Amhehi ca ñātā, “saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte kiṃ soḷasa hārā paṭhamaṃ yojetabbā, udāhu nayā”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:277: Saṅkhipiya aṅkusena hi, nayehi tihi niddise sutta”nti. –
tika-s0501t:278_0: Gāthamāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ hāre, naye ca niddisitvā idāni nesaṃ yojanakkamaṃ
tika-s0501t:278_1: dassento ‘soḷasa hārā paṭhama’ntiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha soḷasa hārā byañjanapariyeṭṭhibhāvato
tika-s0501t:278_2: saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena paṭhamaṃ yojetabbā, yojentena niddiṭṭhā hārānukkameneva
tika-s0501t:278_3: yojetabbā, na uppaṭipāṭiyā. Hārasaṃvaṇṇanānukkamena saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā
tika-s0501t:278_4: pacchā disālocanena oloketvā aṅkusanayena netvā tīhi atthanayehi niddiseti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:282_0: Nettivisayaṃ sāsanavarasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttaṃ yesaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ, atthapadānañca
tika-s0501t:282_1: vasena “dvādasa padāni sutta”nti saṅgahavāre vuttaṃ, “katamāni tānī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:288: Etehi chahi padehi, attho kammañca niddiṭṭha”nti. –
tika-s0501t:289_0: Gāthādvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idāni yesaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ, atthapadānañca
tika-s0501t:289_1: vasena ‘dvādasa padāni ‘sutta’nti vuttaṃ, tāni padāni niddisituṃ ‘akkharapada’ntiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:290_0: Tattha kenaṭṭhena akkharanti? Akkharaṭṭhena asañcaraṇaṭṭhena. Akārādivaṇṇo hi akārādito
tika-s0501t:290_1: ikārādipariyāyaṃ nakkharati, na sañcarati, na saṅkamati. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “apariyosite
tika-s0501t:290_2: pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato asañcaraṇato”ti. Apariyosite padeti
tika-s0501t:290_3: ca vibhatyantabhāvaṃ appatte dviticatukkharavantesu padesu ekadvitikkharamatteyeva
tika-s0501t:290_4: akkharaṃ nāma, pariyosite padaṃyeva, na akkharanti adhippāyo. Padaṃ pana pavesanato
tika-s0501t:290_5: atthavasena pariyāyaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti, na evaṃ akārādivaṇṇo avevacanattā. “Mā
tika-s0501t:290_6: evaṃ maññasī”tiādīsu vā ekakkharapadā mā-kārādi akkharaṃ nāma, vibhatyantaṃ padaṃ pana padameva hoti.
tika-s0501t:291_0: Pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ. Taṃ nāmākhyātopasagganipātappabhedena catubbidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:291_1: dabbapadhānaṃ “phasso vedanā citta”nti evamādikaṃ nāmapadaṃ. Tattha hi dabbamāvibhūtarūpaṃ,
tika-s0501t:291_2: kiriyā anāvibhūtarūpā. Kiriyāpadhānaṃ “phusati vedayati vijānātī”ti evamādikaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ
tika-s0501t:291_3: nāma. Tattha hi phusanādikiriyā āvibhūtarūpā, dabbamanāvibhūtarūpaṃ. Kiriyāvisesabodhahetubhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:291_4: pa-upa-itievamādikaṃ upasaggapadaṃ nāma. “Cirappavāsiṃ upavuttha”nti evamādīsu hi
tika-s0501t:291_5: pa-upādisaddā vasanādikiriyāya viyogādivisiṭṭhataṃ dīpenti. Vacanattho pana nāmapadaākhyātapadadvayaṃ
tika-s0501t:291_6: upagantvā tassa padadvayassa atthaṃ sajjantīti upasaggāti daṭṭhabbo. Kiriyāya ceva
tika-s0501t:291_7: dabbassa ca sarūpavisesapakāsanahetubhūtaṃ “evaṃ, itī”ti evamādikaṃ nipātapadaṃ assapi
tika-s0501t:291_8: saṃvaṇṇanāyapi icchitattā, akkharena pana kathaṃ gahitoti ce? Akkharehi suyyamānehi
tika-s0501t:291_9: suṇantānaṃ visesavidhānassa katattā padapariyosāne padatthasampaṭipatti hoti. Tasmā
tika-s0501t:291_10: akkharenapi atthākāro gahitovāti veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ – “akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi
tika-s0501t:291_11: pakāseti, akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghaṭetī”ti ca.
tika-s0501t:292_0: Vivaraṇā vitthāraṇā. Vibhajanā ca uttānīkammañca paññatti ca vibhajanuttānīkammapaññattīti
tika-s0501t:292_1: samāhāre ayaṃ dvandasamāso. Tattha vibhāgakaraṇaṃ vibhajanaṃ nāma. Byañjanākārehi
tika-s0501t:292_2: yo atthākāro niddisiyamāno, so atthākāro vivaraṇavibhajanāti dvīhi atthapadehi niddisito.
tika-s0501t:292_3: Pākaṭakaraṇaṃ uttānīkammaṃ nāma. Pakārehi ñāpanaṃ paññatti. Niruttiniddesasaṅkhātehi
tika-s0501t:292_4: byañjanapadehi pakāsiyamāno yo atthākāro atthi, so atthākāro uttānīkammapaññattīhi
tika-s0501t:292_5: paṭiniddisito. Etehi saṅkāsanādīhi chahi atthapadehi attho suttattho gahito, kammañca
tika-s0501t:292_6: ugghaṭanādikammañca niddiṭṭhanti attho. Yena suttatthena ugghaṭitaññuno cittasantānassa
tika-s0501t:292_7: sambodhanakiriyāsaṅkhātassa ugghaṭanakammassa nibbatti bhave, so suttattho saṅkāsanāpakāsanākāro
tika-s0501t:292_8: hoti. Yena suttatthena vipañcitaññuno cittasantānassa bodhanakiriyāsaṅkhātassa vipañcanakammassa
tika-s0501t:292_9: nibbatti, so suttattho vivaraṇāvibhajanākāro hoti. Yena suttatthena neyyassa cittasantānassa
tika-s0501t:292_10: pabodhanakiriyāsaṅkhātassa nayakammassa nibbatti, so suttattho uttānīkammapaññattākāro
tika-s0501t:292_11: hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo “suttatthena hi desanāya pavattiyamānena
tika-s0501t:292_12: ugghaṭitaññuādiveneyyānaṃ cittasantānassa pabodhanakiriyānibbatti, so ca suttattho
tika-s0501t:293: “Yathāvuttehi tīhi atthanayehi ceva chahi atthapadehi ca ayuttopi attho kiṃ koci atthi, udāhu sabbo attho yutto evā”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:295: “Tīṇi ca nayā anūnā, atthassa ca chappadāni gaṇitāni.
tika-s0501t:297_0: Gāthamāha. Tattha tīṇīti liṅgavipallāsaniddeso, tayoti pana pakatiliṅganiddeso vattabbo.
tika-s0501t:297_1: Gaṇitā anūnā tayo atthassa nayā ca gaṇitāni anūnāni cha atthassa padāni ca niddiṭṭhāni,
tika-s0501t:297_2: niddiṭṭhehi ca atthapadehi bhagavato vacanassa sabbo attho samāyuttova ayutto koci
tika-s0501t:297_3: attho natthīti yojanā kātabbā. Atthassāti suttatthassa. Nayāti nettiatthanayā. Padānīti nettiatthapadāni.
tika-s0501t:298_0: 26. Ye hārādayo niddiṭṭhā, te hārādayo sampiṇḍetvā nettippakaraṇassa padatthe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:298_1: gaṇanavasena paricchinditvā dassento “atthassā”tiādimāha. Tattha atthassa samūhassa
tika-s0501t:298_2: avayavabhūtāni navabhedāni atthapadāni suttabyañjanassa atthassa pariyeṭṭhisaṅkhātāya
tika-s0501t:298_3: saṃvaṇṇanāya gaṇanato catuvīsati byañjanapadāni honti, atthapadabyañjanapadabhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:298_4: ubhayaṃ saṅkhepayato sampiṇḍayato tettiṃsā tettiṃsavidhā ettikā tettiṃsavidhāva nettīti yojanā.
