tika-s0501t:512_5: upādiyeva sesaṃ upādisesaṃ, khandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ natthi etissā nibbānadhātuyāti anupādisesā.
tika-s0501t:512_6: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā anupādisesanibbānadhātu hutvā muccati, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe
tika-s0501t:512_7: cāyaṃ karaṇaniddeso. Nibbānadhātūti ca khandhapañcakassa nibbāyanamattaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0501t:512_8: na asaṅkhatadhātu. Tasmāti saṅkhāradukkhatāya sakalalokabyāpakabhāvena sabbalokasaṅgāhakattā
tika-s0501t:512_9: vuttappakārasaṅkhāradukkhatāya sabbalokassa dukkhaṃ hoti, iti katvā saṅkhāradukkhatāya
tika-s0501t:513_1: brūsī”ti tatiyapadassāpi vissajjanā siyāti āsaṅkabhāvato “tena ca catutthassa padassa
tika-s0501t:513_2: vissajjanā yuttā”ti vuttaṃ. “Kena yathākkamaṃ pucchāvissajjanānaṃ yuttatarabhāvo
tika-s0501t:513_3: jānitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena yathākkamaṃ pucchāvissajjanānaṃ
tika-s0501t:513_4: yuttatarattā yuttatarajānanako bhagavā “avijjāya nivuto loko”tiādimāha, tasmā yuttatarabhāvo
tika-s0501t:514_0: Ettha ca lokassa nīvaraṇādīni ajānantena ca titthiyavādesu samayantaresu paricayena
tika-s0501t:514_1: ca tesu samayantaresu ceva nīvaraṇādīsu ca saṃsayapakkhandena ekaṃseneva sattādhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0501t:514_2: pucchitabbattā, ekaṃseneva sattādhiṭṭhānena byākātabbattā ca sattādhiṭṭhānā pucchā
tika-s0501t:514_3: katāti veditabbā. Sā cāyaṃ pucchā ajānantassa jānanatthāya, jātasaṃsayassa ca saṃsayavinodanatthāya
tika-s0501t:514_4: vissajjetabbassa nīvaraṇādivisayassa catubbidhattā catubbidhā. Nīvaraṇādīnaṃ pana
tika-s0501t:514_5: visayānaṃ loko ca ādhārabhāvena gāthāyaṃ vuttoti “eko pañho dassito”ti ayamettha
tika-s0501t:514_6: pucchāvicayo, vissajjanāvicayo pana “adiṭṭhajotanā vissajjanā, vimaticchedanā vissajjanā”tiādinā
tika-s0501t:515_0: Ekādhāre pucchāvissajjane vicayo ācariyehi vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “anekādhāre
tika-s0501t:515_1: pucchāvissajjane yo vicayo vibhajanāraho, so vicayo kathaṃ amhehi viññāyati, amhākaṃ
tika-s0501t:515_2: viññāpanatthāya tasmiṃ vicayaṃ vibhajathā”ti vattabbabhāvato anekādhāraṃ pucchaṃ
tika-s0501t:518: Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi, kena sotā pidhīyare”ti. –
tika-s0501t:519_0: Gāthamāha. Gāthāttho tāva daṭṭhabbo. Savantīti sandanti, pavattantīti attho. Sabbadhīti
tika-s0501t:519_1: taṇhādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu sabbesu rūpādīsu āyatanesu. Sotāti taṇhābhijjhābyāpādādayo
tika-s0501t:519_2: sotā. Iccāyasmāti iti evaṃ āyasmā ajito āha. Sotānanti taṇhābhijjhābyāpādādīnaṃ sotānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:519_3: Kiṃ nivāraṇanti kiṃ katamaṃ dhammajātaṃ āvaraṇaṃ bhave, kā katamā dhammajāti rakkhā
tika-s0501t:519_4: bhave. Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhīti sotānaṃ taṇhābhijjhābyāpādādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ āvaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:519_5: idaṃ dhammajātaṃ bhaveti sabbasattahitatthaṃ amhākaṃ tvaṃ kathehi. Kena sotā pidhīyareti
tika-s0501t:519_6: kena pahāyakadhammena taṇhābhijjhābyāpādādayo sotā paṇḍitehi pidhīyareti pucchatīti pucchitāni.
tika-s0501t:520_0: “Pucchāvasena kathitāya ‘savanti…pe… pidhīyare’ti imāya gāthāya kittakāni padāni
tika-s0501t:520_1: pucchitāni, kittakā pañhā”ti pucchitabbattā “imāni cattāri padāni pucchitāni, te
tika-s0501t:520_2: dve pañhā”ti vuttaṃ. “Pucchāvasena pavattāya imissā gāthāya yadi cattāri padāni siyuṃ,
tika-s0501t:520_3: evaṃ santesu pañhāpi catubbidhā siyuṃ, kasmā ‘dve’ti vuttā”ti vattabbattā “kasmā?
tika-s0501t:520_4: Ime hi bahvādhivacanena pucchitā”ti vuttaṃ. Ime etāya gāthāya gahitā atthā bahvādhivacanena
tika-s0501t:520_5: pucchitā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “savanti…pe… pidhīyareti bahūni vacanāni adhikicca pavattā
tika-s0501t:520_6: saṃvarasaṅkhātā sati ceva pidahanahetubhūtā paññā cāti ime dve atthāva pucchitā,
tika-s0501t:520_7: tasmā atthavasena dve pañhā vuttā vā”ti. “Pucchāya duvidhatthavisayatā kathaṃ vuttā”ti
tika-s0501t:520_8: vattabbattā pucchāya duvidhatthavisayataṃ vivarituṃ “evaṃ samāpannassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:520_9: Tattha evaṃ samāpannassāti imāhi duggatihetubhūtāhi ñātibyasanādisaṅkhātāhi āpadāhi
tika-s0501t:520_10: vā, pāṇavadhādīhi āpadāhi vā, samaṃ saha, sabbathā vā ayaṃ sattaloko āpanno ajjhotthaṭo,
tika-s0501t:520_11: evaṃ ajjhotthaṭassa vā samāpannassa. Evaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhassāti ñātibyasanādayo vā pāṇavadhādīni
tika-s0501t:520_12: āgamma pavattehi dasahi kilesavatthūhi ca ayaṃ sattaloko saṃkiliṭṭho, evaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhassa
tika-s0501t:520_13: ca lokassāti samāpannassa ajjhotthaṭassa lokassa vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ kiṃ katamaṃ dhammajātaṃ
tika-s0501t:520_14: bhave. Iti evañhi saccaṃ ajitasutte āhāti vitthārattho, pucchāya duvidhatthavisayatā
tika-s0501t:521_0: “Kiṃ nu sotā sabbassa lokassa sabbadhi savanti, udāhu, ekaccassevā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:521_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijjhābyāpādappamādabahulattā rūpādīsu nānārammaṇesu vikkhittacittasseva
tika-s0501t:521_3: sotā savanti pavattanti, na samāhitassa abhijjhābyāpādappamādavirahitassāti adhippāyo
tika-s0501t:521_4: daṭṭhabbo. “Katamā abhijjhā, katamo byāpādo, katamo pamādo”ti vattabbattā “tattha
tika-s0501t:521_5: yā abhijjhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu abhijjhābyāpādappamādesu. Yā abhijjhā,
tika-s0501t:521_6: ayaṃ lobho, na abhijjhāyanamattaṃ. Lobho ca akusalamūlaṃ, na lubbhanamattaṃ. Yo byāpādo,
tika-s0501t:521_7: ayaṃ doso, na byāpajjanamattaṃ. Doso ca akusalamūlaṃ, na dūsanamattaṃ. Yo pamādo,
tika-s0501t:521_8: ayaṃ moho, na sativippavāsamattaṃ. Moho ca akusalamūlaṃ, na mūhanamattaṃ. Evaṃ iminā
tika-s0501t:521_10: asamāhitassa chasu rūpādīsu āyatanesu taṇhā savanti.
tika-s0501t:522_1: rūpataṇhādīnaṃ chasu rūpādiāyatanesu savanaṃ kena ca vacanena amhehi saddahitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:522_2: vattabbattā “yathāha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Savatīti ca kho, bhikkhave…pe… paṭihaññatī”ti
tika-s0501t:522_3: yaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā yathā yena pakārena āha, tathā tena pakārena vuttanayena vacanena
tika-s0501t:522_4: tumhehi saddahitabbanti adhippāyo. Ettha ca cakkhādīnaṃ rūpataṇhādīnaṃ channaṃ sotānaṃ
tika-s0501t:522_5: dvārabhāvena pavattattā cakkhādayo nissitūpacāravasena sayaṃ savanto viya bhagavatā
tika-s0501t:522_6: vuttā. Itīti evaṃ vuttappakārena sabbā sabbasmā cakkhādidvārato ca savati pavattati.
tika-s0501t:522_8: attho. “Kasmā sabbasmā cakkhādidvārato ca savati pavattati, sabbappakārena taṇhāyanamicchābhinivesanaunnamanādippakārena
tika-s0501t:522_9: savanabhāvo vijānitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tenāti asamāhitassa
tika-s0501t:522_11: pavattanato pavattajānanako bhagavā “savanti sabbadhi sotā”ti āha.
tika-s0501t:523_0: “Sotānaṃ ‘kiṃ nivāraṇa’nti iminā kiṃ pucchati? Sotānaṃ anusayappahānaṃ pucchati kiṃ?
tika-s0501t:523_1: Udāhu vītikkamappahānaṃ pucchatī”ti vattabbattā “sotānaṃ kiṃ nivāraṇanti pariyuṭṭhānavighātaṃ
tika-s0501t:523_2: pucchatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ pariyuṭṭhānavighātaṃ vodānaṃ, udāhu vuṭṭhānaṃ ki”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:523_3: “idaṃ vodāna”nti vuttaṃ. “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi, ‘kena sotā pidhīyare’ti iminā kiṃ
tika-s0501t:523_4: pucchati? Sotānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati kiṃ? Udāhu vītikkamanaṃ, samugghāṭaṃ vā
tika-s0501t:523_5: pucchati ki”nti vattabbattā sotānaṃ…pe… pidhīyareti anusayasamugghāṭaṃ pucchatī”ti
tika-s0501t:523_6: vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ anusayasamugghāṭaṃ vodānaṃ kiṃ, udāhu vuṭṭhānaṃ ki”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:524: “Savanti sabbadhi sotā”tiādipucchāvicayo ācariyena vutto, amhehi ca ñāto; tāya pucchāya “katamo vissajjanavicayo”ti vattabbattā “tattha vissajjanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pucchāyaṃ –
tika-s0501t:528_0: Gāthā vissajjanāti daṭṭhabbā. Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ ajita lokasmiṃ yāni sotāni savanti,
tika-s0501t:528_1: tesaṃ sotānaṃ yaṃ nivāraṇaṃ, sā sati hoti; taṃ satiṃ sotānaṃ saṃvaranti ahaṃ brūmi;
tika-s0501t:528_2: ete sotā paññāya pidhīyareti yojanā kātabbā. Tattha satīti vipassanāpaññāya sampayuttā
tika-s0501t:528_3: sati. Paññāyāti maggapaññāya. Pidhīyareti uppajjituṃ appadānavasena pidhīyanti pacchijjanti.
tika-s0501t:529_0: “Sati tesaṃ nivāraṇaṃ sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti bhagavā āha – “yāya kāyaci satiyā
tika-s0501t:529_1: sotānaṃ saṃvaraṇakiccaṃ siddhaṃ kiṃ, visiṭṭhāya satiyā sotānaṃ saṃvaraṇakiccaṃ siddhaṃ
tika-s0501t:529_2: kiṃ, katamāya satiyā sotānaṃ saṃvaraṇakiccaṃ siddha”nti pucchitabbattā “kāyagatāya
tika-s0501t:529_3: satiyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāyagatāya satiyāti rūpakāye gataṃ kesādikaṃ aniccādito
tika-s0501t:529_4: vipassitvā pavattāya vipassanāñāṇasampayuttāya satiyā. Bhāvitāyāti kāyagataṃ aniccato
tika-s0501t:529_5: dukkhato anattato nibbindanato virajjanato nirodhanato paṭinissajjanato anupassanāvasena
tika-s0501t:529_6: bhāvitāya. Evañhi aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati; dukkhato anupassanto
tika-s0501t:529_7: sukhasaññaṃ pajahati; anattato anupassanto attasaññaṃ pajahati; nibbindanto nandiṃ
tika-s0501t:529_8: pajahati; virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati; nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati; paṭinissajjanto
tika-s0501t:529_9: ādānaṃ pajahatīti. Bahulīkatāyāti yathāvuttappakārena divasampi māsampi saṃvaccharampi
tika-s0501t:529_11: cakkhuṃ, niggahitāgamaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nāviñchatīti cakkhudvāre pavattaṃ abhijjhādisahitaṃ
tika-s0501t:529_12: cittasantānaṃ, taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ vā nākaḍḍhati, manāpikesu rūpesu nāviñchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:529_13: Amanāpikesu rūpesu na paṭihaññati. Kāyagatāya satiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya sotaṃ
tika-s0501t:529_14: nāviñchati. Manāpikesu saddesu…pe… amanāpikesu saddesu na paṭihaññatīti yojanā yathāsambhavato kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:530_0: “Kena kāraṇena nāviñchati paṭihaññatī”ti pucchati, indriyānaṃ saṃvutanivāritattā
tika-s0501t:530_1: nāviñchati na paṭihaññatīti vissajjeti. “Kenārakkhena te saṃvutanivāritā”ti pucchati,
tika-s0501t:530_3: kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tenāti tasmā
tika-s0501t:530_4: satiārakkhena saṃvutanivāritattā saṃvutanivāritajānanako bhagavā “sati tesaṃ nivāraṇa”nti
tika-s0501t:530_5: yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena tumhehi satiārakkhena saṃvutanivāritabhāvo saddahitabboti
tika-s0501t:530_6: pubbabhāge paññā satyānugāti kiccamevettha adhikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:531_0: “Sati tesaṃ nivāraṇa”nti vissajjanassa vitthārattho ācariyena vutto, amhehi ca ñāto,
tika-s0501t:531_1: “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vissajjanassa vitthārattho “kathaṃ amhehi jānitabbo”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:531_2: “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vissajjanassa vitthāratthaṃ dassento “paññāya anusayā pahīyantī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:531_3: Tattha paññāyāti maggapaññāya. Anusayāti anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjanārahā
tika-s0501t:531_4: kāmarāgānusayādayo. Pahīyanti samucchedavasena anusayesu paññāya pahīnesu pariyuṭṭhānāpi
tika-s0501t:531_5: atthato pahīyanti. Kissa pahīnattā “pahīyantī”ti vuccati? Anusayassa pahīnattā pariyuṭṭhānā
tika-s0501t:532_0: “Taṃ anusayappahānena pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ kiṃ viya bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “taṃ
tika-s0501t:532_1: yathā khandhavantassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha khandhavantassa rukkhassa kudālādinā bhūmiṃ
tika-s0501t:532_2: khaṇitvā anavasesamūluddharaṇe kate tassa rukkhassa pupphaphalapallavaṅkurasantatipi
tika-s0501t:532_3: kudālādinā samucchinnāva bhavati yathā, evaṃ arahattamaggañāṇena anusayesu pahīnesu
tika-s0501t:532_4: anusayānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānasantati samucchinnā pidahitā paṭicchannā bhavati. Kena samucchinnā
tika-s0501t:532_5: bhavati? Paññāya maggapaññāya samucchinnā bhavatīti atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā. “Paññāya
tika-s0501t:532_7: pidhīyare”ti vacanato anusayānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānasantatiyā paññāya paricchinnabhāvo paṇḍitehi
tika-s0501t:533_0: Imesu pañhāvissajjanesu sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ, pidhānañca ajānantena vā saṃsayitena vā
tika-s0501t:533_1: saṃvarapidhānānaṃ pucchitabbattā dhammādhiṭṭhānā pucchāti pucchāvicayo ceva satipaññānaṃ
tika-s0501t:533_2: vissajjetabbattā dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ vissajjananti vissajjanavicayo ca veditabbo. Etesu
tika-s0501t:533_3: ca “kenassu nivuto loko”tiādiko pañho nīvaraṇavicikicchāpamādajappānaṃ vasena catubbidhopi
tika-s0501t:533_4: lokādhiṭṭhānavasena eko pañhoti vutto, evaṃ sati “savanti sabbadhi sotā”tiādikopi
tika-s0501t:533_5: pañho saṃvarapidhānānaṃ vasena duvidhopi ekatthavasena gahetvā ekādhiṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0501t:533_6: “eko pañho”ti vattabbo, sotānaṃ bahubhāvato vā “bahupañho”ti vattabbo; tathā pana
tika-s0501t:533_7: avatvā sote anāmasitvā saṃvarapidhānānaṃ vasena “savanti sabbadhi sotā”tiādimhi “dve
tika-s0501t:533_8: pañhā”ti vuttā. Tadanusārena “kenassu nivuto loko”tiādimhipi lokaṃ anāmasitvā nīvaraṇādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:533_9: catunnaṃ vasena “cattāro pañhā”tipi vattabbāti ayaṃ nayo dassitoti nayadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:534_0: Desanākāle vuttadhammassa anusandhimaggahetvā attanā racitaniyāmeneva pucchitapañhassa
tika-s0501t:534_1: ceva pañhaṃ aṭṭhapetvā, paṭiññañca akatvā vissajjanassa ca vicayahāro ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t:534_2: amhehi ca ñāto, “desanākāle vuttadhammassa anusandhiṃ gahetvā pucchitapañhassa ceva
tika-s0501t:534_3: taṃ pañhaṃ ṭhapetvā, paṭiññañca katvā vissajjanassa ca yo vicayo hāro vibhatto, so
tika-s0501t:534_4: vicayahāro kathaṃ amhehi viññāyati, amhākaṃ viññāpanatthāya tasmiṃ vicayaṃ vibhajethā”ti
tika-s0501t:534_5: vattabbabhāvato tesu vicetabbākāraṃ dassento “yāni sotānī”tiādigāthāya vicayākāradassanānantaraṃ
tika-s0501t:535_0: Tattha gāthāttho tāva viññātabbo – yāya paññāya anusayappahānena sotanirujjhanaṃ
tika-s0501t:535_1: vuttaṃ, yāya satiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānappahānena sotanirujjhanaṃ vuttaṃ, sāyaṃ paññā
tika-s0501t:535_2: ceva sāyaṃ sati ca tāhi paññāsatīhi asesaṃ sahuppannaṃ nāmañceva rūpañca, etaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0501t:535_3: kattha nirujjhamāne asesaṃ uparujjhatīti mārisa me mayā puṭṭho tvaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ
tika-s0501t:535_4: etaṃ nirujjhanaṃ pabrūhi, iti āyasmā ajito bhagavantaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0501t:536_0: Ajita tvaṃ yametaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitaṃ nirujjhanaṃ maṃ apucchi, ahaṃ te tava taṃ nirujjhanaṃ
tika-s0501t:536_1: vadāmi. Yattha viññāṇanirodhe paññāsatisahitaṃ nāmañca rūpañca viññāṇassa nirodhena
tika-s0501t:536_2: saha ekato asesaṃ uparujjhati, ettha viññāṇanirodhe etaṃ sabbaṃ viññāṇanirodhena
tika-s0501t:536_3: ekato ekakkhaṇe apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uparujjhati, etaṃ viññāṇanirodhaṃ tassa nāmarūpassa
tika-s0501t:536_4: nirodho nātivattati, taṃ taṃ nāmarūpanirodhaṃ so so viññāṇanirodho nātivattatīti.
tika-s0501t:537_0: “Tasmiṃ pañhe ayaṃ ajito kiṃ pucchati? Uparujjhanameva pucchati, udāhu aññaṃ pucchatī”ti
tika-s0501t:537_1: vattabbato “ayaṃ pañhe anusandhiṃ pucchatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayanti yo āyasmā
tika-s0501t:537_2: ajito pañhaṃ apucchīti ayaṃ ajito. Pañheti “paññā ceva sati cā”tiādipañhe. Yadi anusandhiṃ
tika-s0501t:537_3: pucchati, evaṃ sati “katthetaṃ uparujjhatī”ti pucchanaṃ ayuttaṃ bhaveyyāti? Na, anusandhīyati
tika-s0501t:537_4: etena upanirujjhanenāti anusandhīti atthasambhavato. Tena vuttaṃ “anusandhiṃ pucchanto
tika-s0501t:538_0: “Yā anupādisesanibbānadhātu pucchitā, taṃ katamāya paṭipadāya adhigacchatī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:538_1: catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ paṭipadaṃ visayena saha dassetuṃ “tīṇī saccānī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:538_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhatānīti kammādipaccayehi samecca sambhūya dukkhādīni karīyantīti
tika-s0501t:538_3: saṅkhatāni. Nirodhadhammānīti nirujjhanaṃ nirodho, dhammopi nirodhadhammova, tasmā
tika-s0501t:538_4: nirodho dhammo sabhāvo yesaṃ dukkhādīnanti nirodhadhammānīti atthova gahetabbo. Tāni
tika-s0501t:538_5: tīṇi saccāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “dukkhaṃ samudayo maggo”ti vuttaṃ. Tīṇi dukkhasamudayamaggasaccāni
tika-s0501t:538_7: vuttaṃ. Idha “nirodhadhammo”tipi vattabbaṃ. Kammādipaccayehi asaṅkhatattā asaṅkhato.
tika-s0501t:538_9: katamo pahātabbo, katamāya bhūmiyā pahīno”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha samudayo dvīsu
tika-s0501t:538_10: bhūmīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dvīsu bhūmīsūti dassanabhāvanābhūmīsu. Kāmacchandoti
tika-s0501t:538_11: kāmabhavarāgo. Rūparāgoti rūpabhavarāgo. Arūparāgoti arūpabhavarāgo. Saṃyojanabhedato
tika-s0501t:539_1: “indriyabhedato kathaṃ vibhattānī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha tīṇī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha
tika-s0501t:539_2: vā “pahātabbasaṃyojanesu katamāni saṃyojanāni katamaṃ indriyaṃ attano pahāyakaṃ katvā
tika-s0501t:539_3: nirujjhantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha tīṇī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhāya attano pahāyakaṃ
tika-s0501t:539_5: nirujjhanahetu hotu, aññātāvindriyaṃ kissa hetū”ti pucchitabbattā “yaṃ panā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:539_6: vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ yena aññātāvindriyena arahā “me jāti khīṇā”ti evaṃ jānāti, idaṃ
tika-s0501t:539_7: jānanahetu aññātāvindriyaṃ khaye jātikkhaye arahattaphale pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yaṃ yena
tika-s0501t:539_8: aññātāvindriyena arahā “itthattāya aparaṃ na bhavissāmī”ti pajānāti, idaṃ pajānanahetu
tika-s0501t:539_9: aññātāvindriyaṃ. Anuppāde pana anuppajjane arahattaphale pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:539_10: jānanahetu hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Indriyañāṇāni pahāyakāni katvā saṃyojanāni nirujjhanti,
tika-s0501t:539_11: “tāni ñāṇāni kadā nirujjhantī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha yañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:540_1: pāpuṇantassa nirujjhatu, aññātāvindriyaṃ kadā nirujjhatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha
tika-s0501t:540_2: yañca khaye”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dveti kiccabhedena dve, sabhāvato pana ekāva.
tika-s0501t:541_0: “Pajānanakiccampi ekameva, kathaṃ dve siyu”nti vattabbattā “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇapaññābhedena
tika-s0501t:541_1: dve nāmāni labbhantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sāti yā paññā pubbagāthāyaṃ sotapidhānakiccena
tika-s0501t:541_2: vuttā, sā paññā pakārehi jānanasabhāvena paññā nāma. Yathādiṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ apilāpanaṭṭhena
tika-s0501t:542_0: 13. “Paññā ceva sati cā”ti padassa attho ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “nāmarūpañcā’ti
tika-s0501t:542_1: padassa attho kathaṃ amhehi ñātabbo”ti vattabbattā nāmarūpaṃ vibhajanto “tattha ye
tika-s0501t:542_4: Viññāṇasampayuttanti sampayuttapaccayattaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ, pacurajanassa pana
tika-s0501t:542_5: avibhajitvā gahaṇīyasabhāvamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vibhāgaṃ jānantehi pana “nāmaṃ
tika-s0501t:542_6: viññāṇasampayuttaṃ, rūpaṃ pana na viññāṇasampayuttaṃ, sahajāta”nti vibhajitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:543_0: Bhagavantaṃ pucchanto āyasmā ajito “paññā ceva…pe… katthetaṃ uparujjhatī”ti evaṃ
tika-s0501t:543_1: pārāyane āha. “Paññā cevātiādigāthāya yā anupādisesanibbānadhātu pucchitā, sā anupādisesanibbānadhātu
tika-s0501t:543_2: katamena adhigamena pattabbā”ti pucchitabbattā caturiddhipādamukhena ariyamaggādhigamamukhena
tika-s0501t:543_3: pattabbā, caturiddhipādabhāvanāya ca cattārindriyāni mūlabhūtāni, tasmā mūlabhūtāni
tika-s0501t:543_4: tāni cattārindriyāni niddhāretvā dassento “tattha sati ca paññā cā”tiādimāha. Kusalākusaladhammagatiyo
tika-s0501t:543_5: samanvesamānāya satiyā sijjhamānāya ekantena samādhi nipphādetabbo, satiggahaṇena
tika-s0501t:543_6: ca pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ gāthāyaṃ adhippetaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānappahānena ca samādhikiccaṃ
tika-s0501t:543_7: pākaṭanti āha “sati dve indriyāni satindriyañca samādhindriyañcā”ti. Paññāya anusayasamugghātaṃ
tika-s0501t:543_8: catubbidhasammappadhānasaṅkhātena vīriyena sijjhati, na vinā tenāti vuttaṃ “paññā
tika-s0501t:544_0: Imesu yathāvuttesu catūsu indriyesu pubbabhāge vā maggakkhaṇe vā sijjhantesu taṃsampayuttā
tika-s0501t:544_1: yā saddahanā okappanā siddhā, idaṃ saddahanaokappanasaṅkhātaṃ dhammajātaṃ saddhindriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:544_2: siddhaṃ, “tesu mūlabhūtesu indriyesu siddhesu katamena indriyena katamo dhammo siddho”ti
tika-s0501t:544_3: pucchitabbattā iminā ayaṃ siddhoti dassento “tattha yā saddhādhipateyyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:544_4: Tattha tatthāti satyādīsu. Saddhādhipateyyāti paccayabhūtāya saddhāya siddho chando
tika-s0501t:544_5: adhipatīti saddhādhipati, saddhādhipatinā pavattetabbā cittekaggatāti saddhādhipateyyā.
tika-s0501t:544_6: Chandasamādhīti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattito samādhi vā chandādhipatinā sampayutto
tika-s0501t:544_7: pubbabhāge pavatto samādhi vā chandasamādhi, pahānaṃ pahānahetu hotīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:544_8: Pahānanti ca pajahati vikkhambhitakilese etena chandasamādhināti pahānanti karaṇasādhanattho
tika-s0501t:545_0: “So chandasamādhi sayaṃ kevalova pahāna”nti vattabbattā “tattha ye assāsapassāsā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:545_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ samāhite citte cittuppāde. “Tasmiṃ samāhite cittuppāde
tika-s0501t:545_2: assāsā”tiādinā assāsādisīsena assāsādijanakā vīriyasaṅkhārā gahitā, te ca yāva bhāvanāpāripūrī,
tika-s0501t:545_3: tāva punappunaṃ saraṇato ca sarā, punappunaṃ saṅkappato ca saṅkappā. Yo pana “sarasaṅkappā,
tika-s0501t:545_4: ime saṅkhārā cā”ti evaṃ vuttappakāro purimako chandasamādhi vā kilesavikkhambhanatāya
tika-s0501t:545_5: ca tadaṅgappahānatāya ca pahānaṃ pahānahetupadhānaṃ vā, “ime vuttappakārā saṅkhārādayo
tika-s0501t:545_6: kiṃ bhāventī”ti pucchitabbattā “ime ca saṅkhārā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ime saṅkhārā
tika-s0501t:546_1: Tena vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “chandaṃ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati
tika-s0501t:546_2: samādhi”nti. Chandahetuko vā samādhi, chandādiko vā samādhi chandasamādhi, chandādhipatissa
tika-s0501t:546_3: paccayuppanno samādhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā, padhānasaddena
tika-s0501t:546_4: saṅkhatasaṅkhārādayo nivattāpitā, chandasamādhi ca padhānasaṅkhārā cāti chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārā,
tika-s0501t:546_5: tehi samannāgato chanda…pe… samannāgato, taṃ…pe… gataṃ. Ijjhati samijjhati nippajjatīti
tika-s0501t:546_6: iddhi, koṭṭhāso, iddhi eva pādo koṭṭhāsoti iddhipādo, iddhipādacatuttho. Ijjhanti
tika-s0501t:546_7: vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi, pajjati etenāti pādo, iddhiyā
tika-s0501t:546_9: vuttattā chandiddhipādova gahetabbo, taṃ iddhipādaṃ taṃ chandiddhipādaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti attho.
tika-s0501t:547_0: Vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitanti vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato
tika-s0501t:547_1: nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ, maggakkhaṇe pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṃ, ārammaṇato
tika-s0501t:547_3: ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ, maggakkhaṇe pana kiccato samucchedavirāganissitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:547_4: ārammaṇato nissaraṇavirāganissitaṃ. Nirodhanissitanti vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅganirodhanissitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:547_7: vossaggo duvidho. Tatthapi vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena pariccāgavossaggo, nibbānaninnabhāvena
tika-s0501t:547_10: pariṇataṃ vā paripacati paripacanaṃ karotīti vossaggapariṇāmī, taṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
tika-s0501t:548_0: Chandiddhipādabhāvanākāro ācariyena vutto, amhehi ca ñāto, “kathaṃ vīriyiddhipādabhāvanākāro
tika-s0501t:548_1: amhehi vijānitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha yā vīriyādhipateyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho
tika-s0501t:548_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva viññeyyo. Saṃkhittavasena pana ṭhapitaṃ pāṭhaṃ vitthārato
tika-s0501t:549_0: “Tattha yā vīriyādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṃ vīriyasamādhi. Samāhite citte kilesānaṃ
tika-s0501t:549_1: vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṃ pahānaṃ. Tattha ye
tika-s0501t:549_2: assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā. Iti purimako
tika-s0501t:549_3: ca vīriyasamādhi, kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṃ ime ca saṅkhārā, tadubhayaṃ vīriyasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0501t:549_4: iddhipādaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
tika-s0501t:550_0: “Tattha yā cittādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṃ cittasamādhi. Samāhite citte kilesānaṃ
tika-s0501t:550_1: vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṃ pahānaṃ. Tattha ye
tika-s0501t:550_2: assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā. Iti purimako
tika-s0501t:550_3: ca cittasamādhi, kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṃ ime ca saṅkhārā, tadubhayaṃ cittasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0501t:550_4: iddhipādaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
tika-s0501t:551_0: “Tattha yā vīmaṃsādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhi, samāhite citte kilesānaṃ
tika-s0501t:551_1: vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṃ pahānaṃ. Tattha ye
tika-s0501t:551_2: assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā. Iti purimako
tika-s0501t:551_3: ca vīmaṃsāsamādhi kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṃ ime ca saṅkhārā, tadubhayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0501t:551_4: iddhipādaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmi”nti.
tika-s0501t:552_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – vīriyasamādhīti vīriyaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattito samādhi vā vīriyādhipatinā
tika-s0501t:552_1: sampayutto pubbabhāge pavatto samādhi vā vīriyasamādhi. Cittasamādhīti cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
tika-s0501t:552_2: katvā pavattito samādhi vā cittādhipatinā sampayutto pubbabhāge pavatto samādhi vā
tika-s0501t:552_3: cittasamādhi. Vīmaṃsāsamādhīti vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pavattito samādhi vā vīmaṃsādhipatinā
tika-s0501t:552_4: sampayutto pubbabhāge pavatto samādhi vā vīmaṃsāsamādhīti.
tika-s0501t:553: Sattibalānurūpenettha saṅkhepavaṇṇanā katā, gambhīrañāṇehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānurūpena vitthārato vā gambhīrato vā vibhajitvā gahetabbā.
tika-s0501t:554_1: vīmaṃsāsamādhiyeva ñāṇamūlako ñāṇapubbaṅgamo ñāṇānuparivatti bhaveyya, aññe tayo
tika-s0501t:554_2: samādhayo aññāṇamūlakā aññāṇapubbaṅgamā aññāṇapavattiyo bhaveyyu”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:554_3: sabbe samādhayo ñāṇamūlakādayoyevāti dassetuṃ “sabbo samādhi ñāṇamūlako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:554_4: Tattha sabbo samādhīti chandasamādhi, vīriyasamādhi, cittasamādhi, vīmaṃsāsamādhīti
tika-s0501t:554_5: catubbidho samādhi. Ñāṇamūlakoti ekāvajjanavīthinānāvajjanavīthīsu pavattaṃ upacārañāṇamūlako.
tika-s0501t:554_6: Ñāṇapubbaṅgamoti adhigamañāṇaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ assāti ñāṇapubbaṅgamo. Ñāṇānuparivattīti
tika-s0501t:554_7: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ anuparivatti assāti ñāṇānuparivatti. Atha vā nānāvajjanūpacārañāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:554_8: vā paṭisandhiñāṇaṃ vā mūlaṃ assāti ñāṇamūlako, upacārañāṇaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ assāti ñāṇapubbaṅgamo,
tika-s0501t:554_9: appanāñāṇaṃ anuparivatti assāti ñāṇānuparivatti. Sabbaṃ vā upacārañāṇaṃ mūlaṃ assāti
tika-s0501t:554_10: ñāṇamūlako. Appanāñāṇaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ assāti ñāṇapubbaṅgamo. Abhiññāñāṇaṃ anuparivatti
tika-s0501t:554_11: assāti ñāṇānuparivatti, anuparivattanaṃ vā anuparivatti, ñāṇassa anuparivatti ñāṇānuparivatti,
tika-s0501t:554_12: ñāṇānuparivatti assāti ñāṇānuparivatti. Ñāṇaṃ pana pubbe vuttappakārameva.
tika-s0501t:555_0: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti yathā chandasamādhiādicatubbidhasamādhissa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇānuparivattibhāvena
tika-s0501t:555_1: pure atītāsu jātīsu asaṅkhyeyyesupi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu attano khandhapaṭibaddhassa,
tika-s0501t:555_2: paresaṃ khandhapaṭibaddhassa ca suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhanaṃ tathā
tika-s0501t:555_3: tathāvuttasamādhissa anāgataṃsañāṇānuparivattibhāvena pacchā anāgatāsu jātīsu asaṅkhyeyyesupi
tika-s0501t:555_4: saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu attano khandhapaṭibaddhassa, paresaṃ khandhapaṭibaddhassa ca suṭṭhu
tika-s0501t:555_5: paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhananti attho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā pacchā tathā pureti
tika-s0501t:555_7: divasesu parasattānaṃyeva cittassa suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:555_8: tathā tathāvuttasamādhissa pure atītesu sattasuyeva divasesu parasattānaṃyeva cittassa
tika-s0501t:556_0: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā cakkhumantānaṃ sattānaṃ divasabhāge sūriyālokena
tika-s0501t:556_1: andhakārassa viddhaṃsitattā āpāthagataṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ manoviññāṇenapi suviññeyyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:556_2: tathā rattibhāge caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre vattamāne yathāvuttasamādhissa
tika-s0501t:556_3: dibbacakkhuñāṇānuparivattibhāvena rūpāyatanassa suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhanaṃ.
tika-s0501t:556_4: Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā rattibhāge caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre yathāvuttasamādhissa
tika-s0501t:556_5: dibbacakkhuñāṇānuparivattibhāvena rūpāyatanassa suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:556_6: tathā divasabhāge sukhumassa rūpāyatanassa vā kenaci pākārādinā tirohitassa rūpāyatanassa
tika-s0501t:556_7: vā atidūraṭṭhāne pavattassa rūpāyatanassa vā yathāvuttasamādhissa dibbacakkhuñāṇānuparivattibhāvena
tika-s0501t:556_8: suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhananti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:557_1: saddāyatanassa vā kenaci pākārādinā tirohitassa saddāyatanassa vā atidūraṭṭhāne pavattassa
tika-s0501t:557_2: saddāyatanassa vā suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhanaṃ, tathā rattibhāgepi
tika-s0501t:557_4: kenaci pākārādinā tirohitassa saddāyatanassa vā atidūraṭṭhāne pavattassa saddāyatanassa
tika-s0501t:557_5: vā suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhananti ayaṃ nayopi netabbo. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-s0501t:558_1: “yathā ca rūpāyatane vuttaṃ, tathā samādhissa dibbasotañāṇānuparivattitāya saddāyatane ca netabba”nti.
tika-s0501t:559_1: pucchitabbattā “iti vivaṭenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha itīti evaṃ vuttappakārena. Apariyonaddhenāti
tika-s0501t:559_2: nīvaraṇādivigamanena. Sappabhāsaṃ cittanti iddhipādasampayuttaṃ maggacittaṃ bhāveti.
tika-s0501t:559_3: Iddhipādasampayutte maggacitte uppajjamāne hi maggacittasahabhūni kusalāni saddhindriyavīriyindriyasatindriyasamādhindriyapaññindriyabhūtāni
tika-s0501t:559_4: pañcindriyāni uppajjanti. Maggacitte nirujjhamāne anuppajjanabhāvena nirujjhanti
tika-s0501t:559_5: ekacittakkhaṇikattā. Evaṃ maggaviññāṇassa nirodhā paññā ca sati ca nirujjhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:560_1: vuttaṃ, paṭisandhiviññāṇassa nirodhā nāmarūpañca nirujjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā
tika-s0501t:560_2: “viññāṇassa nirodhā paññā ca sati cāti vuttāni pañcindriyāni evaṃ nirujjhantī”ti
tika-s0501t:560_3: vattabbattā nāmarūpañca nirujjhati, nirujjhamānaṃ pana nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
tika-s0501t:560_4: nirodhā nirujjhatīti dassetuṃ “nāmarūpañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nāmarūpañcāti maggena
tika-s0501t:560_6: Viññāṇahetukanti uppajjanārahaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ hetu assa nāmarūpassāti viññāṇahetukaṃ.
tika-s0501t:560_7: Viññāṇapaccayā nibbattanti viññāṇena paccayena nibbattaṃ. Tassāti uppajjanārahassa
tika-s0501t:560_8: paṭisandhiviññāṇassa. Hetūti taṇhāavijjādiko kileso. Viññāṇanti uppajjanārahaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0501t:560_9: Anāhāranti appaccayaṃ. Anabhinanditanti kāmataṇhādīhi anabhinanditabbaṃ. Appaṭisandhikanti
tika-s0501t:560_10: punabbhavābhisandahanarahitaṃ. Nti tādisaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Ahetūti natthi hetusaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0501t:560_11: paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ imassa nāmarūpassāti ahetu. Appaccayanti sahāyavirahena natthi
tika-s0501t:560_12: paccayā saṅkhārā imassāti appaccayaṃ. Evaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa nirodhā nāmarūpañca nirujjhatīti.
tika-s0501t:561_0: “Paññāsatīnañceva nāmarūpassa ca vuttappakārena nirujjhanabhāvo kathaṃ amhehi saddahitabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:561_1: vattabbattā “tenāha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vattabbākārena paññāsatīnañceva nāmarūpassa
tika-s0501t:561_3: uparujjhatī”ti gāthāvacanaṃ āha. Tena gāthāvacanena tumhehi mayā vutto nirujjhanabhāvo
tika-s0501t:561_4: saddahitabboyevāti. Etthāpi paññāsatināmarūpānaṃ nirujjhanaṃ ajānantena tattha vā
tika-s0501t:561_5: saṃsayantena ajitena pucchitabbattā “adiṭṭhajotanā pucchāti vā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchāti
tika-s0501t:561_6: vā paññādīnaṃ anekatthattā dhammato vā anekādhiṭṭhānā pucchāti vā dhammādhiṭṭhānā
tika-s0501t:561_8: anekādhiṭṭhānavissajjananti vā dhammādhiṭṭhānavissajjana”nti vā iccevamādivissajjanavicayo niddhāretabbo.
tika-s0501t:562_1: ca visuṃ visuṃ dassetvā pucchāvicayo ceva vissajjanavicayo ca ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t:562_2: amhehi ca ñāto, “sattādhiṭṭhānadhammādhiṭṭhānesu ekato dassitesu pucchāvissajjanesu
tika-s0501t:562_3: kathaṃ pucchāvicayo ceva vissajjanavicayo ca amhehi viññātabbo”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:562_4: sattādhiṭṭhānadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ pucchaṃ nīharitvā tattha vicayaṃ vibhajanto “ye ca
tika-s0501t:563: “Evaṃ anusandhipucchampi dassetvā heṭṭhā sattādhiṭṭhānā, dhammādhiṭṭhānā ca pucchā visuṃ visuṃ dassitāti idāni tā saha dassetuṃ “ye ca saṅkhatadhammāse’tiādi āraddha”nti –
tika-s0501t:564_0: Vuttaṃ. Tassāyaṃ attho – idha sāsane ye arahanto saṅkhatadhammā honti, puthū bahūyeva
tika-s0501t:564_1: satta janā sekkhā sīlādisikkhamānā honti, tesaṃ arahantāvañceva sekkhānañca iriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:564_2: paṭipattiṃ meṃ mahā puṭṭho nipako tvaṃ bhagavā pabrūhi mārisa iti āyasmā ajito pucchanto āhāti.
tika-s0501t:565_0: 15. Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ “kittakāni pucchitānī”ti vattabbattā “imānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Padatthānurūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:565_1: pucchitabbattā “imāni tīṇi padāni pucchitānī”ti vuttaṃ. “Ye ca …pe… mārisā”ti gāthāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:565_2: ye pañhā pucchitā, te pañhā tayo honti, “kissa kena kāraṇena tayo hontī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:565_3: “kissa…pe… yogenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sekkhā ariyā ca asekkhā ariyā ca vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0501t:565_4: pahānañcāti sekhāsekhavipassanāpubbaṅgamappahānāni, tesaṃ yogoti sekhā…pe… yogo,
tika-s0501t:565_5: tena sekhā…pe… yogena. Evaṃ pucchāvidhinā hi yasmā “ye ca saṅkhatadhammāse…pe… mārisā”ti
tika-s0501t:565_6: gāthamāha, tasmā tayo pañhā hontīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0501t:566_0: “Ye ca saṅkhatadhammāse”ti iminā asekkhānaṃ arahattaṃ pucchati, “ye ca sekkhā puthū
tika-s0501t:566_1: idhā”ti iminā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ sekkhasikkhanaṃ pucchati, “tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:566_2: puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti iminā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ vipassanā pubbabhāge tadaṅgappahānaṃ
tika-s0501t:566_3: pucchati. “Adiṭṭhajotanā pucchāti vā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchāti vā sattādhiṭṭhānā
tika-s0501t:566_4: pucchāti vā anekādhiṭṭhānā pucchā”ti vā iccevamādipucchāvicayo niddhāretabbo.
tika-s0501t:567_0: Sattadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ pucchaṃ nīharitvā pucchāvicayo ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca
tika-s0501t:567_1: ñāto, “tassaṃ pucchāyaṃ katamā vissajjanāgāthā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha vissajjanā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:567_2: āraddhaṃ. Tatthāti tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ. “Kāmesu…pe… paribbaje”ti vissajjanāgāthā bhagavatā
tika-s0501t:567_3: vuttā. Kāmesūti kāmīyantīti kāmā, tesu kāmesu. Vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena paṇḍitehi
tika-s0501t:567_4: nābhigijjheyya. Manasā nāvilosiyāti āvilabhāvakare byāpādavitakkādayo ceva kāyaduccaritādayo
tika-s0501t:567_5: ca dhamme pajahanto paṇḍito manasā anāvilo suppasanno bhaveyya. Kusalo sabbadhammānanti
tika-s0501t:567_6: sabbadhammānaṃ aniccatādinā paritulitattā aniccatādīsu pañcasu khandhesu kusalo cheko.
tika-s0501t:567_7: Satoti kesādīsu saratīti sato. Bhikkhūti saṅkhatadhamme bhayādito ikkhatīti bhikkhu.
tika-s0501t:568_0: Pucchāgāthāyaṃ “nipako”ti padena pasaṃsitena bhagavatā vissajjanāgāthā vuttā, tassa
tika-s0501t:568_1: bhagavato yena anāvaraṇañāṇena ukkaṃsagatena pakkabhāvo dassito, taṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:568_2: tāva kāyakammādibhedehi vibhajitvā dassento “bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:568_3: Tattha anāvaraṇañāṇena jānitvā kataṃ sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti.
tika-s0501t:568_4: Esa nayo sesesupi. Atīte aṃseti atītabhave saparakkhandhādike koṭṭhāse aññāṇena appaṭihataṃ
tika-s0501t:568_5: bhagavato ñāṇadassanaṃ. Anāgate aṃseti anāgatabhave saparakkhandhādike koṭṭhāse.
tika-s0501t:568_6: Paccuppanne aṃseti paccuppanne bhave saparakkhandhādike koṭṭhāse.
tika-s0501t:569_0: “Ñāṇadassanassa katarasmiṃ paṭighāto”ti pucchitabbattā pucchaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭighātavisayaṃ
tika-s0501t:569_1: dassetuṃ “ko cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā “paccuppannabhave saparakkhandhādike koṭṭhāse
tika-s0501t:569_2: aññesampi ñāṇadassanaṃ bhaveyya, tadanusārena atītānāgatakoṭṭhāsesupi katarasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:569_3: aññesaṃ ñāṇadassanassa paṭighāto bhaveyyā”ti pucchitabbattā pucchaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭighātavisayaṃ
tika-s0501t:569_4: niyametvā dassetuṃ “ko cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ko cāti kva katarasmiṃ samaye aññesaṃ
tika-s0501t:570_0: Anicce, dukkhe, anattaniye ca aññesaṃ aññāṇaṃ yaṃ adassanaṃ atthi, aññāṇādassanasaṅkhāto
tika-s0501t:570_1: sabhāvo ñāṇadassanassa paṭighāto bhavati, na saparakkhandhādidassanamattapaṭighāto.
tika-s0501t:570_2: Etena aniccato lakkhaṇattaye pavattassa ñāṇadassanassa aññesaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ,
tika-s0501t:570_3: bhagavato ca ñāṇadassanassa aññehi asādhāraṇataṃ dasseti. Bhagavato hi lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanena
tika-s0501t:570_5: ñāṇadassanassa paṭighātabhāvo katamāya upamāya amhākaṃ pākaṭo”ti vattabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:570_6: upamāya pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “yathā idhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idha sattaloke cakkhumā puriso
tika-s0501t:570_7: ākāse tārakāni passeyya, gaṇanasaṅketena “ettakānī”ti no ca jāneyya yathā, evaṃ aññesaṃ
tika-s0501t:571_0: Bhagavato pana tathā abhāvato kenaci aññāṇena adassanena appaṭihataṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:571_1: bhavatīti attho daṭṭhabbo. “Bhagavato ñāṇadassanassa appaṭihatabhāvo kasmā amhehi
tika-s0501t:571_2: saddahitabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “anāvaraṇañāṇadassanā hi buddhā bhagavanto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:571_3: “Nipakassa…pe… bhagavato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāyakammādibhedehi ācariyena vibhajitvā dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:571_4: amhehi ca ñātaṃ, pacchā gāthāya ‘iriya’nti padena pucchitā sekkhāsekkhapaṭipadā kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:571_5: vijānitabbā”ti vattabbattā sekkhāsekkhapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha sekhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:571_6: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ vissajjane. Sekhenāti sikkhanasīlena puggalena rajanīyesu
tika-s0501t:571_7: rūpārammaṇādīsu dhammesu gedhā cittaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānīyesu āghātavatthūsu
tika-s0501t:572_0: “Tesu gedhadosesu katamaṃ nivārento bhagavā vissajjanagāthāyaṃ katamaṃ padamāhā”ti
tika-s0501t:572_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha yā icchā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti gedhadosesu. Icchāti
tika-s0501t:572_2: rāgicchā. Mucchāti lobhamohasahagatamohamucchā. Patthanāti rāgapatthanā. Piyāyanāti
tika-s0501t:572_3: taṇhāpiyāyanāva, na mettāpiyāyanā. Kīḷanāti gedhakīḷanā. Etāni hi gedhapariyāyavacanāni.
tika-s0501t:572_4: Taṃ gedhasaṅkhātaṃ icchādikaṃ nivārento bhagavā “kāmesu nābhigijjheyyā”ti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pakārena āha.
tika-s0501t:573_0: Pariyuṭṭhānavighātaṃ dosaṃ nivārento bhagavā “manasānāvilo siyā”ti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0501t:573_1: pakārena āhāti yojanā. Gedhadosānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ nivārento bhagavā dve padāni āhāti
tika-s0501t:573_2: vuttaṃ, “taṃ kena atthena saddahitabba”nti vattabbattā “tathā hi sekho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:573_3: Rajanīyesu abhigijjhanto sekho anuppannaṃ lobhapadhānaṃ kilesañca uppādeti, uppannaṃ
tika-s0501t:573_4: kilesañca phātiṃ abhivaḍḍhanaṃ karoti, pariyuṭṭhānīyesu āvilo sekho anuppannaṃ dosapadhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:573_5: kilesañca uppādeti, uppannaṃ kilesañca phātiṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ karoti, iti iminā paṭikkhepaatthena
tika-s0501t:574_0: “Kiṃ pana anabhigijjhanto, anāvilo ca sekkho agedhadosanivāraṇameva karoti, udāhu
tika-s0501t:574_1: uttaripi paṭipadaṃ pūretī”ti pucchitabbattā uttaripi paṭipadaṃ pūretiyevāti dassento
tika-s0501t:574_2: “yo pana anāvilasaṅkappo”tiādimāha. Tattha anāvilasaṅkappoti natthi āvilakarā saṅkappā
tika-s0501t:574_4: anabhigijjhanto vāyamati kusalavāyāmaṃ pavatteti. “Kathaṃ vāyamatī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:574_5: “so anuppannāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha soti uparibhāvanāmaggabhāvatthāya paṭipajjamāno
tika-s0501t:574_6: sekkho. Anuppannānantiādīnaṃ attho sakkā aṭṭhakathāvacaneneva jānitunti na vibhatto.
tika-s0501t:575_0: 16. Yenāti asubhādīnaṃ anussaraṇalakkhaṇena indriyena taṇhāmayitavatthūsu kāmataṇhāya
tika-s0501t:575_1: sahajātaṃ vitakkaṃ vāreti, idaṃ asubhādianussaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ indriyaṃ satindriyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:575_2: Yena mahaggatabhāvappattena avikkhepena byāpādavitakkaṃ vāreti, idaṃ avikkhepasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0501t:575_3: indriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ. Yena sammappadhānena vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vāreti, idaṃ sammappadhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0501t:575_4: indriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ. Yena sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena indriyena uppannuppanne…pe… nādhivāseti,
tika-s0501t:575_5: idaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ. Imesu catūsu indriyesu saha uppajjamānā
tika-s0501t:575_6: yā saddahanā okappanā uppajjati, anāvilabhāvato idaṃ saddahanasaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:576_0: Ekasmiṃyeva visaye jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇeyyuṃ, attano visaye jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ pāpuṇituṃ
tika-s0501t:576_1: arahanti, “katamaṃ indriyaṃ kattha visaye jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ pavatta”nti pucchitabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:576_2: idaṃ indriyaṃ imasmiṃ visaye pavattanti dassento “tattha saddhindriyaṃ kattha daṭṭhabba”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:576_3: Tattha tatthāti tesu indriyesu catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyaṃ jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t:576_4: pavattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi yojetabbaṃ. Kiṃ nu sekkho paññindriyeva appamatto’ti
tika-s0501t:576_5: bhagavatā vutto thomito, udāhu sabbehi kusalehi dhammehīti pucchitabbattā sabbehi
tika-s0501t:576_6: kusalehi dhammehi pañcindriyapamukhehi vutto thomito hotīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ sekho”tiādi
tika-s0501t:576_7: vuttaṃ. Tattha evaṃ pañcindriyānaṃ nibbattidassanena sekho puggalo sabbehi kusalehi
tika-s0501t:576_8: dhammehi appamattoti bhagavatā vutto thomito anāvilatāya manasāti yojanā. “Sekkhassa
tika-s0501t:576_9: anāvilatā kena saddahitabbā”ti vattabbattā “tenāha bhagavā manasānāvilo siyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:576_10: Bhagavatā “manasānāvilo siyā”ti vuttattā sekkhassa anāvilatā tumhehi saddahitabbāti.
tika-s0501t:577_0: 17. Sekkhassa matthakappattā paṭipadā ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:577_1: asekkhassa matthakappattā paṭipadā ñātabbā”ti vattabbattā asekkhassa matthakappattaṃ
tika-s0501t:577_2: paṭipadaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “kusalo sabbadhammāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha sabbadhammānanti
tika-s0501t:577_3: sabbesu dhammesu matthakappattāya paṭipadāya asekkho kusalo chekataroti bhagavatā
tika-s0501t:577_4: vutto thomito anāvilatāya manasāti. Asekkhassa sabbadhammesu yaṃ kosallaṃ dassetukāmo,
tika-s0501t:577_5: tassa kosallassa visayabhūte sabbadhamme tāva puggalādhiṭṭhānena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:577_6: “loko nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha “sabbadhammāna”nti iminā vuttadhammasaṅkhāto loko nāma
tika-s0501t:577_7: kilesaloko, bhavaloko, indriyalokoti tividho hotīti yojanā. Tattha parittadhammaṭṭho
tika-s0501t:577_8: kilesajananaṭṭhena kileso, kusalādipavattanaṭṭhena loko cāti kilesaloko. Mahaggatadhammaṭṭho
tika-s0501t:577_9: bhavanaṭṭhena bhavo, vuttanayena loko cāti bhavaloko. Saddhindriyādidhammaṭṭho ādhipaccaṭṭhayogavasena
tika-s0501t:577_10: indriyabhūto hutvā saddhindriyādipattanaṭṭhena loko cāti indriyaloko.
tika-s0501t:578_0: “Tīsu lokesu katamena katamo samudāgacchatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:578_1: “Saddhādiindriyāni ko nibbattetī”ti pucchitabbattā “so indriyāni nibbattetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:578_2: Tattha soti yo puggalo kilesalokasaṅkhāte parittadhamme, bhavalokasaṅkhāte mahaggatadhamme
tika-s0501t:578_3: ca taṃtaṃsampādanavasena ṭhito, so puggalo saddhindriyādīni indriyāni attasantāne nibbatteti.
tika-s0501t:579_0: “Indriyesu attasantānesu punappunaṃ nibbattāpanavasena vuḍḍhāpiyamānesu kā paññā
tika-s0501t:579_1: bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “indriyesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha neyyassāti abhiññeyyassa.
tika-s0501t:579_2: Pariññāti rūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇato, paccayato ca pariggahādivasena pavattapaññā.
tika-s0501t:579_3: “Sā pariññā katividhena upaparikkhitabbā”ti pucchitabbattā “sā duvidhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:579_4: Tattha sā pariññā dassanapariññāya ca bhāvanāpariññāya ca duvidhena viññūhi upaparikkhitvā
tika-s0501t:579_5: gahetabbāti. Dassanapariññāyāti ca dassanamaggapaññājanikāya ñātapariññāyāti attho
tika-s0501t:579_6: gahetabbo. Tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “dassanapariññāti ñātapariññā”ti. Bhāvanāpariññāyāti
tika-s0501t:580_0: “Sā duvidhenā’tiādinā vutto attho atisaṅkhepo na sakkā viññātuṃ, vitthāretvā kathehī”ti
tika-s0501t:580_1: vattabbattā “yadā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yadāti balavavipassanuppajjanakāle. Sekhoti
tika-s0501t:580_2: sikkhanasīlatāya kalyāṇaputhujjano ceva sotāpannādiko ca. Ñeyyanti ñātabbaṃ rūpādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:580_3: saṅkhāraṃ. Parijānātīti pariggahādiñāṇena pariggahetvā jānāti nibbidāñāṇasahagatena.
tika-s0501t:580_4: Tassāti kalyāṇaputhujjanassa ceva sotāpannādikassa ca. Dve dhammāti kalyāṇaputhujjanassa
tika-s0501t:580_5: balavavipassanādhammo ceva sotāpannādikassa ca balavavipassanādhammo ca. Yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0501t:581_0: “Pubbe yaṃ ñāṇaṃ ‘neyyassa pariññā’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ ñāṇaṃ katividhena veditabba”nti
tika-s0501t:581_1: pucchitabbattā “taṃ ñāṇaṃ pañcavidhena veditabbaṃ…pe... sacchikiriyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Tāsu
tika-s0501t:581_2: vipassanābhedena bhinnāsu pañcasu abhiññādīsu katamā abhiññā, katamā pariññā, katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:581_3: pahānaṃ, katamā bhāvanā, katamā sacchikiriyā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:581_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti abhiññādīsu. Yaṃ dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇe ñāṇanti rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:581_6: yaṃ ñāṇaṃ hetuphalajānanahetujānanasaṅkhātā dhammapaṭisambhidā ceva hetuphalajānanasaṅkhātā
tika-s0501t:581_7: atthapaṭisambhidā ca bhavati. Ayaṃ salakkhaṇena saddhiṃ hetuphalajānanā paññā abhiññā nāma.
tika-s0501t:582_0: Evanti vuttappakārena. Abhiññāñāṇena abhijānitvā. Yā parijānanātiādīsu “idaṃ anavajjaṃ
tika-s0501t:582_1: kusalaṃ, idaṃ sāvajjaṃ akusalaṃ, idaṃ akusalavipākajanakaṃ sāvajjaṃ, idaṃ kusalavipākajanakaṃ
tika-s0501t:582_2: anavajjaṃ, idaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ kaṇhaṃ, idaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukkaṃ, idaṃ kusalaṃ anavajjādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:582_3: sevitabbaṃ, idaṃ akusalaṃ sāvajjādikaṃ na sevitabba”nti evaṃ aniccādito kalāpasammasanādivasena
tika-s0501t:582_4: gahitā sammasitā ime vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā saṅkhatadhammā idaṃ udayabbayañāṇādiphalaṃ
tika-s0501t:582_5: ānisaṃsaṃ anukkamena nibbattāpenti. Tannibbattavipassanāya uppajjanato upacāraṃ uppādenti,
tika-s0501t:582_6: evaṃ anukkamena gahitānaṃ pavattitānaṃ tesaṃ udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ ayaṃ saccānubodhapaṭivedho
tika-s0501t:582_7: atthoti paricchinditvā yā parijānanā pavattā, sā ayaṃ parijānanā pariññā nāmāti yojetvā,
tika-s0501t:582_8: evaṃ vuttappakārāya pariññāpaññāya parijānitvā pahātabbā, bhāvetabbā, sacchikātabbā
tika-s0501t:582_9: ca tayo dhammā avasiṭṭhā bhavanti. “Ye akusalā, te pahātabbā”ti yā parijānanā paññā
tika-s0501t:582_10: pavattā, idaṃ pahānaṃ pahānañāṇaṃ. “Ye kusalā, te bhāvetabbā”ti yā parijānanā paññā
tika-s0501t:582_11: pavattā, sā bhāvanāpaññā. “Yaṃ asaṅkhataṃ, idaṃ sacchikiriya”nti yā parijānanā paññā
tika-s0501t:582_12: pavattā, sā sacchikiriyāpaññāti yojetvā aṭṭhakathādhippāyena aviruddho attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:583_0: Abhiññādayo pañcavidhā paññā ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “tāhi pariññāhi
tika-s0501t:583_1: jānanto puggalo ‘ki’nti vuccati thomīyatī”ti vattabbattā “yo eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:583_2: yo puggalo evaṃ vuttappakārena jānāti, ayaṃ jānanto puggalo paccayuppannesu dhammesu
tika-s0501t:583_3: kusalattā chekattā “atthakusalo”ti vuccati thomīyati, paccayadhammesu kusalattā “dhammakusalo”ti
tika-s0501t:583_4: ca catunnaṃ ekattādīnaṃ nayānaṃ yuttatāya kovidattā “kalyāṇatākusalo”ti ca phalasamāpattīsu
tika-s0501t:583_5: kovidattā “phalatākusalo”ti ca vaḍḍhīsu kovidattā “āyakusalo”ti ca avaḍḍhīsu kovidattā
tika-s0501t:583_6: “apāyakusalo”ti ca accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne sati tassa kiccassa, bhayassa
tika-s0501t:583_7: vā tikicchanasamatthe ṭhānuppattiyakāraṇe kovidattā “upāyakusalo”ti ca mahantesu
tika-s0501t:583_8: abhikkamādīsu satisampajaññāya sampannattā “mahatā kosallena samannāgato”ti ca vuccati
tika-s0501t:583_9: thomīyati. “Tassa asekkhassa atthādīsu kusalabhāvo kathaṃ saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:584_0: “Kusalo sabbadhammāna”nti padassa attho ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “sato
tika-s0501t:584_1: bhikkhu paribbaje”ti padassa attho kathaṃ amhehi vitthārato viññāto”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:584_2: “sato bhikkhu paribbaje”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā “sato bhikkhu paribbaje”ti bhagavatā
tika-s0501t:584_3: vuttaṃ, “kattha pavattena satisahitena ñāṇena sampanno sato kimatthaṃ paribbaje”ti
tika-s0501t:584_4: pucchitabbattā “imesu pavattena satisahitañāṇena sampanno sato imamatthaṃ paribbaje”ti
tika-s0501t:584_5: niyametvā dassento “sato bhikkhu paribbaje”tiādimāha. Tattha tenāti yo abhikkamādīsu
tika-s0501t:584_6: pavattena satisahitañāṇena samannāgato sato asekkhabhikkhu, tena asekkhabhikkhunā
tika-s0501t:584_8: tuṇhībhāvena satena satisahitena sampajānena ñāṇena vihātabbaṃ catuiriyāpathaparivattanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0501t:585_0: “Yā sekkhāsekkhapaṭipadā niddiṭṭhā, imā sekkhāsekkhapaṭipadā saṅkhepato katividhā”ti
tika-s0501t:585_1: pucchitabbattā imā paṭipadāsaṅkhātā cariyā saṅkhepato puggalavasena dveti dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:585_2: “imā dve cariyā”tiādimāha. Tattha yā cariyā bhāvetabbakusalādibhedena vā atthakosallādibhedena
tika-s0501t:585_3: vā abhikkamādīsu satisampajaññabhedena vā niddiṭṭhā, imā cariyā dveti bhagavatā anuññātā
tika-s0501t:585_4: anujānanavasena desitā, visuddhānaṃ arahantānaṃ ekā cariyā, visujjhantānaṃ sekkhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:586_2: vuttaṃ. Arahato indriyāni katakiccāni, indriyānaṃ katakiccattā yaṃ pucchaṃ pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:586_3: taṃ sabbaṃ catubbidhaṃ dukkhassa pariññābhisamayena bojjhitabbaṃ…pe… nirodhassa sacchikiriyābhisamayena
tika-s0501t:586_4: bojjhitabbaṃ bhave. Catubbidhaṃ idaṃ bojjhaṃ bojjhitabbaṃ yo asekkho sativepullappattattā
tika-s0501t:586_5: evaṃ pariññābhisamayādinā jānāti, ayaṃ asekkho nippariyāyena “rāgassa khayāya, dosassa
tika-s0501t:586_6: khayāya, mohassa khayāya sato abhikkamati, sato paṭikkamatī”ti vuccati thomīyati.
tika-s0501t:586_7: Sekkhopi yathāvuttaṃ bojjhaṃ bojjhitabbaṃ attano pariññābhisamayādinā jānāti, tasmā
tika-s0501t:586_8: “sato…pe… mohassā”ti vuccati thomīyatīti veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “ke visujjhantā? Sekkhā”ti.
tika-s0501t:587_1: saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā vuttaṃ “tenāha bhagavā sato bhikkhu paribbaje”ti. “Bhagavato
tika-s0501t:587_2: sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgama’ntiādinā manāpikesu kāmesu nābhigijjhanabhāvo, amanāpikesu
tika-s0501t:587_3: kāmesu manasā anāvilabhāvo, sabbadhammesu kusalabhāvo, satisampajaññena samannāgatassa
tika-s0501t:587_4: paribbajanabhāvo ācariyena niddiṭṭho, so nābhigijjhanabhāvādiko kasmā amhehi saddahitabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:587_5: pucchitabbattā vuttaṃ “tenāha kāmesu…pe… paribbaje”ti. Imissā gāthāyapi pucchāvissajjanavicayo
tika-s0501t:588_0: Vicayahāravibhaṅge ajitasuttaṃ nīharitvā pucchāvissajjanavicayo ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t:588_1: amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo suttantaresu pucchāvissajjanavicayo”ti pucchitabbattā ajitasutte
tika-s0501t:588_3: yojetabbāti dassetuṃ “evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ, evaṃ vissajjitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –
tika-s0501t:589_0: Ettāvatā ca mahāthero vicayahāraṃ vibhajanto ajitasuttavasena pucchāvicayaṃ, vissajjanavicayañca
tika-s0501t:589_1: dassetvā idāni suttantaresupi pucchāvissajjanavicayānaṃ nayaṃ dassento evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:590_0: Vuttaṃ. Tattha evanti ajitasutte vuttapucchāvicayānusārena pucchāvasena pavattasuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:590_1: nīharitvā pucchāvicayo vibhajetabbo, evaṃ ajitasutte vuttavissajjanavicayānusārena
tika-s0501t:590_2: suttantaresupi vissajjanavasena pavattasuttaṃ nīharitvā vissajjanavicayo vibhajetabbo.
tika-s0501t:591_0: Pucchāvissajjanavicayā ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamo suttaanugītivicayo”ti
tika-s0501t:591_1: pucchitabbattā “suttassa ca anugītī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha suttassāti nīharitasuttassa.
tika-s0501t:591_2: Anugītīti suttantaradesanāsaṅkhātā anugīti. Atthato ca byañjanato ca samānetabbāti
tika-s0501t:591_3: tassā anugītiyā atthato, byañjanato ca saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttena samānā sadisī kātabbā,
tika-s0501t:591_4: tasmiṃ vā saṃvaṇṇiyamānasutte anugīti suttatthato, byañjanato ca samānetabbā. “Atthato
tika-s0501t:591_5: asamāne ko nāma doso āpajjeyyā”ti pucchitabbattā atthāpagataṃ hi byañjanaṃ samphappalāpaṃ
tika-s0501t:591_6: bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Atthato asamāne doso vutto, amhehi ca ñāto, byañjanato asamāne
tika-s0501t:591_7: pana ko nāma doso āpajjatī”ti pucchitabbattā “dunnikkhittassa padabyañjanassa atthopi
tika-s0501t:591_8: dunnayo bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā sadosattā anugītiyā vā suttena atthabyañjanūpetaṃ saṅgāyitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:592_0: Anugītivicayo ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo suttassa vicayo”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:592_1: suttañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha suttañcāti niddhāritasuttañca. “Idaṃ niddhāritasuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:592_2: nāma bhagavatā vuttaṃ āhaccavacanaṃ kiṃ, udāhu saṅgāyantehi vuttaṃ anusandhivacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:592_3: ki”nti pavicinitabbaṃ, “idaṃ niddhāritasuttaṃ nītatthaṃ kiṃ, udāhu neyyatthaṃ ki”nti
tika-s0501t:592_4: pavicinitabbaṃ, “idaṃ niddhāritasuttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ kiṃ, udāhu vāsanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:592_5: ki”nti pavicinitabbaṃ, “idaṃ niddhāritasuttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kiṃ, udāhu asekkhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:592_6: ki”nti pavicinitabbaṃ. Evaṃ pavicinitvā yadi āhaccavacanaṃ bhave, evaṃ sati “āhaccavacana”nti
tika-s0501t:592_7: niddhāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Yadi asekkhasuttaṃ bhave, evaṃ sati “asekkhasutta”nti niddhāretvā
tika-s0501t:593_0: “Suttaṃ pavicinitvā suttassa atthabhūtāni sabbāni saccāni niddhāretvā kattha padese
tika-s0501t:593_1: passitabbānī”ti pucchitabbattā pucchaṃ ṭhapetvā imasmiṃ padese passitabbānīti dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:593_2: “kuhiṃ imassa suttassa sabbāni…pe… pariyosāne”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha imassa suttassāti
tika-s0501t:593_3: yaṃ suttaṃ vicinituṃ niddhāritaṃ, imassa suttassa catusaccavinimuttassa suttatthassa
tika-s0501t:593_4: abhāvato sabbāni saccāni tasseva suttassa ādimajjhapariyosāne passitabbānīti attho.
tika-s0501t:594_0: Yathāvuttaṃ suttavicayaṃ nigamento “evaṃ suttaṃ pavicetabba”nti āha. “Na yathāvuttapucchādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:594_1: pavicetabbabhāvo amhehi jānitabbo saddahitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “tenāha…pe… anugītī”ti
tika-s0501t:594_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha tena yathāvuttapucchādīnaṃ vicetabbabhāvena āyasmā mahākaccāno “yaṃ
tika-s0501t:594_3: pucchitañca…pe… anugītī”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena vicetabbabhāvo tumhehi
tika-s0501t:595_0: “Yathāvuttappakāro ca vicayo hāro paripuṇṇo kiṃ, udāhu aññopi niddhāretvā yojetabbo
tika-s0501t:595_1: atthi ki”nti pucchitabbattā “niyutto vicayo hāro”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha pucchāvicayavissajjanavicayapubbāparavicayaanugītivicayasuttavicayā
tika-s0501t:595_2: sarūpato vibhattā, tehi avaseso assādādivicayopi yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yutto yuñjitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:598: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:600_0: 18. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vicayahāravibhaṅgena padapañhādayo vicitā,
tika-s0501t:600_2: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo yuttihāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu niddiṭṭhesu
tika-s0501t:600_3: soḷasasu hāresu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso yuttihāro yuttihāravibhaṅgoti pucchi. “Sabbesaṃ
tika-s0501t:600_5: yuttihāravibhaṅgo nāmāti viññeyyo. Tena vuttaṃ “tattha katamo yuttihārotiādi yuttihāravibhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0501t:600_6: Ayaṃ yuttihāro kiṃ nāma suttatthaṃ yuttāyuttivasena yojayatīti yuñjitabbaṃ suttatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:600_7: pucchati. Suttattho pana duvidho atathākārena gayhamāno, tathākārena gayhamāno atthoti.
tika-s0501t:600_8: Tattha atathākārena gayhamānova attho yāthāvato yuttiniddhāraṇena yojetabbo, itaro
tika-s0501t:600_9: pana bhūtakathanamattena yojetabbo. Yasmā panāyaṃ yuttigavesanā nāma saṃvaṇṇanā mahāpadesehi
tika-s0501t:600_10: vinā na sambhavati, tasmā yuttihāraṃ vibhajanto tassa yuttihārassa lakkhaṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0501t:600_11: upadisituṃ “cattāro mahāpadesā”tiādimāha. Tattha mahāpadesāti mahante buddhādayo
tika-s0501t:600_12: apadisitvā vuttāni kāraṇāni, mahantāni vā dhammassa apadesāni patiṭṭhānāni. Apadisīyateti
tika-s0501t:600_13: apadeso, buddho apadeso etassa kāraṇassāti buddhāpadeso. Sesesupi eseva nayo netabbo.
tika-s0501t:600_14: “Buddhassa sammukhā etaṃ suttaṃ mayā suta”nti vatvā ābhatassa ganthassa suttavinayehi
tika-s0501t:600_15: saṃsandanaṃ dhammo, asaṃsandanaṃ adhammoti vinicchayakāraṇaṃ mahāpadesoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:600_16: “Buddhassa sammukhā mayā ābhataṃ, saṅghassa sammukhā mayā ābhataṃ, sambahulattherānaṃ
tika-s0501t:600_17: sammukhā mayā ābhataṃ, ekattherassa sammukhā mayā ābhata”nti vatvā ābhatassa ganthassa
tika-s0501t:600_18: yāni byañjanapadaatthapadāni santi, tāni padabyañjanāni bhagavatā desite sutte otarayitabbāni
tika-s0501t:600_19: anuppavesitāni, vinaye rāgādivinaye sandassayitabbāni saṃsandetabbāni. Dhammatāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:600_20: upanikkhipitabbāni pakkhipitabbāni. Yadi suttatthena, vinayatthena, dhammatāya ca
tika-s0501t:600_21: aviruddhāni honti, evaṃ sati tava ābhatapadabyañjanāni yuttānīti vinicchayantehi
tika-s0501t:601_1: vuttāni, “kattha sutte, kattha vinaye, kattha dhammatāya”nti vattabbattā “katamasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:601_2: sutte”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha catūsu ariyasaccesūti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ dassanakesu
tika-s0501t:601_3: suttesu. Rāgo vinassati vūpasamati etena asubhādināti rāgavinayaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Asubhādinimittaṃ,
tika-s0501t:601_4: taṃ assa atthīti rāgavinayo, ko so? Asubhādinimittadassanako suttantaviseso. Esa
tika-s0501t:601_5: nayo dosavinayotiādīsupi. Paṭiccasamuppādo nāma sassatadiṭṭhiucchedadiṭṭhiṃ vivajjetvā
tika-s0501t:602_0: “Suttādīsu avatarante sandissante avilomente kiṃ na janetī”ti vattabbato “catūsū”tiādi
tika-s0501t:602_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha “buddhādīnaṃ sammukhā mayā ābhata”nti vatvā ābhatagantho catūsu ariyasaccesu
tika-s0501t:602_2: yadi avatarati, evaṃ sati ābhatagantho āsave na janeti. Rāgādikilesavinaye yadi sandissati,
tika-s0501t:602_3: evaṃ sati ābhatagantho āsave na janeti. Dhammatañca yadi na vilometi, evaṃ sati ābhatagantho
tika-s0501t:603_0: “Kimatthaṃ yuttihāravibhaṅge cattāro mahāpadesā ābhatā”ti vattabbattā “catūhi mahāpadesehī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:603_1: Tattha ābhataganthe yaṃ yaṃ atthajātaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā catūhi mahāpadesehi
tika-s0501t:603_2: yujjati, taṃ taṃ atthajātaṃ vā taṃ taṃ dhammajātaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:603_3: Yena yena kāraṇena ca catūhi mahāpadesehi yujjati, taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāvasena
tika-s0501t:603_4: saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte gahetabbaṃ. Yathā yathā pakārena catūhi mahāpadesehi yujjati,
tika-s0501t:603_5: so so pakāro saṃvaṇṇanāvasena saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte gahetabbo. Evaṃ gāhaṇatthaṃ cattāro
tika-s0501t:604_0: 19. Catūhi mahāpadesehi yuttaṃ aviruddhaṃ taṃ taṃ atthajātaṃ gahetabbanti ācariyena
tika-s0501t:604_1: vuttaṃ, “kattha kena yuttiniddhāraṇaṃ kātabba”nti vattabbattā “pañhaṃ pucchitenā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:604_2: vuttaṃ. Pañhe pañhaṃ pucchitena puggalena yuttiniddhāraṇaṃ kātabbanti. Tattha pañhanti
tika-s0501t:604_3: pañhitabbaṃ sabhāvadhammaṃ. Pucchitenāti vissajjetuṃ samatthena paṇḍitapuggalena.
tika-s0501t:604_4: Pañheti pucchāvasena pavattapāṭhe. Padāni kati kittakāni hontīti padaso paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0501t:604_5: pariyogāhitabbaṃ yuttihārena vicetabbaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. “Kathaṃ vicetabba”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:604_6: “yadi sabbānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sabbāni padānīti pucchitapāṭhe niravasesāni padāni
tika-s0501t:604_7: ekaṃ samānaṃ atthaṃ yadi abhivadanti, evaṃ sati atthavasena eko pañho. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0501t:605_0: Ekanti atthavasena ekavidhaṃ pañhaṃ. Upaparikkhamānena puggalena aññātabbaṃ daḷhaṃ
tika-s0501t:605_1: jānitabbaṃ. “Ko ājānanākāro”ti pucchitabbattā ājānanākāraṃ dassento “kiṃ ime dhammā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:605_2: Tattha “ye hi pariyattidhammā saṃvaṇṇetabbā, ime pariyattidhammā nānatthā honti kiṃ,
tika-s0501t:605_3: nānābyañjanā honti kiṃ, udāhu imesaṃ pariyattidhammānaṃ eko attho hoti, byañjanameva
tika-s0501t:605_4: nānaṃ hoti ki”nti yuttito vicetvā aññātabbanti yojanā. “Yathāvutto pañho kiṃ bhave”ti
tika-s0501t:605_5: pucchitabbattā yathāvuttaṃ pañhaṃ ekadesaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā kiṃ bhave”ti pucchitvā
tika-s0501t:606_0: Tassaṃ pucchāgāthāyaṃ – coraghātakena manussena coro abbhāhato viya kena dhammena
tika-s0501t:606_1: sattaloko sadā abbhāhato, māluvalatāya attano nissitarukkho parivārito ajjhotthaṭo
tika-s0501t:606_2: viya kena dhammena sattaloko sadā parivārito ajjhotthaṭo, visappītakhurappena sallena
tika-s0501t:606_3: otiṇṇo anupaviṭṭho viya kena sallena sattaloko sadā otiṇṇo anupaviṭṭho, kissa kena
tika-s0501t:606_4: kāraṇena sattaloko sadā dhūpāyito santāpitoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:607_0: “Imāya pucchāgāthāya kittakāni padānī”ti pucchitabbattā “imānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:607_1: pucchitānīti pucchitatthāni padāni cattāri honti. “Kittakā pañhā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:608: Bhagavā devatāya hi yasmā vissajjeti, iti tasmā vissajjanato “tayopañhā”ti viññāyati. “Katamā vissajjanagāthā”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:611_0: Vuttaṃ. Tassaṃ vissajjanagāthāyaṃ – coraghātakena manussena coro abbhāhato viya maccunā
tika-s0501t:611_1: sattaloko sadā abbhāhato, māluvalatāya attano nissitarukkho parivārito ajjhotthaṭo
tika-s0501t:611_2: viya jarāya sattaloko sadā parivārito ajjhotthaṭo, visappītakhurappena sallena otiṇṇo
tika-s0501t:611_3: anupaviṭṭho viya taṇhāsallena sattaloko sadā otiṇṇo anupaviṭṭho, icchāya sattaloko
tika-s0501t:612_0: 20. “Katamaṃ maccu, katamā jarā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha jarā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:612_1: tatthāti tissaṃ vissajjanagāthāyaṃ. Dutiyapade vuttā jarā ca paṭhamapade vuttaṃ maraṇañca
tika-s0501t:612_2: imāni dve saṅkhatassa khandhapañcakassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni honti, saṅkhataṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
tika-s0501t:612_3: muñcitvā visuṃ na upalabbhatīti attho. “Saṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ jarāmaraṇānaṃ kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:612_4: bhedo jānitabbo”ti vattabbattā “jarāyaṃ ṭhitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jarāyaṃ ṭhitassa
tika-s0501t:612_5: aññathattanti ṭhitassa khandhappabandhassa yaṃ aññathattaṃ, ayaṃ pākaṭajarā nāma,
tika-s0501t:612_6: na khaṇaṭṭhitijarā. Maraṇaṃ vayoti sammutimaraṇaṃ cutiyeva hoti, na khaṇikamaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:612_7: na samucchedamaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti.
tika-s0501t:613_0: Yadi ṭhitasseva maraṇaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati jarāmaraṇānaṃ nānattaṃ yuttaṃ na siyā, ayutte
tika-s0501t:613_1: sati “te tayo pañhā”ti vacanampi ayuttamevāti vattabbato “tattha jarāya cā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:613_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tissaṃ vissajjanagāthāyaṃ vuttāya jarāya ca vuttassa maraṇassa
tika-s0501t:614_0: “Kena kāraṇena yuttaṃ, kathaṃ kāraṇena nānattaṃ sampaṭicchitabba”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:614_1: “gabbhagatāpi hi mīyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Jaraṃ appattā gabbhagatāpi sattā hi yasmā mīyanti,
tika-s0501t:614_2: tasmā nānattaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. “Gabbhagatāpi jarappattā bhaveyyu”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:614_3: “na ca te jiṇṇā bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Jarappattāpi ajiṇṇattā jiṇṇajaraṃ appattāva mīyanti,
tika-s0501t:614_4: evaṃ idhādhippetassa jiṇṇajarāvirahitassa maraṇassa sambhavato aññā jarā, aññaṃ maraṇanti
tika-s0501t:614_5: ñātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Na gabbhagatānaṃyeva jiṇṇajaraṃ appattaṃ maraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t:614_6: aññesampi atthī”ti vattabbabhāvato “atthi ca devānaṃ maraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. “Devāpi cirakālasambhavato
tika-s0501t:614_7: jaraṃ pattā bhaveyyu”nti vattabbattā “na ca tesaṃ sarīrāni jīrantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Jarāmaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0501t:614_8: nānatte kāraṇaṃ ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā aññampi atthīti dassetuṃ “sakkate vā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:614_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha jiṇṇajarāya paṭikammaṃ kātuṃ sakkateva, maraṇassa pana paṭikammassa
tika-s0501t:614_10: kātuṃ na sakkateva, imināpi kāraṇena jarāmaraṇānaṃ nānattaṃ sampaṭicchitabbamevāti
tika-s0501t:614_11: attho. “Na sakkate maraṇassa paṭikammaṃ kātu”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu iddhipādabhāvanāya
tika-s0501t:614_12: vasībhāve sati sakkā maraṇassāpi paṭikammaṃ kātunti codanaṃ manasi katvā “aññatreva
tika-s0501t:615_0: Jarāmaraṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nānābhāvo ācariyena dassito, amhehi ca ñāto, “kathaṃ pana
tika-s0501t:615_1: taṇhāya jarāmaraṇehi nānābhāvo”ti vattabbato tehi taṇhāya nānattaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ
tika-s0501t:615_2: panāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṇhāya avijjamānāyapi jīrantāpi mīyantāpi vītarāgā yasmā dissanti,
tika-s0501t:616_0: “Taṇhāya jīraṇabhijjanalakkhaṇaṃ atthīti tehi taṇhāya anaññatte ko nāma doso siyā”ti
tika-s0501t:616_1: vattabbato dosaṃ dassetuṃ “yadi cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā yena jīraṇabhijjanalakkhaṇena
tika-s0501t:616_2: pākaṭaṃ, evaṃ jīraṇabhijjanalakkhaṇena taṇhāpi pākaṭā. Yadi ca siyā; evaṃ sante yobbanaṭṭhāpi
tika-s0501t:616_3: sabbe māṇavā vigatataṇhā siyuṃ, na ca vigatataṇhā, tasmā nānābhāvo sampaṭicchitabbo.
tika-s0501t:616_4: Tato aññopi doso āpajjeyyāti dassetuṃ “yathā ca taṇhā dukkhassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:616_5: jarāmaraṇānaṃ taṇhāya anaññatte sati taṇhāya bhavataṇhāya dukkhasamudayo hoti, evaṃ
tika-s0501t:616_6: jarāmaraṇampi dukkhasamudayo siyā. Yasmā na jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhasamudayo, tasmā jarāmaraṇehi
tika-s0501t:617_0: Tehi tāya anaññatte sati evampi doso āpajjeyyāti dassetuṃ “yathā ca taṇhā maggavajjhā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:617_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tehi tāya anaññatte sati yathā taṇhā maggavajjhā hoti, evaṃ jarāmaraṇampi
tika-s0501t:617_2: maggavajjhaṃ siyā. Yathā jarāmaraṇaṃ maggavajjhaṃ na hoti, evaṃ taṇhāpi maggavajjhā
tika-s0501t:617_3: na siyā, tathā ca na hoti pahātabbāpahātabbabhāvato, tasmāpi jarāmaraṇehi taṇhāya
tika-s0501t:618_0: “Yadi cātiādinā vuttāya yuttiyā upapattiyā eva jarāmaraṇehi taṇhāya aññattaṃ gavesitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:618_1: vattabbattā aññehipi kāraṇehi gavesitabbanti dassetuṃ “imāya yuttiyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:618_2: Tattha imāya yuttiyāti yā yutti “yadi cā”tiādinā vuttāya imāya yuttiyā upapattiyā.
tika-s0501t:618_3: Aññamaññehi kāraṇehi aññehi aññehi kāraṇabhūtehi upapattīhi jarāmaraṇehi taṇhāya
tika-s0501t:618_4: aññattaṃ gavesitabbanti attho. “Aññamaññehi kāraṇehi gavesitabba”nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:618_5: nanu yuttiyā, atthato ca aññattaṃ sandissatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā “yadi ca sandissatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:618_6: Tattha yuttisamāruḷhaṃ atthato ca maraṇehi taṇhāya ca aññattaṃ yadi ca sandissati,
tika-s0501t:619_0: “Kathaṃ byañjanato aññattaṃ gavesitabba”nti vattabbattā “salloti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:619_1: Tattha “sallo”ti vā “dhūpāyana”nti vā dvīhi byañjanehi vuccamānānaṃ imesaṃ icchātaṇhāsaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0501t:619_2: dhammānaṃ atthato ekattaṃ samānattaṃ yujjati, na aññattaṃ. “Sallo”ti vā “dhūpāyana”nti
tika-s0501t:619_3: vā dvīhi byañjanehi avuccamānānaṃ jarāmaraṇānaṃ taṇhāya ekattaṃ na yujjati. Tamevatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:619_4: vivarituṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha icchāya ca taṇhāya ca atthato aññattaṃ na yujjati,
tika-s0501t:619_5: ekattameva yujjatīti yojanā. Icchāya ca taṇhāya ca jīraṇabhijjanasambhavato jarāmaraṇehi
tika-s0501t:619_6: taṇhāya ekattaṃ siyā, “kasmā aññattaṃ yutta”nti vattabbato “taṇhāya adhippāye”tiādi
tika-s0501t:619_7: vuttaṃ. Tattha taṇhāya adhippāye aparipūramāne navasu āghātavatthūsu kodho ca uppajjati,
tika-s0501t:619_8: upanāho ca uppajjati. Jarāmaraṇesu aparipūramānesu navasu āghātavatthūsu kodho ca
tika-s0501t:619_9: na uppajjati, upanāho ca na uppajjati. Iti imāya yuttiyā jarāya ca maraṇassa ca taṇhāya
tika-s0501t:620_0: Yadi icchā taṇhāya atthato ekattaṃ yuttaṃ, evaṃ sati kasmā bhagavatā “maccunābbhāhato
tika-s0501t:620_1: loko”tiādigāthāyaṃ “taṇhāsallena otiṇṇo, icchādhūpāyito sadā”ti dvidhā vuttāti codanaṃ
tika-s0501t:620_3: nāmehi yaṃ panidaṃ abhilapitaṃ yaṃ panidaṃ abhilapanaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ abhilapanaṃ bhagavatā
tika-s0501t:620_4: bāhirānaṃ icchitabbatasitabbānaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ bhedānaṃ vasena “icchā”tipi
tika-s0501t:620_5: “taṇhā”tipi dvīhi nāmehi abhilapitaṃ abhilapanavasena katanti ekattaṃ yuttameva,
tika-s0501t:621_0: “Nāmavasena dvidhā vuttānaṃ icchātaṇhādīnaṃ kena ekattaṃ yuttanti saddahitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:621_1: vattabbattā “sabbāhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nānānāmavasena pabhedā sabbā icchādikā
tika-s0501t:621_2: taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā hi yasmā yuttā, tasmā nāmavasena bhinnānampi
tika-s0501t:621_3: ekalakkhaṇena ekattaṃ yuttanti saddahitabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kimiva yutta”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:621_4: “yathā sabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kaṭṭhaggiādivasena aneko sabbo aggi uṇhattalakkhaṇena
tika-s0501t:621_5: ekalakkhaṇo yathā, evaṃ ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇāti yojanā. Sabbassa aggino
tika-s0501t:621_6: upādānavasena anekāni nāmāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:621_7: Ārammaṇavasena taṇhā aññehi aññehi nāmehi bhagavatā abhilapitā, upādānavasena aggi
tika-s0501t:621_8: aññehi aññehi nāmehi abhilapitoti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:622_0: “Vissajjanagāthāyaṃ āgatanāmehi eva taṇhā abhilapitā”ti pucchitabbattā anekehi nāmehi
tika-s0501t:622_1: abhilapitāti dassetuṃ “icchāitipī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha icchitabbāni atthāni rūpādīni
tika-s0501t:622_2: ārammaṇāni sattā icchanti etāyāti icchā. Tasanti etāyāti taṇhā. Sallati pavisati
tika-s0501t:622_3: visappītaṃ sallaṃ viyāti sallā, santāpaṃ lāti ādadātīti vā sallā, santāpaṃ lāti pavattetīti
tika-s0501t:622_4: vā sallā. Dhūpāyati santāpeti paridahatīti dhūpāyanā. Sarati ākaḍḍhati avaharati
tika-s0501t:622_5: sīghasotā saritā viyāti saritā, sarati sallatīti vā saritā. Visaratīti visattikā.
tika-s0501t:622_6: Pītivasena sinehatīti sineho. Tāsu tāsu gatīsu kilamathaṃ uppādetīti kilamatho. Sattā
tika-s0501t:622_7: rūpādiārammaṇāni maññanti etāyāti maññanā. Bhavaṃ bandhatīti bandho. Āsīyate patthīyateti
tika-s0501t:622_8: āsā. Āsiyati patthetīti vā āsā. Pipāsīyateti pipāsā, ārammaṇarasaṃ pipāsatīti vā
tika-s0501t:622_9: pipāsā. Abhinandīyateti abhinandanā, abhinandatīti vā abhinandanā. Vitthārato aṭṭhakathāvasena veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:623_1: ca vevacane”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vevacanahāravibhaṅge “āsā ca pīhā…pe… vevacana”nti yā taṇhā
tika-s0501t:623_2: yathā yena pakārena vuttā, tathā tena pakārena vuttāya taṇhāya icchādippakāravasena
tika-s0501t:623_3: ālapitabhāvo saddahitabbo. “Vevacanavibhaṅge ācariyena vuttopi bhagavatā avutte kena
tika-s0501t:623_4: saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “yathāha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā yena pakārena bhagavā
tika-s0501t:623_5: “rūpe tissā”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanamāha, tathā tena pakārena vuttena tena vacanena saddahitabbo
tika-s0501t:623_6: vāti. Evaṃ yujjatīti evaṃ vuttanayena icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato ekattā, jarāya ca maraṇassa
tika-s0501t:623_7: ca taṇhāya ca atthato aññattā ca “tayo pañhā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vacanaṃ yujjatīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:624_0: 21. “Kenassubbhāhato lokotiādigāthāya tayo pañhā vuttā”ti pañhattayabhāve yutti ācariyena
tika-s0501t:624_1: vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā. “Tato aññehi pakārehi yutti kathaṃ ñātabbā”ti vattabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:624_2: aññehi pakārehipi yuttigavesanaṃ dassento “sabbo dukkhūpacāro”tiādimāha. Tattha sabbo
tika-s0501t:624_3: dukkhūpacāro kāmataṇhāsaṅkhāramūlakoti yujjati, sabbo nibbidūpacāro kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti
tika-s0501t:624_4: na yujjati. Vacanatthato pana dukkhassa upacāro pavattīti dukkhūpacāro. Kāmataṇhāpaccayā
tika-s0501t:624_5: pavatto saṅkhāro mūlaṃ etassāti kāmataṇhāsaṅkhāramūlako. Nibbidāya upacāro pavattīti
tika-s0501t:624_6: nibbidūpacāro. Kāmataṇhāya parikkhārabhūto vatthukāmo mūlaṃ etassāti kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti.
tika-s0501t:624_7: Tattha anabhiratisaṅkhātā ukkaṇṭhā nibbidā kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlikā yujjati, ñāṇanibbidā
tika-s0501t:624_8: kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlikā na yujjati, tasmā sabbo nibbidūpacāro kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti
tika-s0501t:625_0: “Pañhattayabhāve ceva dukkhūpacāranibbidūpacāre ca yā yutti ācariyena vibhattā, sāva
tika-s0501t:625_1: yutti sallakkhetabbā kiṃ, udāhu imāya yuttiyā aññāpi yutti gavesitabbā ki”nti vattabbato
tika-s0501t:625_2: nayaṃ dassetuṃ “imāyā”tiādimāha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pañhattayabhāve ceva dukkhūpacāranibbidūpacāre
tika-s0501t:625_3: ca yā yutti mayā vibhattā, imāya yuttiyā anusārena aññamaññehi kāraṇehi tesu tesu
tika-s0501t:626_0: “Idaṃ nayadassanaṃ saṃkhittaṃ, na sakkā vitthārato gavesitu”nti vattabbato taṃ nayadassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:626_1: vitthārato vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yathā hi bhagavā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Asubhassa jigucchanīyabhāvato
tika-s0501t:626_2: rāguppādo na yutto, tasmā rāgacaritassa puggalassa asubhadesanā rāgavinayāya yuttā.
tika-s0501t:626_3: Mettāya dosapaṭipakkhattā dosacaritassa puggalassa mettādesanā dosavinayāya yuttā.
tika-s0501t:626_6: vattabbattā “yadi hi bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tibbakilesassa rāgacaritassa adhippetattā
tika-s0501t:626_7: tādisassa puggalassa mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ yadi deseyya, evaṃ sati mettāvasenapi rāguppajjanato
tika-s0501t:626_8: desanā na yujjati. Sukhaṃ paṭipadaṃ vā yadi deseyya, evaṃ sati rāgacaritassa dukkhāpaṭipadāyujjanato
tika-s0501t:626_9: desanā na yujjati. Vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ pahānaṃ vā yadipi deseyya, evaṃ sati rāgacaritassa
tika-s0501t:626_10: asubhānupassanaṃ vajjetvā vipassanāpubbaṅgamassa pahānassa dukkarato desanā na yujjatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:627_0: “Bhagavā rāgacaritassā”tiādinā niravasesavasena yutti na vibhattā, nayadassanamevāti
tika-s0501t:627_1: yo nayo dassito, tena nayena aññāpi gavesitabbāti dassetuṃ “evaṃ yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:627_2: vuttaṃ. Rāgassa yaṃ kiñci anulomappahānaṃ, dosassa yaṃ kiñci anulomappahānaṃ, mohassa
tika-s0501t:627_3: yaṃ kiñci anulomappahānaṃ desitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ anulomappahānaṃ yattakā pāḷippadesā
tika-s0501t:627_4: ñāṇassa bhūmi, tattakesu vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbanti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:628_1: vibhajitvā yuttigavesanaṃ dassetuṃ “mettāvihārissā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha mettāvihārissa
tika-s0501t:628_2: mettāvihāralābhino sato saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa mettāya byāpādapaṭipakkhattā byāpādo
tika-s0501t:628_3: cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti desanā na yujjatīti ca, mettāvihārissa sato byāpādo
tika-s0501t:628_4: pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti desanā yujjati. Karuṇāvihārissa karuṇāvihāralābhino
tika-s0501t:628_5: sato saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa karuṇāya vihesāya paṭipakkhattā vihesā cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-s0501t:628_6: ṭhassatīti desanā na yujjati, karuṇāvihārissa sato vihesā pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti
tika-s0501t:628_7: desanā yujjati. Muditāvihārissa muditāvihāralābhino sato saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:628_8: muditāya aratiyā paṭipakkhattā arati cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti desanā na yujjati,
tika-s0501t:628_9: muditāvihārissa sato arati pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti desanā yujjati. Upekkhāvihārissa
tika-s0501t:628_10: upekkhāvihāralābhino sato saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa upekkhāya rāgassa paṭipakkhattā
tika-s0501t:628_11: rāgo cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti desanā na yujjati, upekkhāvihārissa sato rāgo pahānaṃ
tika-s0501t:629_1: saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa nimittānusāri tena teneva saṅkhāranimittānusāreneva niccādīsu
tika-s0501t:629_2: pahīnena nimittena viññāṇaṃ pavattatīti desanā na yujjati, animittānupassanāya niccādivipallāsapaṭipakkhattā
tika-s0501t:629_3: animittavihārissa sato nimittaṃ pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti desanā yujjati. “Asmī”ti
tika-s0501t:629_4: maññitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ attavigataṃ “ayaṃ khandhapañcako ahaṃ asmī”ti na samanupassāmi,
tika-s0501t:629_5: atha ca pana asamanupassane satipi “me kiṃ asmī”ti “kathaṃ asmī”ti vicikicchā kathaṃkathāsallaṃ
tika-s0501t:629_6: cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti desanā na yujjati, vicikicchāya pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato
tika-s0501t:629_7: “ayaṃ khandhapañcako ahaṃ asmī”ti asamanupassantassa vicikicchā kathaṃkathāsallaṃ
tika-s0501t:630_1: yutti gavesitabbāti dassetuṃ “yathā vā pana paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Atha
tika-s0501t:630_2: vā “phalasamāpattivihārisseva yutti gavesitabbā ki”nti vattabbattā jhānasamāpattivasenapi
tika-s0501t:630_3: yutti gavesitabbāti dassetuṃ “yathā vā pana paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:630_4: yathā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa phalasamāpattivihārissa yutti gavesitabbā, evaṃ
tika-s0501t:630_5: jhānasamāpattivihārissapi yutti gavesitabbā. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa
tika-s0501t:630_6: paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgino sato saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato kāmarāgabyāpādā
tika-s0501t:630_7: visesāya dutiyajjhānāya saṃvattantīti desanā na yujjati, kāmarāgabyāpādā jhānassa
tika-s0501t:630_8: hānāya saṃvattantīti desanā yujjati. Vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā upacāradhammena
tika-s0501t:630_9: saha dutiyajjhānadhammā jhānassa hānāya saṃvattantīti desanā na yujjati, vitakkasahagatā
tika-s0501t:630_10: saññāmanasikārā visesāya uparijhānatthāya saṃvattantīti desanā yujjati.
tika-s0501t:631_0: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa sato saṃvijjamānassa puggalassa vitakkavicārasahagatā
tika-s0501t:631_1: vā saññāmanasikārā upacāradhammena saha paṭhamajjhānadhammā visesāya uparijhānatthāya
tika-s0501t:631_2: saṃvattantīti desanā na yujjati, vitakkavicārasahagatā saññāmanasikārā avitakkajhānassa
tika-s0501t:631_3: hānāya saṃvattantīti desanā yujjati. Upekkhāsahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā upacāradhammena
tika-s0501t:631_4: saha catutthajjhānadhammā jhānassa hānāya saṃvattantīti desanā na yujjati, upekkhāsahagatā
tika-s0501t:631_5: saññāmanasikārā visesāya uparijhānatthāya saṃvattantīti desanā yujjati. Sesesupi
tika-s0501t:631_6: atthānurūpaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Yathāvuttasamāpattīsu vasībhāvena paricitaṃ kallatāparicitaṃ cittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:632_0: Ettakameva yuttigavesanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, navavidhasuttantesu yathāladdhayuttigavesanampi
tika-s0501t:632_1: kātabbanti dassetuṃ “evaṃ sabbe”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ yathāvuttabhūmigocarānaṃ
tika-s0501t:632_2: vicayahārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbabhāvo kena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:632_3: “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tena yojetabbabhāvena āyasmā mahākaccāno “sabbesa”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:632_4: yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena saddahitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:635: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:637_1: yuttāyuttabhāvo vibhatto, so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto yuttihāravibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo, “katamo
tika-s0501t:637_2: padaṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgo”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0501t:637_3: Tattha tatthāti tesu niddiṭṭhesu soḷasasu desanāhārādīsu hāresu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:637_4: padaṭṭhāno hāro padaṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgoti pucchati. “Dhammaṃ desesi jino”tiādiniddesassa
tika-s0501t:637_5: idāni mayā vuccamāno “ayaṃ padaṭṭhāno hāro”tiādiko vitthārasaṃvaṇṇanāviseso padaṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgoti
tika-s0501t:637_6: viññeyyo. Tena vuttaṃ – “tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hārotiādi padaṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0501t:637_7: “Ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno vitthārabhūto padaṭṭhāno hāro piṭakattaye desitesu dhammesu
tika-s0501t:637_8: kiṃ nāma dhammaṃ desayati saṃvaṇṇetī”ti pucchaṃ ṭhapetvā “idaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ imassa
tika-s0501t:637_9: āsannaphalassa padaṭṭhāna”nti niyametvā vibhajituṃ “ayaṃ padaṭṭhāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:637_10: Tassattho – sabbesu viññeyyadhammesu yāthāvato asampaṭivedho lakkhaṇaṃ etissā avijjāyāti
tika-s0501t:637_12: padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ. Vipallāse sati avijjā vattati uparūpari jāyati na hāyati,
tika-s0501t:637_13: tasmā vipallāsā avijjāya padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ bhavanti. Avijjāya vaṭṭamūlakattā
tika-s0501t:637_14: taṃ ādiṃ katvā padaṭṭhānaṃ vibhattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:638_0: Taṇhāyapi vaṭṭamūlakattā tadanantaraṃ taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajituṃ “ajjhosānalakkhaṇā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:638_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti piyasabhāvaṃ sātasabhāvaṃ cakkhādidhammajātaṃ.
tika-s0501t:638_2: Piyanīyasātanīye cakkhādike sati taṇhā vattati uparūpari jāyati, tasmā piyarūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:639: Adinnādāne sati lobho vattati, tasmā adinnādānaṃ lobhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Adinnādānañhi ekavāraṃ uppannampi anādīnavadassanato lobhassa āsannakāraṇaṃ bhavatveva.
tika-s0501t:640: Kesādīsu asubhesu pavattāyapi subhasaññāya nīlādivaṇṇadīghādisaṇṭhānahasanādibyañjanaggahaṇalakkhaṇattā cakkhundriyādīnaṃ asaṃvaro subhasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:641: Dukkhadukkhādīsu pavattāyapi sukhasaññāya sāsavaphassūpagamanalakkhaṇattā rūpādīsu assādo sukhasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:642: Rūpakkhandhādīsu aniccesu pavattāyapi niccasaññāya saṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ asamanupassanalakkhaṇattā rūpakkhandhādīsu niccaggahaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ niccasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:643: Aniccadukkhānattasaṅkhātesu khandhādīsu pavattāyapi attasaññāya aniccasaññādukkhasaññānaṃ asamanupassanalakkhaṇattā ahaṃmamādivasena pavatto nāmakāyo attasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:644_0: Evaṃ avijjādīnaṃ akusalapakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tappaṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:644_2: vuttaṃ. Sabbesu ñeyyadhammesu pavattāya vijjāya sabbadhammasampaṭivedhalakkhaṇattā
tika-s0501t:645_1: paṭibhāganimittabhūtā asubhā samathassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Asubhāya hi taṇhāpaṭipakkhattā,
tika-s0501t:646: Adinnādānā veramaṇivasena pavattassa alobhassa icchāvacarapaṭisaṃharaṇalakkhaṇattā adinnādānā veramaṇī alobhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:647: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇivasena pavattassa adosassa abyāpajjalakkhaṇattā pāṇātipātā veramaṇī adosassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:648: Sammāpaṭipattivasena pavattassa amohassa vatthuavippaṭipattilakkhaṇattā sammāpaṭipatti amohassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:649_1: asubhasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Nibbidāñāṇena hi anabhirati pavattati, anabhiratiyā ca
tika-s0501t:650: Dukkhavedanāvasena pavattāya dukkhasaññāya sāsavaphassaparijānanalakkhaṇattā vedanā dukkhasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:651_0: Uppādavayavasena pavattāya aniccasaññāya saṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ samanupassanalakkhaṇattā
tika-s0501t:651_1: uppādavayā aniccasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Uppādavayañhi samanupassitvā aniccasaññā pavattā.
tika-s0501t:652: Dhammamattasaññāvasena pavattāya anattasaññāya sabbadhammaabhinivesalakkhaṇattā dhammasaññā anattasaññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:653: Kāmarāgassa rūpādipañcakāmaguṇārammaṇattā pañca kāmaguṇā kāmarāgassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:654: Rūpasaṅkhāte kāye ārabbha pavattassa rūparāgassa cakkhādipañcindriyānaṃ anusārena pavattanato pañcindriyāni rūpāni rūparāgassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:655_0: Bhavanikantivasena pavattassa bhavarāgassa chaḷāyatanaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Nibbattabhavānupassitāti
