tika-s0501t:655_1: “edisaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ mā nibbattatu, edisaṃ iṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ nibbattatu edisī dukkhā
tika-s0501t:655_2: vedanā mā nibbattatu, edisī sukhā vedanā nibbattatū”ti evamādinā pakārena pavattā
tika-s0501t:657_0: Okappanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yassā saddhāyāti okappanalakkhaṇā saddhā. Adhimutti paccupaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:657_1: yassā saddhāyāti adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā ca saddhā. Anāvilaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yassa pasādassāti
tika-s0501t:657_2: anāvilalakkhaṇoti pasādo. Sampasīdanaṃ paccupaṭṭhānaṃ yassa pasādassāti sampasīdanapaccupaṭṭhāno
tika-s0501t:657_3: ca pasādo. So pana pasādo saddhāya eva avatthāvisesoti veditabbo. Aveccapasādo abhipatthiyanalakkhaṇāya
tika-s0501t:657_4: saddhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, okappanalakkhaṇā saddhā anāvilalakkhaṇassa pasādassa padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:657_5: catubbidhaṃ sammappadhānaṃ vīriyaṃ ārambhalakkhaṇassa vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyādisatipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:657_6: apilāpanalakkhaṇāya satiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ, jhānasahitassa samādhissa ekaggalakkhaṇattā
tika-s0501t:658_0: “Yesaṃ avijjādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāni ācariyena vibhattāni, te avijjādayo katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:658_1: padaṭṭhānānī”ti pucchitabbattā te avijjādayopi imesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:658_3: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Avijjāya hi ādīnavacchādanato ayonisomanasikāro jātoti. Saccasammohanalakkhaṇā
tika-s0501t:658_7: nāmarūpaṃ chaḷāyatanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ sahajātādipaccayabhāvato, cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ
tika-s0501t:658_8: indriyānaṃ pavattānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ chaḷāyatanaṃ chabbidhassa phassassa yathākkamaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:658_10: chabbidho phasso, taṃ vedanāya tena chabbidhena phassena sahajātāya chabbidhāya vedanāya
tika-s0501t:658_12: tividhā vedanā, taṃ taṇhāya tāya tividhāya vedanāya vasena pavattāya taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:658_13: upanissayādipaccayabhāvato, saparasantānesu ajjhosānalakkhaṇā taṇhā, taṃ upādānassa
tika-s0501t:658_14: tāya taṇhāya vasena pavattassa catubbidhassa upādānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ upanissayādipaccayabhāvato.
tika-s0501t:658_15: “So vedanāyā”ti ca “sā taṇhāyā”ti ca “sā upādānassā”ti ca pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, liṅgavipallāsaniddeso vā siyā.
tika-s0501t:659_0: Yaṃ upādānaṃ opapaccayikaṃ upapattikkhandhanibbattakaṃ, taṃ upādānaṃ duvidhassa bhavassa
tika-s0501t:659_1: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo kammabhavo nāmakāyarūpakāyasambhavanalakkhaṇo, so kammabhavo jātiyā
tika-s0501t:659_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yā upapattibhūtā jāti khandhapātubhāvalakkhaṇā, taṃ sā jāti jarāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:659_3: Yā jiṇṇajarā upadhikkhandhaparipākalakkhaṇā, taṃ sā jiṇṇajarā maraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:659_4: Yampi yassa sammutimaraṇaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedalakkhaṇaṃ, tampi tassa sammutimaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:659_5: sokassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Piyassa maraṇaṃ cintentassa yebhuyyena sokuppajjanato yo soko
tika-s0501t:659_6: ñātiādipiyesu ussukkakārako, taṃ so soko paridevassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo paridevo lālappakārako,
tika-s0501t:659_7: taṃ so paridevo kāyikadukkhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyasampīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:659_8: taṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ domanassaṃ cittasampīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:659_9: taṃ domanassaṃ upāyāsassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo upāyāso odahanakārako avadahanakārako,
tika-s0501t:659_10: taṃ so upāyāso bhavassa upāyāsassa nissayasantānabhavassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:660_0: Bhavassāti vuttabhavaṃ dassetuṃ “imānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bhavaṅgāni kileso bhavassa
tika-s0501t:660_1: aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭāni bhavasaṅkhātāni aṅgāni avayavāni. Yadā paccuppannādikāle
tika-s0501t:660_2: samaggāni nibbattāni bhavanti, tadā so kilesavaṭṭakammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭasaṅkhāto dhammasamūho
tika-s0501t:660_3: “bhavassā”ti ettha bhavoti daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ bhavasaṅkhātaṃ kilesavaṭṭakammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭattayaṃ
tika-s0501t:660_4: saṃsārassa padaṭṭhānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ jātinipphannakilesādivaṭṭena saṃsārassa abbocchinnuppajjanato,
tika-s0501t:660_5: yo ariyamaggo niyyānikalakkhaṇo, taṃ so ariyamaggo nirodhassa nibbānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:661_0: Bahussuto sabbasissādīnaṃ patiṭṭhānattā titthaṃ viyāti titthaṃ, jānātīti ñū, titthaṃ
tika-s0501t:661_1: ñūti titthaññū, titthaññuno bhāvo titthaññutā, sammāpayirupāsanā, sā pītaññutāya
tika-s0501t:661_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Bahussutassa hi sammāpayirupāsanāya dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ jāyati,
tika-s0501t:661_3: pāmojjena ca kammaṭṭhānabrūhanā jāyatīti sappāyadhammassavanena pītiṃ jānātīti pītaññū,
tika-s0501t:661_4: pītaññuno bhāvo pītaññutā, kammaṭṭhānassa brūhanā, sā pattaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānabrūhanāya
tika-s0501t:661_5: hi bhāvanāpattajānanatā jāyatīti pattaññutā. Bhāvanāpattajānanatā attaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:661_6: Bhāvanāpattajānanatāya hi pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatassa attano jānanatā jāyatīti
tika-s0501t:662_0: Padhāniyaṅgesu samannāgatattajānanatāya hi pubbe puññakaraṇaṃ jātaṃ, pubbekatapuññatā
tika-s0501t:662_1: patirūpadesavāsassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Pubbe hi katena puññena patirūpadesavāso laddho,
tika-s0501t:662_2: patirūpadesavāso sappurisūpanissayassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Patirūpadesavāsena hi sappurisūpanissayo
tika-s0501t:662_4: hi attasammāpaṇidhānaṃ jātaṃ, attasammāpaṇidhānaṃ sīlānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Attasammāpaṇidhānena
tika-s0501t:662_5: hi sīlāni sampatiṭṭhitāni, sīlāni avippaṭisārassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Attani hi sampatiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0501t:662_6: sīlaṃ paccavekkhantassa vippaṭisāro natthevāti, avippaṭisārena pāmojjaṃ jāyati, tasmā
tika-s0501t:662_7: avippaṭisāro pāmojjassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Pāmojjena pīti jāyati, tasmā pāmojjaṃ pītiyā
tika-s0501t:662_8: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Pītiyā passaddhi jāyati, tasmā pīti passaddhiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Passaddhiyā
tika-s0501t:662_9: sukhaṃ jāyati, tasmā passaddhi sukhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sukhena samādhi jāyati, tasmā
tika-s0501t:662_10: sukhaṃ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Samādhinā yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ jāyati, tasmā samādhi
tika-s0501t:662_11: yathābhūtañāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanena nibbidāñāṇaṃ jāyati, tasmā
tika-s0501t:662_12: yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Nibbidāya virāgo jāyati, tasmā nibbidā
tika-s0501t:662_13: virāgassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Virāgena vimutti jāyati, tasmā virāgo vimuttiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:662_14: Vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ jāyati, tasmā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:662_15: Evaṃ yathāvuttanayena yo koci dhammo upanissayo hoti, yo koci dhammo paccayo hoti,
tika-s0501t:662_16: sabbo so dhammo attano paccayuppannassa dhammassa padaṭṭhānanti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:663_1: kena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tenāti yassa kassaci
tika-s0501t:663_3: āyasmā mahākaccāno “dhammaṃ deseti jino”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena tesaṃ
tika-s0501t:663_5: hāro paripuṇṇo kiṃ, udāhu añño niddhāretvā yojetabbo atthi ki”nti vattabbattā “niyutto
tika-s0501t:663_6: padaṭṭhāno hāro”ti vuttaṃ. Idha pāḷiyaṃ avibhattampi yathālābhavasena padaṭṭhāno
tika-s0501t:663_7: hāro nīharitvā yutto yujjitabbo, vibhajitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:666: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:668_0: 23. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena padaṭṭhānavibhaṅgena avijjādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāni
tika-s0501t:668_1: vibhattāni, so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto padaṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo, “katamo lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgo”ti
tika-s0501t:668_2: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha-saddassa
tika-s0501t:668_3: attho vuttova. Katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso lakkhaṇo hāro lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgoti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:668_4: “Vuttamhi ekadhamme”tiādiniddesassa idāni mayā vuccamāno “ye dhammā”tiādiko vitthārasaṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:668_5: lakkhaṇo hāro lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgo nāmāti viññeyyoti. Tena vuttaṃ –“tattha katamo
tika-s0501t:668_6: lakkhaṇo hārotiādi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgo nāmā”ti. Ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno vitthārabhūto
tika-s0501t:668_7: lakkhaṇo hāro piṭakattaye desitesu dhammesu kiṃ nāma lakkhitabbaṃ dhammaṃ lakkhīyatīti
tika-s0501t:668_8: pucchitvā pucchite lakkhaṇahāravicaye dhamme saṅkhepena dassetuṃ “ye dhammā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:668_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha ye dhammāti ye samūhā dhammā. Ekalakkhaṇāti samānalakkhaṇā. Tesaṃ
tika-s0501t:668_10: dhammānanti samānalakkhaṇānaṃ tesaṃ samūhadhammānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ. Ekasmiṃ dhammeti
tika-s0501t:668_11: samānalakkhaṇe ekasmiṃ dhamme, pāḷiyaṃ bhagavatā vutte sati vuttadhammato avasiṭṭhasamānalakkhaṇā
tika-s0501t:669_0: Lakkhaṇahāravisaye dhamme vitthārato imasmiṃ dhamme vutte ime samānalakkhaṇā dhammāpi
tika-s0501t:669_1: vuttā bhavantīti niyametvā dassetuṃ “yathā kiṃ bhave”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yathā
tika-s0501t:669_2: yena pakārena vuttā bhavanti, so pakāro kiṃ bhaveti pucchati. Yathā yena pakārena
tika-s0501t:669_3: vuttā bhavanti, so pakāro samānalakkhaṇāti bhāvo bhaveti attho. Kinti bhagavā āha?
tika-s0501t:670_1: vāti āyatanavaseneva ekalakkhaṇaṃ vattabba”nti vattabbattā khandhavasenapi ekalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:670_2: dassetuṃ “yathā cāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Atīte, rādha, rūpe anapekkho hoti, anāgataṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:670_3: mā abhinandi, paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya
tika-s0501t:670_4: paṭipajjā”ti vutte “atītāya, rādha, vedanāya anapekkho hoti, anāgataṃ vedanaṃ mā
tika-s0501t:670_5: abhinandi, paccuppannāya vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya
tika-s0501t:671_1: vāti khandhāyatanavaseneva ekalakkhaṇadhammā vattabbā”ti vattabbattā satipaṭṭhānavasenāpi
tika-s0501t:671_2: vattabbāti dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā yena ekalakkhaṇattena ca
tika-s0501t:671_3: bhagavā āha, tathā ca tena ekalakkhaṇattena ca avuttāpi dhammā vuttā bhavantīti attho.
tika-s0501t:671_4: Ye vipassakā puggalā pañcasu khandhesu niccaṃ susamāraddhā niccaṃ kāyagatāsatiṃ bhāventi,
tika-s0501t:671_5: te vipassakā akiccaṃ subhasukhādikaṃ, kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ vā na sevanti, kicce asubhāsukhādike,
tika-s0501t:671_6: kāyādike vā sātaccakārino hontīti bhagavā āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:672_0: Itisaddassa cettha ekassa lopo. Iti evaṃ “yesañcā”tiādigāthāya kesādike kāye gatāya
tika-s0501t:672_1: pavattāya satiyā bhagavatā sarūpena vuttāya vijjamānāya tadavasesā vedanāgatā sati
tika-s0501t:672_2: ca cittagatā sati ca dhammagatā sati ca satipaṭṭhānabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattena vuttā
tika-s0501t:672_3: bhavantīti saṅkhepato niccaṃ susamāraddhā niccaṃ vedanāgatā sati ca…pe… niccaṃ cittagatā
tika-s0501t:672_4: sati ca…pe… niccaṃ dhammagatā satīti vattabbāti.
tika-s0501t:673_0: “Satipaṭṭhānavaseneva ekalakkhaṇā dhammā vattabbā”ti vattabbattā “tathā yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:673_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ kiñci rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci saddāyatanaṃ
tika-s0501t:673_2: sotaviññāṇena sutaṃ, yaṃ kiñci gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇādittayena
tika-s0501t:673_3: viññāṇena mutaṃ, iti evaṃ diṭṭhādittaye bhagavatā sarūpena vutte sati tadavasesaṃ
tika-s0501t:673_4: yaṃ kiñci viññātaṃ dhammārammaṇapariyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavatā ālambitabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā
tika-s0501t:673_5: vuttaṃ bhavatīti attho. Atha vā yaṃ kiñci rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:673_6: vutte sati tadavasesaṃ sutādikampi vuttaṃ hotīti ādiattho visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo.
tika-s0501t:673_7: Tena vuttaṃ – “diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā mutaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0501t:674_0: “Kāyagatāya satiyā vuttāya tadavasesā vedanāgatāsatiādayoyeva vattabbā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:674_1: sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammāpi vuttā bhavantīti dassetuṃ “yathā cāha bhagavā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:674_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā yena niyyānikalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattena ca bhagavā āha, tathā
tika-s0501t:674_3: tena ekalakkhaṇattena ca bhagavā āha, tathā tena ekalakkhaṇattena ca vuttā bhavantīti
tika-s0501t:674_4: attho. “Tasmā abhijjhādomanassena abhibhūtattā iha mama sāsane, bhikkhu, tvaṃ ātāpī
tika-s0501t:674_5: sampajāno satimā hutvā loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ tadaṅgappahānena vā vikkhambhanappahānena
tika-s0501t:674_6: vā vineyya vinayitvā kāye kesādirūpakāye kāyānupassī kesādirūpakāyānupassī hutvā
tika-s0501t:674_7: viharāhī”ti bhagavatā vutte sati “tasmātiha, tvaṃ bhikkhu, vedanāsu vedanānupassī
tika-s0501t:674_8: viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ, tasmātiha, tvaṃ
tika-s0501t:674_9: bhikkhu, citte cittānupassī viharāhi…pe… domanassaṃ, tasmātiha, tvaṃ bhikkhu, dhammesu
tika-s0501t:674_10: dhammānupassī viharāhi…pe… domanassa”nti vuttaṃ bhavatīti saṅkhepattho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:674_11: Vitthārattho pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ bahudhā vuttoti amhehi na vitthārito.
tika-s0501t:675_0: “Ekasmiṃ satipaṭṭhāne vutte kasmā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā vuttā bhaveyyu”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:675_1: “ātāpīti vīriyindriya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “ātāpī”ti iminā padena kāyavedanācittadhammesu
tika-s0501t:675_2: pavattaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Sampajāno”ti padena kāyavedanācittadhammesu pavattaṃ
tika-s0501t:675_3: paññindriyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Satimā”ti padena kāyavedanācittadhammesu pavattaṃ satindriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:675_4: vuttaṃ. “Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti padena kāyavedanācittadhammesu pavattaṃ
tika-s0501t:675_5: samādhindriyaṃ vuttaṃ, na kāyeyeva pavattaṃ. Evaṃ pakārena kāye kāyānupassino yogāvacarassa
tika-s0501t:675_6: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti ce vadeyya, evaṃ sati catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t:675_7: vīriyapaññāsatisamādhīnaṃ indriyānaṃ catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ sādhakabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā
tika-s0501t:675_8: samānalakkhaṇattā pāripūriṃ gacchantīti yojanā. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “catusatipaṭṭhānasādhane
tika-s0501t:676_0: 24. “Evaṃ vuttepi cattāro satipaṭṭhānāyeva vattabbā bhaveyyuṃ, kathaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammā
tika-s0501t:676_1: vattabbā”ti vattabbattā “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0501t:676_2: yena yogāvacarena bhāviyamānesu tassa yogāvacarassa cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
tika-s0501t:676_3: gacchanti. Evaṃ sesesupi yojanā kātabbā. Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ bujjhanaṃ bodhaṃ, ariyamaggañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:676_4: bodhaṃ gacchantīti bodhaṅgamā. Bodhassa ariyamaggañāṇassa pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā.
tika-s0501t:677_0: “Kusalāyeva dhammā ekalakkhaṇabhāvena nīharitā kiṃ, udāhu akusalāpi dhammā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:677_1: “evaṃ akusalāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kusalā dhammā ekalakkhaṇattena niddhāritā yathā,
tika-s0501t:677_2: evaṃ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattena niddhāritabbāyevāti attho. “Kathaṃ niddhāretabbā”ti
tika-s0501t:677_4: abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti āha. Tattha ekalakkhaṇattāti pahānekaṭṭhabhāvena samānalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0501t:677_5: “Katamaṃ pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:678_0: Tattha catūsu…pe… pariññaṃ gacchantīti kāyāgatāsatipaṭṭhāne yogāvacarena bhāviyamāne
tika-s0501t:678_1: sati tena yogāvacarena asubhe kesādike rūpakāye “subha”nti vipallāso pahīyati, assa
tika-s0501t:678_2: yogāvacarassa kabaḷīkārāhāro pariññaṃ gacchati, “āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo”ti vuttattā
tika-s0501t:678_3: rūpakāye chandarāgaṃ pajahantassa tassa samudaye kabaḷīkārāhārepi chandarāgo pahīyatīti
tika-s0501t:678_4: attho. Vedanāgatāsatipaṭṭhāne bhāviyamāne sati dukkhe “sukha”nti vipallāso pahīyati,
tika-s0501t:678_5: assa yogāvacarassa phassāhāro pariññaṃ gacchati, “phassapaccayā vedanā”ti vuttattā
tika-s0501t:678_6: vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahantassa tassa paccaye phassāhāre chandarāgo pahīyati. Cittagatāsatipaṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:678_7: bhāviyamāne anicce “nicca”nti vipallāso pahīyati, assa yogāvacarassa viññāṇāhāro
tika-s0501t:678_8: pariññaṃ gacchati. Dhammagatāsatipaṭṭhāne bhāviyamāne anattani “attā”ti vipallāso
tika-s0501t:678_9: pahīyati, assa yogāvacarassa manosañcetanāhāro pariññaṃ gacchatīti visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā
tika-s0501t:678_10: ekekasmiṃ pahātabbe vutte tadavasesā pahātabbā vuttā bhavanti pahātabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:679_0: “Āhārā cassa pariññaṃ gacchantī”ti vacane āhāresu pavattā kāmarāgadosamohā byantīkatā
tika-s0501t:679_1: hontīti attho gahito. Kabaḷīkārāhārañhi ārabbha pavatte kāmarāge vijjamāne kabaḷīkārāhārassa
tika-s0501t:679_2: vijānanā nattheva, tasmiṃ kāmarāge pana pahīne parijānanā bhavatīti. Sesāhārajānanampi
tika-s0501t:679_3: eseva nayo. Yassa yogāvacarassa satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā, vipallāsā pahīnā, āhāraparijānanā
tika-s0501t:679_4: uppannā, so yogāvacaro upādānehi anupādāno bhavati. Subhasaññite hi kāye kāmupādānaṃ
tika-s0501t:679_5: visesena bhavatīti subhasaññito kāyo kāmupādānassa vatthu, kāyagatāya satiyā anusaritabbo
tika-s0501t:679_6: asubhasaññito kesādi kāmupādānassa vatthu na hotveva. Sukhavedanāya assādavasena
tika-s0501t:679_7: diṭṭhupādānaṃ bhavatīti sukhasaññitā vedanā diṭṭhupādānassa vatthu, vedanāgatāya
tika-s0501t:679_8: pana satiyā anupassitabbā vedanā diṭṭhupādānassa vatthu na hotveva. “Cittaṃ nicca”nti
tika-s0501t:679_9: diṭṭhigahaṇavasena tassa tassa attano sīlavatavasena parisuddhīti parāmasanaṃ hotīti
tika-s0501t:679_10: cittaṃ sīlabbatupādānassa vatthu, cittagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbaṃ cittaṃ sīlabbatupādānassa
tika-s0501t:679_11: vatthu na hotveva. Dhamme nāmarūpaparicchedena yathābhūtaṃ apassantassa dhammesu
tika-s0501t:679_12: attābhiniveso hotīti dhammā attavādupādānassa vatthu, dhammagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbā
tika-s0501t:679_13: dhammā attavādupādānassa vatthu na honti eva. Tasmā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu
tika-s0501t:679_14: upādānehi anupādāno bhavatīti vuttanti adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:680_0: “Yena yogāvacarena satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā, so yogāvacaro upādānehiyeva anupādāno bhavatī”ti
tika-s0501t:680_1: pucchitabbattā yogādīhipi visaṃyutto bhavatīti dassetuṃ “yogehi ca visaṃyutto”tiādi
tika-s0501t:680_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha yogehi cāti kāmayogabhavayogadiṭṭhiyogaavijjāyogehi ca. Visaṃyuttoti
tika-s0501t:680_4: attho. Subhasaññito hi rūpakāyo kāmarāgassa vatthu hoti, kāyagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbo
tika-s0501t:680_5: kāyo kāmarāgassa vatthu na hotveva. “Sukho”ti vā “sukhahetū”ti vā gahaṇīyo bhavo
tika-s0501t:680_6: bhavarāgassa vatthu hoti, vedanāgatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbo bhavo bhavarāgassa
tika-s0501t:680_7: vatthu na hoti. “Attā”ti abhinivisitabbaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyogassa vatthu hoti, cittagatāya
tika-s0501t:680_8: pana satiyā anupassitabbaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyogassa vatthu na hoti. Vinibbhogassa dukkarattā,
tika-s0501t:680_9: dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya ca duppaṭivijjhattā avinibbhujitabbā, dhammamattatāya appaṭivijjhitabbā
tika-s0501t:680_10: dhammā avijjāyogassa vatthu honti, dhammagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbā dhammā
tika-s0501t:680_11: avijjāyogassa vatthu na honti. Tasmā catusatipaṭṭhānānupassako “yogehi ca visaṃyutto”ti
tika-s0501t:680_12: vutto. Ayaṃ nayo āsavehi ca anāsavo bhavati, oghehi ca nitthiṇṇo bhavatīti etthāpi yojetabbo.
tika-s0501t:681_0: Ganthehi ca vippayutto bhavatīti ettha pana subhasaññito rūpakāyo abhijjhākāyaganthassa
tika-s0501t:681_1: vatthu, kāyagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbo rūpakāyo abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu
tika-s0501t:681_3: vatthu honti, tena vuttaṃ – “dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti. Vedanāgatāya
tika-s0501t:681_4: pana satiyā anupassitabbā vedanā byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu na hoti. “Cittaṃ nicca”nti
tika-s0501t:681_5: abhinivesavasena sassatassa “attano sīlena suddhi, vatena suddhī”ti parāmasanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:681_6: tasmā “nicca”nti gahitaṃ cittaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthassa vatthu, cittagatāya
tika-s0501t:681_7: pana satiyā anupassitabbaṃ cittaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsassa vatthu na hoti. Dhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:681_9: sacca”nti abhinivisitabbā dhammā idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthassa vatthu, dhammagatāya
tika-s0501t:681_10: pana satiyā anupassitabbā dhammā idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthassa vatthu na honti,
tika-s0501t:682_0: Subhasaññito ca kāyo rāgasallassa vatthu, kāyagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbo kāyo
tika-s0501t:682_1: rāgasallassa vatthu na hoti. Sukhasaññitāya vedanāya doso hoti, tasmā vedanā dosasallassa
tika-s0501t:682_2: vatthu, vedanāgatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbā vedanā dosasallassa vatthu na hoti.
tika-s0501t:682_3: “Cittaṃ attā”ti gahetvā “attā seyyo”tiādivasena pavattassa mānasallassa cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0501t:682_4: cittagatāya pana satiyā anupassitabbaṃ cittaṃ mānasallassa vatthu na hoti. Dhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:682_5: sappaccayanāmarūpasabhāvassa ajānanato dhammā mohasallassa vatthu, dhammagatāya pana
tika-s0501t:682_6: satiyā anupassitabbā dhammā mohasallassa vatthu na honti, tasmā catusatipaṭṭhānānupassako
tika-s0501t:683_0: “Āhārā cassa pariññaṃ gacchantī”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ, “kiṃ pana āhārāva assa yogāvacarassa
tika-s0501t:683_1: pariññaṃ gacchanti, udāhu aññepī”ti pucchitabbattā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo ca assa yogāvacarassa
tika-s0501t:683_2: pariññaṃ gacchantīti dassetuṃ “viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo cassa pariññaṃ gacchantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:683_3: Yena yogāvacarena cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā, tassa yogāvacarassa kāyavedanācittadhammāva
tika-s0501t:683_4: pariññaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti ce vadeyya kāyānupassanādīhi ca kāyavedanācittadhammesu
tika-s0501t:683_5: pariññātesu saññāyapi pariññātabbabhāvato. Sā hi vedanācittasaṅkhātena dhammesu pariññātesu
tika-s0501t:684_0: Yena cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā, so yogāvacaro upādānehi anupādāno ca, yogehi visaṃyutto
tika-s0501t:684_1: ca, khandhehi vippayutto ca, āsavehi anāsavo ca, oghehi nitthiṇṇo ca, sallehi visallo
tika-s0501t:684_2: ca bhavatīti vutto, “kiṃ pana tathāvidhova hoti, udāhu aññathāpī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:684_3: agatimpi na gacchatīti dassento “agatigamanehi ca na agatiṃ gacchatī”ti āha. Subhādisaññite
tika-s0501t:684_4: rūpakāye apekkhamāno puggalo chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti subhādisaññito rūpakāyo visesato
tika-s0501t:684_5: chandāgatiyā vatthu hoti, kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānena pana anupassitabbo assāsapassāsādiko
tika-s0501t:684_6: kāyo chandāgatiyā vatthu na hoti, tasmā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ bhāvento
tika-s0501t:684_7: puggalo chandāgatiṃ na gacchati. Sukhavedanassādavasena vedayamāno tadabhāvena byāpādaṃ
tika-s0501t:684_8: āgacchatīti sukhavedanā dosāgatiyā vatthu hoti, vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānena pana
tika-s0501t:684_9: anupassitabbā vedanā dosāgatiyā vatthu na hoti, tasmā vedanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0501t:684_10: bhāvento puggalo dosāgatiṃ na gacchati. Santatighanavasena “niccaṃ, dhuva”nti gahitaṃ
tika-s0501t:684_11: cittaṃ mohassa vatthu hoti, cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānena pana anupassitabbaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0501t:684_12: mohassa vatthu na hoti, tasmā cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ bhāvento puggalo
tika-s0501t:684_13: dosāgatiṃ na gacchati. Vibhajitvā dhammasabhāvaṃ ajānantassa bhayaṃ jāyatīti vibhajitvā
tika-s0501t:684_14: ajāniyasabhāvā dhammā bhayassa vatthu honti, dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānena pana anupassitabbā
tika-s0501t:684_15: vibhajitvā jānitabbā dhammā rāgassa vatthu na honti, tasmā dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0501t:684_16: bhāvento puggalo bhayāgatiṃ na gacchati. Evaṃ pahātabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇe akusalepi
tika-s0501t:684_17: dhamme nīharitvā idāni nigametuṃ “evaṃ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:685_0: Bhāvetabbesu dhammesu ekadesesu vutte tadavasesāpi bhāvetabbā dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā
tika-s0501t:685_1: nīharitvā vattabbā, pahātabbesupi dhammesu ekadese vutte tadavasesāpi dhammā pahātabbā
tika-s0501t:685_2: ekalakkhaṇattā nīharitvā vattabbāti ācariyena vuttā, amhehi ca ñātā, “aññathāpi yadi
tika-s0501t:685_3: vattabbā siyuṃ, tepi vadathā”ti vattabbabhāvato aññenapi pariyāyena lakkhaṇahārassa
tika-s0501t:685_4: udāharaṇāni dassetuṃ “yattha vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yattha yassaṃ rūpekadesadesanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:685_6: rūpekadesaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ. Tattheva tassaṃ rūpekadesadesanāyaṃ rūpadhātu ruppanalakkhaṇā
tika-s0501t:685_8: desitā. Sabbo rūpakkhandho ca desito. Rūpāyatanaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhāyatanādiphoṭṭhabbāyatanapariyosānaṃ
tika-s0501t:685_9: dasavidhaṃ āyatanaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā bhagavatā desitaṃ.
tika-s0501t:686_0: Yattha vā pana yassaṃ vedanekadesadesanāyaṃ sukhā vedanā bhagavatā desitā, tattha
tika-s0501t:686_1: tassaṃ vedanekadesadesanāyaṃ sukhindriyañca desitaṃ, somanassindriyañca desitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:686_2: dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccañca desitaṃ sukhavedanābhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. Yattha vā
tika-s0501t:686_3: pana yassaṃ vedanekadesadesanāyaṃ dukkhā vedanā bhagavatā desitā, tattha tassaṃ vedanekadesadesanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:686_4: dukkhindriyañca desitaṃ domanassindriyañca desitaṃ, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccañca desitaṃ
tika-s0501t:686_5: dukkhavedanābhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. Yattha vā pana yassaṃ vedanekadesadesanāyaṃ adukkhamasukhā
tika-s0501t:686_6: vedanā bhagavatā desitā, tattha tassaṃ vedanekadesadesanāyaṃ upekkhindriyañca desitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:686_7: sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo ca desitoti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:687_0: Yassaṃ desanāyaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā desitā, tassaṃ desanāyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ desitaṃ
tika-s0501t:687_1: hotu samānalakkhaṇattā, “kena paṭiccasamuppādo desito bhaveyyā”ti vattabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:687_2: “kena kāraṇenā”ti pucchitvā kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “adukkhamasukhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:687_3: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya hi yasmā avijjā anuseti, tasmā avijjā desitā hoti. Avijjāya
tika-s0501t:687_4: ca desitāya avijjāmūlako sabbopi paṭiccasamuppādo “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa
tika-s0501t:687_5: samudayo hotī”ti desitova hotīti adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:688_0: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe… samudayo hotī”ti anulomavasena pavatto yo paṭiccasamuppādo
tika-s0501t:688_1: desitoti ācariyena vutto, “yadi tathā pavatto so ca paṭiccasamuppādo desito, evaṃ
tika-s0501t:688_2: sati sabbo ca paṭiccasamuppādo desito”ti na vattabboti codanaṃ manasi katvā “so cā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:688_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha yo ca anulomavasena pavatto, so ca sarāgasadosasamohasaṃkilesapakkhena
tika-s0501t:688_4: hātabbo. Yo ca paṭilomavasena “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādiko
tika-s0501t:688_5: pavatto, so ca vītarāgavītadosavītamohaariyadhammehi hātabbo. Yo ca anulomapaṭilomavasena
tika-s0501t:688_6: pavatto, so ca tadubhayehi hātabbo. Tasmā “sabbo ca paṭiccasamuppādo desito”ti vattabbovāti
tika-s0501t:689_0: “Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ekasmiṃ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā
tika-s0501t:689_1: bhavantītiādinā ācariyena yā lakkhaṇahārayojanā vuttā, sāva kātabbā, na aññathā kātabbā”ti
tika-s0501t:689_2: pucchitabbabhāvato aññathāpi lakkhaṇahārayojanā kātabbāyevāti dassetuṃ “evaṃ ye dhammā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:689_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha ye pathavīādayo rūpadhammā, ye phassādayo arūpadhammā sandhāraṇādikiccato
tika-s0501t:689_4: saṅghaṭṭanādikiccato ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ekasmiṃ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā
tika-s0501t:689_5: rūpārūpadhammā vuttā bhavanti. Ye pathavīādayo rūpadhammā, ye phassādayo arūpadhammā
tika-s0501t:689_6: kakkhaḷādilakkhaṇato phusanādilakkhaṇato ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ekasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:689_7: dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā rūpārūpadhammā vuttā bhavanti. Ye dhammā ruppanasāmaññato
tika-s0501t:689_8: namanasāmaññato aniccādisāmaññato vā khandhāyatanādisāmaññato vā ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṃ
tika-s0501t:689_9: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ekasmiṃ saṅkhatadhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti. Ye
tika-s0501t:689_10: saṅkhatadhammā bhaṅguppādato saṅkhato cutūpapātato samānanirodhuppādasaṅkhatato vā
tika-s0501t:689_11: cutūpapātato ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ekasmiṃ saṅkhatadhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā
tika-s0501t:690_0: Kiccato ca lakkhaṇato cātiādīsu ca-saddena sahacaraṇasamānahetutādayo saṅgahitāti
tika-s0501t:690_1: daṭṭhabbā. Sahacaraṇādīsu ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ “nānattakāyanānattasaññino, nānattasaññānaṃ
tika-s0501t:690_2: amanasikārā”tiādīsu sahacāritāya saññāsahagatā dhammā niddhāritātiādinā vuttameva.
tika-s0501t:691_0: “Ekasmiṃ dhamme sarūpato vutte ekalakkhaṇādito avasiṭṭhadhammānampi vuttabhāvo kena
tika-s0501t:691_1: amhehi jānitabbo saddahitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “tenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tena
tika-s0501t:691_2: avasiṭṭhadhammānampi vuttabhāvena “vuttamhi ekadhamme”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ āyasmā
tika-s0501t:691_3: mahākaccāno āha, tena vacanena tumhehi avasiṭṭhānampi vuttabhāvo jānitabbo saddahitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:692_0: “Ettāvatā ca lakkhaṇahāro paripuṇṇo, añño niyutto natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyutto
tika-s0501t:692_1: lakkhaṇo hāro”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ekasmiṃ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhadhammāpi
tika-s0501t:692_2: yena lakkhaṇahārena niddhāritā, tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ so lakkhaṇo hāro niyutto niddhāretvā
tika-s0501t:695: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:697_0: 25. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgena suttatthehi samānatthā
tika-s0501t:697_1: vibhattā, so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo, “katamo catubyūhahāravibhaṅgo”ti
tika-s0501t:697_2: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo catubyūho hāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu niddiṭṭhesu
tika-s0501t:697_3: soḷasasu desanāhārādīsu. Katamoti katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso catubyūho hāro catubyūhahāravibhaṅgo
tika-s0501t:697_4: nāmāti viññeyyo. Tena vuttaṃ – “tattha katamo catubyūho hāroti catubyūhahāravibhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0501t:697_6: vuttaṃ. Tattha byañjanenāti catubyūhahārassa suttassa visesato byañjanavicayabhāvato
tika-s0501t:697_7: “byañjanā”ti vohāritena iminā catubyūhahārena suttassa neruttañca, suttassa adhippāyo
tika-s0501t:697_8: ca, suttassa nidānañca, suttassa pubbāparasandhi ca saṃvaṇṇentehi gavesitabboti attho.
tika-s0501t:698_0: “Catubyūhahārena gavesitabbesu neruttādīsu katamaṃ suttassa gavesitabbaṃ nerutta”nti
tika-s0501t:698_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nerutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho – tattha tesu iminā
tika-s0501t:698_2: catubyūhahārena gavesitabbesu neruttādīsu katamaṃ suttassa neruttaṃ nibbacanaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0501t:698_3: ce puccheyya? Suttassa yā nirutti niddhāretvā vuttā sabhāvapaññatti gavesitabbā,
tika-s0501t:698_4: idaṃ sabhāvaniruttibhūtaṃ nibbacanaṃ neruttaṃ nāmāti. “Yā nirutti neruttaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0501t:698_5: vuttā, kā pana sā niruttī”ti pucchitabbattā “padasaṃhitā”ti vuttaṃ. Padesu saṃhitā
tika-s0501t:698_6: yuttā padasaṃhitā. Yathā yathā suttattho vattabbo, tathā tathā yā sabhāvanirutti
tika-s0501t:698_7: pavattā, sā pavattā sabhāvaniruttiyeva nirutti nāmāti yojanā. “Kā pana sā sabhāvaniruttī”ti
tika-s0501t:698_8: pucchitabbattā ca “yaṃ dhammānaṃ nāmaso ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ yāya kāraṇabhūtāya nāmapaññattiyā
tika-s0501t:698_9: dhammānaṃ neyyānaṃ nāmaso pathavīnāmādinā vā phassanāmādinā vā khandhanāmādinā vā
tika-s0501t:698_10: vividhena nāmena atthadhammādīsu kusalassa puggalassa ñāṇaṃ pavattati, sā kāraṇabhūtā
tika-s0501t:698_11: nāmapaññatti sabhāvanirutti nāmāti attho. Yanti ca liṅgavipallāso, yāyāti attho.
tika-s0501t:698_12: “Liṅgapakatidhammānaṃ nāmaso pavattamānaṃ ñāṇaṃ vivaritvā kathehī”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:698_13: “yadā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yadā hi bhikkhūtiādinā ‘dhammānaṃ nāmaso
tika-s0501t:698_14: ñāṇa’nti padassa atthaṃ vivaratī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vibhajitvā vuttovāti na vicārito.
tika-s0501t:699_0: 26. Neruttaṃ ācariyena vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ “katamo sutte gavesitabbo bhagavato
tika-s0501t:699_1: adhippāyo”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo adhippāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:699_2: Apica “dhammo have rakkhatī”tiādīsu yena puggalena attanā rakkhitena dhammena rakkhitabbabhāvo
tika-s0501t:699_3: icchito, so dhammaṃ rakkhissatīti bhagavato adhippāyo. Yo puggalo duggatito muccitukāmo,
tika-s0501t:700_0: Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahitotiādīsu yo coro ghātanato muccitukāmo, so corakammaṃ
tika-s0501t:700_1: na karissatīti bhagavato adhippāyo. Yo puggalo apāyādidukkhato muccitukāmo, so pāpakammaṃ
tika-s0501t:701: Sukhakāmānītiādīsu ye puggalā sukhaṃ icchanti, te parahiṃsanato vivajjissantīti bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:702_0: Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso cātiādīsu ye puggalā punappunaṃ pavattamānajātijarāmaraṇato
tika-s0501t:702_1: muccitukāmā, te bhojane mattaññuno bhavissanti, santuṭṭhā bhavissanti, suddhājīvā
tika-s0501t:702_2: bhavissanti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlasampannā bhavissanti, atandino bhavissanti, vipassakā
tika-s0501t:702_3: bhavissanti, sagāravā sappatissā bhavissantīti bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:703: Appamādo amatapadantiādīsu ye puggalā maccuno bhāyanti, nibbānamicchanti, te puggalā dānasīlabhāvanākammesu appamattā bhavissantīti bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:704_0: 27. Sutte gavesitabbo adhippāyo ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca viññāto, “katamaṃ suttassa
tika-s0501t:704_1: gavesitabbaṃ nidāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nidāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:704_2: nidānanti phalaṃ nīharitvā detīti nidānaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Kāraṇaṃ. Dhaniyoti dhanavaḍḍhanakāraṇe
tika-s0501t:704_3: niyuttoti dhaniyo. Gopālakoti gāvo issarabhāvena pāleti rakkhatīti gopālako. Upadhīhīti
tika-s0501t:704_4: puttagoṇādīhi. Narassāti puttimantassa vā gopālakassa vā narassāti ca padaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0501t:704_5: vā yebhuyyavasena vā gāthāyaṃ āgatavasena vā vuttaṃ, nāriyāpi upadhīhi nandanā atthevāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0501t:705_0: Iminā vatthunāti upadhisaṅkhātena imināva puttagavādinā vatthunā. Vasati pavattati
tika-s0501t:705_1: nandanā ettha puttagoṇādiketi vatthu. Nandanaṃ nīharitvā deti puttagoṇādikanti nidānanti
tika-s0501t:705_2: atthaṃ gahetvā dhaniyo “upadhīhi narassa nandanā”ti āha. Bhagavā pana “vasati pavattati
tika-s0501t:705_3: socanā ettha puttagoṇādikehi vatthu, socanaṃ nīharitvā deti puttagoṇādikanti nidāna”nti
tika-s0501t:705_4: atthaṃ gahetvā “upadhīhi narassa socanā”ti āha. Pariggahīyateti pariggahaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t:705_5: Puttagoṇādikaṃ, taṃ pariggahaṃ “upadhī”ti āha, na kilesūpadhikāyakhandhūpadhinti.
tika-s0501t:706: Upadhīsūti khandhasaṅkhātesu kāyesu. Kāyaṃ “upadhī”ti āha, na puttagavādikaṃ, na pariggahaṃ.
tika-s0501t:708: Kāmasukhanti kāmanīyesu assādasukhavasena pavattā taṇhā. Bāhiravatthukāya taṇhāyāti kāmanīyesu bāhiravatthūsu assādasukhavasena pavattāya taṇhāya.
tika-s0501t:710: Puna ajjhattikavatthukāyāti pañcakkhandhasaṅkhāte ajjhattikavatthumhi sinehavasena pavattāya.
tika-s0501t:711_0: Gavesitabbaṃ nidānaṃ vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamo gavesitabbo pubbāparasandhī”ti
tika-s0501t:711_1: pucchitabbattā tattha katamo pubbāparasandhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu neruttādhippāyanidānapubbāparasandhīsu.
tika-s0501t:711_2: Yathāti yena andhakārādinā sabhāvena “kāmandhā…pe… mātara”nti yaṃ kāmataṇhaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0501t:711_3: āha, ayaṃ kāmataṇhā tathā tena andhakārādinā sabhāvena “kāmandhā…pe… mātara”nti gāthā vuttāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:712_0: Gāthāttho pana – kāmetīti kāmo, kāmataṇhā, kāmena atthassa ajānanatāya dhammassa,
tika-s0501t:712_1: apassanatāya ca andhāti kāmandhā. Kāmataṇhāsaṅkhātena jālena atthadhammānaṃ ajānanāpassanena
tika-s0501t:712_2: sañchannā paliguṇṭhitāti jālasañchannā. Taṇhāsaṅkhātena chadanena tesaṃyeva atthadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:712_3: ajānanāpassanena chāditā pihitāti taṇhāchadanachāditā. Atthadhammesu pamattasaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:712_4: pamādena bandhanena baddhā bandhitabbā puggalā jarāmaraṇaṃ anventi, kumināmukhe pavattā
tika-s0501t:712_5: macchā maraṇaṃ anventi iva ca, khīrapako vaccho mātaraṃ anveti iva ca, tathā jarāmaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:713_0: “Kāmandhā…pe… mātara’nti yāya desanāya, gāthāya vā kāmataṇhā vuttā, sā desanā, gāthā
tika-s0501t:713_1: vā katamena desanābhūtena aparena yujjatī”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā imāya
tika-s0501t:713_2: desanāya, gāthāya vā yujjatīti dassetuṃ “sā katamenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāti “kāmandhā…pe…
tika-s0501t:713_3: anventī”ti desanā, gāthā vā. Pubbāparenāti tato desanāto pubbena desanāvacanena,
tika-s0501t:713_4: gāthāvacanena vā aparena desanāvacanena, gāthāvacanena vā. Yujjati yujjanaṃ eti sametīti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:714_0: Yathāti yena andhakaraṇādinā. “Ratto…pe… nara”nti yaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ bhagavā āha, tena
tika-s0501t:714_1: gāthāvacanena tathā andhakaraṇādinā yujjatīti yojanā. Gāthāttho pana – ratto rañjanto
tika-s0501t:714_2: puggalo atthaṃ attahitapayojanaṃ parahitapayojanaṃ na jānāti. Ratto rañjanto dhammaṃ
tika-s0501t:714_3: yathāvuttassa atthassa hetuṃ paññācakkhunā na passati. Rāgo yaṃ naraṃ yadā sahate,
tika-s0501t:714_4: tadā tassa narassa andhaṃ andhakāraṃ tamaṃ aññāṇaṃ hotīti gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:715_0: Itīti evaṃ. Andhatāya andhakaraṇatāya sañchannatāya sañchannakaraṇatāya. Sāyeva taṇhāti
tika-s0501t:715_1: “kāmandhā…pe… mātara”nti gāthāvacanena yā kāmataṇhā vuttā, sāyeva kāmataṇhā. Abhilapitāti
tika-s0501t:715_2: “ratto…pe… nara”nti aparena gāthāvacanena bhagavatā vohāritā voharaṇena ñāpitā, abhilapitassa
tika-s0501t:715_3: atthassa samānatā pubbadesanā aparadesanāya yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:716_0: “Dvīsu gāthāsu katamehi padehi sāyeva taṇhā abhilapitā”ti pucchitabbattā imehi abhilapitāti
tika-s0501t:716_1: niyametvā dassetuṃ “yañcāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ “kāmandhā…pe… chāditā”ti
tika-s0501t:716_2: yañca padaṃ āha, dutiyagāthāyañca “ratto…pe… na passatī”ti yañca padaṃ āha. Pariyuṭṭhānehi
tika-s0501t:716_3: pariyuṭṭhānadīpakehi imehi “kāmandhā…pe… passatī”ti padehi sāyeva paṭhamagāthāya
tika-s0501t:717_0: “Yaṃ andhakāraṃ vuttaṃ, katamaṃ taṃ? Yā taṇhā ponobhavikā vuttā, katamā sā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:717_1: “yaṃ andhakāra”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha andhakāraṃ yaṃ aññāṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo
tika-s0501t:717_2: bhave. Yā ca taṇhā ponobhavikā vuttā, ayañca dukkhasamudayo bhaveti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:718_0: “Kāmā”ti yañca padaṃ bhagavā āha, tena padena ime kilesakāmā vuttā. “Jālasañchannā”ti
tika-s0501t:718_1: yañca padaṃ bhagavā āha, tena padena tesaṃyeva kilesakāmānaṃ payogena samudācārena
tika-s0501t:718_2: pariyuṭṭhānaṃ bhagavā dasseti. Tasmāti yasmā yasmiṃ santāne taṇhā uppannā, taṃ santānaṃ
tika-s0501t:718_3: saṃsārato nissarituṃ adatvā rūpārammaṇādīhi palobhayamānā hutvā cittaṃ kilesehi pariyādāya
tika-s0501t:718_4: tiṭṭhati, tasmā taṇhāya cittaṃ pariyādāya santāne tiṭṭhamānattā. Kilesavasenāti vītikkamakilesavasena.
tika-s0501t:718_5: Pariyuṭṭhānavasenāti vītikkamanaṃ appatvā uppajjamānavasena. Yeti vuttappakārataṇhāsahitapuggalasadisā.
tika-s0501t:718_6: Teti te taṇhābandhanabaddhā ca edisakā ca puggalā. Jarāmaraṇaṃ anventi jarāmaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:718_7: atikkamituṃ na sakkuṇanti. Ayanti jarāmaraṇānuppavatti “jarāmaraṇamanventī”ti iminā
tika-s0501t:719_1: amhehi ca ñāto, “kathaṃ ‘yassa papañcā ṭhitī cā’tiādigāthāsu pubbāparasandhi amhehi
tika-s0501t:719_2: viññātabbo”ti vattabbattā yassa papañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassā gāthāya – yassa munino
tika-s0501t:719_3: papañcā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhī ca natthi, taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi abhisaṅkhatā saṅkhārā ca natthi,
tika-s0501t:719_4: ṭhitī anusayā taṇhā ca natthi, sandānasadisaṃ taṇhāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ natthi, palighasadiso
tika-s0501t:719_5: moho ca natthi, so muni papañcādikaṃ sabbaṃ vītivatto atikkantoti vuccati. Nittaṇhaṃ
tika-s0501t:719_6: nimānaṃ nidiṭṭhiṃ nisandānaṃ nipalighaṃ loke carantaṃ taṃ muniṃ sadevako taṇhāsahito
tika-s0501t:720_0: Gāthāyaṃ papañcādayo bhagavatā vuttā, “katame te”ti pucchitabbattā “papañcā nāmā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:720_1: vuttaṃ. Attano ādhārapuggalaṃ saṃsāre ciraṃ papañcantāpentī taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo ca,
tika-s0501t:720_2: tāhi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi sahajātavasena vā upatthambhanavasena vā abhisaṅkhatā saṅkhārā
tika-s0501t:720_3: ca papañcā nāma. Santāne appahīnaṭṭhena anusayā taṇhā sattānaṃ tiṭṭhanahetuttā ṭhitī
tika-s0501t:720_4: nāma. Pavattamānāya taṇhāya yaṃ pariyuṭṭhānañca chattiṃsataṇhāya jāliniyā yāni vicaritāni
tika-s0501t:720_5: ca vuttāni, idaṃ sabbaṃ attano ādhāraṃ puggalaṃ bandhanaṭṭhena sandānasadisattā sandānaṃ
tika-s0501t:720_6: nāma. Moho attano ādhārassa puggalassa nibbānanagarappavesanassa paṭisedhakattā palighasadisattā
tika-s0501t:720_7: paligho nāma. “Yassa papañcādayo natthi, so kiṃ vītivatto”ti pucchitabbattā “ye cā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:720_8: vuttaṃ. Ye vuttappakārā papañcā saṅkhārā, yā ca vuttappakārā ṭhiti, yaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
tika-s0501t:720_9: sandānañca, yaṃ vuttappakāraṃ palighañca natthīti vuttā, sabbaṃ etaṃ papañcādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:720_10: yo muni samatikkanto, ayaṃ muni “nittaṇho”ti vuccatīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:721_0: 28. “Yassa papañcātiādigāthāyaṃ ye papañcādayo vuttā, tesu taṇhāmānadiṭṭhihetukā
tika-s0501t:721_1: saṅkhārā kadā katividhaṃ phalaṃ denti, taṃsaṅkhārasampayuttā taṇhā kadā katividhaṃ
tika-s0501t:721_2: phalaṃ detī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhārā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti
tika-s0501t:721_3: tesu papañcasaṅkhārādīsu. Pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhārāti vītikkamavasena pavattā pariyuṭṭhānā
tika-s0501t:721_4: akusalasaṅkhārā cetanā. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīti diṭṭhe passitabbe dhamme attabhāve
tika-s0501t:721_5: vedanīyaṃ phalaṃ detīti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā, diṭṭhe dhamme phalaṃ vedetīti vā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā.
tika-s0501t:721_6: Kā sā? Apadussanīyādīsu atidussanādivasena pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā. Upapajje
tika-s0501t:721_7: phalaṃ vedetīti upapajjavedanīyā, sattamajavanacetanā. Aparāpariyāye attabhāve phalaṃ
tika-s0501t:721_8: vedetīti aparāpariyāyavedanīyā, majjhe pavattā pañca javanacetanā. Tiphaladānavasena
tika-s0501t:721_9: tividhā saṅkhārā. Evaṃ imāya tividhāya saṅkhāracetanāya sampayuttā tividhā taṇhā
tika-s0501t:721_10: tividhaṃ phalaṃ diṭṭhe vā dhamme attabhāve, upapajje vā anantarabhave, apare vā pariyāye
tika-s0501t:721_11: bhave deti nibbattetīti evaṃ phalanibbattakasaṅkhāraṃ vā taṃsampayuttaṃ taṇhaṃ vā bhagavā āha.
tika-s0501t:722_0: “Yāya desanāya, gāthāya vā phalanibbattakaṃ saṅkhāraṃ āha, sā desanā, gāthā vā katamena
tika-s0501t:722_1: desanābhūtena vā aparena yujjatī”ti pucchitabbattā “yaṃ lobhapakataṃ kammaṃ karotī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:722_2: vuttaṃ. Yā “yassa…pe… loko”ti desanā ca yā “yaṃ lobhapakataṃ kammaṃ…pe… apare vā
tika-s0501t:722_3: pariyāye”ti desanā ca vuttā, bhagavato idaṃ desanādvayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pubbāparena pubbaṃ
tika-s0501t:722_4: aparena aparaṃ pubbena yujjati yujjanaṃ eti sameti, yathā gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena,
tika-s0501t:722_5: yamunodakampi gaṅgodakena saṃsandati sameti. “Yassa…pe… loko”ti desanā “yaṃ lobhapakataṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:722_6: pariyāye”ti desanāya saṃsandati sameti, “yaṃ lobhapakataṃ…pe… pariyāye”ti desanāpi
tika-s0501t:722_7: “yassa…pe… loko”ti desanāya saṃsandati sametīti attho gahetabbo. “Kathaṃ yujjatī”ti
tika-s0501t:723_0: Yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ pubbāparena yujjati, taṃ taṃ suttampi nīharitvā
tika-s0501t:723_2: gahetabbo. Tatthāti tesu pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhārataṇhāvicaritesu. Pariyuṭṭhānanti rūpārammaṇādīni
tika-s0501t:723_3: ayonisomanasikārena ārabbha sattasantāne pavattaṃ taṇhācaritaṃ. Paṭisaṅkhānabalenāti
tika-s0501t:723_6: taṇhāvicaritānīti dassanena pahātabbataṇhāvicaritehi avasesāni chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni.
tika-s0501t:723_7: Niggatā taṇhā yassa so nittaṇho, nittaṇhassa bhāvo nittaṇhatā, kā sā? Saupādisesā nibbānadhātu.
tika-s0501t:724: Papañcasaṅkhārābhinandanattayaṃ yadipi atthato ekaṃ samānaṃ, desanāya pana padakkharādīhi viseso atthīti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:725_0: “Yoyaṃ pubbāparasandhi ācariyena vibhatto, soyaṃ katividho”ti pucchitabbattā “so
tika-s0501t:725_1: cāyaṃ pubbāparo sandhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “na kevalaṃ suttantarasaṃsandanameva
tika-s0501t:725_2: pubbāparasandhi, atha kho aññopi atthīti dassetuṃ ‘so cāya’ntiādi vutta”nti. Tattha
tika-s0501t:725_3: atthasandhīti kiriyākārakādivasena atthassa atthena sandhi. Padasandhīti nāmapadādikassa
tika-s0501t:725_4: nāmapadādikantarena sandhi. Desanāsandhīti vuttappakārassa desanantarassa vuttappakārena
tika-s0501t:725_5: desanantarena sandhi. Niddesasandhīti niddesantarassa niddesantarena sandhi.
tika-s0501t:726: Sandhi ca nāma atthādayo muñcitvā añño sabhāvadhammo nāma natthi, atthādīnañca chaatthapadādīsu avarodhanato “atthasandhi chappadānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:727_0: Atthasandhibyañjanasandhayo ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamā desanāsandhī”ti
tika-s0501t:727_1: pucchitabbattā “desanāsandhi na ca pathavi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha na ca pathaviṃ nissāya
tika-s0501t:727_2: jhāyati jhāyī jhāyati cāti ettha jhāyī jhānasamaṅgī puggalo pathaviṃ nissāya ālambitvā
tika-s0501t:727_3: na ca jhāyati, sabbasaṅkhāranissaṭaṃ pana nibbānaṃ nissāya ālambitvā phalasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0501t:727_4: jhāyati samāpajjati evāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Na ca āpantiādīsupi esa nayo yojetabbo.
tika-s0501t:727_5: Phalasamāpattisamaṅgī puggalo hi pathavīādayo muñcitvā nibbānameva ārabbha phalasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0501t:727_6: samāpajjatīti. Ettha ca pathavīādīhi mahābhūtehi kāmabhavarūpabhavā gahitā rūpapaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
tika-s0501t:727_7: Ākāsānañcāyatanādīhipi arūpabhavo gahito, bhavattayaṃ vajjetvā ca jhāyatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:727_8: Yadi pathavīādayo nissāya na jhāyī jhāyati ca, evaṃ sati idhalokasaṅkhātaṃ sattasantānaṃ
tika-s0501t:727_9: vā paralokasaṅkhātaṃ sattasantānaṃ vā anindriyasantānaṃ vā nissāya jhāyī jhāyatīti
tika-s0501t:727_10: āsaṅkanīyattā taṃ pariharanto “na ca imaṃ loka”ntiādimāha. Tattha imaṃ lokanti idhalokasaṅkhāto
tika-s0501t:727_11: diṭṭho attabhāvo sattasantāno vutto, tasmiṃ nissāya na jhāyati jhāyī jhāyati ca.
tika-s0501t:727_12: Paralokanti idhalokato añño bhavantarasaṅkhāto sattasantāno vutto, tasmiṃ nissāya
tika-s0501t:727_13: na ca jhāyati jhāyī jhāyati ca.
tika-s0501t:728_0: Yamidaṃ ubhayantiādīsu idaṃ ubhayaṃ idhalokaparalokadvayaṃ antarena vajjetvā yaṃ
tika-s0501t:728_1: rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ rūpāyatanampi. Yaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ, taṃ saddāyatanampi.
tika-s0501t:728_3: Yaṃ āpodhātu ākāsadhātu lakkhaṇarūpaṃ ojāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammāyatanekadesarūpaṃ viññātaṃ,
tika-s0501t:728_4: taṃ āpodhātādikaṃ dhammāyatanekadesarūpampi. Yaṃ vatthu pariyesitaṃ vā apariyesitaṃ
tika-s0501t:728_5: vā santike pattaṃ, taṃ vatthumpi. Yaṃ vatthu pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ pariyesanārahaṃ
tika-s0501t:728_6: sundaraṃ, taṃ vatthumpi. Yaṃ vatthu vitakkitaṃ vitakkanavasena ālambitabbaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0501t:728_7: vatthumpi. Yaṃ vatthu vicāritaṃ anumajjanavasena ālambitabbaṃ, taṃ vatthumpi. Yaṃ
tika-s0501t:728_8: vatthu manasā citteneva anucintitaṃ anucintanavasena ālambitabbaṃ, taṃ vatthumpi
tika-s0501t:728_9: nissāya na jhāyati jhāyī jhāyati cāti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:729_0: Ettha diṭṭhādikaṃ bahiddhārūpameva gahetabbaṃ anindriyabaddharūpassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0501t:729_2: jhāyī puggalo yathāvutte pathavīādayo nissāya na jhāyati jhāyī jhāyati ca, evaṃ sati
tika-s0501t:729_3: ayaṃ jhāyī puggalo idaṃ nāma nissāya jhāyatīti loke kenaci ñāyati kiṃ, udāhu na ñāyatī”ti
tika-s0501t:729_4: pucchitabbattā na ñāyatīti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ sadevake loke”tiādimāha. Tattha phalasamāpattijhānena
tika-s0501t:729_5: jhāyanto ayaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalo sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya yattha katthacipi
tika-s0501t:729_6: anissitena cittena jhāyatīti sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya kenaci na ñāyatīti
tika-s0501t:731: Yassa te nābhijānāma, kiṃ tvaṃ nissāya jhāyasī”ti. ;
tika-s0501t:732_0: “Kenaci aviññāyabhāvo kena suttena vibhāvetabbo”ti pucchitabbattā iminā godhikasuttena
tika-s0501t:732_1: vibhāvetabboti dassetuṃ “yathā māro pāpimā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idāni
tika-s0501t:732_2: khīṇāsavacittassa katthacipi anissitabhāvaṃ godhikasuttena vakkalisuttena ca vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0501t:732_3: ‘yathā māro’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha dānādipuññakārake, puññe vā māreti nivāretīti
tika-s0501t:732_4: māro, attahitaparahite māretīti vā māro. Pāpacittuppādavantatāya pāpimā. Pubbattabhāve
tika-s0501t:732_5: godhassa ghātakattā “godhiko”ti laddhanāmassa parinibbāyantassa kulaputtassa parinibbānato
tika-s0501t:732_6: uddhaṃ paṭisandhādi viññāṇaṃ samanvesanto na jānāti na passati. “Paracittajānanako
tika-s0501t:732_7: māro kasmā na jānātī”ti vattabbattā “so hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. So godhiko hi yasmā papañcātīto,
tika-s0501t:732_8: tasmā taṇhāpahānena diṭṭhinissayopi assa godhikassa yasmā natthi, tasmā ca na jānātīti.
tika-s0501t:733_1: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā anissitabhāvo vibhāvito, evaṃ sati saupādisesanibbānadhātuyā
tika-s0501t:733_2: anissitabhāvo kena viññāyatīti attho bhaveyyā”ti vattabbattā tadāpi na viññāyatiyevāti
tika-s0501t:733_3: dassetuṃ “sadevakena lokenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā phalasamāpattijhānena
tika-s0501t:733_4: jhāyamānā ime khīṇāsavā katthaci anissitacittā jhāyantīti sadevakena lokena na ñāyanti
tika-s0501t:733_5: samārakena…pe… sadevamanussāya na ñāyantīti yojanā kātabbā. Anissitacittā na ñāyantīti
tika-s0501t:733_6: ettha hi na-kāro ca “jhāyamānā”ti pade na sambandhitabbo “na jhāyamānā”ti atthassa
tika-s0501t:733_7: sambhavato. “Na ñāyantī”ti pana sambandhitabbo heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ eva “loke kenacipi
tika-s0501t:733_8: na ñāyatī”ti vuttattā. Ayaṃ desanāsandhīti godhikasuttavakkalisuttānaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0501t:733_9: atthavasena saṃsandanā niddhāritā viya “na ca pathaviṃ nissāyā”tiādidesanāya ca “na
tika-s0501t:733_10: ca imaṃ loka”ntiādidesanāya ca yāya desanāya atthavasena saṃsandanā niddhāritā, tāya
tika-s0501t:733_11: desanāya yattha katthaci yaṃ kiñci nissāya jhāyī na jhāyati, nibbānaṃ nissāya jhāyī
tika-s0501t:733_12: jhāyatīti atthavasena niddhāritā, ayaṃ saṃsandanā desanāsandhi nāmāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:734_0: Desanāsandhi ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamā niddesasandhī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:734_1: “tattha katamā niddesasandhīti nissitacittā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu catūsu
tika-s0501t:734_3: uddiṭṭhā, sā niddesato katamāti pucchatīti attho. Nissitacittāti taṇhādiṭṭhisahajātavasena
tika-s0501t:734_4: vā upanissayavasena vā nissitaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ puthujjanānanti nissitacittā, puthujjanā
tika-s0501t:734_5: puggalā niddisitabbā imāya desanāya puggalādhiṭṭhānattā. Yadi desanā dhammādhiṭṭhānā,
tika-s0501t:734_6: evaṃ sati nissitaṃ cittaṃ ettha suttappadesesu desitanti nissitacittā nissitacittajānanatthāya
tika-s0501t:734_7: desitā suttappadesā. Anissitaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ ariyapuggalānanti anissitacittā, ariyapuggalā
tika-s0501t:734_8: niddisitabbā imāya desanāya puggalādhiṭṭhānattā. Dhammādhiṭṭhānāya pana anissitaṃ
tika-s0501t:734_9: cittaṃ yattha suttappadesesu desitanti anissitacittā, anissitacittajānanatthāya desitā suttappadesā.
tika-s0501t:735_0: “Nissitacittā kena niddesena niddisitabbā, anissitacittā kena niddesena niddisitabbā”ti
tika-s0501t:735_2: niddesena niddisitabbā. Kusalapakkhenātiādīsupi esa nayo yojetabbo. Akusalapakkhasāmaññakusalapakkhasāmaññehi
tika-s0501t:735_4: Ayaṃ niddesasandhīti akusalapakkhādikassa purimaniddesassa saṃkilesādikena pacchimena
tika-s0501t:735_5: niddesena nissitacittavasena ayaṃ saṃsandanā ca niddesasandhi nāma. Kusalapakkhādikassa
tika-s0501t:735_6: purimassa niddesassa vodānādikena pacchimena niddesena anissitacittavasena ayaṃ saṃsandanā
tika-s0501t:736_1: ca vibhajitabbabhāvo kena amhehi jānitabbo saddahitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “tenāhā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:736_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha tena tathā vibhajitabbabhāvena āyasmā mahākaccāno “neruttamadhippāyo”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:736_3: yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena tumhehi catubyūhahārassa tathā vibhajitabbabhāvo jānitabbo
tika-s0501t:737_0: “Ettāvatā ca catubyūhahāro paripuṇṇo, añño niyutto natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyutto
tika-s0501t:737_1: catubyūho hāro”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yassaṃ yassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ yo yo catubbidho, so so catubyūhahāro
tika-s0501t:737_2: ca yathālābhavasena yojito, tassaṃ tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ so so catubbidho catubyūhahāro
tika-s0501t:737_3: tathā niddhāretvā yutto yojitoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:740: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:742_0: 29. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena catubyūhahāravibhaṅgena neruttādayo vibhattā,
tika-s0501t:742_1: so…pe… catubyūhahāravibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo, “katamo āvaṭṭo hāravibhaṅgo”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:742_2: tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu niddiṭṭhesu soḷasasu
tika-s0501t:742_3: desanāhārādīsu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso āvaṭṭo hāro āvaṭṭahāravibhaṅgo nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:742_5: āvaṭṭahāravibhaṅgo nāmāti gahito. “Tattha desanāyaṃ ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne desanāruḷhe
tika-s0501t:742_6: sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati, pariyesitvā kathaṃ paṭipakkhe āvaṭṭetī”ti vattabbattā –
tika-s0501t:745: Gāthā vuttā. Idha gāthāyaṃ ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne desanāruḷhe sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gāthāttho pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0501t:746_0: “Ārambhathā’tiādigāthāyaṃ katarasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne desanāruḷhe katamaṃ sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:746_1: pariyesatī”ti vattabbattā “ārambhatha nikkamathāti vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:746_2: Tattha “vīriyassa padaṭṭhāna”nti sāmaññavasena vuttampi ārambhadhātusaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:746_3: nikkamadhātusaṅkhātassa vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ parakkamadhātusaṅkhātassa
tika-s0501t:746_4: vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, parakkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ samathabhāvanāsahitassa vīriyassa
tika-s0501t:746_5: padaṭṭhānantiādinā pariyesitabbanti gahetabbaṃ. “Yuñjathā”ti iminā vuttaṃ samathabhāvanāsahitaṃ
tika-s0501t:746_6: vīriyaṃ “buddhasāsane”ti iminā vuttassa mahaggatasamādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ, desanāruḷhaṃ
tika-s0501t:746_7: sukhādikaṃ sesakampi padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ. “Dhunātha maccuno sena”nti padena
tika-s0501t:746_8: gahitaṃ vipassanāsahitaṃ vīriyaṃ kilesadhunane samatthāya paññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, desanāruḷhaṃ
tika-s0501t:747_1: padaṭṭhānaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati kathaṃ vaṭṭamūlaṃ chinditvā vivaṭṭaṃ pāpessantī”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:747_2: puna “ārambhatha nikkamathāti vīriyindriyassa padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ādhipaccakiccatāya
tika-s0501t:747_3: yuttassāpi vīriyādhikassa padaṭṭhānattā ārabhantā yogāvacarapuggalā vaṭṭamūlaṃ chinditvā
tika-s0501t:747_4: vivaṭṭaṃ pāpentīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Ārambhathā”tiādikā pana yasmā vīriyārambhavatthuādidesanā
tika-s0501t:747_5: hoti, tasmā ārambhavatthuādīniyeva saṃvaṇṇitāni padaṭṭhānanti codanaṃ manasi katvā
tika-s0501t:747_7: hoti, na vīriyārambhavatthuādīni, tasmā padaṭṭhānaṃyeva saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:748_0: Evaṃ “ārambhathā”tiādidesanāya padaṭṭhānavasena attho vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:748_1: tassāyeva desanāya paṭipakkhavasena attho vibhajitabbo”ti vattabbattā “ayuñjantānaṃ
tika-s0501t:748_2: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yoge bhāvanāyaṃ ayuñjantānaṃ sattānaṃ aparipakkañāṇānaṃ yoge
tika-s0501t:748_4: Yuñjantānaṃ paripakkañāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ ārambhe ārambhahetu diṭṭheva dhamme parijānanatthāya
tika-s0501t:749_0: Tattha tesu yuñjantāyuñjantesu paripakkāparipakkañāṇesu ye aparipakkañāṇā sattā na
tika-s0501t:749_1: yuñjanti, te aparipakkañāṇā sattā pamādamūlakā hutvā yoge bhāvanāyaṃ yena pamādena
tika-s0501t:749_2: na yuñjanti, so pamādo taṇhāmūlako pamādo, avijjāmūlako pamādoti dubbidho hoti. Tattha
tika-s0501t:749_3: tasmiṃ dubbidhe pamāde aññāṇena nivuto avijjāmūlako satto yena pamādena ñeyyaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:749_4: “ime uppādavayadhammā pañcakkhandhā ñeyyaṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti nappajānāti, ayaṃ aññāṇahetuko
tika-s0501t:749_5: pamādo avijjāmūlako pamādā nāma. Yo pamādo taṇhāmūlako, so pamādo tividho anuppannānaṃ
tika-s0501t:749_6: bhogānaṃ uppādāya pariyesanto taṇhiko satto yaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjati, ayaṃ pamādo ca,
tika-s0501t:749_7: uppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ ṭhitatthāya rakkhanto taṇhiko satto ārakkhanimittaṃ yaṃ pamādaṃ
tika-s0501t:749_8: āpajjati, ayaṃ pamādo ca, ṭhitaṃ bhogaṃ paribhuñjanto taṇhiko satto paribhoganimittaṃ
tika-s0501t:749_9: yaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjati, ayaṃ pamādo cāti tividho hoti. Iti loke ayaṃ pamādo catubbidho
tika-s0501t:749_10: avijjāpadaṭṭhāno ekavidho pamādo, taṇhāpadaṭṭhāno tividho pamādoti catubbidho hoti.
tika-s0501t:749_11: Tattha tāsu avijjātaṇhāsu nāmakāyo phassādināmasamūho avijjāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, rūpakāyo
tika-s0501t:749_12: pathavīādirūpasamūho taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ārambhadhātunikkamadhātusaṅkhātassa
tika-s0501t:749_13: vīriyassa paṭipakkho catubbidho pamādo niddhāretabbo, niddhāretvā ekavidhassa pamādassa
tika-s0501t:749_14: avijjā padaṭṭhānaṃ, tividhassa pamādassa taṇhā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Avijjāya nāmakāyo padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:749_15: taṇhāya rūpakāyo padaṭṭhānanti paṭipakkhe āvaṭṭetvā padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:750_0: “Kasmā nāmakāyo avijjāya padaṭṭhānaṃ bhavati, rūpakāyo taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ bhavatī”ti
tika-s0501t:750_1: pucchitabbattā “taṃ kissa hetū”ti pucchitvā “rūpīsu bhavesu ajjhosānaṃ, arūpīsu sammoho”ti
tika-s0501t:750_2: vuttaṃ. Rūpīsu bhavesu rūpadhammesu ahaṃmamādivasena ajjhosānaṃ taṇhābhiniveso sattesu
tika-s0501t:750_3: patiṭṭhito yasmā hoti, tasmā rūpakāyo taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Anamatagge hi
tika-s0501t:750_4: saṃsāre itthipurisā aññamaññarūpābhirāmā bhavanti. Arūpīsu phassādīsu sukhumabhāvato
tika-s0501t:750_5: sammoho sattesu patiṭṭhito yasmā hoti, tasmā nāmakāyo avijjāya padaṭṭhānaṃ bhavatīti
tika-s0501t:750_6: yojanā kātabbā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – rūpakāyanāmakāyesu ārammaṇakaraṇavasena taṇhāya
tika-s0501t:750_7: ca avijjāya ca uppajjanato rūpakāyo taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, nāmakāyo avijjāya padaṭṭhānanti nīharitabbāvāti.
tika-s0501t:751_0: “Katamo rūpakāyo, katamo nāmakāyo”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha rūpakāyo rūpakkhandho,
tika-s0501t:751_1: nāmakāyo cattāro arūpino khandhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu rūpakāyanāmakāyesu rūpakāyo
tika-s0501t:751_2: rūpasamūho nāma rūpakkhandho hoti, nāmakāyo nāmasamūho nāma cattāro arūpino khandhāti.
tika-s0501t:751_3: Ime pañcakkhandhā avijjātaṇhānaṃ ārammaṇattā saupādānā bhaveyyuṃ, “katamena upādānena
tika-s0501t:751_4: saupādānā bhavantī”ti pucchitabbattā tatheva pucchitvā vissajjetuṃ “ime pañcakkhandhā
tika-s0501t:751_5: katamena upādānena saupādānā? Taṇhāya ca avijjāya cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha upādānabhūtāya
tika-s0501t:751_6: taṇhāya ca upādānabhūtāya avijjāya ca ime pañcakkhandhā saupādānā nāma bhavantīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:752_0: “Kittakāni upādānāni taṇhā nāma bhavanti, kittakāni upādānāni avijjā nāma bhavantī”ti
tika-s0501t:752_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha taṇhā dve”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tāsu taṇhāavijjāsu. Kāmupādānañca
tika-s0501t:752_2: sīlabbatupādānañca dve upādānāni taṇhā nāma bhavanti. Taṇhāvasena hi “mama sīlaṃ,
tika-s0501t:752_3: mama vata”nti parāmasanaṃ bhavati. Diṭṭhupādānañca attavādupādānañca dve upādānāni
tika-s0501t:752_4: avijjā nāma bhavanti. Avijjāvasena hi sassatadiṭṭhi ceva ahaṃmamādidiṭṭhi ca bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:752_5: “Imehi catūhi upādānehi saupādānakkhandhā catūsu saccesu kittakaṃ saccaṃ nāmā”ti
tika-s0501t:752_6: pucchitabbattā “imehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ye lokiyakkhandhā saupādānā khandhā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:752_7: upādānena hi upādānānipi bhavanti, idaṃ saupādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:752_8: nāma. Yāni cattāri upādānāni dukkhakāraṇāni bhavanti, ayaṃ upādānacatukko samudayo
tika-s0501t:752_9: samudayasaccaṃ nāma bhavati. Pañcakkhandhāti saupādānā pañcakkhandhā dukkhavatthubhāvato
tika-s0501t:752_10: dukkhaṃ. Tesanti saupādānānaṃ pañcakkhandhānaṃ. Dhammaṃ desetīti “ārambhathā”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:752_11: dhammaṃ veneyyānurūpaṃ bhagavā deseti. Sāmaññena pubbe vuttampi atthavasena visesaṃ
tika-s0501t:752_12: dassetuṃ puna “dukkhassa pariññāya, samudayassa pahānāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:753_1: ca ñātaṃ, “itarasaccadvayaṃ kathaṃ niddhāritabba”nti vattabbattā taṃ dvayampi pamādamukheneva
tika-s0501t:753_2: niddhāritabbanti dassetuṃ “tattha yo tividho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu taṇhāmūlakaavijjāmūlakesu
tika-s0501t:753_3: pamādesu. Tassāti tividhassa taṇhāmūlakassa pamādassa. Sampaṭivedhenāti assādādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:753_5: iminā vuttassa pamādassa paṭipakkhabhūtena appamādānanuyogena saṃharaṇā yā khepanā
tika-s0501t:753_6: atthi, ayaṃ pamādassa paṭipakkhabhūtena appamādānuyogena pavattā khepanasaṅkhātā
tika-s0501t:753_7: bhāvanā samatho nāmāti pamādassa paṭipakkhamukhena puna āvaṭṭetvā samatho niddhāritoti.
tika-s0501t:754_0: “So samatho kathaṃ kena upāyena bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā upāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:754_1: dassetuṃ “so katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kathanti kena upāyena. “Kāmentīti kāmā,
tika-s0501t:754_2: kāmīyantīti vā kāmā”ti vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ kāmānaṃ paṭicca uppajjamānaṃ assādañca, “appassādā
tika-s0501t:754_3: kāmā bahudukkhā”tiādi vacanato appassādanīyānaṃ kāmānaṃ paṭicca uppajjamānaṃ ādīnavañca.
tika-s0501t:754_4: Kāmānanti ca kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –“kāme paṭiccā”ti. “Kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:754_5: yadidaṃ nekkhamma”nti vacanato nissaraṇanti idha paṭhamajjhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Vokāranti
tika-s0501t:754_6: ettha va-kāro āgamo, o-kāraṃ lāmakabhāvaṃ. Ānisaṃsanti catupārisuddhisīlādikaṃ. Yadā
tika-s0501t:754_7: jānāti, tadā tena upāyena samatho bhavatīti attho.
tika-s0501t:755_0: Samatho ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā vipassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:755_1: vibhajituṃ “tattha yā vīmaṃsā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā kāmānaṃ assādādayo yadā jānāti,
tika-s0501t:755_2: tadā samatho bhavatīti vutto, “tasmiṃ samathe bhavamāne sati katamā bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:755_3: “tattha yā vīmaṃsā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ samathe bhavamāne sati assādādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:755_4: yā aniccādivīmaṃsā upaparikkhā paññā bhavati, ayaṃ vīmaṃsā upaparikkhā paññā visesena
tika-s0501t:755_5: passanato vipassanā nāma. Atha vā tividhassa taṇhāmūlakassa pamādassa sampaṭivedhena
tika-s0501t:755_6: rakkhaṇā paṭisaṃharaṇā, ayaṃ samathoti ācariyena vutto, “katamā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:755_7: “tattha yā vīmaṃsā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ yathāvutte samathe sati yathāvuttassa
tika-s0501t:755_8: pamādassa aniccādivasena yā vīmaṃsā upaparikkhā paññā uppannā, ayaṃ vīmaṃsā upaparikkhā
tika-s0501t:755_9: paññā visesena passanato vipassanā nāma. Vīmaṃsāva dubbalā, upaparikkhā balavatīti viseso.
tika-s0501t:756_0: Samatho ceva vipassanā ca dve dhammā ācariyena niddhāritā, “ime niddhāritā dve dhammā
tika-s0501t:756_1: kiṃ gacchantī”ti vattabbattā “ime dve”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samatho samathabhāvanāpāripūriṃ
tika-s0501t:756_2: gacchati, vipassanā vipassanābhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati. “Imesu dvīsu dhammesu bhāviyamānesu
tika-s0501t:756_3: katame yogāvacarena pahīyantī”ti vattabbattā “imesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samathe dhamme
tika-s0501t:756_4: bhāviyamāne taṇhā yogāvacarena pahīyati, vipassanāya bhāviyamānāya avijjā yogāvacarena
tika-s0501t:756_5: pahīyatīti ime dve pahātabbā dhammā pahīyanti taṇhā ceva avijjā ca. “Imesu dvīsu
tika-s0501t:756_6: dhammesu pahīyamānesu katame dhammā nirujjhantī”ti pucchitabbattā upādānādayopi nirujjhantīti
tika-s0501t:756_7: sakalavaṭṭadukkhanirodhaṃ dassento “imesu dvīsu dhammesu pahīnesū”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0501t:756_8: taṇhāya samathabhāvanāya pahīyamānāya, avijjāya vipassanābhāvanāya pahīyamānāya imesu
tika-s0501t:756_9: dvīsu dhammesu dvīhi bhāvanāhi pahīnesu kāmupādānādīni cattāri upādānāni vikkhambhanasamucchedavasena
tika-s0501t:757_1: nirujjhantī”ti vacanaṃ yuttaṃ hotu, kathaṃ avijjāya pahīyamānāya upādānāni nirujjhantīti?
tika-s0501t:757_3: Yathā hi taṇhāsahitāva avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo, evaṃ avijjāsahitāva taṇhā upādānānaṃ
tika-s0501t:757_4: paccayo hotīti avijjāsahitataṇhānirodhā upādānanirodhoti attho sambhavatīti gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:757_5: Vikkhambhanasamucchedavasena upādānanirodhā tatheva bhavanirodhoti esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0501t:757_6: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhoti etthāpi taṇhāsahitaavijjānirodhā
tika-s0501t:757_7: saṅkhāranirodhotiādiko gahitoti daṭṭhabbo. Itīti evaṃ visabhāgasabhāgadhammānaṃ āvaṭṭanavasena
tika-s0501t:757_8: niddhāritāni ca purimakāni dve saccāni ca, samatho ca vipassanā ca ime dve dhammā
tika-s0501t:757_9: maggo ca maggasaccañca, vaṭṭanirodho vaṭṭanirodhasaccañca nibbānanti cattāri saccāni niddhāritāni.
tika-s0501t:758_1: vasena vā āvaṭṭetvā catunnaṃ saccānaṃ niddhāritabbabhāvo amhehi kena saddahitabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:758_2: vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena tathā niddhāritabbabhāvena bhagavā “ārambhatha
tika-s0501t:758_4: tathā catunnaṃ saccānaṃ niddhāritabbabhāvo tumhehi saddahitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:759_3: āvaṭṭetvā catusaccaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento “yathāpi mūle”tiādigāthāvacanamāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –
tika-s0501t:760_1: ca āvaṭṭanaṃ dassetvā idāni saṃkilesapakkhaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa visabhāgadhammavasena,
tika-s0501t:760_2: sabhāgadhammavasena ca āvaṭṭanaṃ dassetuṃ ‘yathāpi mūle’ti gāthamāhā”ti –
tika-s0501t:761: Vuttaṃ. Gāthātthopi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Tathāpi yatipotānaṃ atthāya aṭṭhakathānusāreneva kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t:762_0: Samūho rukkho mūlati patiṭṭhāti etena avayavena bhūmibhāge ṭhitenāti mūlaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t:762_1: Bhūmibhāge ṭhito mūlasaṅkhāto rukkhāvayavo, tasmiṃ mūle. Natthi upaddavo pharasuchedādiantarāyo
tika-s0501t:762_2: assa mūlassāti anupaddavo. Daḷheti upaddavābhāvena sabhāvato thire sati. Chindīyatīti
tika-s0501t:762_3: chinno, ko so? Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitamūlasahito rukkhāvayavo, na chinditvā gahito rukkhāvayavo.
tika-s0501t:762_4: Ruhati vaḍḍhatīti rukkho. So ca bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitamūlasahito rukkhāvayavo rukkhoti
tika-s0501t:762_5: vutto yathā “samuddo diṭṭho”ti. Punareva rūhatīti puna aṅkuruppādanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:762_6: Taṇhānusayeti attabhāvasaṅkhātassa rukkhassa mūle. Anūhateti arahattamaggañāṇena
tika-s0501t:762_7: anupacchinne sati idaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhahetu punappunaṃ abbocchinnaṃ
tika-s0501t:763_0: “Idha gāthāyaṃ yo taṇhānusayo anūhatabhāvena dukkhassa nibbattanassa mūlanti vutto,
tika-s0501t:763_1: ayaṃ taṇhānusayo katamassā taṇhāya anusayo”ti pucchati, “taṇhāya kāmataṇhādivasena
tika-s0501t:763_2: bahuvidhattā bhavataṇhāya anusayo”ti vissajjeti bhavassādataṇhābhāvato. Yo anusayo
tika-s0501t:763_3: etassa bhavataṇhāsaṅkhātassa dhammassa paccayo hoti, ayaṃ anusayo avijjānusayo hoti.
tika-s0501t:763_5: hi bhavataṇhā”ti vuttaṃ. Avijjāya bhavataṇhāya paccayattā avijjānusayo saddahitabbo.
tika-s0501t:763_6: Avijjāya hi bhavesu ādīnavassa adassanavasena bhavassādataṇhā bhavatīti. Ime dve
tika-s0501t:763_7: kilesātiādimhi heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena cattāri saccāni niddhāretvā visabhāgasabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanaṃ
tika-s0501t:764_1: niravasesassa akusalassa. Akaraṇanti saparasantānesu anuppādanaṃ. Kusalassāti kammapathabhāvappattāpattassa
tika-s0501t:764_2: tebhūmakakusalassa ceva lokuttarakusalassa ca. Upasampadāti santāne uppādanavasena
tika-s0501t:764_3: sampadā. Sassa attano cittanti sacittaṃ, sacittassa pariyodāpanaṃ vodānaṃ arahattaphaluppattiyāti
tika-s0501t:764_4: sacittapariyodāpanaṃ. Arahattamagguppādo pana “kusalassa upasampadā”ti padena gahito.
tika-s0501t:764_5: Etaṃ akaraṇādittayadīpanaṃ buddhānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādoti gāthāttho.
tika-s0501t:765_0: Gāthāyaṃ yassa pāpassa akaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ duccaritakammapathavasena vibhajituṃ
tika-s0501t:765_1: “sabbapāpaṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dosasamuṭṭhānanti yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ, lobhasamuṭṭhānampi
tika-s0501t:765_2: bhavati. Lobhasamuṭṭhānantipi yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ, dosasamuṭṭhānampi bhavati. Mohasamuṭṭhānampi
tika-s0501t:765_3: tatheva vuttaṃ. Lobhasamuṭṭhānadosasamuṭṭhānampi sambhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbapāpo
tika-s0501t:765_4: duccaritakammapathappabhedena vibhatto, “ettakeneva vibhajitabbo, udāhu aññena vibhajitabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:765_7: ettha vuttapāpaṃ vibhajitvā idānissa akusalamūlavasena agatigamanavibhāgampi dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:765_8: ‘akusalamūla’ntiādi vutta”nti anusandhyattho vutto. Mohavasena sabhāvaṃ ajānantassa
tika-s0501t:765_9: bhayasambhavato yaṃ bhayā ca mohā ca agatiṃ gacchati, idaṃ mohasamuṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:766: Sabbapāpo ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamaṃ sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti pucchitabbattā tattha lobho asubhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –
tika-s0501t:767_0: “Ettāvatā ‘sabbapāpassa akaraṇa’nti ettha pāpaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa akaraṇaṃ dassento
tika-s0501t:767_1: ‘lobho…pe… paññāyā’ti tīhi kusalamūlehi tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ pahānavasena sabbapāpassa
tika-s0501t:768_0: Vuttaṃ. Subhādhimuttavasena pavatto lobho asubhāya asubhabhāvanāya tathāpavattena
tika-s0501t:768_1: alobhena tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānena pahīyati, sattesu kujjhanadussanavasena pavatto
tika-s0501t:768_2: doso mettāya mettābhāvanāya tathāpavattena adosena ca tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānena
tika-s0501t:768_3: pahīyati, sattesu ceva saṅkhāresu ca muyhanavasena pavatto moho paññāya vicāraṇapaññāya
tika-s0501t:769_0: “Yadi tīhi kusalamūleheva akusalamūlāni pahīyanti, evaṃ sati upekkhākaruṇāmuditā
tika-s0501t:769_1: niratthakā bhaveyyu”nti vattabbattā “tathā lobho upekkhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upekkhāyāti
tika-s0501t:769_2: “sabbe sattā kammassakā”tiādinā bhāvitāya upekkhāya. Muditā aratiṃ vūpasametvā aratiyā
tika-s0501t:769_3: mūlabhūtaṃ mohampi pajahatīti manasi katvā “moho muditāya pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatī”ti
tika-s0501t:769_4: vuttaṃ. “Akusalamūlānaṃ kusalamūlādīhi pahātabbattaṃ kena amhehi saddahitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:769_5: vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena tathā pahātabbattena bhagavā “sabbapāpassa
tika-s0501t:769_6: akaraṇa”nti vacanaṃ āha, tena “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti vacanena tathā pahātabbattaṃ
tika-s0501t:770_0: 31. “Ettāvatā ca sabbapāpo vibhatto, tassa akaraṇañca vibhattaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati aṭṭhamicchattānaṃ
tika-s0501t:770_1: akaraṇaṃ anivāritaṃ siyā”ti vattabbattā “sabbapāpaṃ nāma aṭṭha micchattānī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:771_0: Sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ bahudhā ācariyena vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca viññātaṃ, “kathaṃ kusalassa
tika-s0501t:771_1: sampadā vibhajitabbā viññātabbā”ti vattabbattā kusalassa sampadaṃ vibhajitvā dassento
tika-s0501t:771_2: “aṭṭhasu micchattesu pahīnesū”tiādimāha. Aṭṭha sammattānīti sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo
tika-s0501t:771_3: sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhīti aṭṭhasammattāni
tika-s0501t:771_5: desitassa. Vipassino hi bhagavato ayaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā. Citte pariyodāpiteti
tika-s0501t:771_7: khandhānaṃ pariyodāpitabhāvo kathaṃ amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “evañhī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:771_8: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vuttappakārena bhagavā yaṃ “cetovisuddhatthaṃ bhikkhave tathāgate brahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0501t:771_9: vussatī”ti vacanaṃ āha, tena “ceto…pe… vussatī”ti vacanena tumhehi saddahitabboti
tika-s0501t:771_10: vuttaṃ hoti. “Pariyodāpanā katividhā bhavantī”ti vattabbattā “duvidhā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:771_12: pariyodāpanassa duvidhattā pañcakkhandhā pariyodāpitā bhavantīti attho. Pahīnanīvaraṇānusayā
tika-s0501t:772_1: vuttaṃ. “‘Sabbapāpassa akaraṇa’ntiādigāthāya desitesu dhammesu katamaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:772_2: katamaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, katamaṃ maggasaccaṃ, katamaṃ nirodhasacca”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:772_3: “tattha yaṃ paṭivedhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti gāthāya desitesu dhammesu yaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
tika-s0501t:772_4: paṭivedhena pariññābhisamayena pariyodāpeti, idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:772_5: bhave. Yato taṇhāsaṃkilesato khandhapañcakaṃ pariyodāpeti, ayaṃ taṇhāsaṃkileso samudayo
tika-s0501t:772_6: samudayasaccaṃ. Yena ariyamaggaṅgena pariyodāpeti, ayaṃ ariyamaggo maggasaccaṃ. Yaṃ
tika-s0501t:772_7: asaṅkhatadhātuṃ adhigatena puggalena pariyodāpitaṃ, ayaṃ asaṅkhatadhātudhammo nirodho
tika-s0501t:772_8: nirodhasaccaṃ bhave. Imāni cattāri saccāni gāthāya desitadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena
tika-s0501t:773: “Sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādigāthāya desitānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena cattāri saccāni ācariyena niddhāritāni, amhehi ca viññātāni.
tika-s0501t:774: “‘Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, chattaṃ mahantaṃ yatha vassakāle;
tika-s0501t:775: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī’ti –
tika-s0501t:776_0: Gāthāya desitānaṃ dhammānaṃ visabhāgasabhāgadhammānaṃ āvaṭṭanavasena kathaṃ cattāri
tika-s0501t:776_1: saccāni niddhāritānī”ti vattabbattā “dhammo have”tiādimāha. Tāya gāthāya desite dhamme
tika-s0501t:776_2: vibhajitvā dassento “dhammo nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha dhammo nāmāti puññadhammo nāma.
tika-s0501t:776_3: Indriyasaṃvaroti manacchaṭṭhindriyasaṃvarasīlādiko sabbo saṃvaro. Tena vuttaṃ –“indriyasaṃvarasīsena
tika-s0501t:776_4: cettha sabbampi sīlaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabba”nti. Cattāro apāyā dukkaṭakammakārīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:777_0: “Tasmiṃ duvidhe dhamme indriyasaṃvaradhammo kattha ṭhito, kathaṃ suciṇṇo, kuto rakkhatī”ti
tika-s0501t:777_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha yā saṃvarasīle”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ duvidhe dhamme.
tika-s0501t:777_2: Saṃvarasīle ṭhitā yā akhaṇḍakāritā hoti, ayaṃ akhaṇḍavasena kātabbo saṃvarasīle ṭhito
tika-s0501t:777_3: suṭṭhu āciṇṇapariciṇṇo puññadhammo catūhi apāyehi attano ādhāraṃ attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ
tika-s0501t:777_4: puggalaṃ ekantikabhāvena rakkhati, anekantikabhāvena pana rakkhitamatto puññadhammopi
tika-s0501t:777_5: rakkhatīti attho gahetabbo. Apāyehīti ca padhānavasena vuttaṃ, rogādiantarāyatopi
tika-s0501t:777_6: rakkhati. Rogādiantarāyo vā ayato apagatattā apāyantogadhoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:778_0: “Tathā rakkhatīti kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:778_1: Evaṃ vuttappakārena lakkhaṇapakāradassanaṃ bhagavā “dvemā, bhikkhave, sīlavato gatiyo
tika-s0501t:778_2: devā ca manussā cā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena “dvemā…pe… manussā cā”ti vacanena tumhehi
tika-s0501t:778_3: saddahitabboti vuttaṃ hoti. “Saṃvarasīle ṭhitassa akhaṇḍakātabbassa suciṇṇassa puññadhammassa
tika-s0501t:778_4: apāyehi rakkhaṇe ekantikabhāvo kena suttena dīpetabbo”ti vattabbattā “evañca nāḷandāya”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:778_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha evañcāti iminā idāni vuccamānena pakārenapi vuttappakāro attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:778_6: Nāḷandāyanti nāḷandanāmake nigame nisinno asibandhakanāmassa putto gāmaṇi gāmajeṭṭhako
tika-s0501t:779: Brāhmaṇāti bāhirakā brāhmaṇā. Bhanteti bhagavantaṃ gāmaṇi ālapati. Pacchābhūmakāti pacchimadisāya nisinnakā. Uyyāpentīti manussalokato uddhaṃ devalokaṃ yāpenti pāpenti.
tika-s0501t:780: Idhassāti idhaloke assa bhaveyya. Puriso pāṇātipātī…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko assa bhaveyyāti yojanā. Sesaṃ pāḷito ceva vuttānusārena ca ñeyyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:781: 32. “Visabhāgadhammasabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanavasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ niddhāritabhāvo kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāha mahākaccāno ekamhi padaṭṭhāne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:782_0: “Ettāvatā ca āvaṭṭo hāro paripuṇṇo, añño niyutto natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyutto āvaṭṭo
tika-s0501t:782_1: hāro”ti vuttaṃ. Yassaṃ yassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ yo yo āvaṭṭo hāro yathālābhavasena yojito,
tika-s0501t:782_2: tassaṃ tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ so so āvaṭṭo hāro tathā niddhāretvā yutto yojitoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:785: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusāreneva gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:787_0: 33. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena āvaṭṭahāravibhaṅgena āvaṭṭetabbā padaṭṭhānādayo
tika-s0501t:787_1: vibhattā, so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto āvaṭṭahāravibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo, “tattha katamo vibhattihāravibhaṅgo”ti
tika-s0501t:787_2: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo vibhattihāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu niddiṭṭhesu
tika-s0501t:787_3: soḷasasu desanāhārādīsu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vibhattihāro vibhattihāravibhaṅgo
tika-s0501t:787_4: nāmāti pucchati. “Dhammañca padaṭṭhānaṃ bhūmiñcā”tiādiniddesassa idāni mayā vuccamāno
tika-s0501t:788_0: “Yesu suttesu vuttā dhammapadaṭṭhānabhūmiyo iminā vibhattihārena vibhattā, tāni suttāni
tika-s0501t:788_1: kittakānī”ti pucchitabbattā tāni suttāni paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “dve suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:788_2: nibbedhabhāgiyañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vāsanābhāgiyanti puññabhāvanā vāsanā nāma, vāsanāya
tika-s0501t:788_3: bhāgo koṭṭhāso vāsanābhāgo, vāsanābhāge vācakabhāvena niyuttaṃ suttanti vāsanābhāgiyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:788_4: katamaṃ taṃ? Yasmiṃ sutte tīṇi puññakiriyavatthūni bhagavatā desitāni, taṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:788_5: vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. Nibbedhabhāgiyanti lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ nibbijjhanaṃ padālanaṃ nibbedho,
tika-s0501t:788_6: nibbedhassa bhāgo koṭṭhāso nibbedhabhāgo, nibbedhabhāge vācakabhāvena niyuttaṃ suttanti
tika-s0501t:788_7: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ, katamaṃ taṃ? Yasmiṃ sutte sekkhāsekkhadhammā bhagavatā desitā,
tika-s0501t:789_0: “Tesaṃ suttānaṃ paṭiggāhakā puggalā yāhi paṭipadāhi sampajjanti, tā paṭipadā kittikā”ti
tika-s0501t:789_1: pucchitabbattā “dve paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dānasīlabhāvanāmayapuññabhāge bhavā paṭipadāti
tika-s0501t:789_2: puññabhāgiyā. Phalabhāge bhavā paṭipadāti phalabhāgiyā. “Yesu sīlesu ṭhitā paṭiggāhakā
tika-s0501t:789_3: paṭipajjanti, tāni sīlāni kittakānī”ti pucchitabbattā “dve sīlānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Saṃvarati
tika-s0501t:789_4: etena saṃvarenāti saṃvaro, so saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro,
tika-s0501t:789_5: khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho. Sabbopi pāpasaṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, lokiyalokuttarasampattiṭṭhānattā
tika-s0501t:789_6: sīlaṃ nāma. Pajahati etena pahātabbeti pahānaṃ, pajahanaṃ vā pahānaṃ, tañca pahānaṃ
tika-s0501t:789_8: nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha nissaraṇappahānaṃ vajjetvā catubbidhaṃ pahānaṃ
tika-s0501t:790_0: “Tesu suttādīsu bhagavā katamaṃ suttaṃ katamāya paṭipadāya desayati, katarasmiṃ sīle
tika-s0501t:790_1: ṭhito puggalo katamena sīlena brahmacārī bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā tathā vibhajitvā
tika-s0501t:790_2: dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu vāsanābhāgiyādīsu suttesu vāsanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:790_3: suttaṃ tattha tāsu puññabhāgiyādipaṭipadāsu puññabhāgiyāya paṭipadāya bhagavā yassa
tika-s0501t:790_4: puggalassa desayati, so vāsanābhāgiyasuttapaṭiggāhako puggalo tattha saṃvarasīlādīsu
tika-s0501t:790_5: saṃvarasīle ṭhito hutvā tena saṃvarasīlasaṅkhātena brahmacariyena seṭṭhacariyena
tika-s0501t:790_6: brahmacārī seṭṭhācārapūrako bhavati. Tattha tesu vāsanābhāgiyādīsu suttesu nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:790_7: suttaṃ tattha tāsu puññabhāgiyādipaṭipadāsu phalabhāgiyāya paṭipadāya yassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:790_8: bhagavā desayati, so nibbedhabhāgiyasuttapaṭiggāhako puggalo tattha saṃvarasīlādīsu
tika-s0501t:790_9: pahānasīle samucchedappassaddhippahānavasena ṭhito hutvā tena pahānasīlasaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:790_10: visesabhūtena maggasaṅkhātena brahmacariyena brahmacārī bhavatīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:791_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu vāsanābhāgiyasuttādīsu. Dānakathāti sappurisadānadānaphalaasappurisadānadānaphalakathā.
tika-s0501t:791_3: sagge nibbattāpakapuññakathā ca. Ādīnavoti ādīnavadassako suttanto. Ānisaṃsoti ānisaṃsadassako
tika-s0501t:792_0: “Tattha katama”ntiādīsu anusandhyattho vuttanayova. Yā desanā catusaccappakāsanā,
tika-s0501t:792_1: sā desanā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Evañca sati vāsanābhāgiyasuttassapi
tika-s0501t:792_2: nibbedhabhāgiyasuttabhāvo āpajjeyya catusaccappakāsanatoti codanaṃ manasi katvā “vāsanābhāgiye
tika-s0501t:792_3: sutte”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vāsanābhāgiye sutte pajānanā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā ariyamaggapadaṭṭhānabhūtā
tika-s0501t:792_4: paññā natthi, maggo ariyamaggo natthi, phalaṃ ariyaphalaṃ natthi. Nibbedhabhāgiye
tika-s0501t:792_5: sutte pana pajānanādayo atthi, vāsanābhāgiye sutte natthi. “Pajānanā”tiādinā catusaccappakāsanā
tika-s0501t:792_6: dānakathādikā nibbedhabhāgiye sutte antogadhā, itaraṃyeva vāsanābhāgiyasuttanti nāmāti
tika-s0501t:792_7: dasseti. Yesu suttesu vuttā dhammapadaṭṭhānabhūmiyo vibhattā, tāni suttāni dveyeva
tika-s0501t:792_8: na honti, kasmā “dveyeva suttāni niddhāritānī”ti ce vadeyyuṃ? Asaṅkarato sutte vuttānaṃ
tika-s0501t:792_10: niddhāritāni asaṅkarattā”ti ce vadeyyuṃ? No niddhāritāni, vāsanābhāgiyasutte niddhārite
tika-s0501t:792_12: nibbedhabhāgiyasutte ca niddhārite asekkhabhāgiyasuttampi niddhāritaṃ anaññattā.
tika-s0501t:793_0: “Yesu suttesu vuttā dhammapadaṭṭhānabhūmiyo vibhattihārena vibhattā, tāni suttāni
tika-s0501t:793_1: katamena phalena yojayitabbānī”ti pucchitabbattā “imāni cattāri suttānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:793_2: Tattha imāni cattāri suttānīti yathāniddhāritāni vāsanābhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyasuttāni
tika-s0501t:793_3: ceva taṃniddhāraṇena niddhāritāni saṃkilesabhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyasuttāni cāti cattāri
tika-s0501t:793_4: suttāni imesaṃyeva catunnaṃ suttānaṃ desanāya nayena nītena phalena sabbato sabbabhāgena
tika-s0501t:793_5: saṃvarasīlappahānasīlena brahmacariyena yojayitabbāni. Yojentena ca sabbato sabbabhāgena
tika-s0501t:793_6: ca padādivicayena hārena saṃvarasīlādikaṃ phalaṃ vicinitvā yuttihārena yuttaṃ phalaṃ
tika-s0501t:793_7: gavesitvā “idaṃ phalaṃ imassa puggalassa phalaṃ, idaṃ phalaṃ imassa suttassa phala”nti
tika-s0501t:793_8: suttāni visuṃ visuṃ phalena yojayitabbānīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:794_1: bhūmī”ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavatā desitena vāsanābhāgiyasuttena siddhā yāvatikā puññabhāgiyā
tika-s0501t:794_2: paṭipadādayo vibhajanañāṇassa bhūmi ārammaṇā bhavitumarahanti, tāvatikāhi bhūmīhi
tika-s0501t:794_3: vāsanābhāgiyasuttaṃ yojayitabbaṃ. Nibbedhabhāgiyasuttena siddhā yāvatikā phalabhāgiyā
tika-s0501t:794_4: paṭipadādayo vibhajanañāṇassa bhūmi ārammaṇā bhavitumarahanti, tāvatikāhi bhūmīhi
tika-s0501t:794_5: nibbedhabhāgiyasuttaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Itaradvayampi suttaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:794_6: Etena ñāṇassa bhūmīnaṃ suttatthānaṃ bahuvidhattaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0501t:795_1: vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “kathaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaasekkhābhāgiyabhāvehi asādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhāvehi
tika-s0501t:795_2: vibhajitabbā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katame dhammā sādhāraṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāya pana –
