tika-s0501t:961_0: “Vuttappakāro hetupaccayo parikkhāro nāmāti kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:961_1: “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena kāraṇabhūtena sabbassa hetupaccayassa parikkhārabhāvena
tika-s0501t:961_2: āyasmā mahākaccāno “ye dhammā yaṃ dhammaṃ janayantī”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena
tika-s0501t:961_3: saddahitabbo, “ye dhammā yaṃ dhammaṃ janayantī”ti vacanaṃ nissāya tumhehi sallakkhetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:962: “Ettakova parikkhāro hāro yuñjitabbo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto parikkhāro hāro”ti vuttaṃ, yo yo parikkhāro hāro yuñjitabbo, so so parikkhāro hāro nīharitvā yutto yuñjitabboti.
tika-s0501t:965: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:967_0: 50. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena parikkhārahāravibhaṅgena suttatthānaṃ hetupaccayo
tika-s0501t:967_1: vibhatto, so…pe… vibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo, “katamo samāropanahāravibhaṅgo”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:967_2: “tattha katamo samāropano hāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu niddiṭṭhesu soḷasasu desanāhārādīsu
tika-s0501t:967_3: katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso samāropano hāro samāropanahāravibhaṅgo nāmāti pucchati. “Ye
tika-s0501t:967_4: dhammā yaṃmūlā”tiādiniddesassa idāni mayā vuccamāno “ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne yattakāni
tika-s0501t:968_0: “Kittake padaṭṭhāne sutte vutte kittakāni padaṭṭhānāni samāropayitabbānī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:968_1: “ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne sutte vutte sati avuttāni yattakāni
tika-s0501t:968_2: padaṭṭhānāni otaranti samosaranti, sabbāni tāni avuttāni padaṭṭhānāni sutte vuttāni
tika-s0501t:968_3: viya niddhāraṇavasena ānetvā desanāya āropayitabbāni. “Kāni viya samāropayitabbānī”ti
tika-s0501t:968_4: vattabbattā “yathā āvaṭṭe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āvaṭṭe hāre ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne sutte vutte
tika-s0501t:968_5: sati sutte avuttāni bahukāni padaṭṭhānāni otaranti, tāni bahukāni padaṭṭhānāni pariyesitabbāni
tika-s0501t:968_6: yathā, evaṃ samāropane hārepi bahukāni padaṭṭhānāni desanāya samāropayitabbānīti attho.
tika-s0501t:969_0: “Kevalaṃ pana padaṭṭhānavaseneva samāropanā kātabbā kiṃ, udāhu aññavasenāpi samāropanā
tika-s0501t:969_1: kātabbā ki”nti vattabbattā aññavasenāpi samāropanā kātabbā; tasmā samāropanā catubbidhā
tika-s0501t:969_2: kātabbāti dassento “tattha samāropanā catubbidhā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti tāsu
tika-s0501t:969_4: bhāvanā bhāvanāsamāropanā, pahānaṃ pahānasamāropanā, iti iminā pabhedena samāropanā catubbidhā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:970_0: “Tāsu catubbidhāsu samāropanāsu katamā padaṭṭhānasamāropanā”ti pucchitabbattā tathā
tika-s0501t:970_1: pucchitvā padaṭṭhānasamāropanaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha katamā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sutte vuttena
tika-s0501t:970_2: padaṭṭhānena sutte avuttānaṃ padaṭṭhānānaṃ samāropanā katamāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:971_0: Sabbapāpassa akusalassa yaṃ akaraṇaṃ akaraṇahetu sāsanaṃ atthi, etaṃ sāsanaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:971_1: sāsanaṃ ovādo hoti, atha vā akaraṇaṃ akaraṇatthāya yaṃ sāsanaṃ atthi, etaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:971_2: sāsanaṃ ovādo hoti, na yassa kassaci sāsananti attho. Akaraṇanti hi sampadānatthe
tika-s0501t:971_3: pavattaṃ paccattavacanaṃ yathā “kissa atthāya kimattha”nti. Kusalassa sampadā sampadāya
tika-s0501t:971_4: yaṃ sāsanaṃ atthi, etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ. Sacittapariyodāpanaṃ sacittapariyodāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:971_5: yaṃ sāsanaṃ atthi, etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:972_0: Iti evaṃpakārena vuttassa tassa sāsanassa kiṃ padaṭṭhānanti visesassa visesapadaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:972_1: puna pucchati. Idaṃ sucaritattayaṃ sāsanassa ovādassa padaṭṭhānaṃ sucaritattayena
tika-s0501t:972_2: hetunā sāsanattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā “annena vasatī”tiādi. “Sucaritattaye padaṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:972_3: vutte katamaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ samāropayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha yaṃ kāyikañcā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:972_4: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ khandhattayaṃ sāsanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ samāropayitabbaṃ, “khandhattaye
tika-s0501t:972_5: padaṭṭhāne samāropayite katamaṃ samāropayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha sīlakkhandho
tika-s0501t:972_6: cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ samathavipassanādvayaṃ sāsanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ samāropayitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:972_8: pucchitabbattā “tattha samathassa phala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ phaladvayaṃ sāsanassa
tika-s0501t:973_0: Sāsanassa padaṭṭhānāni samāropayitabbānīti ācariyena niddhāretvā vibhattāni, amhehi
tika-s0501t:973_1: ca ñātāni, “idāni katamassa katamaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ samāropayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:973_2: “vanaṃ vanathassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ kāmaguṇapañcakaṃ vanaṃ taṇhābhūtassa vanathassa
tika-s0501t:973_4: idaṃ vanaṃ “aho cakkhu, aho sotaṃ, aho ghānaṃ, aho jivhā, aho kāyo”ti tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0501t:973_6: Apariññātaṃ dvādasāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ idaṃ vanaṃ saṃyojanasaṅkhātassa vanathassa padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:973_7: samāropayitabbaṃ, āyatanaṃ paṭicca saṃyojanuppajjanato anusayasaṅkhātaṃ idaṃ vanaṃ
tika-s0501t:973_9: vanabhāvo ca taṇhādīnaṃ vanathabhāvo ca kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāha
tika-s0501t:973_10: bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena pañcakāmaguṇādīnaṃ vanabhāvena ca taṇhādīnaṃ vanathabhāvena
tika-s0501t:973_11: ca bhagavā “chetvā vanañca vanathañcā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena bhagavato vacanena
tika-s0501t:973_12: vacanānusārena saddahitabboti. Ayanti ayaṃ “ekasmiṃ padaṭṭhāne”tiādisaṃvaṇṇanā. Padaṭṭhānenāti
tika-s0501t:973_13: ekekena padaṭṭhānena. Samāropanāti tadaññapadaṭṭhānānaṃ samāropanā. Samāropenti samāropayitabbāni
tika-s0501t:974_0: 51. Padaṭṭhānena samāropanā ācariyena niddiṭṭhā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamā vevacanena
tika-s0501t:974_1: samāropanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamā vevacanenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tāsu
tika-s0501t:974_2: catūsu padaṭṭhānasamāropanādīsu samāropanāsu vevacanena ekekena rotadaññavevacanānaṃ
tika-s0501t:974_4: ca idaṃ vacanattayaṃ anāgāmiphalatthattā anāgāmiphalassa vevacanaṃ. “Avijjāvirāgā”ti
tika-s0501t:974_5: ca “paññāvimuttī”ti ca “asekkhaphala”nti ca idaṃ vacanattayaṃ arahattaphalatthattā
tika-s0501t:974_6: arahattaphalassa vevacanaṃ. Iminā nayena sesesu yojanā kātabbā. (2)
tika-s0501t:975_0: Vevacanena samāropanā ācariyena niddiṭṭhā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamā bhāvanāya samāropanā”ti
tika-s0501t:975_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamā bhāvanāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tāsu catūsu padaṭṭhānasamāropanādīsu
tika-s0501t:975_2: katamāya desitāya bhāvanāya katamesānaṃ adesitānaṃ bhāvanāropanā katamāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:975_3: Yathā yena pakārena yaṃ bhāvanaṃ bhagavā “tasmātiha, tvaṃ bhikkhu, kāye kāyānupassī
tika-s0501t:975_4: viharati, ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti āha, tathā tena
tika-s0501t:975_5: pakārena tāya bhāvanāya tadaññabhāvanāpi samāropayitabbāti attho.
tika-s0501t:976_1: “Ātāpī”ti vacanena vīriyindriyaṃ bhagavā āha. “Sampajāno”ti vacanena paññindriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:976_2: bhagavā āha. “Satimā”ti vacanena satindriyaṃ āha. “Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti
tika-s0501t:976_3: vacanena samādhindriyaṃ āha. “Evaṃ vutte katamā bhāvanā samāropayitabbā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:976_4: “evaṃ kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-s0501t:976_5: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vuttāya vīriyindriyādibhāvanāya cattāro satipaṭṭhānā samāropayitabbāti
tika-s0501t:976_6: attho. Kena kāraṇena bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti pucchati. Catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ indriyabhāvena,
tika-s0501t:976_7: bhāvetabbabhāvena vā ekalakkhaṇattā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti vissajjeti. “Tesu
tika-s0501t:976_8: samāropitesu katame samāropayitabbā”ti pucchitabbattā “catūsū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catūsu
tika-s0501t:976_9: satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu samāropayitabbesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
tika-s0501t:976_10: gacchantīti samāropayitabbāti attho. Sesesupi evameva samāropayitabbā.
tika-s0501t:977_0: Bhāvanāya samāropanā ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamā pahānena samāropanā”ti
tika-s0501t:977_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tāsu catūsu padaṭṭhānasamāropanādīsu
tika-s0501t:977_2: katamena desitena pahānena katamesaṃ adesitānaṃ pahānānaṃ katamā samāropanāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:977_3: “Kāye kāyānupassī viharanto asubhe ‘subha’nti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”ti desitena “subha”nti
tika-s0501t:978_0: “Vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto dukkhe ‘sukha’nti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”ti desitena
tika-s0501t:979_0: “Citte cittānupassī viharanto anicce ‘nicca’nti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”ti desitena “nicca”nti
tika-s0501t:980_0: “Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharanto anattani ‘attā’ti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”ti desitena
tika-s0501t:981: Pahānahāro pana lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyevāti idha na vadāma.
tika-s0501t:982_0: “Sutte desitena ekekena padaṭṭhānādikena adesitānaṃ padaṭṭhānādīnaṃ samāropanabhāvo
tika-s0501t:982_1: kena amhehi vijānitabbo saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāha āyasmā”tiādimāha. Tena
tika-s0501t:983: “Ye dhammā yaṃmūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā;
tika-s0501t:985: Yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena vacanānusārena tathā samāropanabhāvo tumhehi vijānitabbo saddahitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:986_0: “Kiṃ pana ettāvatā samāropano hāro paripuṇṇo, añño niyutto natthī”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:986_1: “niyutto samāropano hāro”ti vuttaṃ. Sutte desitena nayena padaṭṭhānādikena adesitāni
tika-s0501t:986_2: padaṭṭhānāni samāropayitabbāni bhavanti, tena tena padaṭṭhānādikena adesitānaṃ padaṭṭhānādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:986_3: samāropano hāro niyutto niddhāretvā yuñjitabboti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:989: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:990: Ime yathāvuttā soḷasa saṃvaṇṇanāvisesā saṃvaṇṇetabbatthesu aññāṇasaṃsayānaṃ haraṇato apanayanato hārā nāmāti.
tika-s0501t:993: 52. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhāravibhaṅgādihāravibhaṅgena assādādayo nānāsuttatthā vibhattā, so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto desanāhāravibhaṅgādihāravibhaṅgo paripuṇṇo.
tika-s0501t:995: Saṅkhipiya aṅkusena hi, nayehi tīhi niddise sutta”nti. –
tika-s0501t:996_0: Gāthā niddesavāre ācariyena vuttā, tassā gāthāya niddeso hāravibhaṅgavārassa ādimhi
tika-s0501t:996_1: na vibhatto, “kuhiñci vibhatto, hārasampāte vā vibhatto kiṃ, udāhu nayasamuṭṭhānahāre
tika-s0501t:996_2: vā vibhatto ki”nti pucchitabbattā “hārasampāte vibhatto”ti tumhehi daṭṭhabboti viññāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:997_0: Atha vā suparikammakatabhūmisadisesu saṃvaṇṇetabbesu nānāsuttappadesesu nānāvaṇṇasugandhapupphasadise
tika-s0501t:997_1: soḷasa hāre saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena yojetvā soḷasa hārā ācariyena vibhattā, tathā susikkhitasippācariyasuvicāritajambunadābharaṇasadisesu
tika-s0501t:997_3: hāre saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena yojetvāva soḷasa hārā vibhattā, mahāpathaviṃ parivattetvā
tika-s0501t:997_4: pappaṭakojassa khādāpanaṃ atidukkaraṃ viya, nānāvidhesu saṃvaṇṇetabbesu suttappadesesu
tika-s0501t:997_5: paramatthojāya soḷasahi hārehi atidukkarakhādāpanasadisaṃ viññāpanaṃ karontena ca
tika-s0501t:997_6: yojanikamadhugaṇḍaṃ pīḷetvā sumadhurasassa pāyāpanaṃ atidukkaraṃ viya nānāvidhesu
tika-s0501t:997_7: saṃvaṇṇetabbesu suttappadesesu paramatthamadhurasassa soḷasahi hārehi atidukkaraṃ
tika-s0501t:997_8: pāyāpanasadisaṃ viññāpanaṃ karontena ca ācariyena anekesu saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttappadesesu
tika-s0501t:997_9: soḷasa hāre saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena yojetvā soḷasa hārā vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “nānāvidhasuttappadesesu
tika-s0501t:997_10: te saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena yojetvā soḷasa hārā vibhattā kiṃ, udāhu ekasmimpi saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttappadese
tika-s0501t:997_11: saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena yojetvā soḷasa hārā vibhattā ki”nti vattabbattā ekasmimpi saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttappadese
tika-s0501t:997_12: saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena yojetvā soḷasa hārā vibhattāyevāti tathā vibhajanto “soḷasa hārā
tika-s0501t:998_0: Nanu hārasampātavāraṃ kathetukāmena ācariyena “tattha katamo desanāhārasampāto”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:998_1: vattabbaṃ, atha kasmā “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”ntiādi vattabbanti ce? Niddese vuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:998_2: “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”ntiādikaṃ gāthaṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro nappayojeti vippakiṇṇavisayattā
tika-s0501t:998_3: ca nayavicārassa ca antaritattā. Hārasampātavāro pana taṃ gāthaṃ payojeti avikiṇṇavisayattā.
tika-s0501t:998_4: Tasmā taṃ gāthaṃ paccāmasitvā hārasampātavāre tassā gāthāya niddeso daṭṭhabboti viññāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:999_0: Evaṃ suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nānāvaṇṇāni muttapupphāni pakiranto viya, susikkhitasippācariyavicāritesu
tika-s0501t:999_2: viya, mahāpathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ khādāpento viya, yojanikamadhugaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0501t:999_3: pīḷetvā sumadhurasaṃ pāyento viya ca āyasmā mahākaccāno nānāsuttappadese udāharanto
tika-s0501t:999_4: soḷasa hāre vibhajitvā idāni te ekasmiṃyeva sutte yojetvā dassento hārasampātavāraṃ
tika-s0501t:1001: Saṅkhipiya aṅkusena hi, nayehi tīhi niddise sutta”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1002_0: Gāthā vuttā. Yasmā taṃ hāravibhaṅgavāro nappayojeti vippakiṇṇavisayattā, nayavicārassa
tika-s0501t:1002_1: ca antaritattā. Anekehi suttappadesehi hārānaṃ vibhāgadassanameva hi hāravibhaṅgavāro.
tika-s0501t:1002_2: Hārasampātavāro pana taṃ payojeti ekasmiṃyeva suttappadese soḷasa hāre yojetvāva
tika-s0501t:1002_3: tadanantaraṃ nayasamuṭṭhānassa kathitattā. Tasmā “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti gāthaṃ
tika-s0501t:1002_4: paccāmasitvā “tassā niddeso kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbo? Hārasampāteti āhā”ti –
tika-s0501t:1003_0: Vuttaṃ. Gāthāttho niddesavibhāvanāyaṃ vuttova. “Soḷasa…pe… sutta”nti yā gāthā niddese
tika-s0501t:1003_1: ācariyena vuttā, tassā gāthāya niddeso kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbo, hāravibhaṅgassa ādimhi ācariyena
tika-s0501t:1003_2: na vibhatto, hārasampāte vā paccāmasitvā vibhattoti daṭṭhabbo kiṃ, udāhu nayasamuṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:1003_3: vā paccāmasitvā vibhattoti daṭṭhabbo kinti pucchati. Hārasampāte paccāmasitvā vibhattoti
tika-s0501t:1004_0: Hārasampāte tassā gāthāya niddeso daṭṭhabboti ācariyena vutto, so hārasampāto desanāhārasampātabhedena
tika-s0501t:1004_1: soḷasavidho, “tattha katamo hārasampāto desanāhārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā imasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:1004_2: sutte saṃvaṇṇetabbe saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena mayā vibhajiyamāno hārasampātabhūto saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1004_3: desanāhārasampāto nāmāti tathā vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo desanāhārasampāto”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1004_4: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ soḷasavidhe desanāhārasampātādike hārasampāte. Katamo hārasampātabhūto
tika-s0501t:1007_1: desanāhārasampāto nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Gāthāttho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vibhatto. Yojanattho
tika-s0501t:1007_2: pana arakkhitena cittena arakkhitacittasamaṅgī puggalo mārassa maccuno vasaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0501t:1007_3: Micchādiṭṭhihatena vipallāsena vipallāsasamaṅgī puggalo mārassa vasaṃ gacchati. Thinamiddhābhibhūtena
tika-s0501t:1007_4: sasaṅkhārikacittena kusītacittena taṃcittasamaṅgī puggalo mārassa kilesādimārassa vasaṃ gacchatīti.
tika-s0501t:1008_0: “Arakkhitena cittenā’ti padena desitaṃ taṃ pamādadhammajātaṃ kassa pada”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1008_1: “taṃ maccuno pada”nti vuttaṃ. “Arakkhitena cittenā”ti iminā suttappadesena desito
tika-s0501t:1008_2: attho ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “micchādiṭṭhihatena cāti suttappadesena
tika-s0501t:1008_3: desito attho kathaṃ vibhatto”ti vattabbattā “micchādiṭṭhihatena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1008_4: Yena vipallāsena yadā anicce “nicca”nti passati, tadā pavatto so vipallāso “micchādiṭṭhihataṃ
tika-s0501t:1008_5: nāmā”ti vuccati. “So pana vipallāso kiṃlakkhaṇo”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā
tika-s0501t:1009_1: kāritatthasambhavato. Kiṃ vipallāso viparītaggāhalakkhaṇo? So vipallāso saññaṃ vipallāsayati,
tika-s0501t:1009_2: cittampi vipallāsayati, diṭṭhimpi vipallāsayati. Iti tayo dhamme vipallāsayatīti
tika-s0501t:1009_3: vipallāsetabbānaṃ tividhattā vipallāsāpi tividhā honti. Tesu saññāvipallāso muduko
tika-s0501t:1009_5: balavā subhādivasena upaṭṭhahantānaṃ rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ subhādivasena sanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1009_6: katvā gahaṇato. Diṭṭhivipallāso saññāvipallāsacittavipallāsehi balavataro, yaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1009_7: ārammaṇaṃ subhādiākārena upaṭṭhāti. Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ sassatādivasena abhinivisitvā
tika-s0501t:1009_8: gahaṇato. Tasmā saññāvipallāso paṭhamaṃ vutto, tadanantaraṃ cittavipallāso, tadanantaraṃ
tika-s0501t:1009_9: diṭṭhivipallāso vutto. Vitthārato pana ekekassa subhasukhaattaniccaggahaṇavasena
tika-s0501t:1010_0: Vipallāsā ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katame vipallāsapavattiṭṭhānavisayā”ti
tika-s0501t:1010_2: “so kuhiṃ vipallāsayati catūsu attabhāvavatthūsū”ti vuttaṃ. Catūsu rūpakāyavedanācittadhammasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0501t:1010_3: attabhāvavatthūsu so sabbo vipallāso saññācittadiṭṭhiyo vipallāsayati. “Kathaṃ samanupassantassa
tika-s0501t:1010_4: vipallāsayatī”ti pucchitabbattā “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yo puggalo
tika-s0501t:1010_5: rūpaṃ vā attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ vā attato samanupassati, attani
tika-s0501t:1010_6: rūpaṃ vā attato samanupassati. Rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ vā attato samanupassati, evaṃ tassa
tika-s0501t:1010_7: samanupassantassa puggalassa vipallāso rūpakāye saññācittadiṭṭhiyo vipallāsayati.
tika-s0501t:1011_0: “Tesu rūpakāyādīsu katamaṃ katamassa vipallāsassa vatthū”ti pucchitabbattā evaṃ pavattamānassa
tika-s0501t:1011_1: vipallāsassa idaṃ imassa vatthūti vibhajituṃ “tattha rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0501t:1011_2: tesu rūpādīsu catūsu paṭhamaṃ vipallāsavatthu rūpaṃ “asubhe subha”nti evaṃ pavattamānassa
tika-s0501t:1011_3: vipallāsassa vatthu hotīti vibhajitvā gahetabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Evaṃ “asubhe
tika-s0501t:1012_0: Idaṃ imassa vatthūti ācariyena vibhajitvā dassitā, amhehi ca ñātā, “tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1012_1: katame mūlakāraṇadhammā”ti pucchitabbattā “dve dhammā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cittassa saṃkilesā,
tika-s0501t:1012_2: taṇhā ca avijjā ca – ime dve dhammā vipallāsānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1013_0: “Ime dve dhammā ekato vipallāsānaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ kiṃ honti, udāhu visuṃ visu”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1013_1: visuṃ visuṃ vibhajituṃ “taṇhānivuta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Avijjārahitā taṇhā nāma natthi,
tika-s0501t:1013_2: tasmā “taṇhāavijjānivuta”nti vattabbanti? Na, taṇhāya sātisayapaccayattā. Sātisayāya
tika-s0501t:1013_3: hi taṇhāya asubhepi “subha”nti, dukkhepi “sukha”nti samanupassanti. “Taṇhā ca avijjā
tika-s0501t:1013_4: cā”ti vuttattā “avijjānivuta”nti vattabbaṃ, kasmā “diṭṭhinivuta”nti vuttanti? Avijjāya
tika-s0501t:1013_5: diṭṭhi bhavatīti diṭṭhisīsena avijjaṃ gahetvā “diṭṭhinivuta”nti vuttaṃ, avijjānivutanti
tika-s0501t:1013_6: attho gahetabbo. “Avijjānivuta”nti vutte pana diṭṭhirahitā avijjāpi gahitā siyā,
tika-s0501t:1013_7: diṭṭhisahitāya hi avijjāya aniccepi “nicca”nti, anattaniyepi “attā”ti samanupassanti.
tika-s0501t:1014_0: “Kathaṃ taṇhāmūlako vipallāso pavatto, kathaṃ diṭṭhisahitāvijjāmūlako vipallāso pavatto”ti
tika-s0501t:1014_1: vattabbattā “tattha yo diṭṭhivipallāso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu taṇhāmūlakadiṭṭhisahitāvijjāmūlakesu.
tika-s0501t:1014_2: Diṭṭhivipallāsoti diṭṭhisahitāvijjāmūlakavipallāso. Atītaṃ rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti
tika-s0501t:1014_3: adabbabhūtopi dabbabhūto viya vutto. Taṇhāvipallāsoti diṭṭhisahitataṇhāmūlako vipallāso
tika-s0501t:1014_5: pavattiviseso daṭṭhabbo. “Cittassa saṃkileso taṇhāavijjāyeva dve dhammā na honti,
tika-s0501t:1014_6: atha kho dasa kilesāpi, kasmā dveyeva vuttā”ti vattabbattā “dve dhammā cittassa upakkilesā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1014_7: vuttaṃ. Taṇhā ca avijjā ca – ime dveyeva dhammā paramasāvajjassa vipallāsassa mūlakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1014_8: Tāhi taṇhāavijjāhi visujjhantaṃ cittaṃ sabbehi kilesehi visujjhati, tasmā ca visesato
tika-s0501t:1014_9: cittassa upakkilesā hontīti dve dhammā vuttā. Na hi tāsu taṇhāavijjāsu arahattamaggena
tika-s0501t:1014_10: pahīnāsu koci saṃkileso appahīno nāma natthīti.
tika-s0501t:1015_0: “Vuttappakārā taṇhāavijjā vuttappakārānaṃ vipallāsānaṃyeva mūlakāraṇaṃ honti kiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1015_1: udāhu sakalassa vaṭṭassāpi mūlakāraṇaṃ honti ki”nti vattabbattā vuttappakārā taṇhāavijjā
tika-s0501t:1015_2: vuttappakārānaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ honti yathā, evaṃ sakalassa vaṭṭassāpi mūlakāraṇaṃ hontīti
tika-s0501t:1015_3: dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yesaṃ puggalānaṃ cittaṃ arakkhitaṃ, micchādiṭṭhihatañca
tika-s0501t:1015_4: hoti, tesaṃ puggalānaṃ. Yesaṃ avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ pubbakoṭi na paññāyati,
tika-s0501t:1015_5: tehi avijjānīvaraṇehi taṇhāsaṃyojanehi saṃsāre sandhāvantānaṃ saṃsarantānaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1015_6: sakiṃ nirayaṃ māravasagamanena sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ hoti, sakiṃ tiracchānayoniṃ
tika-s0501t:1015_7: sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ hoti, sakiṃ pettivisayaṃ sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ hoti, sakiṃ
tika-s0501t:1015_8: asurakāyaṃ sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ hoti, sakiṃ deve sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ hoti, sakiṃ
tika-s0501t:1016_0: “Micchādiṭṭhihatena cā”ti suttappadesena desito attho ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1016_1: ca ñāto, “thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti suttappadesena desito attho kathaṃ vibhatto”ti
tika-s0501t:1016_2: vattabbattā “thinamiddhābhibhūtenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cittassa viññāṇakkhandhassa yā akallatā
tika-s0501t:1016_3: akammaniyatā atthi, idaṃ akallattaṃ akammaniyattaṃ thinaṃ nāma. Yaṃ kāyassa līnattaṃ
tika-s0501t:1016_4: vedanādikkhandhattayalīnattaṃ atthi, idaṃ kāyassa līnattaṃ middhaṃ nāmāti thinamiddhasarūpameva
tika-s0501t:1016_5: vuttaṃ. Tehi thinamiddhehi cittassa abhibhūtabhāvādiko pana suviññeyyattā na vutto,
tika-s0501t:1016_6: avuttepi yesaṃ puggalānaṃ cittaṃ thinamiddhehi abhibhūtaṃ, tesaṃ puggalānaṃ tena
tika-s0501t:1016_7: cittena cittasīsena saṃyojanena saṃsāre māravasagamanena sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ pariyosānasabhāvo
tika-s0501t:1017_0: “Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti suttappadesena desito attho kathaṃ vibhatto”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1017_1: “vasaṃ mārassa gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kilesamārassāti kileso dānādipuññe māreti
tika-s0501t:1017_2: nivāretīti atthena māroti kilesamāro. Iminā kilesamāraṃ nissāya pavattattā abhisaṅkhāramārakhandhamāramaccumārā
tika-s0501t:1017_3: ca gahitā, ca-saddena vā gahitāti veditabbā. Sattamārassāti devaputtamārassa. Atha
tika-s0501t:1017_4: vā “devaputtamārassā”ti avatvā “sattamārassā”ti vuttattā yo yo rājacorādiko dānādīni
tika-s0501t:1017_5: vā issariyabhogādīni vā māreti, so so rājacorādikopi gahito, tasmā yassa kassaci
tika-s0501t:1017_6: sattamārassāti attho. Vasanti icchaṃ lobhaṃ adhippāyaṃ ruciṃ ākaṅkhaṃ āṇaṃ āṇattiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1017_7: Gacchatīti upagacchati upeti anuvattati anugacchati nātikkamatīti attho. “Kasmā vasaṃ
tika-s0501t:1017_8: gacchatī”ti vattabbattā “so hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yo satto arakkhitacittena ca micchādiṭṭhihatacittena
tika-s0501t:1017_9: ca thinamiddhābhibhūtacittena ca samannāgato hoti, so satto avijjānīvaraṇādīhi nivuto
tika-s0501t:1017_10: hutvā saṃsārābhimukho hi yasmā hoti, na visaṅkhārābhimukho, tasmā mārassa vasaṃ gacchatīti attho.
tika-s0501t:1018_1: suttena kittakāni saccāni desitānī”tivattabbattā “imāni bhagavatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Arakkhitenā”tiādisuttena
tika-s0501t:1018_2: bhagavatā imāni dve saccāni desitāni dukkhaṃ, samudayo cāti. Kathaṃ desitāni? Abhidhammanissitāya
tika-s0501t:1018_3: kathāya ceva suttantanissitāya kathāya ca desitāni. Tāsu kathāsu abhidhammanissitāya
tika-s0501t:1018_4: kathāya desite sati “arakkhitena cittenā”ti iminā padena arakkhitaṃ rattampi cittaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1018_5: arakkhitaṃ duṭṭhampi cittaṃ, arakkhitaṃ mūḷhampi cittaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ ñāpitaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1018_6: Tattha rattacittaṃ lobhasahagatacittuppādavasena aṭṭhavidhaṃ, duṭṭhacittaṃ paṭighasampayuttacittuppādavasena
tika-s0501t:1018_7: dubbidhaṃ, mūḷhacittaṃ momūhacittuppādavasena dubbidhanti veditabbaṃ. Imesañhi cittuppādānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1018_8: vasena yā cakkhundriyādīnaṃ agutti anārakkhā uppannā, tāya aguttiyā anārakkhāya cittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1019_0: “Micchādiṭṭhihatenā”ti iminā padena micchādiṭṭhisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ desitaṃ, taṃ diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādavasena
tika-s0501t:1019_1: catubbidhanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi micchādiṭṭhiyā saṃsaṭṭhabhāvena micchādiṭṭhivasānugatattā
tika-s0501t:1019_2: micchādiṭṭhihataṃ nāmāti. “Thinamiddhābhibhūtenā”ti iminā padena thinamiddhena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1019_3: cittaṃ desitaṃ, taṃ sasaṅkhārikacittuppādavasena pañcavidhanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0501t:1019_5: evaṃ ye dvādasākusalā cittuppādakaṇḍe “katame dhammā akusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ
tika-s0501t:1019_6: cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā vitthārato vattabbā, te dvādasākusalacittuppādā tīhi
tika-s0501t:1019_7: padehi bhagavatā desitāti veditabbā. “Mārassā”ti padena pañca mārā gahitā. Tesu kilesamāro
tika-s0501t:1019_8: “cattāro āsavā, cattāro oghā, cattāro yogā, cattāro ganthā, cattāri upādānāni, aṭṭha
tika-s0501t:1019_9: nīvaraṇā, dasa kilesā”ti desito. Abhisaṅkhāramāro pana “kusalā cetanā akusalā cetanā
tika-s0501t:1019_10: kusalaṃ kammaṃ akusalaṃ kamma”ntiādinā desito. Khandhamāro pana “attabhāvo pañcakkhandhā”tiādinā
tika-s0501t:1019_11: desito. Maccumāro pana “cuti cavanatā”tiādinā desito. Evaṃ tāvettha abhidhammanissitāya
tika-s0501t:1020_0: Suttantanissitāya pana kathāya desite sati “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti
tika-s0501t:1020_1: anubyañjanaggāhī, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā
tika-s0501t:1020_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati
tika-s0501t:1020_3: cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati…pe… sotindriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati…
tika-s0501t:1020_4: ghānindriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati… jivhindriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjati… kāyindriye na
tika-s0501t:1020_5: saṃvaraṃ āpajjati… manindriye na saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1020_6: chadvārikacittaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ chadvārikacittaṃ “arakkhitena cittenā”ti iminā padena
tika-s0501t:1020_7: desitaṃ. Yā micchādiṭṭhiyo pubbantakappanavasena vā aparantakappanavasena vā pubbantāparantakappanavasena
tika-s0501t:1020_8: vā micchā abhinivisantassa ayoniso ummujjantassa “sassato loko”ti vā “asassato loko”ti
tika-s0501t:1020_9: vā “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā uppannā, tāhi diṭṭhīhi vā, yā ca diṭṭhiyo
tika-s0501t:1020_11: vuttā, tāhi diṭṭhīhi vā sampayuttaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ “micchādiṭṭhihatena cā”ti iminā padena desitaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1021_0: “Thinaṃ nāma cittassa akammaññatā, middhaṃ nāma vedanādikkhandhattayassa akammaññatā”ti
tika-s0501t:1021_1: vā “thinaṃ anussāhasaṃsīdanaṃ, middhaṃ ussāhasattivighāto”ti vā yāni thinamiddhāni
tika-s0501t:1021_2: vuttāni, tehi thinamiddhehi yaṃ cittaṃ abhibhūtaṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ “thinamiddhābhibhūtenā”ti
tika-s0501t:1022_0: “Vaso nāma icchā lobho adhippāyo ruci ākaṅkhā āṇā āṇattī”ti yo vaso vutto, so vaso
tika-s0501t:1022_1: “vasa”nti iminā padena desito. “Pañca mārā – khandhamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro maccumāro
tika-s0501t:1022_2: devaputtamāro kilesamāro”ti yo māro vutto, so māro “mārassā”ti iminā desito. “Gacchati,
tika-s0501t:1022_3: upagacchati, upeti, anuvattati, anugacchati, nātikkamatī”ti yo puggalo vutto, so
tika-s0501t:1022_4: puggalo “gacchatī”ti iminā desitoti. Evaṃ desitesu dhammesu akusalā samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1022_5: “vasaṃ mārassa gacchatī”ti iminā padena ye pañcupādānakkhandhe upādāya paññatto puggalo
tika-s0501t:1022_6: vutto, te pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccanti dve saccāni desitāni. “Kimatthāya dve
tika-s0501t:1022_7: saccāni desitānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1022_8: pariññāya ca pahānāya ca “arakkhitenā”tiādi dhammaṃ bhagavā deseti, tāni dve saccāni
tika-s0501t:1023_0: “Tesu dvīsu saccesu kassa saccassa pariññāya, kassa saccassa pahānāya desetī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1023_1: “dukkhassa pariññāya, samudayassa pahānāyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Pariññāpahānehi katamāni saccāni
tika-s0501t:1023_2: desitānī”ti vattabbattā “yena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yena arahattamaggena parijānāti, yena
tika-s0501t:1023_3: arahattamaggena pajahati ca, ayaṃ arahattamaggo maggasaccaṃ nāma. Yaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1023_4: ārabbha taṇhāya, avijjāya ca pahānaṃ jātaṃ, ayaṃ nibbānadhammo nirodho nirodhasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1023_5: nāmāti. Evaṃ cattāri saccāni bhagavatā desitāni.
tika-s0501t:1024_0: “Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ desitabhāvo kena viññātabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1024_1: Tesu catūsu saccesu samudayasaccena assādo gahito, dukkhasaccena ādīnavo gahito,
tika-s0501t:1024_3: jātaṃ, sabbagatipajahanaṃ phalanti gahitaṃ. Yena rakkhitacittatādikena sabbagatipajahanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1024_4: jātaṃ, so rakkhitacittatādiko upāyoti gahito, arakkhitacittatādikassa paṭisedhanamukhena
tika-s0501t:1024_5: rakkhitacittatādikassa niyojanaṃ bhagavato āṇattīti gahitanti desanāhārena nānāsuttesu
tika-s0501t:1024_6: dassitā assādādayo “arakkhitenā”tiādike ekasmiṃyeva sutte nīharitvā dassitā.
tika-s0501t:1025_0: “Assādādīnaṃ nīharitvā dassitabhāvo kena viññātabbo saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1025_1: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nānāsuttesu assādādayo nīharitvā dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1025_2: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhāravibhaṅgo nāma. Yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena ekasmiṃyeva
tika-s0501t:1025_3: sutte assādādayo nīharitvā dassitā, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhārasampāto nāmāti viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:1026_1: vuttaṃ. Ekekasmiṃyeva sutte assādādayo yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātena
tika-s0501t:1026_2: nīharitvā yathārahaṃ dassitā, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto desanāhārasampāto niyutto
tika-s0501t:1031_0: 53. Yena desanāhārasampātena assādādayo ācariyena vibhattā, amhehi ca ñātā, so desanāhārasampāto
tika-s0501t:1031_1: paripuṇṇo, “katamo vicayahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo vicayo hārasampāto”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1031_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1031_3: vicayahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati. Imesu dhammesu ayaṃ dhammo yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena
tika-s0501t:1031_4: vicayitabbo, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vicayahārasampāto nāmāti niyametvā vibhajituṃ “tattha
tika-s0501t:1032_0: “Evaṃ desanāhārasampātaṃ dassetvā idāni vicayahārasampātaṃ dassento yasmā desanāhārapadatthavicayo
tika-s0501t:1032_1: vicayahāro, tasmā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena niddhāritāya taṇhāya kusalādivibhāgapavicayamukhena
tika-s0501t:1033_0: Vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ “arakkhitena cittenā”tiādisuttatthe desanāhārasampātena
tika-s0501t:1033_1: saṃvaṇṇite akusaladhamme “taṇhā”ti niddhāritā sabbataṇhā. Kusalāpīti catubhūmake
tika-s0501t:1033_2: kusale uddissa pavattā taṇhāpi. Akusalāpīti akusaladhamme uddissa pavattā taṇhāpīti
tika-s0501t:1033_3: duvidhā hotīti vicayitabbā. Tena vuttaṃ ṭīkāyaṃ – “kusaladhammārammaṇāti kusaladhamme
tika-s0501t:1033_4: uddissa pavattamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na tesaṃ ārammaṇapaccayataṃ, idha ‘kusalā
tika-s0501t:1034_0: “Kusalā taṇhā kiṃgāminī, akusalā taṇhā kiṃ gāminī”ti pucchitabbattā “akusalā saṃsāragāminī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1034_1: vuttaṃ. Atha vā “katamo kusalākusalataṇhānaṃ viseso”ti pucchitabbattā “akusalā saṃsāragāminī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1034_2: vuttaṃ. “Taṇhā nāma saṃsāragāminī hotu, kathaṃ apacayagāminī”ti vattabbattā “pahānataṇhā”ti
tika-s0501t:1034_3: vuttaṃ, pahānassa hetubhūtā taṇhā pahānataṇhāti attho, pahātabbataṇhaṃ āgamma yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1034_4: pahānaṃ pavattetabbaṃ, tena pavattetabbena pahānena apacayaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1035_0: “Kiṃ pana taṇhāyeva kusalākusalāti dubbidhā, udāhu aññopi kusalākusalāti dubbidho”ti
tika-s0501t:1035_1: vattabbattā “mānopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Katamo māno kusalo, katamo māno akusalo”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1035_2: “yaṃ mānaṃ nissāya mānaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ māno kusalo. Yo pana māno dukkhaṃ nibbattayati,
tika-s0501t:1035_3: ayaṃ māno akusalo”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ mānaṃ…pe… kusaloti yaṃ mānaṃ nissāya upanissāya
tika-s0501t:1035_4: pahānaṃ pavattitaṃ, tena pahānena santāne uppajjanārahaṃ mānaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ upanissayapaccayabhūto
tika-s0501t:1035_5: māno phalūpacārena kusalo. Yo pana…pe… akusaloti yo pana māno parahiṃsanādivasena
tika-s0501t:1035_6: pavattamāno hutvā attano ca parassa ca dukkhaṃ nibbattayati, ayaṃ māno akusaloti
tika-s0501t:1036_0: “Saṃsārāpacayagāminīsu tāsu taṇhāsu katamā apacayagāminī taṇhā kusalā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1036_1: “kusalā”ti vuttāya taṇhāya sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yaṃ nekkhammasita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1036_2: Tatthāti tāsu saṃsārāpacayagāminīsu taṇhābhūtāsu kusalākusalāsu. Ayaṃ taṇhā kusalāti
tika-s0501t:1036_3: sambandho. “Ariyā puggalā santaṃ āyatanaṃ yaṃ ariyaphaladhammaṃ sacchikatvā upasampajja
tika-s0501t:1036_4: viharanti, taṃ āyatanaṃ ariyaphaladhammaṃ ahaṃ kudāssu sacchikatvā viharissa”nti
tika-s0501t:1036_5: patthayantassa tassa kulaputtassa tasmiṃ ariyaphale pihā uppajjati, pihāpaccayā yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1036_6: domanassaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ domanassaṃ “nekkhammasita”nti vuccati. Ayaṃ ariyaphale
tika-s0501t:1036_7: pihāsaṅkhātā taṇhā kusalā anavajjā anavajjaariyaphaladhammaṃ uddissa pavattattāti vicayitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1037_0: “Kathaṃ pavattā”ti vattabbattā “rāgavirāgā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yā rāgavirāgā cetovimutti
tika-s0501t:1037_1: pattabbā. Tadārammaṇā taṃ cetovimuttiṃ āgamma pavattā taṇhā kusalā anavajjā, yā avijjāvirāgā
tika-s0501t:1037_2: paññāvimutti pattabbā, tadārammaṇā taṃ paññāvimuttiṃ āgamma pavattā taṇhā kusalā
tika-s0501t:1037_3: anavajjāti vicayitabbā. Tāya paññāvimuttiyā vasena bhagavatā –
tika-s0501t:1041_0: Gāthāyaṃ “sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ, “tassā paññāvimuttiyā yo pavicayo
tika-s0501t:1041_1: kātabbo, katamo so pavicayo”ti pucchitabbattā “tassā ko pavicayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassā
tika-s0501t:1041_2: paññāvimuttiyā ko pavicayoti ce puccheyya “aṭṭha maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo
tika-s0501t:1041_3: sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhī”ti pavicayo
tika-s0501t:1041_4: veditabbo. “So pavicayo kattha daṭṭhabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so katthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1041_5: So paññāvimuttiyā pavicayo kattha kasmiṃ dhamme daṭṭhabboti pucchati. Catutthe jhāne
tika-s0501t:1041_6: pāramitāya ukkaṃsagatāya catutthajjhānabhāvanāya so pavicayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t:1042_0: “Catutthe jhāne pāramitāyā”ti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “catutthe hi jhāne”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1042_1: Yo so catutthajjhānalābhī puggalo catutthe jhāne parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1042_2: vigatūpakkilesaṃ mudu kammaniyaṃ ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ, iti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1042_3: bhāvayati, so catutthajjhānalābhī puggalo tattha catutthe jhāne aṭṭhavidhaṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1042_4: adhigacchati. Katamaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ? Cha abhiññā, dve ca visese vā adhigacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1042_5: Iddhividhādayo pañca, lokiyābhiññā ceva arahattamaggapaññā cāti cha abhiññā. Manomayiddhi
tika-s0501t:1042_6: ceva vipassanāñāṇañcāti dve ca visesā honti.
tika-s0501t:1043_0: “Taṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ kuto parisuddhaṃ…pe… kuto āneñjappatta”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1043_1: “taṃ cittaṃ yato parisuddha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ cittaṃ yato upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvato
tika-s0501t:1043_2: parisuddhaṃ, tato upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvato pariyodātaṃ hoti. Sukhādīnaṃ paccayaghātena
tika-s0501t:1043_3: yato vītarāgādianaṅgaṇabhāvato anaṅgaṇaṃ, tato vītarāgādianaṅgaṇabhāvato vigatūpakkilesaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1043_4: Yato subhāvitabhāvato mudu, tato subhāvitabhāvato kammaniyaṃ. Yato parisuddhādīsu
tika-s0501t:1043_5: ṭhitabhāvato ṭhitaṃ, tato parisuddhādīsu ṭhitabhāvato āneñjappattaṃ hotītipi yojanā
tika-s0501t:1043_6: yuttā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yugaḷato āgatattā. Saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāobhāsehi pariggahitabhāvato
tika-s0501t:1043_7: āneñjappattaṃ. Saddhāya hi pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe assaddhiye na iñjati na
tika-s0501t:1043_8: calati, vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe kosajje na iñjati, satiyā pariggahitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1043_9: cittaṃ paṭipakkhe pamāde na iñjati, samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe uddhacce
tika-s0501t:1043_10: na iñjati, paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhāya avijjāya na iñjati, obhāsagataṃ
tika-s0501t:1043_11: cittaṃ kilesandhakāre na iñjati. Iti imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1043_12: āneñjappattaṃ hoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā catutthajjhānacittaṃ channaṃ abhiññāñāṇānañca
tika-s0501t:1043_13: manomayiddhivipassanāñāṇānañca adhigamūpāyo hoti, tasmā so paññāvimuttiparicayo catutthajjhāne
tika-s0501t:1043_14: daṭṭhabboyevāti saṅkhepattho. Vitthārato pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tattha upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvenā”tiādinā
tika-s0501t:1043_15: vā “aparo nayo”tiādinā vā vuttoyevāti amhehi na vutto.
tika-s0501t:1044_0: “Yesaṃ rāgādiaṅgaṇānaṃ abhāvena anaṅgaṇaṃ, yesaṃ abhijjhādiupakkilesānaṃ abhāvena
tika-s0501t:1044_1: vigatūpakkilesaṃ, yāya cittassa ṭhitiyā abhāvena ṭhitaṃ, iñjanāya abhāvena āneñjappattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1044_2: te rāgādiaṅgaṇādayo katamāya pakkhā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha aṅgaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1044_3: Tatthāti tesu rāgādiaṅgaṇādīsu aṅgaṇā ca rāgādiaṅgaṇā ca upakkilesā abhijjhādiupakkilesā
tika-s0501t:1044_4: ca santi, tadubhayaṃ rāgādiaṅgaṇaabhijjhādiupakkilesadvayaṃ taṇhāpakkho rāgādiaṅgaṇānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1044_5: taṇhāsabhāvattā, abhijjhādiupakkilesānañca taṇhāya anulomattā. Yā iñjanā phandanā
tika-s0501t:1044_6: yā ca cittassa aṭṭhiti anavaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, ayaṃ iñjanā aṭṭhiti diṭṭhipakkho iñjanāya
tika-s0501t:1044_7: ca aṭṭhitiyā ca micchābhinivesahetubhāvatoti pavicayo kātabbo.
tika-s0501t:1045_3: somanassindriyaṃ iti cattārindriyāni catutthajjhāne nirujjhanti, tassa catutthajjhānalābhino
tika-s0501t:1045_4: upekkhindriyaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ bhavati, tasmāpi catutthajjhānacittaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-s0501t:1045_5: ñāṇānaṃ adhigamūpāyo hoti, so ca adhigamūpāyabhāvo ciṇṇavasībhāvasseva bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1045_6: kathaṃ catutthajjhānamattalābhino ciṇṇavasībhāvo siyā”ti vattabbattā so catutthajjhānalābhī
tika-s0501t:1045_7: catutthajjhāneyeva aṭṭhatvā arūpasamāpattiyopi evaṃ katvā nibbatteti bhāveti, tasmā
tika-s0501t:1045_8: ciṇṇavasībhāvo hotīti dassetuṃ “so uparimaṃ samāpatti”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1046_1: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ santato santatarato manasi karoti. Yathāvuttaṃ uparimaṃ
tika-s0501t:1046_2: samāpattiṃ santato manasi karoto tassa catutthajjhānalābhino yogāvacarassa catutthajjhāne
tika-s0501t:1046_3: saññā saññāpadhānā samāpatti oḷārikā viya hutvā saṇṭhahati, paṭighasaññā ca ukkaṇṭhā
tika-s0501t:1046_4: anabhirati hutvā saṇṭhahati, so yathāvuttena vidhinā manasi karonto yogāvacaro sabbaso
tika-s0501t:1046_5: niravasesato rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1046_6: amanasikārā “ākāsaṃ ananta”nti manasi katvā pavattamānaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0501t:1046_7: sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. Rūpasaññā rūpāvacarasaññā pañcavidhaabhiññābhinīhāro
tika-s0501t:1046_8: hoti. Nānattasaññā nānārammaṇesu vokāro akusalo pavattati. Evaṃ rūpāvacarajjhāne
tika-s0501t:1046_9: ādīnavadassī hutvā tā rūpasaññānānattasaññāyo ārammaṇe samatikkamati, assa yogāvacarassa
tika-s0501t:1046_10: paṭighasaññā ca abbhatthaṃ gacchati. Evaṃ iminā vuttanayena samatikkamena samāhitassa,
tika-s0501t:1046_11: santavuttinā arūpāvacarasamādhinā samāhitassa yogāvacarassa obhāso rūpāvacarajjhānobhāso
tika-s0501t:1046_12: antaradhāyati. Rūpānaṃ kasiṇarūpānaṃ jhānacakkhunā dassanañca antaradhāyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1047_0: “Yena samādhinā samāhitassa, samāhitassa obhāso ca rūpānaṃ dassanañca antaradhāyati,
tika-s0501t:1047_1: so samādhi kittakehi aṅgehi samannāgato, kathaṃ paccavekkhitabbo”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1047_2: “so samādhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. So samādhīti yena rūpārūpāvacarasamādhinā samāhito, so
tika-s0501t:1047_3: duvidhopi samādhi anabhijjhābyāpādavīriyārambhehi tīhi upakārakaṅgehi ca passaddhisatīhi
tika-s0501t:1047_4: dvīhi parikkhāraṅgehi ca avikkhittena ekena sabhāvaṅgena ca chahi aṅgehi samannāgatoti
tika-s0501t:1047_5: paccavekkhitabbo punappunaṃ cintetabbo sallakkhetabbo. “Kathaṃ kattha paccavekkhitabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:1047_6: pucchitabbattā “anabhijjhāsahagataṃ me mānasaṃ sabbaloke”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Tesu chasu
tika-s0501t:1047_7: aṅgesu kittako samatho, kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā ettako samatho, ettakā
tika-s0501t:1048_1: pubbabhāgapaṭipadā samādhimukhena ācariyena vibhattā, “tāya paṭipadāya labhitabbo
tika-s0501t:1048_2: arahattaphalasamādhi kittakena veditabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so samādhi pañcavidhena
tika-s0501t:1048_3: veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Yo arahattaphalasamādhi samathavipassanāpaṭipadāya labhitabbo,
tika-s0501t:1049_1: vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi appitappitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattisukhattā paccuppannasukho
tika-s0501t:1049_2: hoti, iti paccavekkhantassa assa arahato paccattameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1049_3: bhavati. Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi āyatiṃ samāpajjitabbassa arahattaphalasamādhissa
tika-s0501t:1049_4: upanissayapaccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko hoti, iti paccavekkhantassa…pe… bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1049_5: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi kilesaarīhi ārakattā ariyo, kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisalokāmisānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1049_6: abhāvato nirāmiso ca hoti, iti paccavekkhantassa…pe… bhavati. Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi
tika-s0501t:1049_8: hoti, iti paccavekkhantassa…pe… bhavati. Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi aṅgasantakilesadarathasantattā
tika-s0501t:1049_9: santo ceva divasampi samāpajjantassa atittikaraṇato paṇīto ca paṭippassaddhakilesena
tika-s0501t:1049_10: arahatā puggalena laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho ca arahattamaggasamādhisaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:1049_11: ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato ca sasaṅkhārena sapayogena adhigatattā,
tika-s0501t:1049_12: nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhamme niggayha anadhigatattā, aññe kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā,
tika-s0501t:1049_13: arahattamaggaphalabhāveneva pavattattā nasasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato hoti, iti paccavekkhantassa
tika-s0501t:1049_14: assa arahato paccattameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavatīti pañcavidhena ñāṇadassanena
tika-s0501t:1050_0: “Paccuppannasukhādīsu samādhīsu kittako samatho, kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1050_1: “tattha yo ca samādhi paccuppannasukho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samatho, vipassanāti ca arahattaphalasamathavipassanāva
tika-s0501t:1050_2: adhippetā, na pubbabhāgasamathavipassanāti. Arahattaphalasamādhi pañcavidhena veditabboti
tika-s0501t:1050_3: ācariyena vutto, “tassa arahattaphalasamādhissa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhi
tika-s0501t:1050_4: kittakena veditabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1050_5: Yo rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānasamādhi pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyaṃ vutto, so rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānasamādhi
tika-s0501t:1050_7: vuttaṃ. Paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā hoti. Paṭhamadutiyatatiyajjhānesu
tika-s0501t:1050_8: paññā sukhapharaṇatā hoti. Catutthajjhāne cetopariyapaññā cetopharaṇatā hoti. Dibbacakkhupaññā
tika-s0501t:1050_9: ālokapharaṇatā hoti. Jhānaṃ paccavekkhitvā pavattamānapaññā paccavekkhaṇānimittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1050_10: hoti. Iti pañcavidhena paññāpakārena vicayitvā veditabboti. “Tesu pañcavidhesu pakāresu
tika-s0501t:1050_11: kittako samatho, kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca pītipharaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1051_0: 55. Sampayogavasena samādhi ācariyena vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “kathaṃ ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0501t:1051_1: vibhatto”ti pucchitabbattā “dasa kasiṇāyatanānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Imehi dasahi ārammaṇehi
tika-s0501t:1051_2: kasiṇehipi samādhi vicinitvā veditabboti. “Tesu dasasu kittako samatho, kittakā vipassanā”ti
tika-s0501t:1051_3: pucchitabbattā “tattha yañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasiṇanti ca kasiṇamaṇḍalampi parikammampi
tika-s0501t:1051_4: paṭibhāganimittampi tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte uppannajjhānampi vuccati, idha pana sasampayuttajjhānameva adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1052_0: “Kiṃ pana vuttappakāro samādhiyeva samathavipassanāya yojetabbo, udāhu aññopi yojetabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:1052_2: vicayitvā yojetabboti dassetuṃ “evaṃ sabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha evanti mayā vuttanayena
tika-s0501t:1052_4: ariyo maggo yojetabbo. Kathaṃ? Yena yena anabhijjhādiākārena paccuppannasukhatādiākārena
tika-s0501t:1052_5: samādhi mayā vutto, tena tena anabhijjhādiākārena paccuppannasukhatādiākārena yo
tika-s0501t:1052_6: yo ariyamaggo samathena yojetuṃ sambhavati, so so ariyamaggo samathena vicayitvā
tika-s0501t:1052_7: yojayitabbo. Yo yo ariyamaggo vipassanāya yojetuṃ sambhavati, so so ariyamaggo vipassanāya
tika-s0501t:1053_0: “Yehi samathādhiṭṭhānehi vipassanādhammehi yojayitabbo, te samathādhiṭṭhānā vipassanādhammā
tika-s0501t:1053_1: katamehi dhammehi saṅgahitā”ti pucchitabbattā “te tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitā aniccatāya
tika-s0501t:1053_2: dukkhatāya anattatāyā”ti vuttaṃ, te samathādhiṭṭhānā vipassanādhammā “aniccatāya
tika-s0501t:1053_3: paññāya dukkhatāya paññāya anattatāya paññāyā”ti tīhi anupassanādhammehi saṅgahitā
tika-s0501t:1053_4: gaṇhitāti attho. Aniccatādinā sahacaraṇato anupassanāpaññāpi “aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1054: “Yo yogī puggalo samathādhiṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno hoti, so yogī puggalo kiṃ bhāvayatī”ti pucchitabbattā “so samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1055_0: Samathavipassanādīni bhāvayamāno puggalo rāgacarito dosacarito mohacaritoti tividho,
tika-s0501t:1055_1: “tattha katamo puggalo katamena katamena vimokkhamukhena niyyāti, katamāyaṃ katamāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1055_2: sikkhanto, katamaṃ katamaṃ pajahanto, katamaṃ katamaṃ anupagacchanto, katamaṃ katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1055_3: parijānanto, katamaṃ katamaṃ pavāhento, katamaṃ katamaṃ niddhunanto, katamaṃ katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1055_4: vamento, katamaṃ katamaṃ nibbāpento, katamaṃ katamaṃ uppāṭento, katamaṃ katamaṃ vijaṭento
tika-s0501t:1055_5: niyyātī”ti pucchitabbattā “rāgacarito puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idāni
tika-s0501t:1055_6: yesaṃ puggalānaṃ yattha sikkhantānaṃ visesato niyyānamukhāni, yesañca kilesānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtāni
tika-s0501t:1055_7: tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni, tehi saddhiṃ tāni dassetuṃ ‘rāgacarito’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1056_0: “Kasmā tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto tayo khandhe bhāvayatī”ti vattabbattā “tattha
tika-s0501t:1056_1: suññatavimokkhamukha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu tīsu vimokkhamukhesu. Suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1056_4: sīlapadhānattā. Iti tīhi vimokkhamukhehi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ saṅgahitattā tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni
tika-s0501t:1056_5: bhāvayanto so yogī puggalo tayo khandhe bhāvayatiyevāti paññāpadhānādibhāvo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1056_6: vutto. Tayo khandhe bhāvayanto ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayati. “Kasmā bhāvayatī”ti
tika-s0501t:1057_0: Tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ ariyaaṭṭhaṅgikamaggabhāvo vibhatto, amhehi ca jānito, “kathaṃ samathavipassanābhāvo
tika-s0501t:1057_1: jānitabbo”ti vattabbattā tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ samathavipassanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha
tika-s0501t:1057_2: sīlakkhandho cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Yo yogī puggalo samathavipassanaṃ bhāveti, tassa yogino
tika-s0501t:1057_3: puggalassa bhavaṅgāni katamaṃ bhāvanaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “yo samathavipassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1057_4: bhāveti, tassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāyo ca cittañca dve bhavaṅgāni upapattibhavassa aṅgāni
tika-s0501t:1057_5: bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ gacchanti. Sīlañca samādhi ca dve padāni dve pādā bhavanirodhagāminī
tika-s0501t:1058_0: “Kathaṃ gacchantī”ti vattabbattā “so hoti bhikkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhāvitakāyoti bhāvito
tika-s0501t:1058_1: kāyo kāyaābhisamācāriko, kāyasaṃvaro vā yena bhikkhunāti bhāvitakāyo. Sesesupi esa
tika-s0501t:1058_2: nayo. Kāye kāyaābhisamācārike, kāyasaṃvare vā bhāviyamāne sati sammākammanto, sammāvāyāmo
tika-s0501t:1058_3: ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti kāyasamācārasīlattā. Sīle vācāsaṃvaraājīvasaṃvaravasena
tika-s0501t:1058_4: pavatte sīle bhāviyamāne sati sammāvācā ca sammāājīvo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti
tika-s0501t:1058_5: vācādisaṃvarasīlattā. Citte cittasaṃvaravasena pavatte citte bhāviyamāne sati sammāsati
tika-s0501t:1058_6: ca sammāsamādhi ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti cittasaṃvarasīlattā. Paññāya bhāviyamānāya
tika-s0501t:1058_7: sati sammādiṭṭhi ca sammāsaṅkappo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti samānattā, upakārakattā
tika-s0501t:1058_8: ca. Sammāsaṅkappena hi punappunaṃ saṅkappantassa paññā vaḍḍhatīti.
tika-s0501t:1059_0: “Sammākammanto ca sammāvāyāmo ca dve dhammā kāyavaseneva vibhattā vicetabbā kiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1059_1: udāhu cittavasena vibhattā vicetabbā ki”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca sammākammanto”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1059_2: vuttaṃ. Kāyasucaritacetanābhūto yo ca sammākammanto, taṃsahito yo ca sammāvāyāmo
tika-s0501t:1059_3: siyā kāyiko, viratibhūto yo ca sammākammanto, taṃsahito yo ca sammāvāyāmo siyā cetasiko,
tika-s0501t:1059_4: tattha tesu kāyikacetasikabhūtesu sammākammantasammāvāyāmesu yo sammākammantasammāvāyāmo
tika-s0501t:1059_5: kāyasaṅgaho, so sammākammantasammāvāyāmo kāye kāyaābhisamācārike, kāyasaṃvare vā
tika-s0501t:1059_6: bhāvite sati bhāvanaṃ gacchati. Yo sammākammantasammāvāyāmo cittasaṅgaho, so sammākammantasammāvāyāmo
tika-s0501t:1059_7: citte cittasaṃvare bhāvite sati bhāvanaṃ gacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1060_0: “Samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayanto so yogī puggalo kittakaṃ adhigamaṃ gacchatī”ti vicayitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1060_1: “so samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayanto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcavidhaṃ ariyamaggādhigamaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:1060_2: “khippādhigamo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vibhatto. “Kena katamo adhigamo
tika-s0501t:1061_1: vicayito vibhatto, amhehi ca ñāto, “desakassa dasabalasamannāgatassa dasa balāni
tika-s0501t:1061_2: kathaṃ vicayitabbānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo desayati, so dasabalasamannāgato”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1062_1: vicayahārasampātaṃ niddisanto, desanākusalatāya anekehi suttappadesehi tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya
tika-s0501t:1062_2: bhāvanāvisesānaṃ bhāvanānisaṃsānañca vibhajanavasena nānappakārato vicayahāraṃ dassetvā,
tika-s0501t:1062_3: idāni dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānampi vasena taṃ dassetuṃ ‘tattha yo desayatī’tiādimāhā”ti –
tika-s0501t:1063_0: Vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayantesu sāsitabbasāsakesu. Dasabalasamannāgato
tika-s0501t:1063_1: yo desako satthā “arakkhitena cittenā”tiādidhammaṃ deseti, ovādena sāvake na visaṃvādayati,
tika-s0501t:1063_2: tassa desakassa satthuno dasa balāni vicayitabbānīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1064_0: “Kinti desetī”ti pucchitabbattā “so tividha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tesu dasasu tathāgatabalesu
tika-s0501t:1064_1: ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ nāma, “taṃ balaṃ kathaṃ vicayitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1064_2: pucchitabbattā “so tathā ovadito”tiādi vuttaṃ. Attho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, pāḷivasenapi
tika-s0501t:1064_3: pākaṭo. “Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ na vijjatī”ti jānanaṃ aṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma, “etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti
tika-s0501t:1064_4: jānanaṃ ṭhānañāṇaṃ nāmāti ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti
tika-s0501t:1065_0: 57. Ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ vibhattaṃ amhehi
tika-s0501t:1065_2: pucchitabbattā “iti ṭhānāṭṭhānatā”ti vuttaṃ. “Ayaṃ paṭipadā imasmiṃ bhave gāminī,
tika-s0501t:1065_3: ayaṃ paṭipadā imasmiṃ bhave gāminī”ti sabbattha gāminiyā paṭipadāya jānanañāṇaṃ sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1065_4: nāmāti sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ dutiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti adhippāyo. (2)
tika-s0501t:1066_0: 59. Sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ dutiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1066_1: ca ñātaṃ, “kathaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1066_2: pucchitabbattā “iti sabbatthagāminī paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ayaṃ dhātu ca ayaṃ dhātu
tika-s0501t:1066_3: ca anekadhātu nāma, ayaṃ dhātu ca ayaṃ dhātu ca nānādhātu nāmā”ti anekadhātunānādhātūnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1066_4: jānanañāṇaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ nāmāti anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti. (3)
tika-s0501t:1067_0: 60. Anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1067_1: amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “kathaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ
tika-s0501t:1067_3: “Ime sattā evaṃ adhimuttā, ime sattā evaṃ adhimuttā”ti sattānaṃ adhimuccanānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1067_4: sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ nāmāti sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti. (4)
tika-s0501t:1068_0: Sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vibhattaṃ, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1068_1: ca ñātaṃ, “kathaṃ vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1068_2: “iti te yathādhimuttā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ adhimuttānaṃ sattānaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1068_3: imassa kaṇhakammassa ayaṃ vipāko. Idaṃ kammaṃ sukkaṃ, imassa sukkakammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti
tika-s0501t:1068_4: evamādīhi vipākānaṃ nānattajānanañāṇaṃ vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ nāmāti vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1069_0: 62. Vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1069_2: pucchitabbattā “iti tathā samādinnāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ samādinnānaṃ kammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1069_3: jhānānaṃ vimokkhānaṃ samādhīnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso, idaṃ vodānaṃ, idaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1069_4: evaṃ saṃkilissati, evaṃ vodāyati, evaṃ vuṭṭhahatī”ti jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1069_5: anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāmāti jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1070_0: 63. Jhānānaṃ saṃkilesañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ, “kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:1070_2: “iti tasseva samādhissā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāni, evaṃ akampiyaṭṭhena
tika-s0501t:1070_3: balānī”ti jānanena saha “ayaṃ mudindriyo, ayaṃ majjhindriyo, ayaṃ tikkhindriyo”ti
tika-s0501t:1071_1: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbaṃ, kathaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1071_2: navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tattha yaṃ anekavihita”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1071_4: pariyantavasena vā sākārassa sauddesassa anekavihitapubbenivāsassa taṃtaṃbhavassa
tika-s0501t:1071_5: asesato jānanañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāmāti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1072_1: asesato cutūpapātānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nāmāti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ navamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1073_1: sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ dasamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tattha
tika-s0501t:1073_2: ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Bodhimūle saṃkilesamāranihanaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ, idaṃ kilesamāranihanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1073_3: ñāṇaṃ sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ nāmāti sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ dasamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti
tika-s0501t:1073_4: ayaṃ saṅkhepattho. Vitthārato pana pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca yatipotānampi pākaṭo
tika-s0501t:1074_1: vuttaṃ. Ye ye suttappadesatthā vuttā, te te suttappadesatthā yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena
tika-s0501t:1074_2: vicayahārasampātena vicayitabbā, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vicayahārasampāto niyutto
tika-s0501t:1079_0: 65. Yena yena vicayahārasampātena suttappadesatthā ācariyena vicayitabbā, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1079_1: ca ñātā, so vicayahārasampāto paripuṇṇo, “katamo yuttihārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1079_2: “tattha katamo yuttihārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana – “evaṃ nānānayehi
tika-s0501t:1079_3: vicayahārasampātaṃ vitthāretvā idāni yuttihārasampātādīni dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamo
tika-s0501t:1079_4: yuttihārasampāto’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu
tika-s0501t:1079_5: hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso yuttihārasampāto nāmāti pucchati, pucchitvā
tika-s0501t:1079_6: yasmiṃ suttappadese vuttānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo, taṃ suttappadesaṃ nīharituṃ –
tika-s0501t:1083_0: Vuttaṃ. Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ tasmā arakkhitacittassa māravasānugatattā satisaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarādivasena
tika-s0501t:1083_1: bhikkhu rakkhitacitto assa bhaveyya, tasmā kāmavitakkādimicchāsaṅkappagocarassa māravasānugatattā
tika-s0501t:1083_2: nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena bhikkhu sammāsaṅkappagocaro assa bhaveyya, tasmā micchādiṭṭhihatacittassa
tika-s0501t:1083_3: māravasānugatattā yonisomanasikārena bhikkhu udayabbayaṃ ñatvāna sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro
tika-s0501t:1083_4: assa bhaveyya, tasmā thinamiddhena hatacittassa māravasānugatattā vīriyavasena bhikkhu
tika-s0501t:1083_5: thinamiddhābhibhū assa bhaveyya, tādiso bhikkhu sabbā duggatiyo jahe jahissatīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1084_0: “Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ kathaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo”ti vattabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1084_1: vuttaṃ. Rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro bhavissatīti attho yujjati eva, no na
tika-s0501t:1084_2: yujjati. Micchāsaṅkappānampi jahitattā sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro hutvā viharanto udayabbayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1084_4: Udayabbayaṃ paṭivijjhanto sabbā duggatiyo jahissatīti attho yujjati udayabbayānupassanānukkamena
tika-s0501t:1084_5: ariyamaggasambhavato. Sabbā duggatiyo jahanto sabbāni duggativinipātabhayāni samatikkamissatīti
tika-s0501t:1085_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena yuttihārasampātena suttappadesatthānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1085_2: yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto yuttihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ
tika-s0501t:1090_0: 66. Yena yena yuttihārasampātena suttappadesatthānaṃ yuttibhāvo ācariyena vibhāvito,
tika-s0501t:1090_1: amhehi ca ñāto, so yuttihārasampāto paripuṇṇo, “katamo padaṭṭhānahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1091_0: Pucchitvā yasmiṃ suttappadese vuttāni padaṭṭhānāni nīharitāni, taṃ suttappadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1091_1: nīharituṃ “tasmā rakkhitacittassa, sammāsaṅkappagocaroti gāthā”ti vuttā. Gāthāttho
tika-s0501t:1091_2: vuttova. “Katame gāthātthā katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā
tika-s0501t:1091_4: indriyesu guttadvāratā tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sucaritapāripūriyā āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1091_8: ca vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aniccānupassanādīnaṃ visesakāraṇattā. “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti
tika-s0501t:1091_9: suttappadesassa atthabhūtā udayabbayānupassanāpaññā dassanabhūmiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
tika-s0501t:1091_11: atthabhūtaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsannakāraṇattā. “Sabbā
tika-s0501t:1091_12: duggatiyo jahe”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā pahātabbajahanabhāvanāya ariyamaggabhāvanāya
tika-s0501t:1092_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena padaṭṭhānahārasampātabhūtena suttappadesatthāni
tika-s0501t:1092_2: padaṭṭhānāni nīharitāni, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto padaṭṭhānahārasampāto niyutto
tika-s0501t:1097_0: 67. Yena yena padaṭṭhānahārasampātena suttappadesatthāni padaṭṭhānāni ācariyena niddhāritāni,
tika-s0501t:1097_1: amhehi ca ñātāni, so padaṭṭhānahārasampāto paripuṇṇo, “katamo lakkhaṇahārasampāto”ti
tika-s0501t:1097_2: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu
tika-s0501t:1097_3: soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso lakkhaṇahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1098_0: “Katamehi suttatthehi samānalakkhaṇā katame dhammā gahitā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1098_1: vuttaṃ. “Tasmā rakkhitacittassa, sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti suttappadesena vuttaṃ idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1098_2: rakkhaṇaṃ satindriyaṃ gahitaṃ, satindriye gahite saddhādipañcindriyāni gahitāni bhavanti
tika-s0501t:1098_4: gahitā, sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo gahito bhavati. Taṃ kissa hetūti
tika-s0501t:1098_5: kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Pucchitvā kāraṇamāha “sammādiṭṭhito hī”tiādinā. Sammādiṭṭhihetuto
tika-s0501t:1098_6: sammāsaṅkappo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, sammāsaṅkappato sammāvācā hi yasmā pabhavati,
tika-s0501t:1098_7: tasmā, sammāvācāto sammākammanto hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, sammākammantato sammāājīvo
tika-s0501t:1098_8: hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, sammāājīvato sammāvāyāmo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, sammāvāyāmato
tika-s0501t:1098_9: sammāsatihi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, sammāsatito sammāsamādhi hi yasmā pabhavati,
tika-s0501t:1098_10: tasmā, sammāsamādhito sammāvimutti hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, sammāvimuttito sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1098_11: hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo gahito bhavatīti.
tika-s0501t:1099_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena lakkhaṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā
tika-s0501t:1099_2: samānalakkhaṇena gahitā bhavanti, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto lakkhaṇahārasampāto
tika-s0501t:1099_3: niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahitoti.
tika-s0501t:1104_0: 68. Yena yena lakkhaṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā samānalakkhaṇena gahitā, so
tika-s0501t:1104_2: katamo catubyūho hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu
tika-s0501t:1104_3: hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso catubyūhahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1105_2: niruttiṃ “paripālīyatī”ti iminā pariyāyena dasseti, itisaddassa ādyatthattā “cintetīti
tika-s0501t:1105_3: cittaṃ, attano santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ, paccayehi citanti cittaṃ, cittavicittaṭṭhena
tika-s0501t:1105_4: cittaṃ, cittakaraṇaṭṭhena cittaṃ, rakkhitaṃ cittaṃ yassāti rakkhitacitto. Sammā saṅkappetīti
tika-s0501t:1105_5: sammāsaṅkappo, gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viyāti gocaro, sammāsaṅkappo gocaro
tika-s0501t:1105_6: assāti sammāsaṅkappagocaro. Sammā passatīti sammādiṭṭhi, sammādiṭṭhi purekkhāro assāti
tika-s0501t:1105_7: sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro. Jānātīti ñatvāna. Udayo ca vayo ca udayabbayaṃ. Thinañca middhañca
tika-s0501t:1105_8: thinamiddhaṃ, abhibhavatīti abhibhū, thinamiddhaṃ abhibhūti thinamiddhābhibhū. Bhikkhatīti
tika-s0501t:1105_9: bhikkhū”ti niruttipi nīharitā. Tenāha – “iti-saddo ādyattho”ti. Esā vuttappakārā
tika-s0501t:1106_0: Idha suttappadese bhagavato ko adhippāyoti ce puccheyya, ye sappurisā sabbāhi duggatīhi
tika-s0501t:1106_1: parimuccitukāmā bhavissanti, te sappurisā dhammacārino rakkhitacittā bhavissantīti
tika-s0501t:1106_2: ayaṃ adhippāyo. Ettha “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādisuttappadese bhagavato adhippāyoti nīharitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1107_0: “Katamaṃ nidāna”nti ce puccheyya, kokāliko sāriputtamoggallānesu theresu cittaṃ arakkhitvā
tika-s0501t:1107_1: padosayitvā mahāpadumaniraye yasmā upapanno, yasmā bhagavā ca satiārakkhena samannāgato
tika-s0501t:1107_2: sabbā duggatiyo jahati, tasmā ca sabbā duggatiyo jahitukāmo bhikkhu sappuriso rakkhitacitto
tika-s0501t:1108_0: “Katamo pubbāparasandhī”ti ce puccheyya, suttamhi “satiyā cittaṃ rakkhitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1108_1: yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tena pubbavacanena ayaṃ “tasmā rakkhitacittassa…pe… sabbā duggatiyo
tika-s0501t:1108_2: jahe”ti suttappadeso anusandhi saṃsandati sametīti pubbaparānusandhi niddhāritabboti.
tika-s0501t:1109_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena catubyūhahārasampātena nirutyādhippāyanidānapubbāparānusandhi
tika-s0501t:1109_2: niddhāritabbo, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto catubyūhahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ
tika-s0501t:1114_2: katamo āvaṭṭo hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso āvaṭṭahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1115_2: cittekaggatāya cittaṃ ṭhapento saṃkilesato rakkhitacitto nāma hoti, “tasmā rakkhitacittassa,
tika-s0501t:1115_3: sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti iminā rakkhitacitte vutte sati yā ekaggatā āvaṭṭetabbā, sā
tika-s0501t:1115_4: ayaṃ ekaggatā samatho. “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti iminā sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāre vutte
tika-s0501t:1115_5: sati yā paññā āvaṭṭetabbā, sā ayaṃ paññā vipassanā. “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti iminā
tika-s0501t:1115_6: udayabbayañāṇasamannāgate vutte sati yā dukkhaparijānanā āvaṭṭetabbā, sā ayaṃ dukkhaparijānanā
tika-s0501t:1115_7: dukkhapariññā. “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti iminā puggalādhiṭṭhānena yaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1115_8: vuttaṃ, idaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ samudayappahānaṃ. “Sammā duggatiyo jahe”ti iminā
tika-s0501t:1115_9: yo sabbaduggatijahanasaṅkhāto anuppādo vutto, so ayaṃ anuppādo nirodho. Iti dukkhapariññāya
tika-s0501t:1115_10: pariññetabbaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ āvaṭṭetabbaṃ, samudayappahānena pahātabbaṃ samudayasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1115_11: āvaṭṭetabbaṃ, nirodhena nirodhasaccaṃ āvaṭṭetabbaṃ, samathavipassanāhi maggasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1116_0: “Ettakova āvaṭṭo hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto āvaṭṭo hārasampāto”ti
tika-s0501t:1116_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena āvaṭṭahārasampātena samathādayo āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t:1116_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto āvaṭṭahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1121_0: 70. Yena yena āvaṭṭahārasampātena suttatthā āvaṭṭetabbā, so āvaṭṭahārasampāto paripuṇṇo,
tika-s0501t:1121_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vibhattihārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1122_1: vuttaṃ. Yā “tasmā…pe… gocaro”ti gāthā vuttā, tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ vutto kusalapakkho dhammo
tika-s0501t:1122_2: kusalapakkhena dhammena satisaṃvaro dhammo niddisitabbo vibhajitabbo, akusalapakkhena
tika-s0501t:1123_0: Kathaṃ? “Rakkhitacittassā”ti padena vutto kusalapakkho satisaṃvaro dhammo “cakkhudvārasaṃvaro…pe…
tika-s0501t:1123_1: manodvārasaṃvaro”ti chabbidhena kusalapakkhena dhammena niddisitabbo vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1123_3: abyāpāda-saṅkappo avihiṃsāsaṅkappo”ti tividhena kusalapakkhena dhammena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1123_4: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti padena vuttā kusalapakkhā dhammajāti “dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye
tika-s0501t:1123_5: ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ, pubbante ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1123_6: aparante ñāṇaṃ, pubbantāparante ñāṇaṃ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu
tika-s0501t:1123_7: ñāṇa”nti aṭṭhavidhena kusalapakkhena dhammena vibhajitabbā. “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti
tika-s0501t:1123_8: padena vuttaṃ kusalapakkhaudayabbayañāṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ paññāsavidhena udayabbayañāṇena
tika-s0501t:1124_0: Satisaṃvaro kusalapakkho “lokiyo satisaṃvaro, lokuttaro satisaṃvaro”ti dubbidhena
tika-s0501t:1124_1: vibhajitabboti. Lokiyo satisaṃvaro kāmāvacarovāti ekavidhena vibhajitabbo. Lokuttarā
tika-s0501t:1124_2: satisaṃvaro “dassanabhūmi, bhāvanābhūmī”ti dubbidhena vibhajitabbo. Kāmāvacaro satisaṃvaro
tika-s0501t:1124_4: catubbidhena vibhajitabbo. Lokuttaro satisaṃvaropi tathā catubbidhena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1125_1: kāyaasaṃvaro, copanakāyaasaṃvaro, vācāasaṃvaro, manoasaṃvaro”ti aṭṭhavidhena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1125_4: dhammesu aññāṇa”nti aṭṭhavidhena vibhajitabbā, dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhividhenapi vibhajitabbā.
tika-s0501t:1126_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vibhattihārasampātena suttappadesatthā
tika-s0501t:1126_2: vibhattā, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vibhattihārasampāto niyuttoti yathāraha niddhāretvā
tika-s0501t:1131_0: 71. Yena yena vibhattihārasampātena suttappadesatthā vibhattā, so vibhattihārasampāto
tika-s0501t:1132_1: Yā “tasmā…pe… gocaro”ti gāthā vuttā, tāya gāthāya yā samathavipassanā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1132_2: tāya samathavipassanāya bhāvitāya akusalānaṃ nirodho phalaṃ payojanaṃ hoti, pariññātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1132_3: dukkhaṃ hoti, samudayo pahīno hoti, maggo bhāvito hotīti parivattetabbo. Paṭipakkhena
tika-s0501t:1132_4: pana samathavipassanāya abhāvitāya akusalānaṃ anirodho, apariññātaṃ dukkhaṃ, samudayo
tika-s0501t:1133_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena parivattanahārasampātena suttappadesatthā
tika-s0501t:1133_2: parivattetabbā, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto parivattanahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ
tika-s0501t:1138_0: 72. Yena yena parivattanahārasampātena suttappadesatthā parivattetabbā, so parivattano
tika-s0501t:1138_1: hārasampātoti paripuṇṇo, “katamo vevacano hārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo
tika-s0501t:1139_0: “Katamesaṃ suttappadesatthānaṃ, suttapadānaṃ vā katamāni vevacanānī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1139_1: “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yā “tasmā…pe… gocaro”ti gāthā vuttā, tāya gāthāya “rakkhitacittassā”ti
tika-s0501t:1139_2: padena vuttassa cittassa, “rakkhitacittassā”ti ettha cittassa padassa vā “cittaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1139_3: vijānitatta”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ vevacanaṃ, “mānasaṃ hadaya”ntiādivacanampi
tika-s0501t:1139_5: abyāpādasaṅkappo avihiṃsāsaṅkappo”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ vevacanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1139_7: ettha sammādiṭṭhipadassa “sammādiṭṭhi nāma paññāsatthaṃ paññākhaggo paññāratanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1139_8: paññāpatodo paññāpāsādo”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ vevacanaṃ, “paññā pajānanā
tika-s0501t:1139_9: vicayo”tiādi vacanampi sammādiṭṭhipadassa vevacanaṃ. “Thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ
tika-s0501t:1139_10: cittassa, cittassa akallatā akammaññatā onāho pariyonāho antosaṅkoco”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1139_11: vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ thinassa vevacanaṃ. “Kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā kāyālasiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1139_12: soppaṃ supanā suppitatta”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ middhassa vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1139_13: “Bhikkhako bhikkhū”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ bhikkhupadassa vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1139_14: “Duggati apāyo vinipāto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ saṃsāro”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1140_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vevacanahārasampātena vevacanāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t:1140_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vevacanahārasampāto niyutto yathāsambhavaṃ nīharitvā
tika-s0501t:1145_0: 73. Yena yena vevacanahārasampātena vevacanāni niddhāritāni, so vevacanahārasampāto
tika-s0501t:1145_1: paripuṇṇo, “katamo paññattihārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo paññattihārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1146_0: “Katamā suttappadesabhūtā paññatti katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññattī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1146_1: “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti paññatti satiyā padaṭṭhānassa rakkhitabbassa
tika-s0501t:1146_2: cittassa paññāpanato satiyā padaṭṭhānapaññatti nāma. Satiyā hi rakkhitabbaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1146_3: satiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “adhiṭṭhahitvā rakkhantiyā
tika-s0501t:1146_4: satiyā rakkhiyamānaṃ cittaṃ tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya hotī”ti. “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti
tika-s0501t:1146_5: paññatti samathassa bhāvanāya paññāpanato samathassa bhāvanāpaññatti nāma. “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro,
tika-s0501t:1146_6: ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti paññatti dassanabhūmiyā nikkhepassa paññāpanato nikkhepapaññatti
tika-s0501t:1146_7: nāma. “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti samudayassa anavasesappahānassa paññāpanato anavasesappahānapaññatti
tika-s0501t:1146_8: nāma. “Sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti paññatti maggassa ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya paññāpanato
tika-s0501t:1147_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena paññattihārasampātena paññattippabhedā
tika-s0501t:1147_2: niddhāritā, so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto paññattihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā
tika-s0501t:1152_0: 74. Yena yena paññattihārasampātena paññattippabhedā niddhāritā, so paññattihārasampāto
tika-s0501t:1152_1: paripuṇṇo, “katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:1153_0: “Tattha tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ katamāni indriyāni niddhāretvā katamehi niddhāritehi dhammehi
tika-s0501t:1153_2: vuttā, tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ “tasmā…pe… purekkhāro”ti suttappadesena sammādiṭṭhi gahitā,
tika-s0501t:1153_3: sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya pañcindriyāni saddhādipañcindriyāni gahitāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1154_0: Tāniyeva saddhādipañcindriyāni vijjāya upakārattā vā padaṭṭhānattā vā vijjā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1154_1: vijjuppādā tādisāya vijjāya uppādā uppādahetuto avijjānirodho sambhavati, avijjānirodhā
tika-s0501t:1154_2: saṅkhāranirodho sambhavati…pe… jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho sambhavatīti. Ayaṃ otaraṇā
tika-s0501t:1155_0: Tāniyeva pañcindriyāni sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena tīhi khandhehi
tika-s0501t:1155_1: saṅgahitāni bhavanti saddhāvīriyehi sīlasambhavato, satiyā ca paññānuvattakattā.
tika-s0501t:1155_2: Ayaṃ otaraṇā khandhehi pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1156_0: Tāniyeva pañcindriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni bhavanti. Ye saṅkhārā anāsavā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1156_1: bhavaṅgā bhavahetū no bhavanti, te anāsavā saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā bhavanti
tika-s0501t:1156_2: dhammadhātuyā antogadhattā. Ayaṃ otaraṇā dhātūhi pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1157: Sā anāsavā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā bhavati, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ bhavati, bhavaṅgaṃ bhavahetu no bhavati. Ayaṃ otaraṇā āyatanehi dhammadhātuyā otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1158_0: “Ettakova otaraṇo hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto otaraṇo hārasampāto”ti
tika-s0501t:1158_1: vuttaṃ. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena otaraṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā otaritabbā,
tika-s0501t:1158_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto otaraṇo hārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1162_1: ca vuttanayānusāreneva viññātabbo. Katthaci katthaci pāṭhe apākaṭaṃyeva yathābalaṃ kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t:1164_0: 75. Yatthāti yasmiṃ pañhe. Ārambho attho suddho paripuṇṇo, so pañho niravasesato
tika-s0501t:1164_1: vissajjito bhavati. Yattha pañhe pana ārambho attho na suddho aparipuṇṇo koci vissajjetabbo
tika-s0501t:1164_2: avasiṭṭho, so pañho tāva vissajjito na bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1166_0: 77. “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti padena yo satisaṃvaro vutto, ayaṃ satisaṃvaro samathassa
tika-s0501t:1166_1: parikkhāro. “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti padena yo sammāsaṅkappo vutto, so sammāsaṅkappo
tika-s0501t:1168_0: 78. “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti padena yaṃ rakkhitacittaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ rakkhitacittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1168_1: tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ kammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhiyā bhāvitāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
tika-s0501t:1168_2: maggo bhāvito bhavati ekato bhāvitabbattā, padaṭṭhānakāraṇattā ca. Tena vuttaṃ –
tika-s0501t:1168_3: “sammādiṭṭhito hī”tiādi. Yassa arahato samādhivimutti bhavati, ayaṃ arahā anupādiseso
tika-s0501t:1169_1: yujjito, soḷasappabhedabhāvo kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1169_2: vuttaṃ. Tena soḷasappabhedabhāvena āyasmā mahākaccāno “soḷasa…pe… sutta”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1169_3: āha, tena vacanena soḷasappabhedabhāvo tumhehi saddahitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1170_0: “Ettakova hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ. Yena
tika-s0501t:1170_1: yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātena suttappadesatthā niddhāritā, so
tika-s0501t:1170_2: so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto desanāhārasampātādihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā
tika-s0501t:1170_3: yujjitabboti attho gahetabbo, aṭṭhakathāyañca tathā niddhāretvā yujjitoti.
tika-s0501t:1173: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1175_0: 79. Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātādinā hārasampātena ekasuttappadesatthā
tika-s0501t:1175_1: niddhāretvā vibhattā, so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto desanāhārasampātādihārasampāto paripuṇṇo,
tika-s0501t:1175_3: āraddhaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –“evaṃ nānāsuttavasena, ekasuttavasena ca hāravicāraṃ
tika-s0501t:1175_4: dassetvā idāni nayavicāraṃ dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna’ntiādi āraddha”nti
tika-s0501t:1175_5: vuttaṃ. “Tattha katamo nandiyāvaṭṭanayo”tiādiṃ anārabhitvā “tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādiārambhane
tika-s0501t:1175_6: kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tattha tatthāti tesu hārādīsu yo atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanānayena
tika-s0501t:1175_7: niddiṭṭho, tasseva atthanayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmiṃ pucchati “katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0501t:1176_0: Kiñcāpi saṃvaṇṇanānayā niddiṭṭhā, tathāpi atthanayasaṃvaṇṇanānayānaṃ visesassa pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0501t:1176_1: kātuṃ puna kathayissāma. Taṇhāavijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena
tika-s0501t:1176_2: nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ceva samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa
tika-s0501t:1176_3: catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo nāma.
tika-s0501t:1176_4: Tīhi akusalamūlehi lobhādīhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena
tika-s0501t:1176_5: nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ceva tīhi kusalamūlehi alobhādīhi vodānapakkhassa
tika-s0501t:1176_6: suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca tipukkhalo
tika-s0501t:1176_7: nayo nāma. Catūhi subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalasaṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa
tika-s0501t:1176_8: catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ceva catūhi asubhasaññādīhi
tika-s0501t:1176_9: avipallāsehi satipaṭṭhānehi, saddhindriyehi vā vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena
tika-s0501t:1176_10: nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca sīhavikkīḷito nayo nāmāti vuttā nayā saṃvaṇṇanānayā
tika-s0501t:1176_11: nāma. Tesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati “katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0501t:1177_0: Nayā pana nānāsuttato niddhāritehi taṇhāavijjādīhi mūlapadehi catusaccayojanāya nayato
tika-s0501t:1177_1: anubujjhiyamāno dukkhādiattho. So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti “nayo”ti vutto,
tika-s0501t:1177_2: so atthanayo nāma. Tasseva atthanayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati “katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”nti?
tika-s0501t:1177_3: Tasmā catusaccayojanāya nayaggāhato nīyati anupucchīyatīti nayo, ko so? Suttatthabhūto
tika-s0501t:1177_4: dukkhādiko attho. Nayati maggañāṇaṃ pāpetīti vā nayo, dukkhādiko atthova. Tenāha
tika-s0501t:1177_5: – “anubujjhiyamāno dukkhādiattho. So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti nayo”ti. Samuṭṭhahanti
tika-s0501t:1177_6: nayā etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Avijjātaṇhādikāraṇaṃ, taṃdīpanā saṃvaṇṇanā ca.
tika-s0501t:1177_7: Avijjātaṇhādinā hi dukkhādiatthanayā sambhavanti. Atha vā avijjātaṇhādīhi catusaccayojanā
tika-s0501t:1177_8: samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ – “kiṃ pana taṃ? Taṃtaṃmūlapadehi catusaccayojanā”ti.
tika-s0501t:1177_9: Evaṃ atthe gayhamāne sati saṃvaṇṇanānayāpi gahitā honti, nayānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1178_1: dassetuṃ “pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānabhūtāya
tika-s0501t:1178_2: avijjāya ca taṇhāya ca pubbā koṭi “asukassa buddhassa bhagavato uppajjanakāle uppannā,
tika-s0501t:1178_3: asukassa cakkavattino uppajjanakāle uppannā”ti na paññāyati koṭiyā abhāvatoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1178_4: “Avijjātaṇhāsu katamā nīvaraṇaṃ, katamā saṃyojana”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha avijjā
tika-s0501t:1178_5: nīvaraṇaṃ taṇhā saṃyojana”nti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tāsu avijjātaṇhāsu. Ādīnavapaṭicchādikattā
tika-s0501t:1178_6: avijjā nīvaraṇaṃ. Bhavesu saṃyojanato taṇhā saṃyojanaṃ. “Avijjānīvaraṇā sattā kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:1178_7: vicaranti, kathaṃ vuccanti, taṇhāsaṃyojanā sattā kathaṃ vicaranti kathaṃ vuccantī”ti
tika-s0501t:1178_9: Avijjāya saṃyuttā viya pavattā avijjāya abhinivisavatthūsu saṃyuttā viya pavattā
tika-s0501t:1178_10: sattā avijjāpakkhena vipallāsena niccādiabhinivesavatthubhūte rūpādiārammaṇe vicaranti
tika-s0501t:1178_11: vividhā caranti pavattanti, te niccādiabhinivisantā vicarantā sattā “diṭṭhicaritā”ti
tika-s0501t:1178_12: vuccanti. Taṇhāsaṃyojanametesanti taṇhāsaṃyojanā. Taṇhāya saṃyuttā viya pavattā,
tika-s0501t:1178_13: taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūte vatthukāme saṃyuttā viya pavattā sattā taṇhāpakkhena aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritena
tika-s0501t:1179_0: “Diṭṭhicaritā sattā kaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharanti, taṇhācaritā sattā kaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0501t:1179_1: anuyuttā viharantī”ti pucchitabbattā “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhicaritā sattā
tika-s0501t:1179_2: ito sāsanato bahiddhā pabbajitā hontāpi “sukhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ natthi, dukkhena
tika-s0501t:1179_3: adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ pana atthī”ti manasi karontā attakilamathānuyogaṃ pañcātapādipaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0501t:1179_4: anuyuttā viharanti. Taṇhācaritā sattā ito sāsanato bahiddhā pabbajitā hontāpi “kāme
tika-s0501t:1179_5: paṭisevantā lokaṃ vaḍḍhāpentā bahuṃ puññaṃ vaḍḍhāpentī”ti manasi karontā kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ
tika-s0501t:1180_0: “Kasmā diṭṭhicaritā tathāvidhaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharanti, kasmā taṇhācaritā
tika-s0501t:1180_1: tathāvidhaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kiṃ kāraṇa”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1180_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tattha tesu diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritesu. Yaṃ yasmā kāraṇā viharanti,
tika-s0501t:1180_3: taṃ kāraṇaṃ kinti pucchati. Ito sāsanato bahiddhā yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saccavavatthānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1180_4: natthi, catusaccappakāsanā kuto ca atthi, samathavipassanākosallaṃ vā upasamasukhappatti
tika-s0501t:1180_5: vā kuto atthi, te puggalā upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā hutvā evaṃ āhaṃsu
tika-s0501t:1180_6: “sukhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ natthi, dukkhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ nāma atthī”ti.
tika-s0501t:1180_7: Te evaṃsaññī evaṃdiṭṭhī dukkhena sukhaṃ patthayamānā hutvā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā
tika-s0501t:1180_8: viharanti. Ito sāsanato bahiddhā yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saccavavatthānaṃ natthi, catusaccappakāsanā
tika-s0501t:1180_9: kuto ca atthi, samathavipassanākosallaṃ vā upasamasukhappatti vā kuto atthi, te puggalā
tika-s0501t:1180_10: upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā hutvā evamāhaṃsu “yo kāme paṭisevati, so lokaṃ
tika-s0501t:1180_11: vaḍḍhayati, yo lokaṃ vaḍḍhayati, so bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavatī”ti. Te evaṃsaññī evaṃdiṭṭhī
tika-s0501t:1180_12: kāmesu sukhasaññī hutvā kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ anuyuttā ca viharantīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1181_0: “Tathā viharantā kiṃ vaḍḍhayantī”ti pucchitabbattā “te tadabhiññā santā rogameva
tika-s0501t:1181_1: vaḍḍhayantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Tathā vaḍḍhayantā rogādīnaṃ bhesajjaṃ samathavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhayanti
tika-s0501t:1181_2: ki”nti pucchitabbattā “te rogābhitunnā gaṇḍapaṭipīḷitā sallānuviddhā nirayatiracchānayonipetāsuresu
tika-s0501t:1181_3: ummujjanimujjāni karontā ugghātanigghātaṃ paccanubhontā rogagaṇḍasallabhesajjaṃ na
tika-s0501t:1181_4: vindantī”ti vuttaṃ. Attho pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. “Katame saṃkilesavodānā, katame
