tika-s0501t:1181_5: rogādayo, katamaṃ bhesajja”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha attakilamathānuyogo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1181_6: Tatthāti tesu saṃkilesavodānarogabhesajjādīsu. Attakilamathānuyogo ca kāmasukhallikānuyogo
tika-s0501t:1181_7: ca saṃkileso hoti, samathavipassanā vodānaṃ hoti, attakilamathānuyogo ca rogo hoti,
tika-s0501t:1182_0: “Katamo katamaṃ sacca”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha saṃkileso dukkha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1182_1: Tatthāti tesu saṃkilesādīsu saṃkileso ekadesavasena dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ hoti. Tadabhisaṅgoti
tika-s0501t:1182_2: tasmiṃ saṃkilese abhisaṅgo viya pavatto lokiyadhammo niravasesavasena dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1182_3: hoti. Atha vā tasmiṃ dukkhe abhisaṅgo viya pavattā taṇhā dukkhasamudayo samudayasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1182_4: hoti. Taṇhānirodho dukkhanirodho nirodhasaccaṃ hoti. Samathavipassanā dukkhanirodhagāminī
tika-s0501t:1182_5: paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ hoti. Imāni cattāri saccāni niddhāretvā yojetabbāni. “Tesu catūsu
tika-s0501t:1182_6: saccesu katamaṃ pariññeyyaṃ, katamo pahātabbo, katamo bhāvetabbo, katamo sacchikātabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:1183_2: niddhāritānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā “diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1183_3: sakkāyadassane katamo pavattibhedo”ti pucchitabbattā imesaṃ sakkāyadassane ayaṃ pavattibhedoti
tika-s0501t:1183_4: vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “idāni diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1183_6: tesu diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritesu. Diṭṭhicaritā puggalā rūpaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti…pe…
tika-s0501t:1183_7: viññāṇaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti diṭṭhicaritānaṃ attābhinivesassa balavabhāvato,
tika-s0501t:1183_8: taṇhācaritā pana rūpaṃ vā “attā”ti rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti attani vā rūpaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1183_9: rūpasmiṃ vā “attā”ti attānaṃ upagacchanti…pe… viññāṇasmiṃ vā “attā”ti attānaṃ upagacchanti
tika-s0501t:1183_10: taṇhācaritānaṃ attaniyābhinivesassa balavabhāvato. Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ekekaṃ
tika-s0501t:1183_11: nissāya catubbidhattā vīsativatthukā ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhi “sakkāyadiṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1183_12: Evaṃ diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane pavattibhedo viññātabboti attho.
tika-s0501t:1184_1: Tassā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena lokuttarā sammādiṭṭhi paṭipakkho, tassā sammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0501t:1184_2: anvāyikā anuguṇabhāvena pavattanakā dhammā ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena paṭipakkhā
tika-s0501t:1184_4: Sammāsaṅkappo…pe… sammāsamādhi ime dhammā anvāyikā honti. Ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādiko ariyo
tika-s0501t:1184_5: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tassā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā paṭipakkho hoti pahāyakattā. “Te sammādiṭṭhiyādayo
tika-s0501t:1184_6: dhammā khandhato kittakā hontī”ti pucchitabbattā “te tayo khandhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Katamo
tika-s0501t:1184_7: khandho samatho, katamo khandho vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho
tika-s0501t:1184_8: ca samatho, paññākkhandho vipassanā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sakkāyādīsu katamo katamaṃ saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1184_9: katamo katamaṃ sacca”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha sakkāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1185_1: kathaṃ antadvayamajjhimapaṭipadā niddhāritā”ti vattabbattā “tattha ye rūpaṃ attato”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1185_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritesu ye diṭṭhicaritā puggalā rūpaṃ “attā”ti
tika-s0501t:1185_3: attato upagacchanti…pe… viññāṇaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti. Ime diṭṭhicaritā puggalā
tika-s0501t:1185_4: “rūpādayo ca attā, rūpādīnañca aniccattā, attassāpi aniccattā attā ucchijjati, attā
tika-s0501t:1185_5: vinassati, attā paraṃ maraṇā na hotī”ti abhinivisanato “ucchedavādino”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0501t:1185_6: Ye taṇhācaritā puggalā rūpaṃ vā “attā”ti rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti…pe… viññāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1185_7: vā “attā”ti viññāṇavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti. Attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā
tika-s0501t:1185_8: attānaṃ upagacchanti. Ime taṇhācaritā puggalā “rūpādīhi attā añño aññattā attā nicco
tika-s0501t:1186_0: Tattha tesu ucchedavādīsassatavādīpuggalesu pavattā ucchedavādasassatavādā ubho antā
tika-s0501t:1186_1: antadvayapaṭipadā honti. Ayaṃ antadvayapaṭipadā saṃsārapavattanassa hetubhāvato saṃsārapavatti
tika-s0501t:1186_2: hoti, tassa antadvayassa paṭipajjanassa pajahanavasena majjhimapaṭipadāsaṅkhātova
tika-s0501t:1186_3: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo paṭipakkho hoti pahāyakattā. Ayaṃ maggo saṃsāranivattanassa
tika-s0501t:1186_4: hetubhāvato saṃsāranivatti hoti. Tattha saṃsārapavattisaṃsāranivattīsu pavatti saṃsārapavatti
tika-s0501t:1186_5: dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, tadabhisaṅgo tasmiṃ dukkhe abhisaṅgo taṇhā samudayo samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1186_6: taṇhānirodho dukkhanirodho nirodhasaccaṃ, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī
tika-s0501t:1186_7: paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ, iti imāni cattāri saccāni niddhāritāni. “Dukkhaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādimhi vuttanayova attho.
tika-s0501t:1187_0: “Ucchedasassatassa kittako pabhedo, maggassa kittako”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha ucchedasassata”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1187_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha ucchedasassataariyamaggesu ucchedasassatadassanaṃ samāsato saṅkhepato
tika-s0501t:1187_2: vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Ucchedo pañcupādānakkhandhe nissāya pavattattā pañcavidho,
tika-s0501t:1187_3: sassatadassanaṃ ekekasmiṃ tidhā uppajjanato pannarasavidhanti vīsatividhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1187_4: Vitthārato dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni. Katamāni? Cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā,
tika-s0501t:1187_5: cattāro antānantavādā, cattāro amarāvikkhepavādā, dve adhiccasamuppannavādā, soḷasa
tika-s0501t:1187_6: saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca
tika-s0501t:1187_7: diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni veditabbāni. Vitthārato pana brahmajālasutte
tika-s0501t:1187_8: āgatāni. Tesaṃ ucchedasassatadassanānaṃ tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā paṭipakkho
tika-s0501t:1187_9: maggo. Katame tecattālīsaṃ? “Aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā”ti tisso saññā ca
tika-s0501t:1187_10: “pahānasaññā virāgasaññā nirodhasaññā”ti tisso saññā cāti cha saññā ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0501t:1187_11: cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā,
tika-s0501t:1187_12: aṭṭha maggaṅgānī”ti tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā vipassanāvasena paṭipakkho maggo nāma.
tika-s0501t:1188_0: “Samathavasena katamo paṭipakkho”ti vattabbattā “aṭṭha vimokkhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭha
tika-s0501t:1188_1: vimokkhā pākaṭā. Dasa kasiṇāyatanāni samathavasena paṭipakkho maggo nāma. “Katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1188_2: ñāṇaṃ katamassa dhammassa padālana”nti pucchitabbattā “dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatānī”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1188_3: vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhicarite pavattāni diṭṭhigatāni, moho. Taṇhācarite pavattāni diṭṭhigatāni,
tika-s0501t:1188_4: jālaṃ. Anādivasena pavatto moho. Anidhanavasena pavattaṃ jālaṃ. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo
tika-s0501t:1188_5: samāpajjitvā tejetvā tikkhaṃ vipassanāñāṇañca ariyamaggañāṇañcañāṇavajiraṃ nāma bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1188_6: ñāṇapadaṭṭhānattā. Moho ca jālañca mohajālaṃ. Padāletīti padālanaṃ, kattari yupaccayo,
tika-s0501t:1188_7: mohajālassa padālananti mohajālapadālanaṃ. Padālanañhi duvidhaṃ vikkhambhanapadālanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1188_9: samucchedapadālanaṃ eva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ mohajāle avijjā moho, bhavataṇhā
tika-s0501t:1188_10: jālaṃ. Attano ādhāraṃ puggalaṃ dukkhādīsu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu mohetīti moho. Paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1188_11: jālaṃ jaṭaṃ lāyitvā jaṭāvasena lāti pavattatīti jālaṃ, attani jātaṃ macchasakuṇādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1188_12: lāti gaṇhāti, lāpeti gaṇhāpetīti vā jālaṃ, jālaṃ viyāti jālaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “atītādibhedabhinnesu
tika-s0501t:1188_13: rūpādīsu, sakaattabhāvādīsu ca saṃsibbanavasena pavattanato jālaṃ bhavataṇhā”ti.
tika-s0501t:1188_15: kena saddahitabba”nti vattabbattā “tena vuccati ‘pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya
tika-s0501t:1189_0: 81. “Ito sāsanato bahiddhā diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ paṭipadādayo niddhāritā, sāsane
tika-s0501t:1189_2: suttatthā ācariyena dassitā, vodānapakkhasuttatthā kathaṃ dassitabbā”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1189_3: vā “tattha diṭṭhicarito asmiṃ sāsane”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritesu.
tika-s0501t:1189_4: Diṭṭhicarito puggalo asmiṃ sāsane pabbajito hutvā catūsu paccayesu sallekhānusantatavutti
tika-s0501t:1189_5: bhavati. Kasmā? Yasmā sallekhe tibbagāravo, tasmā sallekhe tibbagāravattā. Taṇhācarito
tika-s0501t:1189_6: puggalo asmiṃ sāsane pabbajito hutvā sikkhānusantatavutti bhavati. Kasmā? Yasmā sikkhāya
tika-s0501t:1189_7: tibbagāravo, tasmā sikkhāya tibbagāravattā. Diṭṭhicarito puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ
tika-s0501t:1189_8: okkamanto hutvā dhammānusārī puggalo bhavati. Kasmā? Diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivisaye paññāsadisapavattanato.
tika-s0501t:1189_9: Taṇhācarito puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto hutvā saddhānusārī bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t:1189_10: Taṇhāvasena micchādhimokkhattā. Diṭṭhicarito puggalo sukhāya paṭipadāya, dandhābhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1189_11: ca niyyāti, sukhāya paṭipadāya, khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti sukhena kilesehi vikkhambhituṃ
tika-s0501t:1189_12: samatthattā. Taṇhācarito puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya, dandhābhiññāya ca niyyāti,
tika-s0501t:1189_13: dukkhāya paṭipadāya, khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti dukkhena kilesehi vikkhambhituṃ samatthattā.
tika-s0501t:1190_0: “Tathā kasmā niyyātī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1190_1: yena kāraṇena niyyāti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ kinti pucchati. Tassa taṇhācaritassa kāmā sukhena
tika-s0501t:1190_2: apariccattā hi yasmā bhavanti, tasmā kāmānaṃ sukhena apariccattattā tathā niyyāti.
tika-s0501t:1190_3: So taṇhācarito kāmehi vatthukāmakilesakāmehi viveciyamāno dukkhena paṭinissarati,
tika-s0501t:1190_4: dandhañca dhammaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ ājānāti. Yo pana ayaṃ puggalo diṭṭhicarito hoti,
tika-s0501t:1190_5: so ayaṃ diṭṭhicarito puggalo ādito ādimhiyeva kāmehi kilesakāmavatthukāmehi anatthiko
tika-s0501t:1190_6: bhavati. So diṭṭhicarito tato tehi kāmehi viveciyamāno khippañca sukhena paṭinissarati,
tika-s0501t:1191_0: “Taṇhācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāya
tika-s0501t:1191_1: khippābhiññāya niyyātīti ekekāya paṭipadāya bhavitabba”nti vattabbattā “dukkhāpi
tika-s0501t:1191_2: paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā ca, sukhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā
tika-s0501t:1191_3: ca khippābhiññā cā”ti vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ sati ekova dvīhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi niyyātīti āpajjatī”ti
tika-s0501t:1191_4: vattabbattā “sattāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṇhācaritā sattāpi duvidhā mudindriyāpi tikkhindriyāpi,
tika-s0501t:1191_5: diṭṭhicaritā sattāpi duvidhā mudindriyāpi tikkhindriyāpīti yojanā kātabbā. Ye taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritā
tika-s0501t:1191_6: mudindriyā bhavanti, te taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritā dandhañca paṭinissaranti, dandhañca
tika-s0501t:1191_7: dhammaṃ ājānanti. Ye taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritā tikkhindriyā bhavanti, te taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritā
tika-s0501t:1191_8: khippañca paṭinissaranti, khippañca dhammaṃ ājānanti, tasmā ekekasseva ekekā paṭipadā
tika-s0501t:1191_9: yuttāvāti. “Imāhi paṭipadāhi niyyantiyeva, na niyyiṃsu niyyissantīti āpajjeyya vattamānavibhattiyā
tika-s0501t:1191_10: niddiṭṭhattā”ti vattabbattā “imā catasso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atītepi imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi
tika-s0501t:1191_11: niyyiṃsu, paccuppannesupi niyyanti, anāgatepi niyyissantīti attho gahetabbo yathā
tika-s0501t:1192_0: Evanti evaṃ vuttappakārena. Ariyapuggalā catukkamaggaṃ paṭipadaṃ paññāpenti. “Kimatthaṃ
tika-s0501t:1192_1: paññāpentī”ti vattabbattā “abudhajanasevitāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa
tika-s0501t:1192_2: nayassa bhūmīti taṇhāavijjānaṃ vasena saṃkilesapakkhe dvidisā catusaccayojanāpi samathavipassanānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1192_3: vasena vodānapakkhe dvidisā catusaccayojanāpi dassitā. Ayaṃ catubbidhā catusaccayojanā
tika-s0501t:1192_4: nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmi samuṭṭhānabhāvatoti. “Tathāvidhāya catusaccayojanāya
tika-s0501t:1192_5: nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānabhūmibhāvo kena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1193_0: 82. “Nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānabhūtā bhūmi dassitā, tassa nandiyāvaṭṭassa
tika-s0501t:1193_1: nayassa kattha katamā disā kittakena upaparikkhitabbā”ti vattabbattā “veyyākaraṇesu
tika-s0501t:1193_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hi-saddo pakkhantarattho. Ye disābhūtā āhārādayo dhammā veyyākaraṇesu
tika-s0501t:1193_3: “kusalākusalā”ti vuttaṃ, te disābhūtā āhārādayo dhammā duvidhena “ime akusalā dhammā
tika-s0501t:1193_4: saṃkilesadhammā, ime kusalā vodānadhammā”ti duvidhena upaparikkhitabbā ālocitabbā.
tika-s0501t:1193_6: vuttaṃ. “Katamaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, katamaṃ vivaṭṭa”nti pucchitabbattā “vaṭṭaṃ nāma saṃsāro,
tika-s0501t:1193_7: vivaṭṭaṃ nibbāna”nti vuttaṃ. “Saṃsārassa katamo hetū”ti pucchitabbattā “kammakilesā
tika-s0501t:1193_8: hetu saṃsārassā”ti vuttaṃ. “Katamaṃ kammaṃ nāma, cetanāyeva kammaṃ nāma kiṃ, udāhu
tika-s0501t:1193_9: cetasikañca phaladānasamatthāsamatthampi kammaṃ ki”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha kamma”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1193_10: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu kammakilesesu. “Taṃ kammaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena daṭṭhabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1193_11: ce vadeyya, yathā yena upacayena kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ upacaye
tika-s0501t:1193_12: taṃ kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Te kilesā katamehi dhammehi niddisitabbā”ti ce puccheyya,
tika-s0501t:1193_13: sabbepi kilesā catūhi vipallāsehi niddisitabbā. “Te kilesā kattha daṭṭhabbā”ti ce
tika-s0501t:1193_14: puccheyya, dasavatthuke kilesapuñje te kilesā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0501t:1194_0: “Katamāni dasa vatthūnī”ti ce puccheyya, cattāro āhārā, cattāro vipallāsā, cattāri
tika-s0501t:1194_1: upādānāni, cattāro yogā, cattāro ganthā, cattāro āsavā, cattāro oghā, cattāro sallā,
tika-s0501t:1194_2: catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, cattāri agatigamanānīti dasa vatthūnīti veditabbāni catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1194_3: kiccavasena ekattā. Ettha ca kilesānaṃ paccayo vatthukāmopi kilesopi kilesavatthu
tika-s0501t:1194_4: hoti purimānaṃ purimānaṃ kilesānaṃ pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kilesānaṃ paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0501t:1195_0: “Katamo katamo katamassa katamassa vatthū”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhame āhāre”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1195_1: vuttaṃ. Ālambitabbe paṭhame kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭhamo “rūpaṃ subha”nti vipallāso ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0501t:1195_2: pavattati. Ālambitabbe dutiye phassāhāre dutiyo “phassapaccayā vedanā sukhā”ti vipallāso
tika-s0501t:1195_3: pavattati. Ālambitabbe tatiye cittāhāre tatiyo “cittaṃ nicca”nti vipallāso pavattati,
tika-s0501t:1195_4: ālambitabbe catutthe manosañcetanāhāre “dhammo attā”ti vipallāso ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0501t:1195_5: pavattati. Ālambitabbe paṭhame “rūpaṃ subha”nti vipallāso paṭhamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0501t:1195_6: pavattati. Sesesupi yathārahaṃ nayānusārena yojetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1196_0: 83. “Tesu āhārādīsu katamo katamassa puggalassa upakkileso”ti vattabbattā “tattha
tika-s0501t:1196_1: yo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu āhārādīsu, taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritesu vā. Taṇhācaritassa
tika-s0501t:1196_2: rūpavedanāsu tibbacchandarāgassa uppajjanato yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro, yo ca phassāhāro
tika-s0501t:1196_3: pavattati, ime kabaḷīkārāhāraphassāhārā taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1196_4: Diṭṭhicaritassa dhammacittesu balavaattaniccābhinivesassa uppajjanato yo ca manosañcetanāhāro,
tika-s0501t:1196_5: yo ca viññāṇāhāro pavattati, ime manosañcetanāhāraviññāṇāhārā diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:1196_6: upakkilesā bhavanti. “Tattha yo ca asubhe subha”ntiādīsupi vuttanayānusārena attho
tika-s0501t:1196_7: gahetabboti. Purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ taṇhāpadhānattā ceva taṇhāsabhāvattā ca, pacchimānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1196_8: dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ diṭṭhipadhānattā ceva diṭṭhisabhāvattā cāti.
tika-s0501t:1197_0: 84. “Katamasmiṃ paṭhamādike āhāre katamo paṭhamādiko vipallāso pavattatī”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1197_1: “tattha kabaḷīkāre āhāre”tiādinā nāmavasena niyametvā pubbe vuttatthameva dasseti.
tika-s0501t:1197_2: “Katamasmiṃ vipallāse ṭhito katamaṃ upādiyatī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhame vipallāse
tika-s0501t:1197_3: ṭhito”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito puggalo kāme yena upādānena upādiyati,
tika-s0501t:1197_4: idaṃ upādānaṃ “kāmupādānaṃ nāmā”ti vuccati. Sesesu iminā nayena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1198: “Yena kāmupādānena kāmehi puggalo saṃyujjati, ayaṃ kāmupādānadhammo ‘kāmayogo’ti vuccatī”tiādinā yojanā kātabbā. Sesānaṃ yojanatthādayo pāḷito, aṭṭhakathāto ca pākaṭā.
tika-s0501t:1199_0: 85. “Āhārādīsu katame katamā disā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha imā catasso disā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1199_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu āhāracatukkādīsu dasasu catukkesu paṭhamo paṭhamo kabaḷīkārāhārādiko
tika-s0501t:1199_2: paṭhamā disā, dutiyo dutiyo phassāhārādiko dutiyā disā, tatiyo tatiyo viññāṇāhārādiko
tika-s0501t:1199_3: tatiyā disā, catuttho catuttho manosañcetanāhārādiko catutthā disāti veditabbā.
tika-s0501t:1200_0: “Tāsu catūsu disāsu tesu kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu dhammesu katame dhammā katamassa upakkilesā”ti
tika-s0501t:1200_1: pucchitabbattā ime āhārādayo dhammā imassa puggalassa upakkilesāti vibhattāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:1200_2: “tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro…pe… ime diṭṭhicaritassa udattassa upakkilesā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1200_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana – “kabaḷīkārāhāro āhārotiādi āhārādīsu ye yassa puggalassa upakkilesā,
tika-s0501t:1200_4: taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ āraddha”nti vuttaṃ. Dasannaṃ suttānanti ekadesabhūtānaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-s0501t:1200_5: suttānaṃ. Atthoti sabhāvadhammo. Saddattho hi asamānoti. “Byañjanameva nāna”nti etena
tika-s0501t:1201: “Kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu katame āhārādayo katamena vimokkhamukhena pariññaṃ pahānaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1202_0: Itīti evaṃ vuttappakārā. Sabbeti sabbe āhārādayo dhammā lokavaṭṭānusārino bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1202_1: Teti te sabbe āhārādayo dhammā. Lokāti lokato vaṭṭato. Tīhi vimokkhamukhehi aniccānupassanādīhi niyyanti.
tika-s0501t:1203_0: 86. Saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtā āhāracatukkādayo dasa catukkā dhammā ācariyena niddhāretvā
tika-s0501t:1203_1: dassitā, amhehi ca ñātā, “vodānapakkhe katame disābhūtā dhammā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1203_2: vodānapakkhe disābhūte dhamme dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cattāro vihārāti
tika-s0501t:1203_3: dibbavihārā brahmavihārā ariyavihārā āneñjavihārāti cattāro vihārā. Tesu rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo
tika-s0501t:1203_4: dibbavihārā, catasso appamaññāyo brahmavihārā, catasso phalasamāpattiyo ariyavihārā,
tika-s0501t:1203_5: catasso arūpasamāpattiyo āneñjavihārā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammāti mānapahānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1203_6: ālayasamugghāto avijjāpahānaṃ bhavūpasamoti cattāro acchariyaabbhutadhammā. Cattāri
tika-s0501t:1203_8: cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni. Catasso samādhibhāvanāti chandasamādhibhāvanā vīriyasamādhibhāvanā
tika-s0501t:1203_9: cittasamādhibhāvanā vīmaṃsāsamādhibhāvanāti catasso samādhibhāvanā. Cattāro sukhabhāgiyāti
tika-s0501t:1203_10: indriyasaṃvaro tapo bojjhaṅgo sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggoti cattāro sukhabhāgiyā. Avasesā pākaṭā.
tika-s0501t:1204_0: “Catūsu catūsu paṭipadādīsu katamo paṭipadādiko paṭhamo satipaṭṭhānādiko bhavatī”ti
tika-s0501t:1204_2: paññāpadaṭṭhānādikā, satipaṭṭhānādayo pana satipadaṭṭhānādikā, tasmā ‘paṭhamā paṭipadā
tika-s0501t:1204_3: paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhāna’ntiādiyojanā kātabbā”ti vattabbattā “paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā
tika-s0501t:1204_4: bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ pūretī”tiādi vuttaṃ, pūrakapūretabbabhāvato tathā
tika-s0501t:1204_5: yojanā kātabbāti adhippāyo. Atha vā “bhāvitā bahulīkatā katame paṭipadādayo katame
tika-s0501t:1204_6: satipaṭṭhānādike pūrentī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1205_0: 87. “Tesu dasasu paṭipadācatukkādīsu katame dhammā katamā disā, katame dhammā katamā
tika-s0501t:1205_1: disā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha imā catasso disā paṭhamā paṭipadā, paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1205_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu dasasu paṭipadācatukkādīsu. Imā mayā vuccamānā paṭhamā paṭipadādayo
tika-s0501t:1206_0: “Tesu catūsu disābhūtesu paṭipadācatukkādīsu katamo disābhūto attho katamassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:1206_1: bhesajja”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha paṭhamā paṭipadā…pe… diṭṭhicaritassa udattassa
tika-s0501t:1207_0: “Tesu dasasu paṭipadādicatukkesu dhammesu katamo katamo katamaṃ katamaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti
tika-s0501t:1207_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha dukkhā ca paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Attho pana ṭīkāyaṃ vitthārena
tika-s0501t:1207_2: vutto pākaṭo. Saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtā āhāracatukkādayo dasa catukkā samatikkamitabbapahātabbabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1207_3: niddhāritā, vodānapakkhe pana disābhūtā paṭipadācatukkādayo dasa catukkā samatikkamapahāyakabhāvena niddhāritā.
tika-s0501t:1208_0: “Tesaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ samatikkamanapahānasaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca
tika-s0501t:1208_1: tesaṃ paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca
tika-s0501t:1208_2: sacchikiriyāsaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca atthi, taṃ tividhaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ katamesaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1208_3: vikkīḷitaṃ bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ vikkīḷita”nti vuttaṃ. Atha vā “yathāvuttappakārehi
tika-s0501t:1208_4: vimokkhamukhehi ye buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā vimucciṃsu, tesu buddhasseva vikkīḷitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1208_5: bhavati kiṃ, paccekabuddhasseva vikkīḷitaṃ bhavati kiṃ, sāvakasseva vikkīḷitaṃ bhavati
tika-s0501t:1208_6: kiṃ, udāhu sabbesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ bhavati ki”nti vicāraṇāya
tika-s0501t:1208_7: sambhavato “tesaṃ vikkīḷita”nti vuttaṃ. Yathāvuttappakārehi vimokkhamukhehi ye buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā
tika-s0501t:1208_8: mucciṃsu, tesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ. Yaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-s0501t:1208_9: catukkānaṃ saparasantāne samatikkamanapahānañca yā paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-s0501t:1208_10: catukkānaṃ saparasantāne bhāvanāsampādanā, sacchikiriyāsampādanā ca atthi, idaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0501t:1209_0: “Sabbesaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ sabbe paṭipadācatukkādayo dasa catukkā
tika-s0501t:1209_1: paṭipakkhā honti kiṃ, udāhu yathākkamaṃ catukkānaṃ catukkā paṭipakkhā honti ki”nti
tika-s0501t:1209_2: vicāraṇāya sambhavato yathākkamaṃ catukkānaṃ catukkā paṭipakkhā honti pahātabbapahāyakabhāvenāti
tika-s0501t:1209_3: dassento “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā”tiādimāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1209_4: pana – “idāni āhārādīnaṃ paṭipadādīhi yena samatikkamanaṃ, taṃ nesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t:1209_5: dassento ‘cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā’tiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0501t:1209_6: saṃkilesapakkhe cattāro ye āhārā niddhāritā, tesaṃ catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1209_7: yā catasso paṭipadā niddhāritā, tā catasso paṭipadā paṭipakkho āhārānaṃ pahātabbattā,
tika-s0501t:1209_8: paṭipadānaṃ pana pahāyakattā. Satipi āhārānaṃ appahātabbabhāve vipassanārammaṇattā
tika-s0501t:1210_0: Sīhāti sīhasadisā buddhā ca sīhasadisā paccekabuddhā ca sīhasadisā sāvakā cāti sīhasadisā
tika-s0501t:1210_1: visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbā. Sāvakā pana ahatarāgadosamohāpi santi, tepi “sīhā”ti maññeyyunti
tika-s0501t:1210_2: taṃ nivattāpanatthaṃ “hatarāgadosamohā”ti vuttaṃ. Hanitabbāti hatā, rāgo ca doso
tika-s0501t:1210_3: ca moho ca rāgadosamohā, hatā rāgadosamohā etehi sāvakehīti hatarāgadosamohā, sāvakāti
tika-s0501t:1210_4: yojanā kātabbā sāvakānaṃyeva byabhicārasambhavatoti. Tesaṃ sīhānaṃ buddhānaṃ, tesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1210_5: sīhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ, tesaṃ sīhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ bhāvanā vodānapakkhe bhāvitabbānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1210_6: bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā ca, sacchikiriyā vodānapakkheyeva sacchikātabbānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1210_7: phalanibbānānaṃ sacchikiriyā ca, byantīkiriyā saṃkilesapakkhe pahātabbānaṃ pahānasaṅkhātā
tika-s0501t:1211_0: Indriyādhiṭṭhānanti saddhindriyādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ bhāvanā,
tika-s0501t:1211_1: sacchikiriyā ca. Vipariyāsānadhiṭṭhānanti vipallāsānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ pahānavasena appavattanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1211_2: anuppādanañca saṅkhepato vikkīḷitaṃ nāmāti gahitaṃ. Indriyāni saddhindriyādīni saddhammagocaro
tika-s0501t:1211_3: saddhammassa vodānapakkhassa gocaro pavattanahetūti adhippetāni. Vipariyāsā vipallāsā
tika-s0501t:1212_0: “Cattāro āhārātiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1212_1: catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ upakkilesavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā ācariyena katā, ‘catasso
tika-s0501t:1212_2: paṭipadā’tiādinā ca vodānapakkhe paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1212_3: catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā ācariyena katā, sā ayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1212_4: niddhāraṇā katamassa nayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmīti vuccatī”ti pucchitabbattā “ayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1212_5: vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ayanti yā ayaṃ vuttanayena
tika-s0501t:1212_6: dvippakārā niddhāraṇā katā, sā ayaṃ dvippakārā niddhāraṇā sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa
tika-s0501t:1212_7: bhūmi pavattiṭṭhānaṃ samuṭṭhānanti nayasamuṭṭhānakosallehi puggalehi vuccatīti yojanā kātabbāti.
tika-s0501t:1213_0: “Vuttappakārāya niddhāritāya nayassa bhūmibhāvo kasmā viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1213_1: vuttaṃ. Tena vuttappakārāya niddhāraṇāya nayabhūmibhāvena “yo neti…pe… kusalāti cā”ti
tika-s0501t:1213_2: yaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyo āha, tena vacanena viññāyatīti.
tika-s0501t:1214_0: Sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmi ācariyena vibhāvitā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katamā tipukkhalanayabhūmī”ti
tika-s0501t:1214_1: pucchitabbattā tipukkhalanayabhūmiṃ vibhāvetukāmo “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:1214_2: Evaṃ sati “ayaṃ saṃkileso, tīṇi akusalamūlānī”tiādivacanameva ācariyena vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1214_3: kasmā pana “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ, tipukkhalanayabhūmibhāvanā
tika-s0501t:1214_5: vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Evamapi “tattha yo
tika-s0501t:1214_6: sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ ugghaṭitaññū”tiādivacanameva vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1214_7: kasmā pana “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ, ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_8: pana sīhavikkīḷitanayato tipukkhalanayassa niggacchanato nikkhamanato sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmivibhāvanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_10: paṭipadāvibhāgato vibhāvitaṃ puggalacatukkaṃ paṭhamaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya
tika-s0501t:1214_11: paṭipadāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti yo paṭipadācatukko sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmivibhāvanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_12: niddhārito, tasmiṃ paṭipadācatukke. Yeti ye dandhaudattā diṭṭhicaritapuggalā yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_13: sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti,
tika-s0501t:1214_14: iti niyyakā dve puggalā ca niddhāritā. “Tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti
tika-s0501t:1214_15: pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”ti vissajjetuṃ “tesaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_16: puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cattāro āhārā niddhāritā…pe… cattāri agatigamanāni
tika-s0501t:1214_17: niddhāritāni, iti ayaṃ dasavidho āhāracatukkādicatukko tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_18: saṃkileso hoti. Tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso ācariyena niddhārito, “katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_19: vodāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Catasso
tika-s0501t:1214_20: paṭipadā niddhāritā, catasso appamāṇā niddhāritā, iti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṭipadācatukkādicatukkabhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_21: dhammajātaṃ tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1215_0: 88. “Tesu catūsu puggalesu katamo puggalo ugghaṭitaññū, katamo puggalo vipañcitaññū,
tika-s0501t:1215_1: katamo puggalo neyyo”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha ye”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Pubbepi ‘tattha
tika-s0501t:1215_2: ye’tiādinā cattāro puggalā niddhāritā, kasmā pana puna “tattha ye’tiādinā cattāro
tika-s0501t:1215_3: puggalā niddhāritā”ti ce vadeyya? Pubbe saṃkilesavodānaṃ sāmibhāvena niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1215_4: pacchā pana ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ avayavānaṃ samūhabhāvena niddhāritāti visesattho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1215_5: Tattha ye…pe… ime dve puggalāti ettha yojanattho heṭṭhā vuttasadisova. Tatthāti tesu
tika-s0501t:1215_6: catūsu puggalesu. Yoti udatto diṭṭhicarito. Ayanti ayaṃ niyato udatto diṭṭhicarito.
tika-s0501t:1215_7: Puna yoti udattova taṇhācarito ca mando diṭṭhicarito ca. Sādhāraṇāyāti dukkhāya paṭipadāya
tika-s0501t:1215_8: khippābhiññāya ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca.
tika-s0501t:1216_0: “Ugghaṭitaññuādayo tayo puggalā ācariyena niddhāritā, tesu tīsu puggalesu katamassa
tika-s0501t:1216_1: katamassa katamaṃ katamaṃ bhagavā upadisatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha bhagavā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1216_2: vuttaṃ. Atha vā “paṭipadābhedena puggalabhedo ācariyena vibhāvito, kathaṃ desanābhedena
tika-s0501t:1216_3: puggalabhedo vibhāvito”ti vattabbattā desanābhedenapi puggalabhedaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha
tika-s0501t:1216_4: bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu tīsu ugghaṭitaññuādīsu puggalesu. “Samathadesanāvipassanādesanābhedeneva
tika-s0501t:1216_6: puggalabhedaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesesupi evameva anusandhyattho vattabbo.
tika-s0501t:1217_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paṭipadābhedena cattāro hutvā visuṃ ca sampiṇḍitā ca paṭipadābhedena
tika-s0501t:1217_1: ceva desanābhedena ca tayo hontīti vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye”tiādiṃ puna vatvā “iti kho
tika-s0501t:1217_2: cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha cattāri tīṇīti liṅgavipallāsaniddeso,
tika-s0501t:1218_0: “Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1218_1: ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ saṃkilesoti “tīṇi akusalamūlāni…pe… sīlavipatti
tika-s0501t:1218_2: diṭṭhivipatti ācāravipattī”ti niddhāritānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ iti ayaṃ samūho
tika-s0501t:1218_3: saṃkileso hoti. “Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso ācariyena niddhārito, kathaṃ vodānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1218_4: niddhāritabba”nti vattabbattā “tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1218_5: Tattha idaṃ vodānanti “tīṇi kusalamūlāni…pe… tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni suññataṃ animittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1218_6: appaṇihita”nti niddhāritānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ samūhabhūtaṃ iti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1219_0: “Vuttappakārena cattāro hutvā tayo puggalā bhavantīti ācariyena vibhāvitā, tayo hutvā
tika-s0501t:1219_1: kittakā puggalā bhavantī”ti vattabbabhāvato “iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1219_2: tīṇi hutvā dve bhavanti taṇhācarito ca diṭṭhicarito cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Itīti heṭṭhā
tika-s0501t:1219_3: vuttappakārena cattāri cattāro hutvā tīṇi tayo bhavanti. Tīṇi tayo hutvā taṇhācarito
tika-s0501t:1219_4: ca diṭṭhicarito cāti dve puggalā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1220_0: “Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti vattabbabhāvato “tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1220_1: ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ saṃkilesoti “taṇhā ca avijjā ca…pe… sassatadiṭṭhi
tika-s0501t:1220_2: ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti niddhāritānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ iti ayaṃ samūho saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t:1221_0: “Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso ācariyena niddhārito, kathaṃ vodāna”nti vattabbabhāvato
tika-s0501t:1221_1: “tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vodānanti “samatho ca vipassanā
tika-s0501t:1221_2: ca…pe… saupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti niddhāritānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1221_3: kusaladhammānaṃ samūhabhūtaṃ iti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1222_1: tikānaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalānaṃ saṃkilesavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā
tika-s0501t:1222_2: katā, “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”tiādinā vodānapakkhe kusalamūlatikādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvādasannaṃ
tika-s0501t:1222_3: tikānaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t:1222_4: ayaṃ vuttappakāraniddhāraṇā tipukkhalassa ca nayassa, aṅkusassa ca nayassa bhūmi
tika-s0501t:1222_5: samuṭṭhānaṃ pavattihetu nāmāti yojetvā “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1222_6: taṇhāavijjādukādīnaṃ pannarasannaṃ dukānaṃ, dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1222_7: vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā, “samatho ca vipassanā cā”tiādinā vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1222_9: puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā, ayaṃ vuttappakārā nandiyāvaṭṭassa
tika-s0501t:1222_10: nayassa bhūmītipi nīharitvā yojetabbā. Puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena hi nandiyāvaṭṭanayato
tika-s0501t:1222_11: sīhavikkīḷitanayassa sambhavo, sīhavikkīḷitanayato ca tipukkhalanayassa sambhavo
tika-s0501t:1222_12: hoti. Dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena pana sīhavikkīḷitanayato tipukkhalanayassa sambhavo,
tika-s0501t:1222_13: tipukkhalanayato ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa sambhavo hoti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ante
tika-s0501t:1222_14: ‘taṇhā ca avijjā cā’tiādinā samathassa nayassa bhūmi dassitā. Teneva hi ‘cattāri
tika-s0501t:1222_15: hutvā tīṇi bhavanti, tīṇi hutvā dve bhavantī’ti vutta”nti.
tika-s0501t:1223_0: “Kasmā pana ayaṃ vuttappakārāya niddhāraṇāya tipukkhalassa ca nayassa, aṅkusassa
tika-s0501t:1223_1: ca nayassa bhūmibhāvo viññāyatī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena yathāvuttassa
tika-s0501t:1223_2: niddhāraṇāya bhūmibhāvena ācariyo “yo akusale…pe… disālocanenāti cā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1223_3: āha, tena vacanena vuttappakārāya niddhāraṇāya tipukkhala…pe… yassa bhūmibhāvo viññāyatīti attho.
tika-s0501t:1224_0: “Ettāvatā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, aññaṃ natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1224_1: nayasamuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yena yena nayasamuṭṭhānena saṃkilesapakkhe vā akusalā
tika-s0501t:1224_2: dhammā niddhāritā, vodānapakkhe vā kusalā dhammā niddhāritā, taṃ taṃ nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1224_3: niyuttaṃ yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabbanti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1225_0: Nayakkamena pana saṅkhepato dassayissāmi – dve puggalā, tayo puggalā, cattāro puggalāti
tika-s0501t:1225_1: puggalā tikoṭṭhāsā bhavanti, catudisā, chadisā, aṭṭhadisāti disāpi tikoṭṭhāsā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1225_2: Tattha dve puggalāti taṇhācarito puggalo, diṭṭhicarito puggaloti dve puggalā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1225_3: Tayo puggalāti ugghaṭitaññupuggalo, vipañcitaññupuggalo, neyyapuggaloti tayo puggalā
tika-s0501t:1225_4: bhavanti. Cattāro puggalāti dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādibhedena bhinnā mudindriyo
tika-s0501t:1225_5: taṇhācarito puggalo, mudindriyo diṭṭhicarito puggalo, tikkhindriyo taṇhācarito puggalo,
tika-s0501t:1225_6: tikkhindriyo diṭṭhicarito puggaloti cattāro puggalā bhavanti. Catudisāti saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1225_7: dve dve disā, vodānapakkhe dve dve disāti catudisā bhavanti. Chadisāti saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1225_8: tisso tisso disā, vodānapakkhe tisso tisso disāti chadisā bhavanti. Aṭṭhadisāti saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1225_9: catasso catasso disā, vodānapakkhe catasso catasso disāti aṭṭhadisā bhavanti. Tesu
tika-s0501t:1225_10: dve dve taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicarite puggale, catudisā ca nissāya nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1225_11: bhavati. Tayo ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggale ca chadisā ca nissāya tipukkhalanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1225_13: puggale ca aṭṭhadisā ca nissāya sīhavikkīḷitanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Ekekasmiṃ nayasamuṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:1226_0: “Kathaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavatī”ti ce vadeyya? “Taṇhā ca avijjā ca ahirikañca
tika-s0501t:1226_1: anottappañca assati ca asampajaññañca ayonisomanasikāro ca kosajjañca dovacassañca
tika-s0501t:1226_2: ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca assaddhā ca pamādo ca asaddhammassavanañca asaṃvaro ca abhijjhā
tika-s0501t:1226_3: ca byāpādo ca nīvaraṇañca saṃyojanañca kodho ca upanāho ca makkho ca paḷāso ca issā
tika-s0501t:1226_4: ca maccherañca māyā ca sāṭheyyañca sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti dukadukavasena
tika-s0501t:1226_5: desito ayaṃ disābhūto akusaladhammasamūho dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1226_6: saṃkileso hotīti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu pannarasasu
tika-s0501t:1226_7: dukadukavasena desitesu disābhūtesu akusaladhammesu katamo akusaladhammo katamassa
tika-s0501t:1226_8: puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo
tika-s0501t:1226_9: akusaladhammo taṇhācaritassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe paṭhamā disā nāma, ayaṃ ayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1226_10: dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe dutiyā disā
tika-s0501t:1226_11: nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo
tika-s0501t:1226_12: ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1226_13: bhavati, tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca
tika-s0501t:1226_14: disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati, tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa
tika-s0501t:1226_15: puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca aṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1227_0: “Samatho ca vipassanā ca, hirī ca ottappañca, sati ca sampajaññañca, yonisomanasikāro
tika-s0501t:1227_1: ca vīriyārambho ca, sovacassañca dhamme ñāṇañca anvaye ñāṇañca, khaye ñāṇañca anuppāde
tika-s0501t:1227_2: ñāṇañca, saddhā ca appamādo ca, saddhammassavanañca saṃvaro ca, anabhijjhā ca abyāpādo
tika-s0501t:1227_3: ca, rāgavirāgā ca cetovimutti, avijjāvirāgā ca paññāvimutti, abhisamayo ca appicchatā
tika-s0501t:1227_4: ca, santuṭṭhi ca akkodho ca, anupanāho ca amakkho ca, apaḷāso ca issāpahānañca macchariyappahānañca
tika-s0501t:1227_5: vijjā ca, vimutti ca saṅkhatārammaṇo ca vimokkho, asaṅkhatārammaṇo ca vimokkho, saupādisesā
tika-s0501t:1227_6: ca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti tikadukavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:1227_7: kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hotīti
tika-s0501t:1227_8: vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu ekūnavīsatiyā dukadukavasena vā
tika-s0501t:1227_9: desitesu disābhūtesu dhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:1227_10: disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo taṇhācaritassa
tika-s0501t:1227_11: puggalassa vodānapakkhe paṭhamā disā nāma, ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusaladhammo diṭṭhicaritassa
tika-s0501t:1227_12: puggalassa vodānapakkhe dutiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā maggasaccanirodhasaccāni
tika-s0501t:1227_13: yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito,
tika-s0501t:1227_14: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati, tassa olokanā ca yena
tika-s0501t:1227_15: saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1227_16: tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena
tika-s0501t:1227_17: nayati, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca aṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1228_1: lobho akusalamūlaṃ, doso akusalamūlaṃ, moho akusalamūlaṃ. Tīṇi duccaritāni – kāyaduccaritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1228_2: vacīduccaritaṃ, manoduccaritaṃ. Tayo akusalavitakkā – kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko,
tika-s0501t:1228_3: vihiṃsāvitakko. Tisso akusalasaññā – kāmasaññā, byāpādasaññā, vihiṃsāsaññā. Tisso
tika-s0501t:1228_4: viparītasaññā – niccasaññā, sukhasaññā, attasaññā. Tisso vedanā – sukhā vedanā, dukkhā
tika-s0501t:1228_5: vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā. Tisso dukkhatā – dukkhadukkhatā, saṅkhāradukkhatā,
tika-s0501t:1228_6: vipariṇāmadukkhatā. Tayo aggī – rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi. Tayo sallā – rāgasallo,
tika-s0501t:1228_7: dosasallo, mohasallo. Tisso jaṭā – rāgajaṭā, dosajaṭā, mohajaṭā. Tisso akusalūpaparikkhā
tika-s0501t:1228_8: – akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ, akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ, akusalaṃ manokammaṃ. Tisso vipattiyo
tika-s0501t:1228_9: – sīlavipatti, diṭṭhivipatti, ācāravipattī”ti tikavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto akusaladhammasamūho
tika-s0501t:1228_10: tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggalānaṃ saṃkileso hotīti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1228_11: yojetvā “imesu dvādasasu tikatikavasena desitesu disābhūtesu akusaladhammesu katamo
tika-s0501t:1228_12: katamo akusalo dhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1228_13: oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1228_14: paṭhamā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo vipañcitaññupuggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1228_15: dutiyā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo akusaladhammo neyyassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1228_16: tatiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā
tika-s0501t:1228_17: vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito. So saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1228_18: ca tipukkhalanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1228_19: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa
tika-s0501t:1228_20: dhammavisesassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1229_0: “Tīṇi kusalamūlāni – alobho kusalamūlaṃ, adoso kusalamūlaṃ, amoho kusalamūlaṃ. Tīṇi
tika-s0501t:1229_1: sucaritāni – kāyasucaritaṃ, vacīsucaritaṃ, manosucaritaṃ. Tayo kusalavitakkā – nekkhammavitakko,
tika-s0501t:1229_2: abyāpādavitakko, avihiṃsāvitakko. Tayo samādhī – savitakko savicāro samādhi, avitakko
tika-s0501t:1229_3: vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhi. Tisso kusalasaññā – nekkhammasaññā,
tika-s0501t:1229_4: abyāpādasaññā, avihiṃsāsaññā. Tisso aviparītasaññā – aniccasaññā, dukkhasaññā, anattasaññā.
tika-s0501t:1229_5: Tisso kusalūpaparikkhā – kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ, kusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ, kusalaṃ manokammaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1229_6: Tīṇi soceyyāni – kāyasoceyyaṃ, vacīsoceyyaṃ, manosoceyyaṃ. Tisso sampattiyo – sīlasampatti,
tika-s0501t:1229_7: samādhisampatti, paññāsampatti. Tisso sikkhā – adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhā.
tika-s0501t:1229_8: Tayo khandhā – sīlakkhandho, samādhikkhandho, paññākkhandho. Tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni
tika-s0501t:1229_9: – suññataṃ, animittaṃ, appaṇihita”nti tikatikavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1229_10: tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1229_11: yojetvā “imesu dvīsu dvādasasu tikatikavasena desitesu disābhūtesu kusaladhammesu
tika-s0501t:1229_12: katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1229_13: oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1229_14: paṭhamā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusalo dhammo vipañcitaññupuggalassa vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1229_15: dutiyā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo kusaladhammo neyyapuggalassa vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1229_16: tatiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā maggasaccanirodhasaccāni yathārahaṃ
tika-s0501t:1229_17: nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito. So saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1229_18: ca tipukkhalanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1229_19: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa
tika-s0501t:1229_20: dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1230_0: “Kathaṃ sīhavikkīḷitanayasamuṭṭhāna”nti ce puccheyya, “cattāro āhārā, cattāro vipallāsā,
tika-s0501t:1230_1: cattāri upādānāni, cattāro yogā, cattāro ganthā, cattāro āsavā, cattāro oghā, cattāro
tika-s0501t:1230_2: sallā, catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, cattāri agatigamanānī”ti catukkacatukkavasena desito
tika-s0501t:1230_3: ayaṃ disābhūto catukko catukko akusaladhammo “dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1230_4: niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa
tika-s0501t:1230_5: tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1230_6: diṭṭhicaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa
tika-s0501t:1230_7: cā”ti catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkilesoti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā
tika-s0501t:1230_8: “imesu catukkacatukkavasena desitesu dasasu catukkesu dhammesu katamo katamo akusaladhammo
tika-s0501t:1230_9: katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva saṃkilesapakkhe disādhammabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1230_10: oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1230_11: niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa paṭhamā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo
tika-s0501t:1230_12: dutiyo akusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1230_13: taṇhācaritassa puggalassa dutiyā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo akusaladhammo
tika-s0501t:1230_14: sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:1230_15: tatiyā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ catuttho catuttho akusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1230_16: niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa catutthā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ
tika-s0501t:1230_17: visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā, samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā, vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo
tika-s0501t:1230_18: ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito. So saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca sīhavikkīḷitanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1230_19: bhavati. Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca
tika-s0501t:1230_20: disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati. Tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1230_21: nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca aṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1231_0: “Catasso paṭipadā, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāri jhānāni, cattāro vihārā, cattāro
tika-s0501t:1231_1: sammappadhānā, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, catasso samādhibhāvanā,
tika-s0501t:1231_2: cattāro sukhabhāgiyā dhammā, catasso appamāṇā”ti catukkacatukkavasena desitaṃ idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1231_4: mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1231_5: taṇhācaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa
tika-s0501t:1231_6: sa sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa cā”ti
tika-s0501t:1231_7: catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu
tika-s0501t:1231_8: catukkacatukkavasena desitesu dasasu catukkesu kusaladhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo
tika-s0501t:1231_9: katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā, “ayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1231_10: ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1231_11: taṇhācaritassa puggalassa paṭhamā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusaladhammo
tika-s0501t:1231_12: dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:1231_13: dutiyā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo kusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1231_14: niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa tatiyā disā nāma. Ayaṃ ayaṃ catuttho
tika-s0501t:1231_15: catuttho kusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1231_16: diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa catutthā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā,
tika-s0501t:1231_17: maggasaccanirodhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā, vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena
tika-s0501t:1231_18: saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito. So saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca sīhavikkīḷitanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1231_19: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā. So saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1231_20: bhavati. Tathā oloketvā disāvisesassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena
tika-s0501t:1231_21: nayati, so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca aṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavatīti nayakkamena saṅkhepato
tika-s0501t:1234: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1236_0: 89. “Tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā ācariyena sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1236_1: amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “soḷasahārapañcanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:1236_2: vibhattā, kuhiṃ amhehi daṭṭhabbā”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ
tika-s0501t:1236_3: daṭṭhabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu soḷasahārapañcanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu aṭṭhārasa
tika-s0501t:1236_4: mūlapadā kena padena ācariyena vibhattā, kuhiṃ amhehi vitthārato daṭṭhabbāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1236_5: Aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne mayā vibhattā, tumhehi ca vitthārato sāsanapaṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:1236_6: daṭṭhabbāti vissajjeti. Vibhattāyeva hi aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbā bhavanti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana –
tika-s0501t:1237_0: “Evaṃ sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā idāni sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajanto yasmā
tika-s0501t:1237_1: saṅgahavārādīsu mūlapadeheva paṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahetvā sarūpato na dassitaṃ, tasmā yathā
tika-s0501t:1237_2: mūlapadehi paṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ, evaṃ paṭṭhānatopi mūlapadāni niddhāretabbānīti
tika-s0501t:1237_3: dassanatthaṃ ‘aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā? Sāsanapaṭṭhāne’ti āhā”ti –
tika-s0501t:1238_0: Vuttaṃ. Sāsanapaṭṭhāne aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbāti ācariyena vuttā, “katamaṃ taṃ
tika-s0501t:1238_1: sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0501t:1238_2: tesu aṭṭhārasamūlapadasāsanapaṭṭhānesu katamaṃ taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānanti idāni mayā niddhāriyamānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1238_3: bhagavatā desitaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādisuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti vissajjeti. Sāsananti
tika-s0501t:1238_4: pariyattisāsanaṃ. Paṭṭhānanti tassa pariyattisāsanassa saṃkilesabhāgiyatādīhi pakārehi
tika-s0501t:1238_5: ṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ, taṃdīpanasuttaṃ pana idha paṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1238_7: sāsanaṃ nāma, taṃ sikkhattayaṃ patiṭṭhahati etena saṃkilesādināti paṭṭhānaṃ, sikkhattayassa
tika-s0501t:1238_8: sāsanassa paṭṭhānanti sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadādhārabhūtaṃ suttampi ṭhānyūpacārato sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1239_0: “Saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ, vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ, nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ, asekkhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1239_1: suttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1239_2: suttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1239_4: suttaṃ, vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ, taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1240_0: Vuttaṃ. “Tesu suttesu ye saṃkilesādayo bhagavatā vuttā, tesu saṃkilesādīsu saṃkileso
tika-s0501t:1240_1: kittako”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha saṃkileso tividho taṇhāsaṃkileso diṭṭhisaṃkileso
tika-s0501t:1240_2: duccaritasaṃkileso”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu suttantesu saṃkilesādīsu dhammesu. “Tividhe
tika-s0501t:1240_3: tasmiṃ saṃkilese taṇhāsaṃkileso katamena kusalena visujjhatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha
tika-s0501t:1240_4: taṇhāsaṃkileso samathena visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ tividhe taṇhāsaṃkilesādike.
tika-s0501t:1240_5: “So samatho khandhesu katamo khandho”ti pucchitabbattā “so samatho samādhikkhandho”ti
tika-s0501t:1240_7: visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Sā vipassanā katamo khandho”ti vattabbattā “sā vipassanā paññākkhandho”ti
tika-s0501t:1240_9: visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Taṃ sucaritaṃ katamo khandho”ti vattabbattā “taṃ sucaritaṃ
tika-s0501t:1240_10: sīlakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ. “Tasmiṃ sīle ṭhitassa puggalassa kiṃ bhavatī”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1240_11: “tassa sīle patiṭṭhitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sīle sucaritasaṅkhāte sīlakkhandhe patiṭṭhitassa
tika-s0501t:1240_12: tassa sīlavantassa puggalassa bhavesu kāmabhavarūpārūpabhavesu āsatti bhavapatthanā
tika-s0501t:1240_13: yadi uppajjati, evaṃsāyanti evaṃ assa ayanti padacchedo. Evaṃ sati assa sīle patiṭṭhitassa
tika-s0501t:1240_15: ca-saddena dānamayasīlamayapuññakiriyavatthu ca bhavatīti attho saṅgahito. Tatrāti
tika-s0501t:1241_0: “Saṃkilesādayo yehi suttehi dassitā, tāni suttāni kittakānī”ti vattabbattā “imāni
tika-s0501t:1241_2: cattāri suttāni bhavanti, sādhāraṇāni saṃkilesabhāgiyavāsanābhāgiyasutta, saṃkilesabhāgiyanibbedhabhāgiyasutta,
tika-s0501t:1241_4: cattāri bhavanti. Iti aṭṭha suttāni bhavanti. Tāniyeva vuttappakārāni aṭṭha suttāni
tika-s0501t:1241_10: soḷasa suttāni bhavanti. Tesu soḷasasuttesu cattāri ekakāni suttāni ca cattāri dukāni
tika-s0501t:1241_11: suttāni ca dve tikāni ca pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni, dve dukāni suttāni ca dve tikāni ca dve
tika-s0501t:1242_0: “Yadi paṭṭhānanayena vuttappakārāni soḷasa suttāniyeva vibhattāni, evaṃ sati suttageyyādinavavidhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1242_1: sakalaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ paṭṭhānanayena avibhattaṃ bhaveyyā”ti vattabbattā “imehi
tika-s0501t:1242_2: soḷasahi suttehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭṭhānanayena vibhattehi soḷasahi imehi suttehi navavidhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1242_3: sakalaṃ pariyattisuttaṃ paṭṭhānanayena vibhattaṃyeva hutvā bhinnaṃ bhavati. Saṃkilesabhāgiyādipabhedāya
tika-s0501t:1242_4: gāthāya gāthā anuminitabbā, saṃkilesabhāgiyādipabhedena veyyākaraṇena veyyākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1242_5: anuminitabbaṃ. Saṃkilesabhāgiyādipabhedena suttena suttaṃ anuminitabbaṃ bhavatiyevāti.
tika-s0501t:1243_0: 90. “Tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti
tika-s0501t:1243_1: pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu
tika-s0501t:1243_2: soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1247_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1247_1: nāma. Ye sattā kāmandhā kāmena andhā jālasañchannā taṇhāchadanena chāditā, pamattabandhanāya
tika-s0501t:1247_2: baddhā bandhitabbā, te satte jarāmaraṇaṃ anveti, yathā taṃ kumināmukhe ye macchā
tika-s0501t:1247_3: gahitā, te macche jarāmaraṇaṃ anveti iva, evaṃ te satte jarāmaraṇaṃ anveti. Khīrapako
tika-s0501t:1247_4: vaccho mātaraṃ anveti iva, evaṃ te satte jarāmaraṇaṃ anvetīti yojanā kātabbā. Atha
tika-s0501t:1247_5: vā khīrapako vaccho mātaraṃ anveti iva, kumināmukhe gahitā macchā jarāmaraṇaṃ anventi
tika-s0501t:1247_6: iva ca, evaṃ ye sattā kāmandhā pamattabandhanāya bandhitabbā, te sattā jarāmaraṇaṃ anventīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1249_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, agatigamanāni. Katamāni cattāri? Chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ
tika-s0501t:1249_1: gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri
tika-s0501t:1249_2: agatigamanāni. Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ vatvāna sugato, athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
tika-s0501t:1250: “Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṃ ativattati;
tika-s0501t:1253_0: Vuttaṃ. Chandā chandahetunā dosā dosahetunā bhayā bhayahetunā mohā mohahetunā yo
tika-s0501t:1253_1: rājādiko yo vinayadharādiko vā dhammaṃ sappurisadhammaṃ ativattati atikkamitvā vattati,
tika-s0501t:1253_2: tassa rājādino vā tassa vinayadharādino vā yaso kitti ca parivāro ca bhogo ca nihīyati.
tika-s0501t:1253_3: Candimā kāḷapakkhe pabhāya nihīyati iva, evaṃ nihīyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1254: “Ettakaṃyevā”ti vattabbattā “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā…pe… cakkaṃva vahato padanti idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti vuttaṃ. Attho pākaṭo. Aṭṭhakathāyampi vibhatto.
tika-s0501t:1255: “Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī;
tika-s0501t:1257_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1257_1: suttaṃ nāma. Nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho gāmasūkaro niddāyitā supanasīlo samparivattasāyī
tika-s0501t:1257_2: hoti iva, evaṃ yo mando satto yadā mahagghaso hoti, so mando satto middhī thinamiddhābhibhūto
tika-s0501t:1257_3: hutvā niddāyitā muduphassasayane muduhatthehi parāmasito samparivattasāyī punappunaṃ
tika-s0501t:1259: Evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ, sāni kammāni nayanti duggati”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1260_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Ayasā ayato samuṭṭhitaṃ jātamalaṃ tatuṭṭhāya
tika-s0501t:1260_1: tato ayato uṭṭhahitvā tameva ayaṃ khādati iva, evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ atikkamitvā dhonacāripuggalaṃ
tika-s0501t:1260_2: sāni sayaṃ katāni akusalakammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1261: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati bajjhate ca;
tika-s0501t:1262: Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā parattha, sakammunā haññati bajjhate cā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1263_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Sandhimukhe rājapurisādīhi gahito coro
tika-s0501t:1263_1: sakammunā attanā katena corakammena haññati ca bajjhate ca yathā, evaṃ ayaṃ pāpakārinī
tika-s0501t:1263_2: pajā parattha paraloke pecca sakammunā sayaṃ katena akusalakammunā satthādīhi haññati
tika-s0501t:1265: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1266_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attano sukhaṃ esāno esamāno yo satto
tika-s0501t:1266_1: aññāni sukhakāmāni bhūtāni daṇḍena vihiṃsati, so hiṃsako satto paraloke pecca sukhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1268: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchanti, nette jimhaṃ gate sati.
tika-s0501t:1270: So ce adhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
tika-s0501t:1271: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1272_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Nadiṃ taramānānaṃ gunnaṃ puṅgavo jimhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1272_1: ce gacchati, evaṃ nette jimhaṃ gate sati sabbā tā gāviyo jimhaṃ gacchanti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1272_2: evameva manussesu yo rājā seṭṭhasammato, so rājā adhammaṃ carati, evaṃ raññe adhammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1272_3: carante sati itarā pajā pageva paṭhamameva adhammaṃ carati. Rājā adhammiko ce hoti,
tika-s0501t:1272_4: evaṃ raññe adhammike sati sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ setīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1273: “Sukiccharūpā vatime manussā, karonti pāpaṃ upadhīsu rattā;
tika-s0501t:1274: Gacchanti te bahujanasannivāsaṃ, nirayaṃ avīciṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānaka”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1275_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Ye manussā upadhīsu kāmaguṇūpadhīsu
tika-s0501t:1275_1: rattā rāgābhibhūtā hutvā pāpaṃ akusalakammaṃ karonti, ime pāpakammakarā manussā sukiccharūpā
tika-s0501t:1275_2: vata suṭṭhu kicchāpannarūpā vata bhavanti, te pāpakammakarā manussā kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1276: “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-s0501t:1277: Sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1278_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Phalaṃ kadaliyā phalaṃ kadaliṃ ve ekantena
tika-s0501t:1278_1: hanti yathā, phalaṃ veḷuṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā, phalaṃ naḷaṃ ve ekantena hanti
tika-s0501t:1278_2: yathā, gabbho assatariṃ mātaraṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā, evaṃ sakkāro kāpurisaṃ ve
tika-s0501t:1281_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Sukhette sundare khettepi khittaṃ pūtibījaṃ
tika-s0501t:1281_1: na ruhati iva, evaṃ yo bhikkhu lābhasakkāragāravo kodhaṃ kujjhanalakkhaṇaṃ kodhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1281_2: makkhaṃ paraguṇasīlamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhañca garuṃ katvā carati, so caranto bhikkhu
tika-s0501t:1282_0: 91. “Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca
tika-s0501t:1282_1: pajānāmi…pe… iti me suta”nti idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Bhikkhave
tika-s0501t:1282_2: idha sāsane, loke vā ahaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ mama cetasā tassa ceto
tika-s0501t:1282_3: cittaṃ paricca paricchinditvā buddhacakkhunā evaṃ pajānāmi. “Kathaṃ pajānāmī”ti ce
tika-s0501t:1282_4: puccheyya, yañca paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno, yañca maggaṃ samāruḷho ayaṃ puggalo yathā yāya
tika-s0501t:1282_5: duppaṭipadāya yena dummaggena iriyati pavattati, tāya duppaṭipadāya tena dummaggena
tika-s0501t:1282_6: imamhi imasmiṃ samaye duppaṭipajjanakāle ayaṃ duppaṭipannaṃ paṭipanno dummaggasamāruḷho
tika-s0501t:1282_7: puggalo ce kālaṃ kareyya, evaṃ sati ābhataṃ vatthu nikkhittaṃ yathā, evaṃ niraye
tika-s0501t:1282_8: nikkhitto. Taṃ kissa hetu? Bhikkhave assa puggalassa cittaṃ paduṭṭhaṃ padositaṃ hi
tika-s0501t:1282_9: yasmā hoti, tasmā nikkhitto. Evaṃ idha sāsane, loke vā cetopadosahetu ca pana ekacce
tika-s0501t:1282_10: sattā puggalā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ upapajjantīti
tika-s0501t:1282_11: pajānāmīti. Etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. Tattha tasmiṃ sutte etaṃ “paduṭṭhacittaṃ ñatvāna…pe…
tika-s0501t:1282_12: nirayaṃ so upapajjatī”ti gāthāvacanaṃ iti evaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1283_0: Satthā idha sāsane, loke vā paduṭṭhacittaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ ñatvāna bhikkhūnaṃ santike
tika-s0501t:1283_1: etamatthaṃ byākāsi. Imamhi imasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ puggalo ce kālaṃ kayirātha, evaṃ sati
tika-s0501t:1283_2: paduṭṭhacittasamaṅgī hi nirayasmiṃ upapajjeyya, puggalassa cittaṃ padūsitaṃ hi yasmā
tika-s0501t:1283_3: hoti, tasmā upapajjeyya, cetopadosahetu sattā duggatiṃ gacchanti ābhataṃ vatthuṃ
tika-s0501t:1283_4: nikkhipeyya yathā, evamevaṃ tathāvidho duppañño so padosacitto puggalo kāyassa bhedā
tika-s0501t:1283_5: paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjatīti ayampi attho bhagavatā vutto, iti me mayā sutanti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1285: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
tika-s0501t:1286: “Sace ca pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissatha karotha vā;
tika-s0501t:1287: Na vo dukkhā pamutyatthi, upeccapi palāyata”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1288_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Sappurisā tumhe dukkhassa jātidukkhajarādukkhabyādhidukkhamaraṇadukkhaapāyadukkha-
tika-s0501t:1288_2: dukkhassa sace bhāyatha, vo tumhehi dukkhaṃ tathā aṭṭhavidhaṃ dukkhaṃ sace appiyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1288_3: evaṃ sati āvi vā yadi raho vā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ mākattha mā akattha. Sappurisā tumhe
tika-s0501t:1288_4: āvi vā yadi raho vā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ sace karissatha vā sace karotha vā, evaṃ sati
tika-s0501t:1288_5: upeccapi sañciccāpi palāyataṃ palāyantānaṃ vo tumhākaṃ dukkhā aṭṭhavidhā dukkhato
tika-s0501t:1290: Mameti bālā maññanti, taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1292: Matā saggaṃ na gacchanti, nanu ettāvatā hatā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1293_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Ye bālā adhammena ca musāvādena ca dhanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1293_1: saviññāṇāviññāṇaṃ sabbaṃ labhitabbaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā ubhayaṃ dhanaṃ “mama dhana”nti
tika-s0501t:1293_2: maññanti, tesaṃ bālānaṃ taṃ ubhayaṃ dhanaṃ kathaṃ kena nu pakārena bhavissati, adhammena
tika-s0501t:1293_3: sambhatattā ciraṭṭhitikaṃ na hoti. Antarāyā rājantarāyādayo antarāyā tesaṃ bālānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1293_4: bhavissanti. Yena adhammavohārādikena yaṃ dhanaṃ sambhataṃ, assa adhammavohārādikassa
tika-s0501t:1293_5: taṃ sambhataṃ dhanaṃ vinassati. Matā marantā te bālā saggaṃ sugatiṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0501t:1293_6: Sugati hi sobhanehi bhogehi aggoti “saggo”ti adhippetā. Ettāvatā ettakena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1293_7: attahitānaṃ hāyanena te bālā hatā vinaṭṭhā bhavanti nanūti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1295: Kathaṃ vivaṭṭate dhammā, kathaṃ saggaṃ na gacchati”.
tika-s0501t:1297: Lobhā vivaṭṭate dhammā, lobhā saggaṃ na gacchatī”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1298: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Yojanattho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1300: Karontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphalaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1301: “Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati;
tika-s0501t:1303_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Dummedhā nippaññā bālā amittena pāpakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1303_1: kammaṃ kataṃ iva, evaṃ attanā kaṭukapphalaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ hoti, taṃ pāpakaṃ kataṃ
tika-s0501t:1303_2: kammaṃ karontā caranti. Yaṃ kammaṃ katvā karonto pacchā anutappati, taṃ kataṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1303_3: na sādhu. Yassa kammassa vipākaṃ rodaṃ rudanto assumukho paṭisevati, taṃ kataṃ kammaṃ na sādhūti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1304: “Dukkaraṃ duttitikkhañca…pe… avītarāgo”ti idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Suttattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato vutto.
tika-s0501t:1306: Appameyyaṃ pamāyinaṃ, nivutaṃ taṃ maññe akissava”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1307_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Idha sāsane appameyyaṃ appameyyaguṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1307_1: khīṇāsavaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ khīṇāsavo puggalo ettakasīlo ettakasamādhi ettakapañño”ti
tika-s0501t:1307_2: paminanto ko puthujjano vikappaye. Appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ pamāyinaṃ pamāyantaṃ
tika-s0501t:1307_3: taṃ puthujjanaṃ ayaṃ nivutaṃ avakujjapaññaṃ akissavaṃ apaññanti maññe maññāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1309: Yāya chindati attānaṃ, bālo dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1310: “Na hi satthaṃ sunisitaṃ, visaṃ halāhalaṃ iva;
tika-s0501t:1311: Evaṃ viraddhaṃ pāteti, vācā dubbhāsitā yathā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1312_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Dubbhāsitaṃ ariyūpavādasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavācaṃ
tika-s0501t:1312_1: bhaṇaṃ bhaṇanto bālo duṭṭho puriso yāya kuṭhārīsadisiyā dubbhāsitavācāya attānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1312_2: chindati, sā kuṭhārīsadisī dubbhāsitavācā jātassa purisassa mukhe jāyate jāyati,
tika-s0501t:1312_3: sā dubbhāsitavācā mukhe jāyati iva, evaṃ sunisitaṃ satthaṃ mukhe na jāyati, yathā
tika-s0501t:1312_4: halāhalaṃ visaṃ mukhe na jāyati, dubbhāsitā vācā apāyesu viraddhaṃ puggalaṃ pāteti
tika-s0501t:1312_5: yathā, evaṃ sunisitaṃ satthaṃ apāyesu na pāteti, halāhalaṃ visaṃ apāyesu na pātetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1314: “Yo nindiyaṃ pasaṃsati, taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyo;
tika-s0501t:1315: Vicināti mukhena so kaliṃ, kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindati.
tika-s0501t:1317: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā, ayameva mahantataro kali;
tika-s0501t:1319: “Sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānaṃ, chattiṃsatī pañca ca abbudāni;
tika-s0501t:1320: Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upeti, vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpaka”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1321_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Yo puggalo nindiyaṃ duccaraṃ dussīlaṃ
tika-s0501t:1321_1: puggalaṃ pasaṃsati, so pasaṃsako puggalo mukhena kaliṃ vicināti upacināti, tena kalinā
tika-s0501t:1321_2: sukhaṃ na vindati. Yo sucārī sīlavā puggalo pasaṃsiyo hoti, taṃ vā sucāriṃ vā sīlavantaṃ
tika-s0501t:1321_3: puggalaṃ yo puggalo nindati, so nindanto puggalo mukhena kaliṃ vicināti upacināti,
tika-s0501t:1322_0: Attanā sahāpi sabbassa dhanassa vasenapi akkhesu yo dhanaparājayo bhavati, ayaṃ kali
tika-s0501t:1322_1: ayaṃ dhanaparājayo appamatto hoti. Yo puggalo sugatesu manaṃ padosaye, tassa puggalassa
tika-s0501t:1322_2: yo kali bhavati, ayameva kali mahantataro hoti.
tika-s0501t:1323_0: Kasmā? Vācañca manañca paṇidhāya ariyagarahī puggalo yaṃ kālaṃ pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,
tika-s0501t:1323_1: so kālo “sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānañca chattiṃsa nirabbudāni ca pañca abbudāni
tika-s0501t:1323_2: ca yasmiṃ kāle gaṇīyantī”ti tena kālena samo hoti, tasmā mahantataro hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1326_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Yo puggalo lobhaguṇe anuyutto anu punappunaṃ
tika-s0501t:1326_1: yutto hoti, so puggalo aññe puggale vacasā paribhāsati, assaddho kadariyo avadaññū
tika-s0501t:1326_2: buddhānaṃ ovādaññū na hoti, maccharī pesuṇiyaṃ pesuṇiyasmiṃ anuyutto hoti.
tika-s0501t:1327_0: Mukhadugga mukhavisama vibhūta vigatabhūta anariya bhūnahu buddhivināsaka pāpaka
tika-s0501t:1327_1: dukkaṭakāri purisanta purisalāmaka kali alakkhi avajātaputta tvaṃ nerayiko asi. Idha
tika-s0501t:1328_0: Ahitāya rajaṃ attani mā ākirasi mā pakkhipasi. Kibbisakāri tvaṃ sante khīṇāsave puggale
tika-s0501t:1328_1: garahasi, bahūni duccaritāni kammāni carasi, caritvā tvaṃ cirarattaṃ racanavirahitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1328_2: papataṃ narakaṃ nirayaṃ gacchasi kho ekaṃsenāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1329_0: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1329_1: vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1329_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1329_3: suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati. “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā…pe… chāyāva anapāyinī”ti idaṃ vāsanābhāge
tika-s0501t:1329_4: puññabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1330_0: 93. “Mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca…pe… apāpikā kālaṅkiriyā”ti idaṃ suttampi
tika-s0501t:1330_1: vāsanābhāge puññabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1332: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1333: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1334: “Gunnaṃ ce taramānānaṃ…pe… rājā ce hoti dhammiko”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1335: 94. “Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati…pe… evaṃ pajānātī”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanā…pe… suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1336_0: “Kasmā bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caratī”ti puccheyya, sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto
tika-s0501t:1336_1: janapadacārikaṃ caranti. Katamehi sattahi? Desantaragatānaṃ veneyyānaṃ vinayanatthaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1336_2: tatra ṭhitānaṃ ussukkasamuppādanatthaṃ, sāvakānaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nibaddhavāsanivāraṇatthaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1336_3: attano ca tattha nibaddhavāse anāsaṅgadassanatthaṃ, sambuddhavasitaṭṭhānatāya desānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1336_5: avuṭṭhiādiupaddavūpasamanatthañcāti imehi sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1338: Deve ceva manusse ca, sesena parinibbuto”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1339: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Sahassaṃ kappakoṭiyoti sahassaṃ attabhāvato koṭiyo.
tika-s0501t:1343: Tisso vijjā sacchikatā, tassā saññāya vāsanā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1344: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Haritobhāseti haritaobhāse. Alabhiṃhanti ahaṃ alabhiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1345_0: “Piṇḍāya kosalaṃ puraṃ…pe… vipāko hoti acintiyo”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1345_1: nāma. Aggapuggalo anukampako taṇhānighātako muni sambuddho purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya piṇḍaṃ
tika-s0501t:1346_0: Yassa purisassa hatthe sabbapupphehi alaṅkato vaṭaṃsako pupphavaṭaṃsakova atthi,
tika-s0501t:1346_1: so ayaṃ puriso rājamaggena kosalapuraṃ pavisantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ devamānusapūjitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1346_2: sambuddhaṃ addasa, disvā haṭṭho cittaṃ pasādesi; pasādetvā sambuddhaṃ upasaṅkami.
tika-s0501t:1347: Upasaṅkamitvā so ayaṃ pasanno hutvā surabhiṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ manoramaṃ taṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ sambuddhassa sehi pāṇībhi upanāmesi.
tika-s0501t:1348_0: Tato buddhassa lapanantarā lapanassa vadanassa antarā aggisikhā vaṇṇā sahassaraṃsi
tika-s0501t:1348_1: okkā pabhā nikkhami, abbhā vijju nikkhamati iva, evaṃ ānanā sahassaraṃsi nikkhamitvā
tika-s0501t:1348_2: ādiccabandhuno sīse tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karitvāna parivaṭṭetvā muddhani antaradhāyatha.
tika-s0501t:1349: Ānando acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā cīvaraṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā etaṃ abravi – “mahāmuni, sitakammassa hetu ko? Taṃ hetuṃ byākarohi, dhammāloko bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0501t:1350_0: Yassa bhagavato sabbadhammesu ñāṇaṃ sadā pavattati, kaṅkhāvitaraṇo muni so bhagavā
tika-s0501t:1350_1: kaṅkhiṃ vematikaṃ ānandaṃ theraṃ etaṃ abravi. Ānanda, yo sopuriso mayi cittaṃ pasādayi,
tika-s0501t:1350_2: so puriso caturāsītikappāni duggatiṃ na gamissati, devesu devasobhaggaṃ dibbaṃ rajjaṃ
tika-s0501t:1350_3: pasāsitvā manujesu raṭṭhe sakalaraṭṭhe manujindo rājā bhavissati. So puriso carimaṃ
tika-s0501t:1350_4: pabbajitvā, dhammataṃ sacchikatvā ca dhutarāgo vaṭaṃsako nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1351: Tathāgate vā sammāsambuddhe vā paccekasambuddhe vā tassa tathāgatassa sāvake vā citte pasannamhi dakkhiṇā appakā nāma natthi.
tika-s0501t:1352_0: Buddhā evaṃ ettakāti acintiyā bhavanti. Buddhadhammā buddhaguṇā evaṃ ettakāti acintiyā
tika-s0501t:1352_1: bhavanti, acintiye pasannānaṃ vipāko puññavipāko evaṃ ettakoti acintiyo hotīti etaṃ abravīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1353_0: 96. “Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ…pe… ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā iti me
tika-s0501t:1353_1: suta”nti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Bhikkhave, idha imasmiṃ sāsane
tika-s0501t:1353_2: ahaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ mama cetasā ekaccassa puggalassa ceto cittaṃ paricca buddhacakkhunā
tika-s0501t:1353_3: evaṃ pajānāmi, yathā yena pakārena ayaṃ puggalo yañca dānādipaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0501t:1353_4: yañca dassanādimaggaṃ samāruḷho hutvā taṃ paṭipadaṃ, maggañca iriyati pavatteti,
tika-s0501t:1353_5: imamhi imasmiñca samaye ayaṃ puggalo ce kālaṃ kareyya, evaṃ sati ābhataṃ vatthuṃ
tika-s0501t:1353_6: nikkhipati yathā, evaṃ tāya paṭipadāya tena maggena sagge attanikkhitto bhave. Taṃ
tika-s0501t:1353_7: kissa hetu? Bhikkhave, assa puggalassa cittaṃ hi yasmā pasannaṃ pasāditaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0501t:1353_8: nikkhitto bhave. Idha sāsane, loke vā ekacce sattā puggalā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
tika-s0501t:1353_9: sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ cetopasādahetu kho pana upapajjantīti evaṃ ahaṃ pajānāmīti bhagavā
tika-s0501t:1353_10: etamatthaṃ avoca. Tattha tasmiṃ atthe saṅgahavasena pavattaṃ etaṃ “pasannacittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1353_11: ñatvāna…pe… saggaṃ so upapajjatī”ti gāthāvacanaṃ vuccati. Ayampi attho bhagavatā
tika-s0501t:1353_12: vutto, iti me mayā sutanti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1354_0: “Suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ nāvaṃ…pe… etādisaṃ katapuññā labhi”nti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1354_1: suttaṃ nāma. Nāri devadhītā suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi chāditaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha
tika-s0501t:1354_2: tiṭṭhasi, pokkharaṇiṃ devapokkharaṇiṃ ogāhasi, padumaṃ pāṇinā chindasi.
tika-s0501t:1355_0: Devate kena kammena te tava tādiso vaṇṇo tādiso ānubhāvo tādisī juti bhavati, devate
tika-s0501t:1355_1: te tava ye keci bhogā manasā icchitā bhavanti, te bhogā ca kena kammena uppajjanti.
tika-s0501t:1355_2: Devate me pucchitā tvaṃ saṃsa saṃsāhi idaṃ sabbaṃ kissa kammassa ca phalanti sakko pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1356_0: Devarājena pucchitā sā devadhītā attamanā hutvā pañhaṃ puṭṭhā sakkassa byākāsi. Devarājā
tika-s0501t:1356_1: addhānaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipannā ahaṃ yasassino kassapassa bhagavato manoramaṃ thūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:1356_2: addassaṃ, disvā tattha thūpe cittaṃ pasādesiṃ. Pasannāhaṃ sehi pāṇīhi padumapupphehi
tika-s0501t:1356_3: pūjesiṃ. Tasseva kammassa idaṃ sabbaṃ phalaṃ vipāko bhave. Katapuññāhaṃ etādisaṃ
tika-s0501t:1356_4: phalaṃ alabhinti sakkassa byākāsi. Iti me sutanti mahāmoggallāno vadatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1357_1: sīlakathā saggakathā puññakathā puññavipākakathāti idaṃ vāsanābhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1357_2: Tattha yāya desanāya dānañca dānaphalañca dassitaṃ, sā desanā dānakathā nāma. Yāya
tika-s0501t:1357_3: desanāya sīlañca sīlaphalañca dassitaṃ, sā desanā sīlakathā nāma. Yāya desanāya saggā
tika-s0501t:1357_4: ca saggesu nibbattāpakañca kammaṃ dassitaṃ, sā saggakathā nāma. Yāya desanāya dānasīlabhāvanādivasena
tika-s0501t:1357_5: dasavidhaṃ puññakammaṃ dassitaṃ, sā puññakathā nāma. Yāya desanāya tādisassa puññakammassa
tika-s0501t:1357_6: vividho ayaṃ vipāko imassa puññassa vipākoti niyametvā dassito, sā puññavipākakathā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1358_0: Dasabaladharānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ uddissakatesu sarīradhātuṃ abbhantare ṭhapetvā
tika-s0501t:1358_1: paṃsūhi katesu thūpesu ye narā pasannā, te narā tattha thūpe kāraṃ puññaṃ katvā saggesu
tika-s0501t:1358_2: uppajjitvā pamodantīti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ vā…pe… suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1359_1: sabbe janā udakena paṃsuṃ temetvā thūpaṃ vaḍḍhetha, so ayaṃ thūpo kassa puggalassa thūpoti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1360_0: Sugatte sundaragatte devate tasmiṃ thūpe pasannā ime devamanujā kāraṃ puññaṃ karontā
tika-s0501t:1360_1: hutvā jarāmaraṇato pamuccare. So ayaṃ thūpo mahesino dasabaladhammadhārino sugatassa
tika-s0501t:1360_2: thūpoti veditabboti āhāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ vā…pe… suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1361_0: Yāhaṃ yā ahaṃ mahesino thūpaṃ cattāri uppalāni ca mālañca abhiropayiṃ, tena mayā
tika-s0501t:1361_1: kataṃ taṃ puññaṃ uḷāraṃ vata āsi ahosi. Tato kappato ajja kappā tiṃsaṃ dharanti satthuno
tika-s0501t:1361_2: thūpaṃ pūjetvā tattakāni duggatiṃ na jānāmi, vinipātaṃ na gacchāmīti yojanā. Idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1362_1: lokanāthassa thūpaṃ apūjesiṃ, pūjetvā satasahassaṃ kappe āyukappe pamudito āsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1362_2: Mayā yaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ, tena puññena vinipātaṃ anāgantuna anāgantvā devasobhaggaṃ
tika-s0501t:1362_3: sampattiṃ ca devarajjāni ca tāni akāriṃ. Atha vā devasobhaggañca mayā kāritaṃ, rajjāni ca mayā kāritāni.
tika-s0501t:1363_0: Adantadamakassa sāsane yaṃ cakkhu paññācakkhu paṇihitaṃ, tathā cittaṃ yaṃ vimuttacittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1363_1: paṇihitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ paññācakkhu vimuttacittaṃ me mayā laddhaṃ, ahaṃ vidhutalatāsaṅkhātataṇhā
tika-s0501t:1363_2: hutvā vimuttacittā phalavimuttacittasampannā amhīti avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ vā…pe… suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1364_0: 98. Vimuttacitte phalavimuttacittasampanne akhile pañcacetokhīlarahite anāsave araṇavihārimhi
tika-s0501t:1364_1: araṇavihārasīle asaṅgamānase alaggamānase paccekabuddhasmiṃ sāmākapatthodanamattameva dakkhiṇaṃ adāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1365_0: Tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe uttamaṃ dhammaṃ paccekabodhidhammaṃ okappayiṃ “so uttamo dhammo
tika-s0501t:1365_1: atthī”ti saddahiṃ. Evaṃ ariyavihārena vihārīhi paccekabuddhehi me mama saṅgamo kato
tika-s0501t:1365_2: siyā bhave, kudāsupi ca ahaṃ apekkhavā mā bhaveyyanti mānasaṃ tasmiñca dhamme paṇidhesiṃ
tika-s0501t:1365_3: “iminā paccekabuddhena laddhadhammaṃ ahampi sacchikareyya”nti cittaṃ paṇidahiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1366_0: Tasseva paccekabuddhe katasseva kammassa vipākato ahaṃ dīghāyukesu amamesu “mama
tika-s0501t:1366_1: pariggaho”ti pariggahābhāvena apariggahesu visesagāmīsu ahīnagāmīsu kurūsu uttarakurūsu
tika-s0501t:1367: Tasseva kammassa vipākato vicitramālābharaṇānulepīsu yasassīsu parivāravantesu tidaso devo ahaṃ visiṭṭhakāyūpagato hutvā sahassakkhattuṃ upapajjatha.
tika-s0501t:1368_0: Tasseva kammassa vipākato ahaṃ vimuttacitto akhīlo anāsavo hutvā hitāhitāsīhi kusalākusalavītivattehi
tika-s0501t:1368_1: antimadehadhāribhi imehi paccekabuddhehi, buddhasāvakehi vā me mama samāgamo āsi.
tika-s0501t:1369_0: “Sīlavato yaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ samijjhate”ti imaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgato jino paccakkhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1369_1: katvā avaca kho, yathā yathā yena yena pakārena me manasā vicintitaṃ, tathā tathā
tika-s0501t:1369_2: tena tena pakārena samiddhaṃ bhavati. Ayaṃ bhavo antimo bhavoti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ vā…pe… suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1370_0: Ekatiṃsamhi kappamhi jino anejo anantadassī “sikhī”ti itināmako uppajji. Tassāpi
tika-s0501t:1370_1: bhagavato rājā bhātā sikhiddhe ca sikhī itināmake buddhe ca tassa bhagavato dhamme
tika-s0501t:1370_2: ca abhippasanno lokavināyakamhi parinibbute sati devātidevassa naruttamassa mahesino
tika-s0501t:1370_3: vipulaṃ mahantaṃ samantato gāvutikaṃ thūpaṃ akāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1371_0: Tasmiṃ thūpe baliṃ pūjābaliṃ abhihārī manusso jātisumanaṃ paggayha pahaṭṭho pūjesi.
tika-s0501t:1371_1: Assa manussassa ekaṃ pupphaṃ vātena paharitaṃ hutvā patitaṃ. Ahaṃ taṃ patitaṃ ekaṃ
tika-s0501t:1372_0: So manusso pupphasāmiko abhippasannacitto hutvā maṃ “tvameva etaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ pūjā”ti
tika-s0501t:1372_1: adāsi. Dadāsīti ettha da-kāro āgamo. Ahaṃ taṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā buddhaṃ buddhaguṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1372_2: punappunaṃ anussaranto yasmiṃ kappe abhiropayiṃ, tato kappato ajja kappā tiṃsaṃ ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1372_3: Tesu kappesu duggatiṃ nābhijānāmi, vinipātañca na gacchāmi, idaṃ phalaṃ thūpapūjāya
tika-s0501t:1372_4: phalanti avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ vā…pe… suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1373_0: Brahmadattassa brahmadattanāmakassa rājino kapilaṃ nāma nagaraṃ suvibhattaṃ bhāgato
tika-s0501t:1373_1: suṭṭhu vibhattaṃ, mahāpathaṃ mahāpathasampannaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ, nānājātikehi manussehi paripuṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1374_0: Pañcālānaṃ tattha puruttame ahaṃ kummāsaṃ vikkiṇiṃ, so ahaṃ yasassinaṃ upariṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1374_1: upasamīpe ṭhitaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ nāma sambuddhaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ addasiṃ, disvā haṭṭho cittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1374_2: pasādetvā naruttamaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ me gehasmiṃ yaṃ dhuvabhattaṃ vijjatha vijji, tena dhuvabhattena nimantesiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1375_0: Yato ca yasmiṃ kāle ca kattiko yassaṃ pannarasīpuṇṇo, sā puṇṇamāsī pannarasī upaṭṭhitā,
tika-s0501t:1375_1: tato ca tasmiṃ kāle ca ahaṃ navaṃ dussayugaṃ gayha ariṭṭhassa ariṭṭhanāmakassa paccekabuddhassa upanāmesiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1376: Naruttamo anukampako kāruṇiko taṇhānighātako muni paccekabuddho pasannacittaṃ maṃ ñatvāna paṭiggaṇhi.
tika-s0501t:1377: Ahaṃ kalyāṇaṃ buddhavaṇṇitaṃ kammaṃ karitvāna deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā tato cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ nagare aḍḍhe kulasmiṃ seṭṭhissa ekaputtako uppajjiṃ, pāṇehi ca piyataro āsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1378: Tato ca tasmiṃ kāle viññutaṃ patto hutvā devaputtena codito ahaṃ pāsādā oruhitvāna sambuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1379_0: So sambuddho bhagavā gotamo anukampāya me dhammaṃ adesesi. Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccañca
tika-s0501t:1379_1: dukkhasamuppādaṃ samudayasaccañca dukkhassa atikkamaṃ nirodhasaccañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1379_2: dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ maggaṃ maggasaccañca iti cattāri saccāni desitāni, taduppādakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1380: Ahaṃ tassa bhagavato gotamassa vacanaṃ sutvā sāsane rato hutvā vihariṃ, ahaṃ rattindivaṃ atandito hutvā samathaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1381: Ajjhattañca ye āsavā, bahiddhā ca ye āsavā maggena samucchinnā āsuṃ, sabbe te āsavā me mama vijjiṃsu, puna na ca uppajjare.
