tika-s0501t:1382_0: Dukkhaṃ “pariyantakataṃ yassa dukkhassā”ti pariyantakataṃ āsi, ayaṃ samussayo jātimaraṇasaṃsāro
tika-s0501t:1382_1: carimo antimo āsi, idāni imassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ punabbhavo mama natthīti avocāti
tika-s0501t:1382_2: yojanā. Yaṃ nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ udāharaṇavasena niddhāritaṃ, idaṃ nānāvidhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1382_3: suttaṃ vāsanābhāge puññakoṭṭhāse visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1383_0: Nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1383_1: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1383_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1384_0: Uddhaṃ brahmaloke adho kāmāvacare bhave sabbadhi sabbesu bhavesu vippamutto arahā
tika-s0501t:1384_1: “ayaṃ nāma dhammo ahaṃ asmī”ti anānupassī, evaṃ vimutto arahā atiṇṇapubbaṃ oghaṃ
tika-s0501t:1384_2: apunabbhavāya udatāri uttiṇṇoti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāge sekkhadhamme visaye
tika-s0501t:1385_1: me mama avippaṭisāro jāyeyya pavatteyyā”ti cetanā na karaṇīyā na kātabbā. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t:1385_2: sīlavato avippaṭisāro yaṃ jāyeyya pavatteyya, esā avippaṭisārassa jāyanā pavattanā
tika-s0501t:1385_3: dhammatā bhavati. Ānanda, avippaṭisārinā puggalena “kinti me mama pāmojjaṃ jāyeyya
tika-s0501t:1385_4: pavatteyyā”ti cetanā na karaṇīyā, ānanda, avippaṭisārino puggalassa pāmojjaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1385_5: jāyeyya pavatteyya, esā pāmojjassa jāyanā pavattanā dhammatā. Sesesupi imassa yojanānayānusārena
tika-s0501t:1385_6: yojanānayo gahetabbo. Idaṃ suttampi nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1386_0: Ātāpino kilesānaṃ ātāpena sammappadhānena samannāgatassa jhāyato jhāyantassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-s0501t:1386_2: yadā yasmiṃ kāle have ekantena pātubhavanti uppajjanti. Atha vā dhammā catuariyasaccadhammā
tika-s0501t:1386_3: pātubhavanti pakāsayanti abhisamayavasena pākaṭā honti. Atha vā pātubhavanakāle assa
tika-s0501t:1386_4: ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa khīṇāsavassa sabbā kaṅkhā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti.
tika-s0501t:1386_5: Kasmā? Sahetudhammaṃ avijjādikena hetunā saha pavattaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ sukhena asammissaṃ
tika-s0501t:1386_6: dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ yato yasmā pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhati, tato tasmā vapayanti
tika-s0501t:1386_7: apagacchanti nirujjhantīti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1387: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ pana paccayānaṃ khayaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yato yasmā avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi, tato tasmā sabbāpi kaṅkhā vapayantīti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1388_0: Tissa, tvaṃ kiṃ nu kujjhasi? Mā kujjhi, tissa, te tava akkodho akujjhanaṃ varaṃ uttamaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1388_1: hi saccaṃ, tissa, tayā kodhamānamakkhavinayatthaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussati nūti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1389_0: Āraññaṃ āraññakaṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ aññātuñchena aññātaanabhilakkhitagharapaṭipāṭiyā ṭhatvā
tika-s0501t:1389_1: uñchena piṇḍapātacaraṇavīriyena laddhena missakabhojanena yāpentaṃ nandaṃ kadā kāle
tika-s0501t:1389_2: ahaṃ passeyyanti avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1390_0: Gotama, kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno hutvā
tika-s0501t:1390_1: sukhaṃ seti sayati, kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso
tika-s0501t:1390_2: hutvā na socati, gotama, tvaṃ kissa ekadhammassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ rocesīti brāhmaṇo pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1391_0: Brāhmaṇa, kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno
tika-s0501t:1391_1: hutvā sukhaṃ seti sayati, kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena
tika-s0501t:1391_2: vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā na socati, visamūlassa visasadisassa dukkhassa mūlabhūtassa
tika-s0501t:1391_3: madhuraggassa madhurasaṅkhātassa sukhapariyosānassa kodhassa kujjhanassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1391_4: ariyā buddhādayo puggalā pasaṃsanti. Hi saccaṃ taṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā
tika-s0501t:1391_5: vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā seti sayatīti yojanā. Madhuraggassāti
tika-s0501t:1391_6: ca madhuraṃ cetasikasukhaṃ assādaaggaṃ pariyosānaṃ assa kodhassāti madhuraggoti samāso
tika-s0501t:1391_7: veditabbo. Kujjhantassa hi akkositvā paribhāsitvā paharitvā pariyosāne cetasikasukhassādo
tika-s0501t:1392_0: Gotama, hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kiṃsu katamaṃ hane haneyya. Vinodento dhīro jātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1392_1: kiṃsu katamaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya. Pajahanto dhīro kiṃ ca katamaṃ pajahe pajaheyya.
tika-s0501t:1392_2: Dhīrassa kissa dhammassa abhisamayo sukhoti devatā pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1393_0: Devaputta, hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ hane haneyya. Vinodento dhīro
tika-s0501t:1393_1: jātaṃ rāgaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya. Pajahanto dhīro avijjaṃ pajahe pajaheyya. Saccadhammassa
tika-s0501t:1393_2: abhisamayo sukhoti bhagavā avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1394_0: 101. Bhagavā sattiyā omaṭṭho uparito yāva heṭṭhā viddho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1394_1: ārabhati viya, agginā matthake ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1394_2: ārabhati iva, evaṃ kāmarāgena ḍayhamāno bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya kāmarāgavikkhambhanāya
tika-s0501t:1394_3: appamatto vāyamamāno sato satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti devatā kathesi.
tika-s0501t:1395_0: Bhagavā pana “samucchedappahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhīyatī”ti dassetuṃ “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:1395_1: Devaputta, sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati viya, agginā matthake
tika-s0501t:1395_2: ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati iva, evaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0501t:1395_3: abhibhūto bhikkhu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggena samucchedappahānāya appamatto
tika-s0501t:1395_4: vāyamamāno sato satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1396_0: Sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khayapariyosānā bhavanti, sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā
tika-s0501t:1396_1: patanapariyosānā bhavanti, sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1396_2: addhuvaṃ bhavati, iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1396_3: apekkhamāno paṇḍito sukhāvahāni diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasukhāvahāni puññāni dānasīlabhāvanāmayapuññāni
tika-s0501t:1397_0: Devaputta, sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khayapariyosānā, sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā
tika-s0501t:1397_1: patanapariyosānā, sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ addhuvaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1397_2: iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ apekkhamāno santipekkho sabbasaṅkhārupasamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1397_3: nibbānaṃ apekkhamāno paṇḍito lokāmisaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ pajahe pajaheyyāti bhagavā avocāti
tika-s0501t:1397_4: yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1398_0: Māvidha yesaṃ munīnaṃ cittaṃ jhānarataṃ jhāne rataṃ hoti, te munayo sukhaṃ sayanti
tika-s0501t:1398_1: na socanti. Paññavā maggapaññavā susamāhito āraddhavīriyo pahitatto nibbānaṃ pesitacitto
tika-s0501t:1399_0: Kāmasaññāya virato vigatacitto yo khīṇāsavo sabbasaṃyojanātīto arahattamaggena sabbe
tika-s0501t:1399_1: saṃyojane atīto nandibhavaparikkhīṇo ahosi, so khīṇāsavo gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na
tika-s0501t:1399_2: sīdatīti yojanā. Nandisaṅkhātā taṇhā ca kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavā ca nandibhavā,
tika-s0501t:1399_3: nandibhavā parikkhīṇā yassa khīṇāsavassāti nandibhavaparikkhīṇoti samāso veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1400_0: Arahataṃ arahantānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ sucaritādibhedañca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedañca
tika-s0501t:1400_1: dhammaṃ yo paṇḍito saddahāno saddahanto hutvā nibbānappattiyā appamatto vicakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t:1400_2: hutvā sussūsaṃ sussūsanto bhave, so paṇḍito paññaṃ lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhate labhati.
tika-s0501t:1401_0: Yo vīriyavā puggalo patirūpadesakārī desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyalokuttaradhammapatirūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:1401_1: adhigamūpāyaṃ karoti, dhuravā cetasikavīriyena anikkhittadhuro uṭṭhātā kāyikavīriyavasena
tika-s0501t:1401_2: uṭṭhānasampanno hoti, so vīriyavā puggalo dhanaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhanaṃ vindate adhigacchati.
tika-s0501t:1401_3: Saccena vacīsaccena ca paramatthasaccena ca buddhādiko saccadhamme ṭhito sappuriso
tika-s0501t:1401_4: kittiṃ pappoti. Dadaṃ dadanto yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ catusaṅgahavatthuṃ dadanto
tika-s0501t:1401_5: saṅgahanto sappuriso mittāni ekantamittāni ganthati sampādeti, evaṃ catūhi saccadhammadhiticāgehi
tika-s0501t:1401_6: samannāgato so sappuriso asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca gantvā ekantena sokakāraṇassa
tika-s0501t:1402_0: Gotama, sabbaganthappahīno tīhi bhavehi vippamutto sato satisampanno tvaṃ, samaṇo,
tika-s0501t:1402_1: aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ anusāsasi yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karosi, taṃ anusāsanaṃ sabbaganthappahīnassa
tika-s0501t:1402_2: tīhi bhavehi vippamuttassa samaṇassa te tava na sādhūti sakkanāmako mārapakkhiko
tika-s0501t:1403_0: “Sakka sakkanāmaka yakkha anukampitena purisena saddhiṃ yena kenaci vaṇṇena kāraṇena
tika-s0501t:1403_1: saṃvāso ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sahavāso jāyati, taṃ anukampitabbaṃ sahavāsagataṃ purisaṃ sappañño
tika-s0501t:1403_2: manasā anukampituṃ na arahati anukampituṃyeva arahati. Yā anukampā karuṇā, yā anuddayā
tika-s0501t:1403_3: mettā, muditā ca uppannā, tāya anukampāya karuṇāya, tāya anuddayāya mettāya muditāya
tika-s0501t:1403_4: ca samussāhitena pasannena manasā yo sappañño sappuriso aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1403_5: anusāsati yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karoti, so sappañño sappuriso tena anusāsanena saṃyutto
tika-s0501t:1403_6: kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ vasena ananulomasaṃyogena saṃyutto na hotīti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1404_0: 102. Samaṇa, rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā kutonidānā, kiṃnidānā, kiṃpaccayā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1404_1: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo kutojā kuto bhavanti? Kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ
tika-s0501t:1404_2: gahetvā pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva,
tika-s0501t:1404_3: evaṃ manovitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajantīti sūcilomayakkho bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0501t:1405_0: Rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā itonidānā ito attabhāvato nidānā jāyanti; arati ca
tika-s0501t:1405_1: rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo itojā ito attato bhavanti; kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0501t:1405_2: pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva, evaṃ manovitakkā
tika-s0501t:1406_0: Nigrodhassa khandhajā pārohā sākhāsu jāyanti iva, vane rukkhaṃ nissāya jātā māluvā
tika-s0501t:1406_1: latā taṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā vitatā otatavitatā tiṭṭhati iva, evaṃ, yakkha, tvaṃ
tika-s0501t:1406_2: suṇohi snehajā taṇhāsnehato jātā attasambhūtā attani sambhūtā puna anekappakārā manovitakkā
tika-s0501t:1406_3: pāpamanovitakkā ceva taṃsampayuttakilesā ca kāmesu vatthukāmesu visattā laggā saṃsibbitā ṭhitā.
tika-s0501t:1407_0: Ye paṇḍitā “yaṃ nidānaṃ assa attabhāvassā”ti yatonidānaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1407_1: pajānanti, te paṇḍitā attabhāvasaṅkhātassa dukkhasaccassa nidānabhūtaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1407_2: samudayasaccaṃ maggasaccena vinodenti. Apunabbhavāya apunabhavasaṅkhātāya nirodhasaccatthāya
tika-s0501t:1407_3: atiṇṇapubbaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre supinenāpi atiṇṇapubbaṃ duttaraṃ imaṃ oghaṃ catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1408_0: “Bhagavā, samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ, bhagavā, samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1408_1: nāma sudukkaraṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ dukkara”nti eko kulaputto pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ katvā
tika-s0501t:1408_2: ariyabhūmiṃ appatvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto, so devaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-s0501t:1408_3: āha. Kāmada, sīlasamāhitā ṭhitattā ṭhitasabhāvā satta sekkhā puggalā dukkaraṃ vāpi
tika-s0501t:1408_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Anagāriyupetassa anagāriyaṃ niggehabhāvaṃ upagatassa pabbajitassa
tika-s0501t:1408_5: tuṭṭhi catupaccayasantoso sukhāvahā hotī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1409_0: “Bhagavā, yadidaṃ yā esā tuṭṭhi sukhāvahā, esā tuṭṭhi dullabhā”ti so devaputto āha.
tika-s0501t:1409_1: “Kāmada, yesaṃ sekkhānaṃ mano divā ca ratto ca bhāvanāya rato cittavūpasame rato,
tika-s0501t:1409_2: te sekkhā dullabhaṃ vāpi tussanaṃ labhantī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1410_0: “Bhagavā, yadidaṃ yaṃ idaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya rataṃ, taṃ cittaṃ dussamādaha”nti so
tika-s0501t:1410_1: devaputto āha. “Kāmada, ye ariyā indriyūpasame rattindivaṃ ratā, te ariyā dussamādahaṃ
tika-s0501t:1410_2: vāpi cittaṃ samādahanti, kāmada, te ariyā maccuno jālaṃ kilesajālaṃ chetvā maggaṃ
tika-s0501t:1411_0: “Bhagavā, yo maggo pubbabhāgapaṭipadāvasena visamo, so maggo duggamo”ti so devaputto
tika-s0501t:1411_1: āha. “Kāmada, ariyā duggame visame vāpi maggaṃ gacchanti, anariyā visame magge avaṃsirā
tika-s0501t:1411_2: papatanti, ariyānaṃ so maggo samova bhave, na asamo. Hi saccaṃ visame visattakāye
tika-s0501t:1411_3: ariyā samā bhavantī”ti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1412: 103. Yaṃ jetavanaṃ isisaṅghanisevitaṃ dhammarājena āvutthaṃ, idaṃ taṃ jetavanaṃ mama pītisañjananaṃ pītiyā sañjananaṃ karaṃ hi karaṃ eva.
tika-s0501t:1413_0: Kammaṃ maggacetanākammañca vijjā maggapaññā ca dhammo samādhi ceva samādhipakkhiko
tika-s0501t:1413_1: ca dhammo sīlaṃ, sīle ṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttamaṃ, etena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sattā
tika-s0501t:1413_2: sujjhanti, gottena vā dhanena vā sattā na sujjhanti.
tika-s0501t:1414_0: Tasmā maggeneva sattānaṃ visujjhanato attano atthaṃ sampassaṃ passanto paṇḍito poso
tika-s0501t:1414_1: yoniso upāyena dhammaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicine vicineyya, evaṃ vicinane sati
tika-s0501t:1415_0: Sāriputto sīlena ca upasamena ca pāraṅgato iva, evaṃ yopi bhikkhu sīlena ca upasamena
tika-s0501t:1415_1: ca pāraṅgato, so bhikkhu etāva paramo sāriputtasadisova siyāti anāthapiṇḍikanāmo
tika-s0501t:1415_2: devaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1416_0: Atītaṃ atītakkhandhapañcakaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nānvāgameyya, anāgataṃ anāgatakkhandhapañcakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1416_1: taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nappaṭikaṅkhe na pattheyya. Yaṃ yasmā atītaṃ pahīnaṃ niruddhaṃ atthaṅgataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1416_2: tasmā atītassa pahīnattā niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā nānvāgameyya. Yaṃ yasmā anāgataṃ
tika-s0501t:1417_0: Paccuppannaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ vayadhammaṃ yattha yattha santāne vā, yattha yattha
tika-s0501t:1417_1: araññādīsu vā uppannaṃ, tattha tattha santāne vā, tattha tattha araññādīsu vā naṃ
tika-s0501t:1417_2: paccuppannadhammaṃ yāhi aniccānupassanādīhi vipassati, tāhi aniccānupassanādīhi nibbānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1417_3: rāgādīhi asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ bhavati, taṃ nibbānaṃ vipassako puggalo vidvā nibbānārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1418_0: Ātappaṃ saṃkilesānaṃ ātapantaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ, suve jīvitaṃ vā maraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1418_1: vā ko jaññā jāneyya, “suve vā dānādipuññaṃ jānissāmī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā “ajjeva
tika-s0501t:1418_2: karissāmī”ti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Hi saccaṃ maraṇakāraṇabhāvatāya ahivicchikavisasatthādianekāya
tika-s0501t:1418_3: senāya vasena mahāsenena tena maccunā saddhiṃ mittasanthavākārena vā lañjadānena
tika-s0501t:1419: Evaṃ manasi katvā vihāriṃ viharantaṃ ātāpiṃ ahorattaṃ atanditaṃ analasaṃ uṭṭhāhakaṃ sappurisaṃ “bhaddekaratto”ti santo muni ve ekantena ācikkhate ācikkhatiyevāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1420: “Cattārimāni bhikkhave”tyādisuttaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca pākaṭaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1421_0: 104. Nānāvidhaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1421_1: asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1421_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1422_0: Yassa uttamapurisassa cittaṃ selūpamaṃ ṭhitaṃ lokadhammavātehi nānukampati, rajanīyesu
tika-s0501t:1422_1: lābhādīsu virattaṃ bhave, so uttamapuriso kopaneyye alābhādike na kuppati, tassa
tika-s0501t:1422_2: uttamapurisassa cittaṃ evaṃ aniccatādinā bhāvitaṃ, naṃ bhāvitacittaṃ uttamapurisaṃ
tika-s0501t:1422_3: vītikkantalokadhammahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ kuto essatīti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāge
tika-s0501t:1422_4: visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Esa nayo ito paresupi veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1424_0: Yo brāhmaṇo bāhitapāpadhammattā bāhitapāpadhammo bhave, so brāhmaṇo niggatahuṃhuṃkattā
tika-s0501t:1424_1: nihuṃhuṅko bhave, niggatakilesakasāvattā nikkasāvo bhave, sīlasaṃvarena saṃyatacittatāya
tika-s0501t:1424_2: yatatto bhave, yo brāhmaṇo catumaggañāṇavedehi antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatattā vedantagū bhave,
tika-s0501t:1424_3: dhammena vusitabrahmacariyattā vusitabrahmacariyo bhave. Yassa brāhmaṇassa kuhiñci
tika-s0501t:1424_4: loke ussadā rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussado natthi, so brāhmaṇo
tika-s0501t:1424_5: brahmavādaṃ “ahaṃ brāhmaṇomhī”ti vācaṃ vadeyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1425: Ye buddhā pāpake akusale dhamme bāhitvā sadā caranti satā satisampannā khīṇasaṃyojanā, te buddhā lokasmiṃ brāhmaṇāti ve ekantena kathīyantīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1426_0: Yattha nibbāne āpo ca pathavī ca tejo ca vāyo ca na gādhati na patiṭṭhahati, tattha
tika-s0501t:1426_1: nibbāne sukkā gahā ceva tārakā ca na jotanti, tattha nibbāne ādicco nappakāsati,
tika-s0501t:1426_2: tattha nibbāne candimā na bhāti, tattha nibbāne tamo na vijjati.
tika-s0501t:1427_0: Yo brāhmaṇo attanā sayaṃ muni monena yadā taṃ nibbānaṃ avedi vindati paṭilabhati
tika-s0501t:1427_1: paṭivijjhati, atha paṭivijjhanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo rūpā rūpadhammato ca arūpā arūpadhammato
tika-s0501t:1427_2: ca sukhadukkhā sukhadukkhato ca pamuccatīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1428_0: Yakkha, yo brāhmaṇo sakesu sakaattabhāvesu dhammesu upādānakkhandhesu saccesu, dhammesu
tika-s0501t:1428_1: ca pāragū hoti, atha pāragamanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo etaṃ ajakalāpakaṃ tayā vuttaṃ etaṃ
tika-s0501t:1428_2: pisācaṃ kilesapisācañca, tayā kataṃ akkulañca akkulaṃ, pakkulakaraṇaṃ ativattatīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1429_0: Yo bhikkhu āyantiṃ āgacchantiṃ purāṇadutiyikaṃ bhariyaṃ vā, aññaṃ āgacchantiṃ itthiṃ
tika-s0501t:1429_1: vā cittena na abhinandati, pakkamantiṃ purāṇadutiyikaṃ bhariyaṃ vā, aññaṃ pakkamantiṃ
tika-s0501t:1429_2: itthiṃ vā cittena na socati, saṅgā pañcavidhatopi saṅgato muttaṃ saṅgāmajiṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-s0501t:1430_0: Ettha nadiyaṃ bahujano nhāyati, so bahujano nhāyako udakena udakanhānena sucī na
tika-s0501t:1430_1: hoti. Yamhi puggale saccaṃ, saccato sesadhammo ca atthi, so puggalo sucī ca hoti,
tika-s0501t:1430_2: so puggalo brāhmaṇo ca hotīti avocāti yojanā; suciasucibhāvo ṭīkāyaṃ vitthārato vuttova.
tika-s0501t:1431_0: Ātāpino jhāyato yassa brāhmaṇassa dhammā saccadhammā yadā have ekantena pātubhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1431_1: tadā dhammānaṃ pātubhavanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo mārasenaṃ vidhūpayaṃ vidhūpayanto tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0501t:1431_3: obhāsayanto tiṭṭhati iva, evaṃ tiṭṭhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1432_0: Yo paṃsukūliko bhikkhu sabbāni cattāri yogāni upātivatto sakiñcane loke akiñcano
tika-s0501t:1432_1: iriyati catubbidhairiyāpathaṃ vatteti. Apahānadhammaṃ kenaci maggena appahānasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t:1432_2: appattakāyena appattaṃ tevijjapattaṃ, iriyamānaṃ santindriyaṃ taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe passatha.
tika-s0501t:1433_0: Ājāniyaṃ purisaājānīyaṃ jātibalanisedhaṃ “ahaṃ jātibrāhmaṇo”ti jātimattakena pavattamānabalanisedhakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1433_1: taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sambahulā uḷārā devatā brahmaṃ vimānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā idha
tika-s0501t:1433_2: sāsane, brahmavimāne vā pasannacittā hutvā namassanti. Nidhāti ca ettha na-kāro āgamo.
tika-s0501t:1434: Purisājañña te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu, purisuttama te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu, yassa te tava nissayaṃ mayaṃ nābhijānāma, so tvaṃ kiṃ puggalaṃ nissāya jhāyasīti avocunti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1435: Ye bhikkhū kālena kālaṃ dhammassavanavasena cirarattaṃ sametikā bhavanti, ime bhikkhū sahāyā honti vata. Nesaṃ sahāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhamme buddhappavedite dhamme saddhammo sameti.
tika-s0501t:1436: Kappinena ariyappavedite dhamme suvinītā te sahāyakā bhikkhū savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ dhārentīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1437: Sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabbha sabbadukkhappamocanaṃ idaṃ nibbānaṃ yogāvacarena na adhigantabbaṃ, appena appakena thāmasā idaṃ nibbānaṃ na adhigantabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1438_0: Ayañca yogāvacaro bhikkhu daharo, yo puriso savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t:1438_1: dhāreti, so ayaṃ puriso so uttamapurisovāti avocāti yojanā. “Puriso”ti vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇavasena “poriso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1439_0: Mogharāja, dubbaṇṇako lūkhacīvaro sadā sato satisampanno khīṇāsavo ca visaṃyutto
tika-s0501t:1439_1: ca katakicco ca anāsavo ca tevijjo ca iddhippatto ca cetopariyāyakovido ca so bhikkhu
tika-s0501t:1439_2: savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ dhāretīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1440: 105. “Tathāgato”tiādīsu yojanā pākaṭā. Idaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1441_0: 106. Nānāvidhaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1441_1: saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca sutta”nti vattabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1441_2: vāsanābhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu
tika-s0501t:1441_3: suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1442_0: Channaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā channaṃ chādentaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso ativassati, vivaṭaṃ
tika-s0501t:1442_1: āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vivaṭaṃ desentaṃ ācikkhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso nātivassati,
tika-s0501t:1442_2: tasmā channassa ativassanato ca vivaṭassa nātivassanato ca channaṃ chāditabbaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-s0501t:1442_3: vivaretha desetha ārocetha, evaṃ vivaraṇe sati taṃ vivarantaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso
tika-s0501t:1443_0: “Imasmiṃ sutte kittakena saṃkileso dassito, kittakena vāsanā dassitā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1443_2: evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī’ti ayaṃ saṃkileso ca vāsanā cā”ti vuttaṃ. “Channamativassatī”ti
tika-s0501t:1443_3: ettakena saṃkileso dassito. “Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatī”ti ettakena vāsanā dassitā. “Tasmā
tika-s0501t:1443_4: channaṃ vivaretha, evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī”ti ettakena ayaṃ saṃkileso ca dassito, ayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1443_5: vāsanā ca dassitā. Idaṃ “channaṃ…pe... vassatī”ti suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca
tika-s0501t:1443_6: vāsanābhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1444_1: mahārājā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Tesu catūsu puggalesu katame puggalā saṃkilesabhāgiyā, katame
tika-s0501t:1444_2: puggalā vāsanābhāgiyā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0501t:1444_3: tesu catūsu tamotamaparāyaṇādīsu puggalesu. Tassattho pākaṭo. Idaṃ “cattārome”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1444_4: suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyesu dvīsu puggalesu ca vāsanābhāgiyesu dvīsu puggalesu ca vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1445_0: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1445_1: ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1445_2: tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho
tika-s0501t:1446_0: Ayasaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca dārujaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca pabbajaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca loke atthi,
tika-s0501t:1446_1: taṃ ayasādibandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti dhīrā buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā na āhu.
tika-s0501t:1446_2: Maṇikuṇḍalesu ca puttesu ca dāresu ca yā sārattarattā balavarāgarattā apekkhā loke
tika-s0501t:1446_3: vijjati, taṃ sārattarattaapekkhāsaṅkhātaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti dhīrā
tika-s0501t:1446_4: paṇḍitapurisā āhu. Iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ sārattarattaapekkhāsaṅkhāto akusaladhammo saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1447_0: “Kena nibbedho dassito”ti vattabbattā “eta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā etaṃ
tika-s0501t:1447_1: rāgabandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti āhu. Etaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ ohārinaṃ heṭṭhā apāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1447_2: avaharaṇaṃ hoti, sithilaṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne chaviādīni akopetattā sithilaṃ hoti, duppamuñcaṃ
tika-s0501t:1447_3: lobhavasena ekavārampi uppannassa rāgabandhanassa dummocayattā duppamuñcaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1447_4: paṇḍitapurisā etampi vuttappakāraṃ rāgabandhanampi maggena chetvāna anapekkhino hutvā
tika-s0501t:1447_5: kāmasukhaṃ pahāya paribbajanti. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1447_6: Idaṃ “ayasa”ntiādikaṃ suttaṃ rāgādisaṃkilesabhāge visaye ca vāsanābhāge visaye ca
tika-s0501t:1447_7: vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1448_0: 107. Bhikkhave, yañca ceteti yañca cetanaṃ nibbatteti, yañca pakappeti yañca pakappanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1448_1: karoti, yañca anuseti yañca anusayanaṃ bhavati, etaṃ cetanaṃ etaṃ pakappanaṃ etaṃ
tika-s0501t:1448_2: anusayanaṃ viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā ārammaṇaṃ paccayo hoti. Ārammaṇe paccaye sati tassa
tika-s0501t:1448_3: abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassa patiṭṭhā hoti. Tasmiṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇe patiṭṭhite viruḷhe
tika-s0501t:1448_4: sati āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti viññāṇādinibbatti hoti. Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā
tika-s0501t:1448_5: sati āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ sambhavati. Āyatiṃ soka…pe… samudayo hoti.
tika-s0501t:1449_0: Bhikkhave, ce no ceteti, ce no pakappeti, atha tathāpi ce anuseti anusayanaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1449_1: evaṃ sati etaṃ anusayanaṃ viññāṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ paccayo hoti…pe…
tika-s0501t:1449_2: samudayo hoti. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ vuttappakāro cetayanādiko akusaladhammo saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1450_0: “Kena nibbedho dassito”ti vattabbattā “yato cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhikkhave, yato ca ariyamaggiko
tika-s0501t:1450_1: neva ceteti, no ca pakappeti, no ca anuseti, etaṃ acetayanaṃ etaṃ akappanaṃ etaṃ
tika-s0501t:1450_2: ananusayanaṃ viññāṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ paccayo na hoti…pe… āyatiṃ
tika-s0501t:1450_3: jātijarāmaraṇaṃ nirujjhati, āyatiṃ soka…pe… yāsā nirujjhanti…pe… nirodho hoti. Iti
tika-s0501t:1450_4: iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ ariyamaggo nibbedho dassito. Idaṃ “yañca bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1450_5: suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca nibbedhabhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t:1451_0: 108. Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1451_1: amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1451_2: “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho
tika-s0501t:1452_0: Bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano samuddo jalasāgarasamuddo “samuddo samuddo”ti bhāsati.
tika-s0501t:1452_1: Kenaṭṭhena bhāsati? Duppūraṇaṭṭhena ca saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ca duratikkamanaṭṭhena ca
tika-s0501t:1452_2: samuddoti bhāsati. Evaṃ sati, bhikkhave, eso jalasāgarasamuddo ariyassa bhagavato
tika-s0501t:1452_3: vinaye vuttappakāraṭṭhena samuddo na hoti. Bhikkhave, eso jalasāgarasamuddo mahā
tika-s0501t:1452_4: udakarāsi mahā udakaṇṇavo hoti. Bhikkhave, cakkhu purisassa samuddo hoti, tassa cakkhussa
tika-s0501t:1452_5: rūpamayo rūpāyatanamayo vego. Kenaṭṭhena? Pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīlādirūpārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1452_6: samosarantampi duppūraṇaṭṭhena ca anamatagge saṃsāre saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ca duratikkamanaṭṭhena
tika-s0501t:1452_7: ca cakkhumeva samuddo hoti. Nīlādirūpāyatanassa appameyyassa appameyyena ūmimayena
tika-s0501t:1452_8: vegena saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena nīlādirūpameva vego hoti. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ cakkhu
tika-s0501t:1452_9: samuddo rūpamayo vego ca saṃkileso saṃkilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t:1453_0: “Kena asekkho dassito”ti vattabbattā “yo ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ arahattaphale ṭhito
tika-s0501t:1453_1: yo arahā rūpamayaṃ taṃ vegaṃ sahati manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ, amanāpe rūpe dosaṃ, asamapekkhane
tika-s0501t:1453_2: mohaṃ anuppādento hutvā upekkhakabhāvena sahati, ayaṃ arahā, bhikkhave, saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0501t:1453_3: sagahaṃ sarakkhasaṃ cakkhusamuddaṃ atarīti vuccati, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati
tika-s0501t:1453_4: brāhmaṇoti vuccati. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ arahattaphalabhūto asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1454_0: “Sotaṃ bhikkhave”tiādīsupi iminā nayena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo. Idaṃ “samuddo”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1454_1: suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca asekkhabhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t:1455_0: “Ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “chayime”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ sattānaṃ anayāya
tika-s0501t:1455_1: anatthāya pāṇīnaṃ byābādhāya ime mayā vuccamānā baḷisā cha bhavanti. Katame cha?
tika-s0501t:1455_2: Bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā cakkhuviññāṇena viññeyyā iṭṭhā kantā kāmanīyā manāpā manavaḍḍhakā
tika-s0501t:1455_3: piyarūpā piyasabhāvā kāmūpasaṃhitā kilesakāmasahitā rajanīyā rūpā nīlādirūpārammaṇā
tika-s0501t:1455_4: santi, taṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ bhikkhu ce abhinandati sappītikataṇhāya abhimukho
tika-s0501t:1455_5: nandati, ce abhivadati “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vadāpentiyā taṇhāyanavasena abhivadati,
tika-s0501t:1455_6: ce ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ sati, bhikkhave,
tika-s0501t:1455_7: ayaṃ bhikkhu “gilitabaḷiso…pe… pāpimato”ti vuccati. Ettha ca nīlādibhedena anekavidhattā
tika-s0501t:1455_9: ca cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena ca ekavidhataṃ anativattanato “ta”nti ekavacananiddeso katoti
tika-s0501t:1455_10: veditabbo. “Santi, bhikkhave, sotaviññeyyā”tiādīsupi iminā nayena yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-s0501t:1455_11: attho veditabbo. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ cakkhuviññeyyādiko chabbidho baḷiso
tika-s0501t:1457_0: Abhedi bhindi, paribhedi parisamantato bhindi. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ arahattaphalabhūto
tika-s0501t:1457_1: asekkho dassito. Idaṃ “chayime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1458_0: 109. Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1458_1: amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1458_2: sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1459_0: Ayaṃ loko sattaloko santāpajāto ñātibyasanādivasena jātasokasantāpo ceva rāgādivasena
tika-s0501t:1459_1: jātapariḷāhasantāpo ca phassapareto anekehi dukkhasamphassehi abhibhūto rodaṃ rodanto
tika-s0501t:1459_2: vadati. Kinti vadati? Attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto
tika-s0501t:1459_3: hutvā “aho dukkhaṃ, īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā rodanto vilapanto
tika-s0501t:1459_4: vadati, “kasmā evaṃ vadatī”ti vattabbattā “attato yena yena hi maññantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1459_5: Ete sattā yena yena kāmajjhosādinā pakārena attato dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti,
tika-s0501t:1459_6: tato pakārato aññathā aññena pakārena taṃ dukkhaṃ tikicchitabbaṃ hi yasmā hoti.
tika-s0501t:1460_0: Aññathābhāvīti yasmā rodaṃ rodanto vadati, yena yena vā paravihiṃsādipakārena attano
tika-s0501t:1460_1: vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti āsīsanti, tato pakārato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva hoti. Taṃ āsīsitabbaṃ
tika-s0501t:1460_2: aññathābhāvi avaḍḍhitabhāvi eva hi yasmā hoti, tasmā maññitabbassa āsīsitabbassa
tika-s0501t:1460_3: aññathā bhavanasīlattā rodaṃ rodanto vadati, ayaṃ sattaloko rodanto ca hutvā vadati.
tika-s0501t:1460_4: “Ki”nti pucchitabbattā “bhavasatto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhavasatto kāmabhavādīsu satto visatto
tika-s0501t:1460_5: loko bhavameva kāmabhavādibhavameva abhinandati. Yaṃ bhavaṃ abhinandati, taṃ jarāmaraṇādianekabyasanānubandhattā
tika-s0501t:1460_6: bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṃ hoti. Yassa yato jarāmaraṇādito bhāyati, taṃ jarāmaraṇādidukkhassa
tika-s0501t:1460_7: adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhaṃ dukkhādhiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ santāpādiko
tika-s0501t:1461_0: Saṃkileso dassito, “kena nibbedho dassito”ti vattabbattā “bhavavippahānāya kho”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1461_1: vuttaṃ. Bhavavippahānāya kho pana kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa pajahanatthāya eva idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1461_2: mayā adhigataṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vussati. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ brahmacariyabhūto
tika-s0501t:1462_0: “Bhavavippahānāyā”tiādinā ekantena niyyānikamaggo nibbedho ācariyena dassito, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1462_1: ca ñāto, “katamo aniyyānikamaggo”ti pucchitabbattā “ye hi keci samaṇā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1462_2: Hi-saddo vācāsiliṭṭhattho. Ye keci samaṇā vā ye keci brāhmaṇā vā bhavena rūpabhavena
tika-s0501t:1462_3: bhavassa kāmabhavassa vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsu, bhavena arūpabhavena bhavassa kāmabhavassa
tika-s0501t:1462_4: ceva rūpabhavassa ca vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsu, sabbe te samaṇā vā sabbe te brāhmaṇā vā
tika-s0501t:1462_5: bhavasmā vuttappakārabhavato avippamuttā bhavantīti ahaṃ vadāmi.
tika-s0501t:1463_0: “Rūpabhavādinā ye ca kāmabhavādibhavassa vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsū”ti vattabbattā vibhavena
tika-s0501t:1463_1: bhavassa nissaraṇaṃ āhaṃsūti dassetuṃ “ye vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ye vā pana keci samaṇā
tika-s0501t:1463_2: vā ye vā pana keci brāhmaṇā vā vibhavena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā bhavassa saṃsārabhavassa
tika-s0501t:1463_3: nissaraṇaṃ āhaṃsu, sabbe te samaṇā vā sabbe te brāhmaṇā vā bhavasmā saṃsārabhavato
tika-s0501t:1463_4: anissaṭāva hontīti ahaṃ vadāmi. “Kasmā anissaṭā”ti vattabbattā anissaṭakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t:1463_5: “upadhiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ dukkhaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ upadhiṃ khandhūpadhikilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhayo
tika-s0501t:1463_6: paṭicca hi yasmā sambhoti, tasmā anissaṭā honti. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1464_0: Ye hi “kecī”tiādinā saṃkileso dassito, “kena nibbedho dassito”ti vattabbattā “sabbupādānakkhayā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1464_1: vuttaṃ. Sabbupādānakkhayā ariyamaggato dukkhassa saṃsāradukkhassa sambhavo natthi.
tika-s0501t:1464_2: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ ariyamaggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1465_1: visuṃ visuṃ avijjāya paretaṃ abhibhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ bhūtesu itthipurisesu aññamaññarataṃ
tika-s0501t:1465_2: bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ bhavehi aparimuttaṃ imaṃ lokaṃ mama citta tvaṃ passa. Ye keci
tika-s0501t:1465_3: bhavā ittarakhaṇā vā bhavā, dīghāyukā vā bhavā, sātavanto vā bhavā, asātavanto vā
tika-s0501t:1465_4: bhavā pañcakkhandhā sabbadhi “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti imesu sabbesu sabbatthatāya
tika-s0501t:1465_5: sabbatthabhāvena ahesuṃ, sabbe te vuttappakārā bhavā niccadhuvarahitattā aniccā sampīḷitattā
tika-s0501t:1465_6: dukkhā vipariṇāmabhāvato vipariṇāmadhammā ahesuṃ. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ avijjādiko saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1466_1: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vuttappakārena etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sassa
tika-s0501t:1466_2: attano maggapaññāya, vipassanāpaññāya vā passato passantassa puggalassa bhavataṇhā
tika-s0501t:1466_3: pahīyati, sammappaññāya yathābhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ passanto vibhavaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0501t:1466_4: nābhinandati na pattheti. Tassa puggalassa sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā asesavirāganirodho
tika-s0501t:1466_5: asesavirāgasaṅkhātena maggena nirodho nirujjhanaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti. Iti iminā
tika-s0501t:1467_0: “Evameta”ntiādinā nibbedho dassito, “kena asekkho dassito”ti vattabbattā “tassa nibbutassā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1467_1: vuttaṃ. Taṇhādiṭṭhinibbutassa tassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanato
tika-s0501t:1467_2: aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti, evaṃbhūtena ariyapuggalena pubbe attānaṃ abhibhūto
tika-s0501t:1467_3: pañcavidho māro vijito ahosi, anena ariyapuggalena pañcahi mārehi saṅgāmo vijito,
tika-s0501t:1467_4: saṅgāme, iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu vā tādī tādilakkhaṇappatto ariyapuggalo sabbabhavāni upaccagā
tika-s0501t:1467_5: atikkantova jāto. Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ asekkho dassito. Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
tika-s0501t:1467_6: “ayaṃ loko”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca nibbedhabhāge visaye ca asekkhabhāge
tika-s0501t:1467_7: visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena ekadesavasena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1468_1: anukūlabhāvena gacchanato anusotagāmī nāma, kalyāṇaputhujjano saṃsārasotassa nibbidānupassanādīhi
tika-s0501t:1468_2: paṭikkūlavasena pavattanato paṭisotagāmī nāma, sekkho acalappasādādisamannāgamena
tika-s0501t:1468_3: ṭhitasabhāvattā ṭhitatto nāma, asekkho saṃsārapāraṅgatavasena tiṭṭhanato “thale tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1469: “Tesu catūsu puggalesu katamo puggalo saṃkilesabhāgiyādī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha yoya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1470_0: 110. Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena
tika-s0501t:1470_1: niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1471_0: Abhijātiyo puggalā cha saṃvijjanti lokasmiṃ, kaṇhe nīce kule nibbatto kaṇhābhijātiko,
tika-s0501t:1471_1: kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā vā kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā kaṇhaṃ kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1471_2: dussīlyadhammaṃ abhijāyati pasavati, eso puggalo atthi. Vuttappakārena kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko
tika-s0501t:1471_3: hutvā sukkaṃ dasavidhaṃ kusaladhammaṃ abhijāyati, eso puggalo atthi. Kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko
tika-s0501t:1471_4: hutvā akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ accantadiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādheti, eso puggalo
tika-s0501t:1472: “Tesu katame puggalā saṃkilesabhāgiyā”tiādinā vattabbattā “tattha yo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1474_0: 111. Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena
tika-s0501t:1474_1: niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti
tika-s0501t:1475_0: Mānusattaṃ manussabhāvaṃ laddhāna kiccaṃ, akiccañca dve bhavanti, dve kiccāniyeva
tika-s0501t:1475_1: kattabbāni. Tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo “kattabba”nti dasseti. “Katamaṃ kattabbaṃ kicca”nti
tika-s0501t:1475_2: vattabbattā kattabbakiccaṃ dassetuṃ “sukiccaṃ cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Puññāni ca kattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1475_3: sukiccaṃ eva, saṃyojanavippahānaṃ vā kattabbattā sukiccaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1476: “Tattha sutte katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “sukiccaṃceva puññānīti vāsanā, saṃyojanavippahānaṃ vāti nibbedho”ti vutto.
tika-s0501t:1477_0: “Ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “puññāni karitvānā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Puññāni karitvāna katapuññā
tika-s0501t:1477_1: puggalā saggā saggato saggaṃyeva vajanti. Saṃyojanappahānā ariyā jarāmaraṇā jarāmaraṇato vippamuccanti.
tika-s0501t:1478_0: “Tattha sutte katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “puññāni karitvāna, saggā saggaṃ
tika-s0501t:1478_1: vajanti katapuññā’ti vāsanā, ‘saṃyojanappahānā, jarāmaraṇā vippamuccantī’ti nibbedho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1479: “Ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “dvemānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “tattha yo…pe… ayaṃ nibbedho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1480_0: Nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1480_1: ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiya”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1480_2: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1480_3: suttaṃ taṇhāpakkheneva niddisitabbaṃ, bahuvisayattā niyametvāna niddhāressāmīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1480_4: hoti. “Kena pakārena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tīhi taṇhāhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhavataṇhāyāti
tika-s0501t:1480_5: rūpabhavataṇhāya. Vibhavataṇhāyāti arūpabhavataṇhāya. Yena yena vā pana vatthunā
tika-s0501t:1480_6: taṇhāpabhedaucchedādivatthunā ajjhositā bhavataṇhādivasena ajjhositā, tena tena pakārena
tika-s0501t:1480_7: taṇhādinā vā taṇhāpabhedaucchedādivatthunā vā taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1481_0: Taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ taṇhāpakkheneva niddisitabbanti ācariyena vuttaṃ, amhehi
tika-s0501t:1481_1: ca lakkhitaṃ, “diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kena pakkhena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1481_2: “tattha diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti diṭṭhippabhedaamarāvikkhepādivatthunā.
tika-s0501t:1482_0: Diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhipakkheneva niddisitabbanti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1482_1: amhehi ca lakkhitaṃ, “duccaritasaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kena pakārena niddisitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1483_0: 112. Yasmiṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāne aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbā, taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ soḷasahi
tika-s0501t:1483_1: saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi suttehi ekadesaniddhāraṇavasena vibhajitaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1483_2: “kiṃ pana taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ tehi soḷasahi eva saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi vibhajitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1483_3: udāhu aññehi suttehipi vibhajitabba”nti vattabbattā aññehi aṭṭhavīsasuttehipi vibhajituṃ
tika-s0501t:1483_4: “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā? Lokiyaṃ lokuttara”ntiādi vuttaṃ. “Yadi aññehipi
tika-s0501t:1483_5: aṭṭhavīsasuttehi vibhajitabbaṃ, evaṃ sati ‘lokiya’ntiādivacanameva vattabbaṃ, kasmā
tika-s0501t:1483_6: ‘tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā’ti vuttā”ti ce? Tassa sāsanapaṭṭhānavibhāgo aṭṭhārasahi
tika-s0501t:1483_7: mūlapadehi saṅgahito, aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāpi vibhajite sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbā, tasmā
tika-s0501t:1483_8: mūlapadā vibhattāyeva. Tāni mūlapadāni vibhajituṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā”ti
tika-s0501t:1484_0: “Evaṃ soḷasavidhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttehi udāharaṇavasena vibhajitvā idāni
tika-s0501t:1484_1: aṭṭhavīsatividhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ dassentena yasmā ayampi paṭṭhānavibhāgo mūlapadehi
tika-s0501t:1484_2: saṅgahito, na imassāpi tehi asaṅgahito padeso atthi, tasmā mūlapadaṃ, vibhajitabbatañca
tika-s0501t:1484_3: dassetuṃ ‘tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā’ti pucchāya vasena mūlapadāni uddharitvā
tika-s0501t:1484_4: ‘lokiyaṃ lokuttara’ntiādinā nava tikā, thavo cāti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ uddiṭṭha”nti –
tika-s0501t:1485_0: Vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu soḷasahārapañcakanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu katamāni padāni mūlapadāni
tika-s0501t:1485_1: hontīti pucchati. Loke niyutto sabhāvadhammoti lokiyo, loke vā vidūhi vidito sabhāvotipi
tika-s0501t:1485_2: lokiyo, lokiyo sabhāvadhammo assa visesasuttassa atthīti taṃ visesasuttaṃ lokiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1485_3: nāma. Esa nayo “lokuttara”ntiādīsupi veditabbo. Jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ assa visesasuttassa
tika-s0501t:1485_4: atthīti ñāṇaṃ. Ñātabbāti ñeyyā, ñeyyā assa visesasuttassa atthīti ñeyyaṃ. Eseva nayo
tika-s0501t:1485_5: – “ñāṇañca ñeyyañcā”ti etthāpi veditabbo. Nibbānaṃ paṭhamaṃ passatīti dassanaṃ, paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1485_6: dassanaṃ assa visesasuttassa atthīti dassanaṃ. Bhāvanā assa visesasuttassa pāḷiyā
tika-s0501t:1485_7: atthīti bhāvanā. “Dassanañca bhāvanā cā”ti etthāpi esa nayo veditabbo. Sassa attano
tika-s0501t:1485_8: vacananti sakaṃ, sakaṃ vacanaṃ sakavacanaṃ, bhagavato vacananti attho. Parassa vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1485_9: paravacanaṃ. Vissajjanīyo assa visesasuttassa atthīti vissajjanīyaṃ. Natthi vissajjanīyo
tika-s0501t:1485_10: assa visesasuttassāti avissajjanīyaṃ. Kammaṃ assa visesasuttassa atthīti kammaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1485_11: Vipāko assa pāṭhassa atthīti vipāko. Sesesupi assatthiattho gahetabbo. Atha vā lokiyādiattho
tika-s0501t:1485_12: mukhyattho, taṃvācakasuttampi ṭhānyūpacārena vuttaṃ. Buddhādīnaṃ guṇe abhitthavati
tika-s0501t:1486_0: “Tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1486_1: sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ lokiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu
tika-s0501t:1486_2: lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ suttanti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1487_0: Bhikkhave, dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ sajjukhīraṃ nikkhantakkhaṇe na muccati na pariṇamati
tika-s0501t:1487_1: khīrabhāvaṃ pajahitvā dadhibhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti, takkādiambilasamāyogato pacchā khīrabhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t:1487_2: pajahati dadhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti iva, evaṃ yena bālena pāpaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1487_3: karaṇakkhaṇe tassa bālassa apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena na vipaccati. Dutiye pana
tika-s0501t:1487_4: vā tatiyādimhi vā attabhāve vipaccati. Bhasmacchanno chārikāya paṭicchanno pāvako
tika-s0501t:1487_5: aggi akkantaṃ janaṃ akkamanakkhaṇe na ḍahati. Chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā kālantare ḍahati
tika-s0501t:1487_6: iva, evaṃ yena bālena pāpaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ kammaṃ karaṇakkhaṇe taṃ bālaṃ apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena
tika-s0501t:1487_7: ḍahāpentaṃ hutvā na anveti. Dutiye vā tatiyādimhi vā attabhāve apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena
tika-s0501t:1487_8: ḍahāpentaṃ hutvā ḍahantaṃ taṃ bālaṃ taṃ anvetīti yojanā. Idaṃ “na hi…pe… pāvako”ti
tika-s0501t:1487_9: suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1488_0: “Ettakameva lokiya”nti vattabbattā “cattārimānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Attho pākaṭo. Idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1488_1: “cattārimāni…pe… kāḷapakkheva candimā”ti suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1489_0: “Evaṃ duvidhaṃyeva lokiya”nti vattabbattā “aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1489_1: Attho pākaṭo. Idaṃ “aṭṭhime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiyesu aṭṭhavidhesu atthesu vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1490_0: Nānāvidhaṃ lokiyaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ suttaṃ lokuttara”nti
tika-s0501t:1490_1: vattabbattā “tattha katamaṃ lokuttara”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ito paresupi esa nayo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1491_0: Chekena sārathinā sudantā assā samathaṅgatā yathā, evaṃ pahīnamānassa pahīnanavavidhamānassa
tika-s0501t:1491_1: yassa anāsavassa bhikkhuno indriyāni chabbidhāni cakkhundriyādīni samathaṅgatāni.
tika-s0501t:1491_2: Tādino tādilakkhaṇena samannāgatassa anāsavassa tassa bhikkhuno devāpi manussāpi
tika-s0501t:1491_3: pihayantīti yojanā. Idaṃ “yassindriyānī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1492: “Ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “pañcimāni bhikkhave indriyānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ “pañcimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokuttaraṃ nāma. (1)
tika-s0501t:1493_0: “Laddhāna mānusattaṃ dve, kiccaṃ akiccameva cā”tiādikā dve gāthā vuttā. Iha gāthāsu
tika-s0501t:1493_1: “sukiccaṃ ceva puññānī”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca “puññāni karitvāna, saggā saggaṃ vajanti
tika-s0501t:1493_2: katapuññā”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca vuttaṃ, idaṃ gāthāpadaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1494_0: Iha gāthāsu “saṃyojanavippahānaṃ vā”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca “saṃyojanavippahānā, jarāmaraṇā
tika-s0501t:1494_1: vippamuccantī”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca vuttaṃ, idaṃ gāthāpadaṃ vuttanayena lokuttaraṃ
tika-s0501t:1495_0: Bhikkhave, viññāṇe āhāre āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge sati nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
tika-s0501t:1495_1: “Viññāṇe…pe… hotī”ti idaṃ vuttanayena lokiyaṃ nāma. “Viññāṇe…pe… nirodho”ti idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1495_2: suttaṃ lokuttaraṃ nāma. Idaṃ “viññāṇe ce bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiye atthe ca
tika-s0501t:1495_3: lokuttare atthe ca ekadesavasena vācakañāpakavasena pavattanato lokiyañca lokuttarañca. (2)
tika-s0501t:1496_0: 113. Sattaloke sabbā disā anuparigamma kvaci disāyaṃ cetasā attanā attato piyataraṃ
tika-s0501t:1496_1: aññaṃ neva ajjhagā, attāva piyataro yathā, evaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ puthu visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0501t:1496_2: attāva piyo piyataro, tasmā attanova piyatarattā attakāmo attano hitakāmo paṇḍito
tika-s0501t:1496_3: sattaloko attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā paraṃ na hiṃse na hiṃseyyāti yojanā. Idaṃ “sabbā disā”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1496_4: suttaṃ sattesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1497_0: Ye keci khīṇāsavā puggalā bhūtāva na bhavissanti, sabbe te khīṇāsavā puggalā dehaṃ
tika-s0501t:1497_1: attabhāvaṃ pahāya nibbānaṃ gamissanti. Ye ca puthujjanādayo sattā punabbhavesu bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t:1497_2: sabbe te puthujjanādayo sattā dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ pahāya paralokaṃ gamissanti, taṃ sabbajāniṃ
tika-s0501t:1497_3: sabbassa sattassa hāniṃ maraṇaṃ, vināsaṃ vā kusalo yo puggalo vijānāti, so kusalo
tika-s0501t:1497_4: puggalo taṃ sabbajāniṃ viditvā ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyāti yojanā. Idaṃ “ye kecī”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1498_0: Sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ yāvajīvaṃ kusalena puggalena na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1498_2: piyo ca piyāyitabbo ca hoti, pāsāṇachattaṃ viya garu ca hoti, sambhāvetabbatāya bhāvanīyo
tika-s0501t:1498_3: ca hoti, “kālena vadāmi, no akālenā”tiādike pañcadhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1498_4: vā sissānaṃ vā vinicchayaullumpanaovādadānabhāve ṭhatvā vattā ca hoti, sabrahmacārīhi
tika-s0501t:1498_5: vā sissādīhi vā vuccamāno suvaco hutvā tesaṃ vacanakkhamo ca hoti, saccapaṭiccasamuppādādigambhīraṃ
tika-s0501t:1498_6: vā aññaṃ gambhīraṃ vā kathaṃ kattā ca hoti, dhammavinayādivaseneva dīpanato aṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:1498_7: ca na niyojako hoti. Imehi sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ yāvajīvaṃ na
tika-s0501t:1498_8: vijahitabbaṃ. Idaṃ “sattahī”tiādivacanaṃ bhagavā avoca. Idaṃ “sattahī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1498_9: sugato vatvā athāparaṃ etaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ satthā avoca. Kiṃ avoca?
tika-s0501t:1500: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
tika-s0501t:1502: Etaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ satthā avocāti yojanā. “Na ca aṭṭhānayojako”ti pāṭho atthi. Idaṃ “sattahī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1503_0: Loke yaṃ kāmasukhañca yaṃ idaṃ diviyaṃ sukhañca atthi, ete kāmasukhadiviyasukhā taṇhākkhayasukhassa
tika-s0501t:1503_1: soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghantīti yojanā. Idaṃ “yañcā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1504: Yattha nibbāne dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ susukhaṃ vatāti yojanā. Idaṃ “susukha”ntiādikaṃ suttampi dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ. (3)
tika-s0501t:1505_0: Tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ mātarañca, pitaraṃ nissāya mānassa
tika-s0501t:1505_1: uppajjanato mānasaṅkhātaṃ pitarañca, raṭṭhe loko raṭṭhissaraṃ rājānaṃ bhajati viya
tika-s0501t:1505_3: khattiye dve rājāno ca, āyasādhako puriso raṭṭhe atthaṃ anucarati iva nandirāgassa
tika-s0501t:1505_4: dvādasāyatane anucaraṇato nandirāgasaṅkhātena anucaraṇena saha pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ dvādasāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1505_5: raṭṭhañca khīṇāsavo yo brāhmaṇo hanati, so brāhmaṇo hantvā anīgho niddukkho hutvā
tika-s0501t:1505_6: yātīti yojanā. Iha “mātara”ntiādigāthāyaṃ “mātaraṃ…pe… hantvā”ti idaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1505_7: dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ. “Anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo”ti idaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1506_0: “Cattārome bhikkhave iddhipādā”ti idaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ. So catūhi
tika-s0501t:1506_1: iddhipādehi samannāgato puggalo kāyepi karajakāyepi cittaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ samodahati
tika-s0501t:1506_2: pakkhipati, so puggalo dissamānakāyena gantukāmo karajakāyagatikaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1506_3: adhiṭṭhahati. Cittepi pādakajjhānacittepi kāyaṃ karajakāyaṃ samodahati pakkhipati,
tika-s0501t:1506_4: so puggalo sīghaṃ aññaṃ gantukāmo pādakajjhānacittagatikaṃ karajakāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0501t:1506_5: Kāye karajakāye sukhasaññañca sukhavihārasaññañca lahusaññañca lahugamanasaññañca
tika-s0501t:1506_6: okkamitvā aññaṃ gamaneyyaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇeneva ca gantvā upasampajja
tika-s0501t:1507_0: 114. Yaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ, yena sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-s0501t:1507_1: bhagavā “sabbaññū”ti vuccati, tassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa parihānaṃ natthi, taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1507_2: sabbakāle jānituṃ āvajjanakāle pavattatīti yojanā. Idaṃ “yaṃ ta”ntiādikaṃ ñāṇe atthe
tika-s0501t:1508_0: Yāya nibbānagāminiyā maggapaññāya jātimaraṇasaṅkhayaṃ pajānāti, sā nibbānagāminī
tika-s0501t:1508_1: maggapaññā sabbāhi lokiyāhi paññāhi seṭṭhā pasatthāti yojanā. Idaṃ “paññā hī”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1509_0: “Dhotaka, vo tumhākaṃ santiṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmī”ti bhagavā avoca. “Diṭṭhe dhamme dukkhādidhamme
tika-s0501t:1509_1: vā attabhāve vā sato aniccānupassanādisatisampanno hutvā caraṃ caranto yogāvacaro
tika-s0501t:1509_2: anītihaṃ yaṃ santiṃ yaṃ nibbānaṃ ariyamaggena viditvā loke saṃsāraloke visattikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1509_3: visappakaṃ taṇhaṃ tare tareyyā”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1510_0: Dhotako bhagavantaṃ vadati “mahesi mahante sīlakkhandhādī esanasīla, gotama, sato
tika-s0501t:1510_1: ‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’tiādisaraṇasampanno hutvā caraṃ caranto yogāvacaro uttamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1510_2: yaṃ santiṃ yaṃ nibbānaṃ ariyamaggena viditvā loke saṃsāraloke visattikaṃ taṇhaṃ tare
tika-s0501t:1510_3: tareyyāti tañca vacanaṃ tañca santiṃ nibbānaṃ ahaṃ abhinandāmi abhipatthayāmi, mahesi
tika-s0501t:1510_4: tvaṃ, yañca sampajānāsī”ti dhotako bhagavantaṃ vadati.
tika-s0501t:1511_0: “Dhotakā”ti ālapitvā bhagavā dhotakaṃ avoca. “Uddhaṃ anāgataṃ upari adho atītaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-s0501t:1511_1: ca tiriyañcāpi majjhe paccuppannaṃ parito ca loke saṃsāraloke etaṃ taṇhaṃ bhavābhavāya
tika-s0501t:1511_2: khuddakabhavamahantabhavatthāya saṅgo laggoti viditvā vicaranto tvaṃ taṇhaṃ mākāsi
tika-s0501t:1511_3: mā akāsī”ti bhagavā dhotakaṃ avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ “kittayissāmī”tiādikaṃ ñeyye visaye
tika-s0501t:1512_1: ariyasaccānaṃ ariyabhāvakarānaṃ saccānaṃ ananubodhā abujjhanena appaṭivedhā appaṭivijjhanena
tika-s0501t:1512_2: evaṃ iminā kāraṇena mamañceva tumhākañca dīghamaddhānaṃ idaṃ sandhāvitaṃ sandhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1512_3: idaṃ saṃsaritaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ ahosīti, bhikkhave, ajja tayidaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1512_4: mayā anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ…pe… tayidaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ
tika-s0501t:1512_5: mayā anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, mama bhavataṇhā ucchinnā, bhavanetti taṇhā khīṇā, idāni
tika-s0501t:1512_6: mama punabbhavo natthi, iti idaṃ “catunna”ntiādikaṃ bhagavā avoca, sugato idaṃ “catunna”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1512_7: vatvā athāparaṃ etaṃ “catunna”ntiādigāthāvacanaṃ satthā avocāti yojetvā gāthāyañca
tika-s0501t:1512_8: tatheva yojanā kātabbā. Idaṃ “catunna”ntiādikaṃ vuttanayena ñeyyaṃ nāma. (5)
tika-s0501t:1513: “Rūpaṃ aniccaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ anicca”nti idaṃ suttaṃ ñeyye rūpādidhamme vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1514_0: Evaṃ “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena jānaṃ jānanto evaṃ “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena
tika-s0501t:1514_1: passaṃ passanto ariyasāvako ariyassa bhagavato sāvako “idaṃ rūpaṃ anicca”nti rūpaṃ
tika-s0501t:1514_2: passati, “ayaṃ vedanā aniccā”ti vedanaṃ passati, “ayaṃ saññā aniccā”ti saññaṃ passati,
tika-s0501t:1514_3: “ime saṅkhārā aniccā”ti saṅkhāre passati, “idaṃ viññāṇaṃ anicca”nti viññāṇaṃ passati.
tika-s0501t:1514_4: Iti idaṃ suttaṃ rūpādipassane ñāṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1515_0: So “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena passanto ariyasāvako rūpena rūparāgena parimuccati…pe…
tika-s0501t:1515_1: viññāṇamhā viññāṇarāgamhā parimuccatīti dukkhasmā parimuccatīti ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1515_2: Idaṃ “so parimuccatī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ ñāṇe ca ñeyye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t:1516_0: Sabbe pañcakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkharitattā saṅkhārā ādiantavantabhāvato, aniccantikabhāvato,
tika-s0501t:1516_1: tāvakālikabhāvato ca khaṇaparittabhāvato aniccā bhavanti. Idaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti
tika-s0501t:1516_2: suttappadesavacanaṃ vuttanayena ñeyyaṃ nāma. Yadā vipassanākaraṇakāle paññāya vipassanāpaññāya
tika-s0501t:1516_3: passati aniccatādikaṃ passati. Idaṃ “yadā paññāya passatī”ti suttappadesavacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1516_4: ñāṇaṃ nāma. Atha passanakkhaṇe dukkhe pañcakkhandhe vipassako nibbindati, nibbindanto
tika-s0501t:1516_5: puggalo dukkhādijānanādivasena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati, eso catusaccapaṭivedho
tika-s0501t:1516_6: visuddhiyā visuddhatthāya maggoti. Idaṃ “athā”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñāṇañca ñeyyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1517_0: Soṇāti soṇaṃ ālapati. Samaṇā bāhirakasamaṇā brāhmaṇā jātibrāhmaṇā aniccena rūpena,
tika-s0501t:1517_1: dukkhena rūpena, vipariṇāmadhammena rūpena “ahaṃ parehi seyyo uttamo asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t:1517_2: “ahaṃ parena sadiso samāno asmī”ti vā samanupassanti, “ahaṃ parato hīno lāmako asmī”ti
tika-s0501t:1517_3: vā samanupassanti, yathābhūtassa adassanā aññatra vajjetvā aññaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1517_4: siyā, yathābhūtaṃ adassanato tāva samanupassanassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi, yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:1517_5: adassanameva kāraṇanti veditabbaṃ. “Aniccāya vedanāyā”tiādīsupi iminā vuttanayena
tika-s0501t:1517_6: vuttanayānusārena yojanā kātabbā. Idaṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñeyyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1517_7: nāma. “Ye ca kho kecī”tiādiko sukkapakkho pana vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1517_8: “ye ca kho”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma. Idaṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1517_9: ñāṇe ca ñeyye ca atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇañca ñeyyañca hoti. (6)
tika-s0501t:1518_0: Nānāvidhaṃ ñāṇañca ñeyyañca sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca
tika-s0501t:1518_1: ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ dassana”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ dassana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1518_2: Tatthāti tesu lokiyādīsu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu sāsanapaṭṭhānesu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1519_0: 115. Gambhīrapaññena sabbaññubuddhena sudesitāni saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi
tika-s0501t:1519_1: suṭṭhu desitāni ariyasaccāni ye bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā paññāobhāsena vibhāvayanti,
tika-s0501t:1519_2: te bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ
tika-s0501t:1519_3: pamattā kiñcāpi honti, tathāpi te bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā sotāpattimaggañāṇena
tika-s0501t:1519_4: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena aṭṭhamabhavādīsu uppajjanārahānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ niruddhattā
tika-s0501t:1519_5: aṭṭhamakkhattuvasena aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ na ādiyantīti yojanā. Idaṃ “ye ariyasaccānī”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1519_6: suttaṃ dassane paṭhamamaggañāṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato dassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1520_1: āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tasmiṃ āvāṭe ussāpitattā pathavissito pathavinissito antopathavinissito
tika-s0501t:1520_2: indakhīlo sāradārumayo thambho catubbhi catūhi disāhi āgatehi vātehi mahāvātehi asampakampiyo
tika-s0501t:1520_3: sampakampituṃ asakkuṇeyyo siyā yathā, yo sappuriso ariyasaccāni avecca passati, taṃ
tika-s0501t:1520_4: sappurisaṃ sabbatitthiyavādavātehi asampakampiyattā tathūpamaṃ ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1521_0: Bhikkhave, catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ariyassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0501t:1521_1: sāvako ācikkhituṃ ākaṅkhamāno hutvā attanāva sayameva attānaṃ byākareyya “bho, mama
tika-s0501t:1521_2: atta ahaṃ idāni khīṇanirayo amhi, khīṇatiracchānayoni amhi…pe…. dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti
tika-s0501t:1521_3: byākareyya. Caturaṅgasarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “katamehi catūhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ “catūhī”tiādikaṃ dassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1522: Nānāvidhaṃ dassanaṃ niddhāritaṃ, “katamā bhāvanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamā bhāvanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1523_0: Idha sāsane yassa ariyasāvakassa ajjhattaṃ kāmabhave nibbattāpakānaṃ orambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1523_1: pajahanavasena ca bahiddhā rūpārūpabhavesu nibbattāpakānaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1523_2: pajahanavasena ca indriyāni saddhindriyādīni indriyāni subhāvitāni ariyamaggabhāvanāvasena
tika-s0501t:1523_3: suṭṭhu bhāvitāni bhavanti, bhāvito bhāvitamaggo sa danto so ariyasāvako imaṃ lokañca
tika-s0501t:1523_4: paraṃ lokañca nibbijjha nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā kālaṃ maraṇakāle, kālaṃkiriyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1523_5: vā kaṅkhati patthetīti yojanā. Ayaṃ “yassindriyānī”tiādikā pāḷi bhāvanāya vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1524_2: sesesupi. Ayaṃ “cattārimānī”tiādikā pāḷi vuttanayena bhāvanā nāma. (7)
tika-s0501t:1525_0: Devaputta chindanto puggalo pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā maggattayena chinde
tika-s0501t:1525_1: chindeyya, pajahanto puggalo pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni arahattamaggena jahe
tika-s0501t:1525_2: pajaheyya, bhāvayanto puggalo pañca saddhindriyādīni ca uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya.
tika-s0501t:1525_5: pañca jahe”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ dassanaṃ nāma. “Pañca cuttari…pe… vuccatī”ti ayaṃ pāḷi
tika-s0501t:1525_6: bhāvanā nāma. Idaṃ “pañcā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ dassanañca bhāvanā ca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1527: 116. “Sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ…pe… buddhāna sāsana”nti idaṃ suttaṃ sammāsambuddhassa vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma. Attho heṭṭhā vuttova.
tika-s0501t:1528_0: Bhikkhave, bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālaupalakkhaṇakāraṇāni bālanimittāni “ayaṃ bālo”ti
tika-s0501t:1528_1: gahaṇakāraṇāni bālāpadānāni bālassa apadānāni porāṇāni viruḷhāni kammāni yehi bālalakkhaṇādīhi
tika-s0501t:1528_2: bālaṃ “bālo”ti pare paṇḍitā sañjānanti, imāni bālalakkhaṇāni mayā vuccamānāni tīṇi.
tika-s0501t:1528_3: Katamāni tīṇi? Bhikkhave, bālo duccintitacintī ca duccintitaṃ abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1528_4: cintī ca hoti, dubbhāsitabhāsī dubbhāsitaṃ musāvādādiṃ bhāsī ca hoti. dukkaṭakammakārī
tika-s0501t:1528_5: ca dukkaṭaṃ pāṇātipātādikammaṃ kārī ca hoti. Bhikkhave, bālassa…pe… bālāpadānāni
tika-s0501t:1528_6: iminā mayā vuttāni tīṇi kho bhavanti. Sukkapakkho pana vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1528_7: Idaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sammāsambuddhassa vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1529_0: Pathavīsamo vitthato sambodho nāma natthi. Pātaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ ābhuso lābhi gaṇhātīti
tika-s0501t:1529_1: pātālo, pātālena samo pātālasamo ninno na vijjati. Merusamo unnato natthi, cakkavattisadiso
tika-s0501t:1529_2: poriso natthīti yojanā. Idaṃ “pathavīsamo”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ parassa devassa vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1530_0: “Devānaṃ inda, tava subhāsitena jayo hotī”ti vatvā “vepacitti, tava subhāsitena jayo
tika-s0501t:1530_1: hotū”ti vatvā “vepacitti, tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇa bhaṇāhī”ti avoca. Bhikkhave, atha kho
tika-s0501t:1530_2: asurindo vepacitti imaṃ vuccamānaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “te paṭisedhako no ce assa no ce
tika-s0501t:1530_3: bhaveyya, evaṃ sati bālā bhiyyo pakujjheyyuṃ, tasmā dhīro paṇḍito bhusena daṇḍena bālaṃ nisedhaye”ti.
tika-s0501t:1531_0: Gāthāya, bhikkhave, asurindena vepacittinā bhāsitāya asurā anumodiṃsu, devā tuṇhī
tika-s0501t:1531_1: ahesuṃ. Bhikkhave, atha kho asurindo vepacitti devānaṃ indaṃ sakkaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1531_2: avoca “devānaminda, tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇa bhaṇāhī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhikkhave, atha
tika-s0501t:1531_3: kho devānamindo sakko imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ paraṃ paccatthikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1531_4: saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā sato satimā yo paṇḍito kodhato upasammati, tassa paṇḍitassa etadeva
tika-s0501t:1532_0: Gāthāya, bhikkhave, devānamindena sakkena bhāsitāya devā anumodiṃsu, asurā tuṇhī
tika-s0501t:1532_1: ahesuṃ. Bhikkhave, atha kho devānamindo sakko asurindaṃ vepacittiṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca
tika-s0501t:1532_2: “vepacitti, tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhikkhave, atha kho asurindo
tika-s0501t:1532_3: vepacitti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “vāsava yadā titikkhati, tadā naṃ titikkhantaṃ puggalaṃ
tika-s0501t:1532_4: bālo “ayaṃ me bhayā titikkhatī”ti maññati, titikkhāya etadeva vajjaṃ ahaṃ passāmi.
tika-s0501t:1532_5: Vāsava gogaṇo palāyinaṃ gavaṃ ajjhottharati iva, evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhāruhati ajjhottharati.
tika-s0501t:1533_0: Gāthāya, bhikkhave, asurindena vepacittinā bhāsitāya asurā anumodiṃsu, devā tuṇhī
tika-s0501t:1533_1: ahesuṃ. Jāyamāne ca goyuddhe paṭhamaṃ dveyeva goṇā yujjhanti, gogaṇo pana yāva eko
tika-s0501t:1533_2: goṇo na palāyati, tāva olokentova tiṭṭhati. Yadā ca eko goṇo palāyati, tadā sabbo
tika-s0501t:1533_3: goṇo taṃ palāyinaṃ gavaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti goyuddhasabhāvo veditabbo. “Atha
tika-s0501t:1534_0: Vepacitti, yo puggalo titikkhati, taṃ khamantaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ me bhayā titikkhatī”ti
tika-s0501t:1534_1: kāmaṃ maññatu vā, mā maññatu vā, taṃ maññanaṃ nipphalameva. Atthā sadatthaparamā
tika-s0501t:1534_2: bhavanti. Khantyā khantito bhiyyo sadattho nāma na vijjati.
tika-s0501t:1535: Yo balavā santo dubbalassa have titikkhatīti tassa balavantassa taṃ titikkhanaṃ paramaṃ khantinti sappurisā āhu, dubbalo niccaṃ khamati eva.
tika-s0501t:1536_0: Yassa bālassa bālabalaṃ atthi, tassa bālassa bālabalaṃ “abala”nti sappurisā āhu,
tika-s0501t:1536_1: yassa dhammaguttassa yaṃ balaṃ atthi, tassa dhammaguttassa tassa balassa paṭivattā
tika-s0501t:1537_0: Vepacitti, yo puggalo kuddhaṃ paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa paṭikujjhati, so paṭikujjhanto
tika-s0501t:1537_1: puggalo tena paṭikujjhanena tassa paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa pāpapuggalassa pāpapuggalato
tika-s0501t:1537_2: pāpiyo eva pāpataro hīnataro eva bhave.
tika-s0501t:1538_0: Vepacitti, yo sappuriso sato satimā paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa
tika-s0501t:1538_1: appaṭikujjhantova bhave, so sappuriso dujjayaṃ saṅgāmaṃ jeti nāma, attano ca parassa
tika-s0501t:1539_0: Attano ca parassa ca tikicchantānaṃ ubhinnaṃ kodho upasammati, ye janā dhammassa
tika-s0501t:1539_1: khantidhammassa atthe, catusaccadhamme vā akovidā bhavanti, te janā khamantaṃ sappurisaṃ
tika-s0501t:1539_2: “ayaṃ bālo”ti maññanti, tesaṃ akovidānaṃ janānaṃ taṃ maññanaṃ nipphalanti.
tika-s0501t:1540_0: Gāthāsu, bhikkhave, devānamindena sakkena bhāsitāsu devā anumodiṃsu, asurā tuṇhī
tika-s0501t:1540_1: ahesunti yojanā. Idaṃ “bhiyyo bālā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sakkavepacittīnaṃ vacanabhāvato
tika-s0501t:1541_0: 117. Pattaṃ etarahi adhigataṃ yañca kāmūpakaraṇaṃ, āyatiṃ pattabbaṃ adhigataṃ yañca
tika-s0501t:1541_1: kāmūpakaraṇaṃ atthi, etaṃ ubhayaṃ rajānukiṇṇaṃ rāgarajādikiṇṇaṃ iti āturassa āturānaṃyeva
tika-s0501t:1541_2: puggalānaṃ santike anusikkhato anusikkhantassa sikkhāsārā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, sīlaṃ
tika-s0501t:1541_3: vataṃ jīvitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ime sikkhāsārā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti ye upaṭṭhānasārā
tika-s0501t:1541_4: puggalā sārato gahetvā ṭhitā. Ettha sīlaṃ nāma “na karomī”ti oramaṇaṃ. Vataṃ nāma
tika-s0501t:1541_5: bhojanakiccakaraṇādi. Jīvitaṃ nāma ājīvo. Brahmacariyaṃ nāma methunavirativisesabhāvo
tika-s0501t:1541_6: veditabbo. Tesaṃ upaṭṭhānasārānaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ vādo eko paṭhamo anto lāmako. Ye
tika-s0501t:1541_7: ca puggalā “kāmesu doso natthī”ti evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino hutvā ṭhitā, tesaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1541_8: ayaṃ vādo eko dutiyo anto lāmako. Iccete ubho antā antavādā puggalā kaṭasivaḍḍhanā
tika-s0501t:1541_9: kaṭasiyo diṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhenti. Ete ubho ante attakilamathānuyoge kāmasukhallikānuyoge
tika-s0501t:1541_10: eke puggalā anabhiññāya olīyanti, eke puggalā atidhāvantīti yojanā. Idaṃ “yañca patta”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1541_11: vacanaṃ paresaṃ puggalānaṃ vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1542_0: Ye ca sammādiṭṭhipuggalā te ubho ante attakilamathānuyogakāmasukhallikānuyoge abhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1542_1: tatra ca ante na ahesuṃ. Tena ca abhijānanena te ubho ante na amaññiṃsu, tesaṃ sammādiṭṭhipuggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1542_2: vaṭṭaṃ tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ paññāpanāya natthi. Iti evaṃ idaṃ “ye cā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1542_3: bhagavato vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma. Ayaṃ udāno “yañca pattaṃ…pe… paññāpanāyā”ti
tika-s0501t:1542_4: ayaṃ udāno vuttanayena sakavacanañca paravacanañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1543_0: Pasenadi nāma kosalo kosalissaro rājā bhagavantaṃ etaṃ “idha mayhaṃ…pe… tesaṃ piyo
tika-s0501t:1543_1: attā”ti vacanaṃ avoca. Bhante, idha rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa mayhaṃ mama cetaso
tika-s0501t:1543_2: cittassa evaṃ parivitakko udapādi, kesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo nu kho, kesaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1543_3: attā appiyo nu kho iti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ udapādi. Bhante, tassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1543_4: ahosi, ye ca keci sattā kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti kho…pe… manasā duccaritaṃ caranti
tika-s0501t:1543_5: kho, tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyo kho. Te duccaritaṃ carantā sattā “no attā piyo”ti
tika-s0501t:1543_6: evaṃ kiñcāpi vadeyyuṃ, atha kho tesaṃ duccaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyova.
tika-s0501t:1543_7: Taṃ kissa hetu? Appiyo appiyassa anatthāya yaṃ duccaritaṃ kareyya, taṃ duccaritaṃ
tika-s0501t:1543_8: te duccaritaṃ carantā sattā attanāva. sayameva. Attano anatthāya hi yasmā karonti,
tika-s0501t:1543_9: tasmā tesaṃ duccaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyovāti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t:1544_0: Bhante, ye ca keci sattā kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti kho…pe… manasā sucaritaṃ caranti
tika-s0501t:1544_1: kho, tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo kho, te sucaritaṃ carantā sattā
tika-s0501t:1544_2: “no attā appiyo”ti evaṃ kiñcāpi vadeyyuṃ, atha kho tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1544_3: attā piyova. Taṃ kissa hetu? Piyo piyassa atthāya yaṃ sucaritaṃ careyya, taṃ sucaritaṃ
tika-s0501t:1544_4: te sucaritaṃ carantā sattā attanāva sayameva attano atthāya hi yasmā karonti, tasmā
tika-s0501t:1544_5: tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyovāti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. Etaṃ
tika-s0501t:1545: “Evametaṃ mahārājā”ti vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā “ye hi kecī”tiādike bhagavato vuttavacanepi yojanā tatheva kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1546_0: Gāthāsu pana yo paṇḍito attānaṃ “piya”nti ce jaññā, evaṃ sati so paṇḍito naṃ attānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1546_1: pāpena kammena na saṃyuje na saṃyojeyya, taṃ vacanaṃ hi saccaṃ piyaṃ attānaṃ sulabhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1546_2: na hoti, dukkaṭakārinā sukhaṃ sulabhaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0501t:1547_0: Antakena maccunā adhipannassa mānusaṃ bhavaṃ jahato pajahantassa tassa maraṇamukhe
tika-s0501t:1547_1: ṭhitassa sattassa kiṃ sakaṃ hoti, maraṇamukhe ṭhito so satto kiñca ādāya paralokaṃ
tika-s0501t:1547_2: gacchati, chāyā gacchantaṃ sattaṃ anapāyinī iva, evaṃ assa paralokagatassa sattassa kiñca anugaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1548_0: Iti bhagavā evaṃ pucchati, pucchitvā “ubho”tiādivissajjanavacanañca āha. Idha loke
tika-s0501t:1548_1: yo macco yaṃ puññañca yaṃ pāpañca ubho kamme kurute karoti, tassa paralokagatassa
tika-s0501t:1548_2: maccassa taṃ puññapāpadvayaṃ sakaṃ hoti. Paralokaṃ gato macco taṃva puññapāpadvayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1548_3: ādāya paralokaṃ gacchati, chāyā gacchantaṃ sattaṃ anapāyinī iva, evaṃ assa paralokagatassa
tika-s0501t:1549_0: Tasmā paṇḍito samparāyikaṃ samparāye phalanibbattāpakaṃ kalyāṇaṃ nicayaṃ nicayanto
tika-s0501t:1549_1: hutvā kareyya. Pāṇinaṃ paralokasmiṃ puññāni patiṭṭhā honti, iti bhagavā āhāti yojanā
tika-s0501t:1549_2: kātabbā. Idaṃ “rājā pasenadī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ kosalarañño vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1549_3: hoti. “Evametaṃ, mahārāja, evametaṃ mahārājā”tiādikā anugīti bhagavato vacanabhāvato
tika-s0501t:1549_4: sakavacanaṃ hoti. Idaṃ dvayaṃ vacanaṃ sakavacanañca paravacanañca hoti. (10)
tika-s0501t:1550_0: 118. Pañhe pucchite idaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ, idaṃ samudayasaccaṃ pahātabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1550_1: idaṃ maggasaccaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, idaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, phalaṃ vā sacchikātabbaṃ, ime kusalākusalā
tika-s0501t:1550_2: dhammā evaṃ kusalākusalabhāvena gahitā anavajjasāvajjabhāvena vā gahitā sukhavipākadukkhavipākabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1550_3: vā gahitā, idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ idaṃ aniṭṭhavipākaṃ phalaṃ nibbattayaiti evaṃgahitānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1550_4: tesaṃ kusalākusaladhammānaṃ ayaṃ vuḍḍhi attho, ayaṃ hāni atthoti. Iti idaṃ “pañhe
tika-s0501t:1550_5: pucchite”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1551_0: “Uḷāro buddho bhagavā”ti iminā padena buddhauḷārataṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_1: “Svākkhāto dhammo”ti iminā padena dhammasvākkhātataṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_2: “Suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti iminā padena saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva
tika-s0501t:1551_3: niddise “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti iminā padena saṅkhārāniccataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_4: “Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti iminā padena saṅkhāradukkhataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise. “Sabbe
tika-s0501t:1551_5: dhammā anattā”ti iminā padena dhammānattataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise. “Sabbe saṅkhārā
tika-s0501t:1551_6: anattā”ti avatvā “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vuttena iminā padena saṅkhārehi aññaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1551_7: vā pana maggaphalanirodhasamāpattidhammajātaṃ atthi, taṃ maggaphalanirodhasamāpattidhammajātampi
tika-s0501t:1551_9: ekaṃseneva niddiseti yojanā. Idaṃ “uḷāro”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye buddhauḷāratādike
tika-s0501t:1552_0: Naradammasārathi ākaṅkhato te bhagavato manasā sabbaññutaññāṇasahitādimanasā vicintitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1552_1: ñeyyadhammaṃ devā manussā sabbe pāṇino na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ. Santaṃ araṇaṃ samādhiṃ
tika-s0501t:1552_2: nisevato te bhagavato manasā vicintitā kasiṇāpi sabbe pāṇino na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1552_3: Kasiṇāpi vā kasiṇārammaṇāya paññāyapi na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ. Kasiṇāpīti ettha ca “kasiṇāyapī”ti
tika-s0501t:1552_4: vattabbepi ya-kāra lopavasena “kasiṇāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā “yaṃ ākaṅkhati yaṃ ākaṅkhanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1552_5: karoti, taṃ ākaṅkhanaṃ kiṃ katama”nti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ aññesaṃ avisayattā avissajjanīyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1552_6: hotīti yojanā. Idaṃ “ākaṅkhato”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1553_0: Bhagavā sīlakkhandhe sīlakkhandhahetu ettako etaparimāṇo, bhagavā samādhikkhandhe
tika-s0501t:1553_1: samādhikkhandhahetu ettako etaparimāṇo, bhagavā paññākkhandhe paññākkhandhahetu ettako
tika-s0501t:1553_2: etaparimāṇo, bhagavā vimuttikkhandhe vimuttikkhandhahetu ettako etaparimāṇo, bhagavā
tika-s0501t:1553_4: iriyāyaṃ kāyavacīsamācāre kāyavacīsamācārahetu ettako etaparimāṇo, bhagavā pabhāve
tika-s0501t:1553_5: ānubhāvahetu ettako etaparimāṇo, bhagavā hitesitāyaṃ mettāhetu ettako etaparimāṇo,
tika-s0501t:1553_6: bhagavā karuṇāyaṃ karuṇāhetu ettako etaparimāṇo, bhagavā iddhiyaṃ iddhividhahetu
tika-s0501t:1553_7: ettako etaparimāṇoti avissajjanīyoti yojanā. Idaṃ “ettako”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye
tika-s0501t:1554_0: Bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa tathāgatassa loke uppādā uppādahetu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1554_1: uppādo sambhavati, āyatiṃ buddharatanassa uppādo sambhavati, ekassa buddharatanassa
tika-s0501t:1554_2: dharamānakkhaṇena hi aññassa buddharatanassa anuppajjanato āyatinti vuttaṃ, dhammaratanassa
tika-s0501t:1554_3: uppādo sambhavati, saṅgharatanassa uppādo sambhavatīti tīṇi ratanāni. “Tāni tīṇi
tika-s0501t:1554_4: ratanāni guṇato kiṃpamāṇānī”ti pucchite sati tāni tīṇi ratanāni guṇato etaparimāṇānīti
tika-s0501t:1554_5: na vissajjitabbānīti yojanā. Idaṃ “tathāgatassā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye
tika-s0501t:1555_0: Buddhavisayo puggalaparo puggalapadhāno pañho avissajjanīyo, buddhavisayāva puggalaparoparaññutā
tika-s0501t:1555_1: avissajjanīyā. Bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1555_2: sakiṃ nirayaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ, sakiṃ tiracchānayoniṃ sandhāvataṃ
tika-s0501t:1555_3: saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ, sakiṃ pettivisayaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ, sakiṃ asurayoniṃ
tika-s0501t:1555_4: sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ, sakiṃ deve sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ, sakiṃ
tika-s0501t:1555_5: manusse sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati na dissati na upalabbhatīti.
tika-s0501t:1555_6: “Sā pubbā koṭi katamā”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ avissajjanīyaṃ saṃsārassa pubbakoṭiyā
tika-s0501t:1555_7: abhāvato avissajjanīyaṃ hoti. “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā sāvakānaṃ ñāṇavekallena katā,
tika-s0501t:1555_8: na attano ñāṇavekallena. “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā attano ceva sāvakānañca ñāṇavekallena
tika-s0501t:1555_9: kātabbā siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā “duvidhā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ desanā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1555_10: vuttaṃ. Attā upanetabbo etissā desanāyāti attūpanāyikā. Paro upanetabbo etissā desanāyāti
tika-s0501t:1555_11: parūpanāyikā. “Katamā attūpanāyikā desanā, katamā parūpanāyikā desanā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1555_12: niyametvā dassetuṃ “na paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā sāvakānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1555_13: netabbānaṃ vasena desitattā parūpanāyikā desanā nāma, “natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1555_14: avijānanā”ti desanā attano netabbassa vasena desitattā attūpanāyikā desanā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1555_15: “Natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanā”ti vuttattā pubbāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva
tika-s0501t:1555_16: na paññāyatīti viññāyati, bhagavato ñāṇassa paññāpanaṃ kātuṃ asamatthattā na paññāyatīti
tika-s0501t:1555_17: na viññāyati tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāti etena
tika-s0501t:1555_18: purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyati, na tattha ñāṇassa paṭighātoti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1556_0: “Kathaṃ pana buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāya natthibhāvovijānitabbo”ti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1556_1: avijānanāya natthibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ “yathā bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1556_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana – “yaṃ pana atthi, taṃ aññesaṃ appameyyampi bhagavato na appameyyanti
tika-s0501t:1556_3: bhagavato sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇataṃ dassetuṃ ‘yathā bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-s0501t:1556_4: ārabbhā’tiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha “kīva dīghaṃ nu kho,
tika-s0501t:1556_5: bhante, padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-s0501t:1556_6: yathā yena pakārena “seyyathāpi…pe… āghātetvā”ti evamāha. Tato tena pakārena avijānanāya
tika-s0501t:1557_0: Bhikkhu, tvaṃ sallakkhehi, kokāliko vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito,
tika-s0501t:1557_1: tato tilato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya,
tika-s0501t:1557_2: so vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā uddharānupakkamena khippataraṃ parikkhayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1557_3: pariyādānaṃ seyyathāpi gaccheyya, eko abbudo nirayo parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ na tveva
tika-s0501t:1557_4: gaccheyya. Vīsati abbudā nirayā tattake kāle parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ seyyathāpi gaccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t:1557_5: evameva eko nirabbudo nirayo tattake kāle parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ na tveva gaccheyya.
tika-s0501t:1557_6: Esa nayo sesesupi. Sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā padumaṃ nirayaṃ kokāliko
tika-s0501t:1557_7: bhikkhu upapanno kho, bhikkhu, tvaṃ evaṃ sallakkhehīti bhagavā āhāti yojanā. Bhagavā
tika-s0501t:1557_8: “ayaṃ appameyyo ayaṃ asaṅkhyeyyo”ti vā na kiñci āha. “Tasmiṃ appameyye katamo appameyyo,
tika-s0501t:1557_9: tasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye katamo asaṅkhyeyyo”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ buddhavisayattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_0: “Kathaṃ kena pakārena jino”ti upakena kataṃ pucchanaṃ “kilesappahānapakārena jino”ti
tika-s0501t:1559_1: vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ. “Kena pakārena jino”ti upakena kataṃ pucchanaṃ “pāpakānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1559_2: dhammānaṃ jitattā jino”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ. “Katamo jino”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1559_3: “rūpādiko jino”ti vā “rūpādikaṃ muñcitvā añño jino”ti vā vissajjetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-s0501t:1559_4: avissajjanīyaṃ. “Katamo āsavakkhayo, katamo rāgakkhayo, katamo dosakkhayo, katamo
tika-s0501t:1559_5: mohakkhayo”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “nibbānaṃ āsavakkhayo”ti vā “arahattamaggo āsavakkhayo”ti
tika-s0501t:1559_6: vā “arahattaphalaṃ rāgakkhayo”ti vā iti evamādinā vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_7: “Kittako āsavakkhayo, kittako rāgakkhayo, kittako dosakkhayo, kittako mohakkhayo”ti
tika-s0501t:1559_8: kataṃ pucchanaṃ “ettako etaparimāṇo āsavakkhayo”ti evamādinā avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_9: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti. (12)
tika-s0501t:1560_0: “Tathāgato satto atthī”ti pucchanaṃ “pañcakkhandhe upādāya paññāpetabbo sattabhūto
tika-s0501t:1560_1: atthī”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ. “Atthi rūpa”nti kataṃ pucchanaṃ rūpassa vissajjamānattā
tika-s0501t:1560_2: “āmantā”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ, “rūpaṃ tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ tathābhāvato
tika-s0501t:1560_3: alabbhanato avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ. “Rūpavā tathāgato”tiādīsupi esa nayo
tika-s0501t:1560_4: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1561_0: “Passati bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā…pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1561_1: “passati bhagavā”ti vā…pe… “pajānāti bhagavā”ti vā vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1561_2: “Katame sattā, katamo tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ paramatthato alabbhanato avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1562_0: “Atthi tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena vissajjanīyaṃ. “Atthi tathāgato
tika-s0501t:1562_1: paraṃ maraṇā”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “atthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vissajjamāne sati
tika-s0501t:1562_2: ca idhaloko eva paralokoti āpajjati, “natthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vissajjamāne
tika-s0501t:1562_3: sati ca idhalokato añño paralokoti āpajjati, tasmā avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1562_4: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye visaye ca avissajjanīye visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1563: 120. Nānāvidhaṃ vissajjanīyāvissajjanīyasuttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ suttaṃ kamma”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ kamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1564_1: chāyāva anapāyinī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ puññakammapāpakammadvaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1565_0: Bhikkhave, tumhe puna caparaṃ kammaṃ sallakkhetha. (Anuṭṭhānagilānaṃ) anuṭṭhānagilānassa
tika-s0501t:1565_1: pīṭhasamāruḷhaṃ pīṭhasamāruḷhassa bālaṃ bālassa vā mañcasamāruḷhaṃ mañcasamāruḷhassa
tika-s0501t:1565_2: bālaṃ bālassa vā chamāyaṃ bhūmiyaṃ semānaṃ semānassa sayantassa bālaṃ bālassa vā
tika-s0501t:1565_3: kāyena duccaritāni vācāya duccaritāni manasā duccaritāni pāpakāni yāni kammāni pubbe
