tika-s0501t:1565_4: pubbakāle vā atīte anekakappakoṭisatasahasse vā assa bālena katāni, tāni pāpakāni
tika-s0501t:1565_5: kammāni tamhi pīṭhasamāruḷhādisamaye olambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti ajjholambanti viya
tika-s0501t:1565_6: upaṭṭhahanti abhippalambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti. Bhikkhave, mahataṃ mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1565_7: chāyā sāyanhasamayaṃ pathaviyaṃ seyyathāpi olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti
tika-s0501t:1565_8: yathā, bhikkhave, evameva bālaṃ…pe… abhippalambanti. Bhikkhave, tatra tasmiṃ upaṭṭhānākāre
tika-s0501t:1565_9: upaṭṭhānākārahetu bālassa katapāpassa evaṃ parivitakko hoti “me mayā kalyāṇaṃ akataṃ
tika-s0501t:1565_10: vata, me mayā kusalaṃ akataṃ vata, bhīruttāṇaṃ kataṃ vata, me mayā pāpaṃ kataṃ vata,
tika-s0501t:1565_11: me mayā luddaṃ kataṃ vata, me mayā kibbisaṃ kataṃ vata, bho agilāna sappurisa akatakalyāṇānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1565_12: akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ yāvatā
tika-s0501t:1565_13: gati duggati atthi, taṃ gatiṃ ahaṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti evaṃ parivitakko hoti. Evaṃ
tika-s0501t:1565_14: vitakkento so bālo socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohaṃ āpajjatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1566_0: Pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā nāma sūriyuggamanakālepi pathaviyā olambantīpi chāyā hāyanavasena
tika-s0501t:1566_1: olambanti. Sāyanhasamayaṃ pana chāyā vaḍḍhanavasena olambanti, tatheva kammānipi
tika-s0501t:1566_2: tasmiṃ kāle vaḍḍhanavasena upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā tameva vaḍḍhanupaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0501t:1566_3: “sāyanhasamaya”nti vuttaṃ. Sukkapakkhepi yojanā kaṇhapakkhe yojanānusārena kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1567_0: Nānāvidhaṃ kammaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamo vipāko”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1567_1: tattha katamo vipāko”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0501t:1567_2: katamo vipākoti pucchati. Bhikkhave, vo tumhehi ye manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo
tika-s0501t:1567_3: paṭiladdhā, te manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo vo tumhākaṃ lābhā bhavanti. Tumhehi
tika-s0501t:1567_4: pabbajitvā yaṃ catupārisuddhisīlādisampādanaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ catupārisuddhisīlādisampādanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1567_5: vo tumhākaṃ suladdhaṃ bhavati. Bhikkhave, yo buddhuppādo navamo khaṇo tumhehi laddho,
tika-s0501t:1567_6: so buddhuppādo navamo khaṇo vo tumhākaṃ brahmacariyavāsāya paṭiladdho bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1568_0: Bhikkhave, mayā chaphassāyatanikā nāma nirayā diṭṭhā, tattha tesu diṭṭhesu chaphassāyatanikesu
tika-s0501t:1568_1: nāma nirayesu yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ cakkhunā passati, taṃ aniṭṭharūpaṃyeva passati, no
tika-s0501t:1568_2: iṭṭharūpaṃ. Akantarūpaṃyeva passati, no kantarūpaṃ. Amanāparūpaṃyeva passati, no manāparūpaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1569_0: Yaṃ kiñci saddaṃ sotena…pe… ghānena…pe… jivhāya…pe… kāyena…pe… yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1569_1: manasā vijānāti, taṃ aniṭṭhadhammaṃyeva vijānāti, no iṭṭhadhammaṃ. Akantadhammaṃyeva
tika-s0501t:1569_2: vijānāti, no kantadhammaṃ. Amanāpadhammaṃyeva vijānāti, no manāpadhammanti pāṭho
tika-s0501t:1569_3: yutto. “Aniṭṭharūpaṃyeva vijānāti, no iṭṭharūpa”ntiādipāṭho ayutto, katthaci pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1569_4: ayuttapāṭho diṭṭho. Sukkapakkhe vuttanayavipariyāyena yojanā kātabbā. Ayaṃ vuttappakārā
tika-s0501t:1569_5: “lābhā vo, bhikkhave”tiādiko pāṭho vipāke vācakañāpakabhāveneva pavattanato vipāko nāma.
tika-s0501t:1570: Mārisā niraye paccamānānaṃ amhākaṃ sabbaso nimujjanaummujjanavasena saṭṭhivassasahassāni paripuṇṇāni, nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ kadā kasmiṃ kāle bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1571_0: Nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ natthi. Nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ kuto atthi? Nirayassa
tika-s0501t:1571_1: anto pariyosānaṃ amhākaṃ na paṭidissati. Mārisā, yadā tumhe ca ahañca seṭṭhiputtā
tika-s0501t:1571_2: jātā, tadā tuyhaṃ tumhākañca mayhaṃ mama ca pāpaṃ hi yasmā pakataṃ pakārehi kataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1571_3: tasmā nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ amhākaṃ na dissatīti ayaṃ pāṭho vipāke vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1572_0: 121. Adhammacārī naro kusaladhammesu pamatto hi yasmā hoti, tasmā so adhammacārī
tika-s0501t:1572_1: pamatto naro yahiṃ yahiṃ yaṃ yaṃ duggatiṃ gacchati, taṃ taṃ gacchantaṃ adhammacāriṃ
tika-s0501t:1572_2: naṃ naraṃ attanā carito so dhammova hanati. Kimiva hanati? Sayaṃ attanā gahito kaṇhasappo
tika-s0501t:1572_3: gaṇhantaṃ janaṃ hanati yathā, evaṃ attanā carito adhammo adhammacāriṃ naṃ hanati.
tika-s0501t:1572_4: “Na hi dhammo adhammo cā”tiādigāthāya attho pākaṭo. Idaṃ suttadvayaṃ kamme ca vipāke
tika-s0501t:1572_5: ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammañca vipāko ca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1573_0: Bhikkhave, tumhe puññānaṃ mā bhāyittha; bhikkhave, yadidaṃ yaṃ idaṃ “puññānī”ti adhivacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1573_1: pavattaṃ; etaṃ “puññānī”ti adhivacanaṃ iṭṭhassa kantassa piyassa manāpassa sukhassa
tika-s0501t:1573_2: sukhavipākajanakassa kammassa adhivacanaṃ hoti. Bhikkhave, ahaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1573_3: puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ abhijānāmi kho. “Kathaṃ
tika-s0501t:1573_4: abhijānāmī”ti ce puccheyya, pubbe satta vassāni mettacittaṃ mettāya sahitaṃ dutiyajjhānacittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1573_5: bhāvetvā satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe imaṃ lokaṃ manussalokaṃ puna na āgamāsiṃ. Satta
tika-s0501t:1573_7: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīpi gahitāti veditabbā. Sesesupi evameva gahetabbo. Bhikkhave, saṃvaṭṭamāne
tika-s0501t:1573_8: kappe ahaṃ ābhassarūpago homi, vivaṭṭakappe suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmi. Bhikkhave,
tika-s0501t:1573_9: tatra brahmavimāne tatra upapajjamāne upapajjamānahetu ahaṃ brahmā homi, aññe mahānubhāvena
tika-s0501t:1573_10: abhibhavanato abhibhū, aññehi anabhibhavanato anabhibhūto mahābrahmā homi, aññadatthu
tika-s0501t:1574_0: Bhikkhave, ahaṃ devānamindo sakko chattiṃsakkhattuṃ ahosiṃ kho, dhammiko dhammarājā
tika-s0501t:1574_2: anekasatakkhattuṃ ahosiṃ, padesarajjassa rājabhāve ko pana vādo.
tika-s0501t:1575_0: Bhikkhave, tassa cakkavattirājabhūtassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi “yena phalena
tika-s0501t:1575_1: yena vipākena ahaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo amhi, taṃ idaṃ phalaṃ kissa
tika-s0501t:1575_2: kammassa phalaṃ nu kho, so ayaṃ vipāko kissa kammassa vipāko nu kho”ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1575_3: ahosi. Bhikkhave, tassa vitakkentassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi “yena phalena
tika-s0501t:1575_4: yena vipākena ahaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo amhi, me pavattaṃ taṃ idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1575_5: phalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ kho, so ayaṃ vipāko tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ vipāko kho, seyyathidaṃ
tika-s0501t:1575_6: katamesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko? Dānassa damassa saṃyamassāti tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1575_7: phalaṃ vipāko”ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1576_0: Tattha tasmiṃ “mā, bhikkhave, puññānaṃ bhāyitthā”tiādike sutte yañca dānaṃ, yo ca
tika-s0501t:1576_1: damo, yo ca saṃyamo atthi, idaṃ dānādittayaṃ kammaṃ, taṃvācakañāpakaṃ suttampi kammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1576_2: nāma. Tappaccayo taṃkammapaccayo paccayuppannabhūto paccanubhūto yo vipāko atthi,
tika-s0501t:1576_3: etaṃ vipāke phalampi pakkhipitabbaṃ, ayaṃ vipāko taṃvācakañāpako pāṭhopi vipāko nāma.
tika-s0501t:1577_0: Todeyyaputtassa subhassa māṇavassa yaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ, tattha sutte vuttā
tika-s0501t:1577_1: ye pāṇātipātādayo dhammā appāyukadīghāyukatāya saṃvattanti, ye hiṃsanādayo dhammā
tika-s0501t:1577_2: bahvābādhaappābādhatāya saṃvattanti, ye usūyanādayo dhammā appesakkhamahesakkhatāya
tika-s0501t:1577_3: saṃvattanti, ye kodhādayo dhammā dubbaṇṇasuvaṇṇatāya saṃvattanti, ye agāravādayo
tika-s0501t:1577_4: dhammā nīcakulikauccakulikatāya saṃvattanti, ye maccherādayo dhammā appabhogamahābhogatāya
tika-s0501t:1577_5: saṃvattanti, ye asallakkhaṇādayo dhammā duppaññapaññavantatāya saṃvattanti. Idaṃ
tika-s0501t:1577_6: pāṇātipātasattayugaṃ kammaṃ, taṃvācakañāpakaṃ suttampi kammaṃ nāma. Tattha subhasutte
tika-s0501t:1577_7: yā appāyukadīghāyukatā vuttā…pe… yā duppaññapaññavantatā vuttā, so ayaṃ appāyukadīghāyukatādiko
tika-s0501t:1577_8: vipāko, taṃvācakañāpakapāṭhopi vipāko. Idaṃ subhasuttaṃ kusalākusalakamme ceva vipāke
tika-s0501t:1577_9: ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammañca vipāko ca hoti. (14)
tika-s0501t:1578_0: 122. Yo puggalo vacīduccaritaparivajjanena vācānurakkhī bhaveyya, abhijjhādianuppādanena
tika-s0501t:1578_1: manasā saṃvuto bhaveyya, pāṇātipātādipajahanena kāyena akusalaṃ na kayirā, iti tayo
tika-s0501t:1578_2: ete kammapathe visodhaye, so puggalo isippaveditaṃ maggaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ
tika-s0501t:1578_3: ārādhaye ārādhayeyyāti yojanā. Idaṃ “vācānurakkhī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ kusale vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1579_0: Yassa puggalassa kāyena dukkaṭaṃ duggatisaṃvattaniyakammaṃ natthi, vācāya dukkaṭakammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1579_1: natthi, manasā dukkaṭakammaṃ natthi, tīhi ṭhānehi uppajjanaṭṭhānehi saṃvutaṃ taṃ
tika-s0501t:1579_2: puggalaṃ “brāhmaṇa”nti ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā. Idaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1580_0: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave…pe… kusalamūlānī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalaṃ. Bhikkhave,
tika-s0501t:1580_1: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā vijjā pubbaṅgamā hoti, hirī ca ottappañca anudevāti
tika-s0501t:1580_2: yojanā. Idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1581_0: Māluvā sālaṃ rukkhaṃ onataṃ bhūmiyaṃ patanaṃ karoti iva, tathā yassa janassa accantaṃ
tika-s0501t:1581_1: dvīsu tīsu bhavesu dussīlyaṃ atthi, so jano attānaṃ onataṃ apāyesu pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-s0501t:1581_2: Anatthakāmo jano yathā anatthaṃ icchati, tathā anatthaṃ karoti yathā, tathā īdiso
tika-s0501t:1581_3: dussīlo naṃ attānaṃ anatthaṃ karotīti yojanā. Idaṃ “yassā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayena akusalaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1582_0: Asmamayaṃ asmasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇimayaṃ vajiraṃ vajirassa uṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇiṃ
tika-s0501t:1582_1: abhimatthati vidhaṃseti iva, tathā attanā hi sayameva kataṃ attajaṃ attasambhavaṃ
tika-s0501t:1582_2: pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ pāpaṃ karontaṃ janaṃ abhimatthatīti yojanā. Idaṃ “attanā hī”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1583_0: Devate kusalehi vivajjitā akusalā dasa kammapathe niseviya katvā garahā gārayhā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1583_1: bālamatī mandabuddhino nirayesu paccareti yojanā. Idaṃ “dasa kammapathe”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1584: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave…pe… akusalamūlānī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayena akusalaṃ. (15)
tika-s0501t:1585_0: Yādisaṃ yaṃ bījaṃ vapate, taṃ bījaṃ tādisaṃ phalaṃ harate iva, tathā kalyāṇakārī
tika-s0501t:1585_1: paṇḍito kalyāṇaṃ phalaṃ harate, pāpakārī bālo ca pāpakaṃ phalaṃ harateti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1585_2: Tattha “yādisa”ntiādike sutte “kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇa”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, idaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1585_3: kusalaṃ. “Pāpakārī ca pāpaka”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, idaṃ vacanaṃ akusalaṃ. Idaṃ dvivacanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1586_0: Kalyāṇakārī sappurisā subhena kammena suggatiṃ vajanti gacchanti, pāpakārī kāpurisā
tika-s0501t:1586_1: asubhena kammunā apāyabhūmiṃ vajanti gacchanti, kammassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇasahagatakammassa
tika-s0501t:1586_3: asubhe nibbanti. Kimiva nibbanti? Indhanakkhayā joti nibbāti iva, tathā te sappurisā
tika-s0501t:1586_4: kammassa khayā anavasesakhayanato nibbantīti yojanā. Tattha tasmiṃ “subhenā”tiādigāthāvacane
tika-s0501t:1586_5: “subhena…pe… suggati”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, idaṃ “subhena…pe…suggati”nti vacanaṃ kusale
tika-s0501t:1586_6: vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kusalaṃ nāma. “Apāyabhūmiṃ asubhena kammunā”ti yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1586_7: vacanaṃ āha, idaṃ “apāya…pe… kammunā”ti vacanaṃ akusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t:1586_8: akusalaṃ nāma. Idaṃ “subhenā”tiādikaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalañca akusalañca hoti. (16)
tika-s0501t:1587: 123. “Yathāpi bhamaro pupphaṃ…pe… munī care”ti idaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ anuññāte caraṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1588_0: Bhamaro nāma puppharasapivanagahaṇavasena caraṇako madhukarādiko bhamaro. So puppharasaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_1: gaṇhanto mandavego hutvā pupphañca vaṇṇañca gandhañca avināsetvā yāvadatthaṃ puppharasaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_2: pivitvā madhukaraṇatthāya ca puppharasaṃ gahetvā madhukaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paleti.
tika-s0501t:1588_3: Pupphavaṇṇagandhā pākatikāva honti. Evameva piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisanto muni pasādajanakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_4: ālokanavilokanagamanatiṭṭhanādikaṃ janetvā pītisomanassasahitaṃ pasādaṃ janetvā saddhādeyyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_5: piṇḍapātaṃ yāpanamattaṃ paṭiggahetvā gāmato nikkhamitvā udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne vane bhesajjaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_6: limpanto viya, kantāre puttamaṃsaṃ khādanto viya, piṇḍapātaṃ paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjitvā
tika-s0501t:1588_7: bhamaro vane madhuṃ karoti viya, kammaṭṭhānānurūpaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā jhānamaggaphalanibbattanatthāya
tika-s0501t:1588_8: samaṇadhammakaraṇatthāya gāme care careyyāti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1589_0: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ karaṇīyāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1589_1: tīṇi karaṇīyānī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā anuññāte ācāre atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1589_2: pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma. Tasmiṃ sutte yo bhikkhu sīlaṃ pāti rakkhati, iti rakkhaṇato
tika-s0501t:1589_3: so bhikkhu pāti nāma. Yaṃ sīlaṃ taṃ pātiṃ bhikkhuṃ apāyādidukkhato moceti, iti mocanato
tika-s0501t:1589_4: taṃ sīlaṃ pātimokkhaṃ nāma. Yena sīlena bhikkhu saṃvaritabbacakkhundriyādikaṃ saṃvarati,
tika-s0501t:1589_5: iti saṃvaraṇakaraṇato taṃ sīlaṃ saṃvaraṃ nāma, pātimokkhaṃ eva saṃvaraṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ,
tika-s0501t:1589_6: pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto samannāgato hutvā saṃvuṇanato catuiriyāpathesu cārako
tika-s0501t:1589_7: hoti, iti saṃvuṇanato bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto nāma. Viharati catuiriyāpathe
tika-s0501t:1589_8: pavatteti. Vārittacāraṃ vajjetvā cārittasīlaṃ ādāya caraṇaṃ ācāro, agocare vajjetvā
tika-s0501t:1589_9: gocare caraṇaṃ gocaroti. Attho vuccamāno ativitthāro bhavissati, tasmā kiñcimattaṃ
tika-s0501t:1590_1: dhammā pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ “dasā”tiādikaṃ suttampi
tika-s0501t:1590_2: anuññāte dasavidhe paccavekkhitabbe dhamme vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1590_3: nāma. “Tīṇimāni…pe… karaṇīyānī”ti idaṃ suttampi anuññāte tividhe sucarite vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1591: Nānāvidhaṃ anuññātaṃ suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ suttaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ paṭikkhitta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1596: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1597_0: Gāthaṃ āha. Ettha etasmiṃ gāthādvaye yaṃ “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”ntiādikaṃ purimakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1597_1: hoti. Idaṃ “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”ntiādikaṃ devaputtavacanaṃ bhagavatā paṭikkhittattā,
tika-s0501t:1597_2: paṭikkhitte atthe pavattanato ca paṭikkhittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1598_0: Dubbhikkhakāle vā kantāre vā mātāpitaro puttadhītaro ghātetvāpi attānameva posenti,
tika-s0501t:1598_1: tasmā “natthi attasamaṃ pema”nti vuttaṃ. Dubbhikkhakālādīsu hiraññasuvaṇṇasārādīni,
tika-s0501t:1598_2: gomahiṃsādīnipi dhaññagahaṇatthāya dhaññassāmikānaṃ datvā dhaññameva gaṇhanti, tasmā
tika-s0501t:1598_3: “natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhana”nti vuttaṃ. Sūriyādīnaṃ ābhā paccuppannatamaṃ ekadesaṃva
tika-s0501t:1598_4: vinodeti, paññā pana dasasahassilokadhātumpi ekapajjotaṃ ekobhāsaṃ kātuṃ samatthā,
tika-s0501t:1598_6: “natthi paññāsamā ābhā”ti vuttaṃ. Samuddo bhūmiyā ca ekadeseyeva tiṭṭhati, so ca
tika-s0501t:1598_7: deve avuṭṭhe sati khayanasabhāvo bhaveyya, vuṭṭhi pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesupi
tika-s0501t:1598_8: yāva ābhassarā brahmalokāpi pūrā bhavati, tasmā “vuṭṭhi ve paramāsarā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1599_1: Idaṃ “tīṇimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi paṭikkhitte duccarite vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t:1600: 124. Nānāvidhaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ anuññātañca paṭikkhittañcā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ anuññātañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1601_0: Bhūripaññabhūripaññavanta gotama, taṃ bhūripaññaṃ gotamaṃ ahaṃ pucchāmi. Idha loke
tika-s0501t:1601_1: anekā yā janatā bhītā, sā janatā kiṃsu katamā bhave. Yo ca maggo anekāyatano iti
tika-s0501t:1601_2: pavutto, so ca maggo kiṃsu katamo bhave. Kismiṃ dhamme ṭhito jano paralokaṃ na bhāye
tika-s0501t:1602_0: Devaputta yo jano sammāvācañca paṇidhāya, sammāmanañca paṇidhāya, kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno
tika-s0501t:1602_1: ca bhave, ayaṃ eko. Bahvannapānaṃ gharaṃ āvasanto ca bhave, ayaṃ eko. Saddho saddhāsampanno
tika-s0501t:1602_2: cittamudubhāvena mudu ca bhave, ayaṃ eko. Vadaññū yācakānaṃ yācanavasena vuttavacanaññū
tika-s0501t:1602_3: hutvā saṃvibhāgī ca bhave, ayaṃ eko. Iti etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito jano dhammesu
tika-s0501t:1602_4: ṭhito hutvā paralokaṃ na bhāye na bhāyeyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1603_0: “Tasmiṃ sutte katamaṃ anuññātaṃ, katamaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha
tika-s0501t:1603_1: yaṃ āhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tasmiṃ “kiṃsūdhā”tiādipañhāya vissajjane “vācaṃ manañcā”tiādivacane
tika-s0501t:1603_2: “vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya sammā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āha, idaṃ “vācaṃ…pe… sammā”ti
tika-s0501t:1603_3: vacanaṃ anuññāte vacanīyādike atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1603_4: “Kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, idaṃ “kāyena …pe… māno”ti vacanaṃ pāpakubbena
tika-s0501t:1603_5: paṭikkhitte vuttanayena pavattanato paṭikkhittaṃ nāma. “Bahvanna…pe… na bhāye”ti
tika-s0501t:1603_6: yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, idaṃ “bahvanna…pe… na bhāye”ti vacanaṃ vuttanayena anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1603_7: Idaṃ “vāca”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayadvayena anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1604: “Sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādiko vuttatthova. “Tasmiṃ sabbapāpassātiādike katamaṃ anuññātaṃ, katamaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti vattabbabhāvato “tattha ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1605_0: Devānaminda, ahaṃ kāyasamācārampi duvidhena vadāmi – sevitabbaṃ anavajjaṃ kāyasamācārampi
tika-s0501t:1605_1: vadāmi, asevitabbaṃ sāvajjaṃ kāyasamācārampi ahaṃ vadāmi. Vacīsamācārādīsupi vuttanayānusārena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1606_2: paṭicca kāyasamācārādayo na sevitabbā, kusaladhammavaḍḍhanaṃ, akusaladhammahāyanañca
tika-s0501t:1607_0: 125. Nānāvidhaṃ anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1607_1: “katamo suttaviseso thavo”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā ayaṃ suttaviseso thavo
tika-s0501t:1607_2: nāmāti viññāpetuṃ “tattha katamo thavo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu
tika-s0501t:1607_3: lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamo suttaviseso thavo nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1608_4: dhammo seṭṭho uttamo. Dvipadānaṃ sabbadevamanussādīnaṃ dvipadānaṃ cakkhumā pañcavidhacakkhumā
tika-s0501t:1608_5: bhagavā seṭṭho uttamoti yojanā. Ayaṃ “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko”tiādisuttaviseso thave atthe
tika-s0501t:1609_0: “Ayameva suttaviseso thavo”ti vattabbattā “tīṇimāni bhikkhave”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apadā
tika-s0501t:1609_1: ahimacchādayo vā, dvipadā manussasakuṇapakkhijātikādayo vā, catuppadā hatthiassagomahiṃsādayo
tika-s0501t:1609_2: vā, bahuppadā satapadiādayo vā, rūpino kāmarūpasattā vā, arūpino arūpasattā vā, saññino
tika-s0501t:1609_3: sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattā vā, asaññino asaññasattā vā, nevasaññīnāsaññino bhavagge
tika-s0501t:1609_4: nibbattasattā vā yāvatā yattakā sattā saṃvijjanti, tesaṃ tattakānaṃ apadādīnaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1609_5: yadidaṃ yo ayaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tathāgato uppanno, so ayaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho
tika-s0501t:1609_6: tathāgato aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati, seṭṭhaṃ seṭṭhoti akkhāyati, pavaraṃ pavaroti akkhāyati, ayaṃ paṭhamo aggo.
tika-s0501t:1610_0: Saṅkhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ vā sappaccayasabhāvānaṃ vā, asaṅkhatānaṃ paccayehi asaṅkharitānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1610_1: paṇṇattimattabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vā yāvatā yattakā paṇṇattī voharīyanti, tattakehi
tika-s0501t:1610_2: paṇṇattīhi paññapetabbānaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ yadidaṃ yo ayaṃ madanimmadano…pe…
tika-s0501t:1610_3: yo ayaṃ nirodho, yaṃ idaṃ nibbānamaggaphalānamālambaṇaṃ bhavati, so ayaṃ madanimmadanādiko
tika-s0501t:1610_4: dhammo aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati…pe… akkhāyati, ayaṃ dutiyo aggo.
tika-s0501t:1611_0: Saṅghānaṃ yāvatā paṇṇatti, gaṇānaṃ yāvatā paṇṇatti, mahājanasannipātānaṃ yāvatā paṇṇatti
tika-s0501t:1611_1: voharīyanti, tattakehi paṇṇattīhi paññapetabbānaṃ tesaṃ saṅghagaṇādīnaṃ yāni imāni
tika-s0501t:1611_2: cattāri puggalāni purisayugāni, ye ime aṭṭha purisapuggalā…pe… lokassa yaṃ idaṃ puññakkhettaṃ
tika-s0501t:1611_3: saṃvijjati, so ayaṃ catupurisayugādiko tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati…pe…
tika-s0501t:1611_4: akkhāyati, ayaṃ tatiyo aggo. Imāni tīṇi tathāgatanibbānaariyasaṅgharatanāni aggāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1612_0: Sabbalokuttaro apadādisabbasattalokato uttaro satthā ca, kusalapakkhato kusalaanavajjapakkhabhāvato
tika-s0501t:1612_1: uttaro dhammo ca, narasīhassa satthuno gaṇo ca iti tīṇi satthudhammagaṇaratanāni
tika-s0501t:1612_2: aggāni, tāni tīṇi satthudhammagaṇaratanāni visissare guṇavasena visissanti.
tika-s0501t:1613_0: Samaṇapadumasañcayo sare ruhamānaṃ padumaṃ sobhanaṃ iva sāsane sobhanasamaṇapadumasamūho
tika-s0501t:1613_1: gaṇo ca, dhammavaro ca, vidūnaṃ sakkato naravaradamako naravarānaṃ brahmadevamanussarājarājamahāmaccādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1613_2: damako anudamako cakkhumā sambuddho ca iti tīṇi gaṇadhammabuddharatanāni lokassa uttari bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1614_0: Appaṭisamo satthā ca, nirupadāho niggataupadāho, sabbo dhammo ca ariyo gaṇavaro ca
tika-s0501t:1614_1: iti yāni tīṇi buddhadhammagaṇaratanāni aggāni, tāni tīṇi…pe… nāni khalu ekaṃsena
tika-s0501t:1615_0: Saccanāmo avitathasaccadesanato saccanāmo khemo sabbābhibhū sabbe manussadevādike
tika-s0501t:1615_1: anabhibhavamānopi guṇātirekavasena abhibhavamāno viya pavattanato sabbābhibhū jino
tika-s0501t:1615_2: ca, saccadhammo avitathasabhāvato saccadhammo ca, tassa saccadhammassa uttari uttamo
tika-s0501t:1615_3: añño dhammo natthi, viññūnaṃ niccaṃ pūjito pūjāraho ariyasaṅgho ca iti tīṇi lokassa
tika-s0501t:1616_0: Ekāyanapadassa vacanattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ bahudhā vutto. Jātikhayantadassī hitānukampī
tika-s0501t:1616_1: bhagavā ekāyanaṃ maggaṃ pajānāti. “Yaṃ ekāyanaṃ maggaṃ pajānāti, tena maggena kiṃ
tika-s0501t:1616_2: taratī”ti vattabbabhāvato “etena maggenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yaṃ maggaṃ bhagavā jānāti,
tika-s0501t:1616_3: etena maggena pubbe atītamaddhānaṃ buddhādayo ariyā oghaṃ saṃsāroghaṃ tariṃsu, anāgatamaddhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1616_4: tarissanti, ye cāpi buddhādayo paccuppanne uppajjanti, te cāpi buddhādayo paccuppanne
tika-s0501t:1616_5: taranti, visuddhipekkhā visuddhiṃ apekkhamānā sattā devamanussaseṭṭhaṃ tādisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1616_6: taṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ namassanti, iti ayaṃ nānāvidhasuttavisesopi thave ratanattaye,
tika-s0501t:1616_7: ratanattayaguṇe ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato thavo nāma. Iccetaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesadassako
tika-s0501t:1617_1: aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ lokiyādisāsanapaṭṭhānasuttañca niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “tesu
tika-s0501t:1617_2: saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu katamaṃ suttavisesaṃ katamena suttavisesena
tika-s0501t:1617_3: saṃsanditvā niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha lokiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1617_4: pana – “evaṃ duvidhampi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttapadāni udāharantena vibhajitvā idāni
tika-s0501t:1617_5: saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi saṃsanditvā dassetuṃ puna ‘lokiyaṃ sutta’ntiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1618_0: Tattha tatthāti tesu soḷasavidhesu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu
tika-s0501t:1618_1: ceva aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu ca akusalapakkhe pavattaṃ
tika-s0501t:1618_2: lokiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyasuttena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati, kusalapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1618_3: pavattaṃ lokiyaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyasuttena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati, tasmā
tika-s0501t:1618_4: lokiyaṃ suttaṃ ekavidhampi saṃkilesabhāgiyena ca vāsanābhāgiyena ca dvīhi suttehi
tika-s0501t:1618_5: niddisitabbaṃ. Dassanapakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1618_6: saṃsandati, bhāvanāpakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1618_7: saṃsandati, asekkhapakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1618_8: saṃsandati, tasmā lokuttarampi suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyena ca bhāvanābhāgiyena ca asekkhabhāgiyena
tika-s0501t:1618_9: ca tīhi suttehi niddisitabbaṃ. Vuttanayānusārena sesesupi saṃsandanayojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1619_0: Amhākācariya tumhehi amhākācariyehi nayadassanavasena suttavisesasaṃsandanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1619_1: amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “kimatthāya saṃkilesabhāgiyādibhedena vibhajitvā bhagavatā vutta”nti
tika-s0501t:1619_3: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca suttavasena suttatthā gahitā.
tika-s0501t:1620_0: “Yaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, taṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ kittakehi suttehi
tika-s0501t:1620_1: vibhajitvā niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ chabbisatiyā
tika-s0501t:1620_2: puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Te chabbīsati puggalā katihi suttehi samanvesitabbā”ti
tika-s0501t:1620_3: vattabbattā “te tīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dassanabhāgiyena sattādhiṭṭhānena, bhāvanābhāgiyena
tika-s0501t:1620_4: sattādhiṭṭhānena, asekkhabhāgiyena sattādhiṭṭhānena cāti tīhi suttehi te chabbīsati
tika-s0501t:1621_0: “Katamehi katamehi katamaṃ katamaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha dassanabhāgiya”ntiādi
tika-s0501t:1621_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu tīsu dassanabhāgiyādīsu suttesu. Tatthāti vā tesu chabbīsatiyā
tika-s0501t:1621_2: puggalesu. Sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ekabījinā puggalena ca niddisitabbaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1621_3: dhammānusārinā puggalena ca niddisitabbaṃ, iti imehi pañcahi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1621_4: dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ. Ettha ca dassanaggahaṇena sotāpattiphalaṭṭhāpi
tika-s0501t:1622_0: Saddhānusārī pana yo vipassanākkhaṇe saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0501t:1622_1: so puggalo nibbattetabbasotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī nāma, saddhāya samāpattiṃ
tika-s0501t:1622_2: anussarati, iti saddhāya samāpattiyā anussaraṇato sotāpattimaggaṭṭho puggalo saddhānusārī
tika-s0501t:1622_3: nāma. So puggalo sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe saddhāya vimuttattā saddhāvimutto hutvā ekabījikolaṃkolasattakkhattuparamo
tika-s0501t:1622_4: bhavati. Yo pana puggalo vipassanākkhaṇe paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0501t:1622_5: so puggalo nibbattetabbasotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī nāma, dhammena paññāya
tika-s0501t:1622_6: samāpattiṃ anussarati, iti dhammena paññāya samāpattiyā anussaraṇato dhammānusārī
tika-s0501t:1622_7: nāma. So puggalo phalakkhaṇe diṭṭhiyā paññāya nirodhaṃ pattattā diṭṭhipatto hutvā
tika-s0501t:1622_8: ekabīji…pe… paramo bhavati. Dhammoti cettha paññā gahitā. Iti pabhedato dve maggaṭṭhā,
tika-s0501t:1622_9: cha phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhahi ariyapuggalehi, sampiṇḍite pana pañcahi ariyapuggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1623_0: Imesaṃ ekabījiādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva dassanabhāgiyatthattā
tika-s0501t:1623_1: ca sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti
tika-s0501t:1623_2: niyametvā ācariyena vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1624_1: paṭipannena, sakadāgāminā, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena, anāgāminā, antarāparinibbāyinā,
tika-s0501t:1624_3: akaniṭṭhagāminā, saddhāvimuttena, diṭṭhippattena, kāyasakkhinā cāti bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1625_0: Vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti gahetabbaṃ. Sakadā…pe…
tika-s0501t:1625_1: pannena sakadāgāmimaggaṭṭhena puggalena, sakadāgāminā sakadāgāmiphalaṭṭhena, anāgāmi…pe…
tika-s0501t:1625_2: pannena anāgāmimaggaṭṭhena, anāgāminā anāgāmiphalaṭṭhena, avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu
tika-s0501t:1625_3: āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena antarāparinibbāyīnāmakena
tika-s0501t:1625_4: anāgāminā, āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena upahaccaparinibbāyīnāmakena
tika-s0501t:1625_5: anāgāminā, asaṅkhārena appayogena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnāmakena
tika-s0501t:1625_6: anāgāminā, sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnāmakena
tika-s0501t:1625_7: anāgāminā, avihādīhi uddhaṃ atappādīsu upapattisotena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1625_8: uddhaṃsotanāmakena anāgāminā, akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1625_9: akaniṭṭhagāmīnāmakena anāgāminā, saddhāya vimuttattā saddhāvimuttanāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_10: diṭṭhiyā paññāya nirodhaṃ pattattā diṭṭhippattanāmakena anāgāminā cāti imehi ekādasahi
tika-s0501t:1625_11: ajhānalābhīpuggalehi ca, kāyena nāmakāye phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajhānānaṃ anantaraṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1625_12: sacchikaroti, iti sacchikaraṇato kāyasakkhīnāmakena jhānalābhinā cāti dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1626_0: Imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva bhāvanābhāgiyatthattā
tika-s0501t:1626_1: ca sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti
tika-s0501t:1626_2: niyametvā ācariyena vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “kittakehi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1627_0: “Asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ navahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ saddhāvimuttena, paññāvimuttena,
tika-s0501t:1627_2: paccekabuddhehi, sammāsambuddhehi cāti asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ imehi navahi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti –
tika-s0501t:1628_0: Vuttaṃ. Tattha sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1628_1: Saddhāya kilesehi vimuttattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe saddhāvimutto arahā, tena saddhāvimuttena.
tika-s0501t:1628_2: Paññāya vimuttattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimutto arahā, tena paññāvimuttena. Suññatavipassanāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:1628_3: anattānupassanena vimuttattā suññatavimutto arahā, tena suññatavimuttena. Animittānupassanāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:1628_4: aniccānupassanena vimuttattā animittavimutto arahā, tena animittavimuttena. Appaṇihitānupassanāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:1628_5: dukkhānupassanena vimuttattā appaṇihitavimutto arahā, tena appaṇihitavimuttena. Ubhato
tika-s0501t:1628_6: rūpakāyanāmakāyato ubhatobhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto arahā, tena ubhatobhāgavimuttena.
tika-s0501t:1628_7: Purimā pañca puggalā ajhānalābhino gahitā, ubhatobhāgavimutto pana jhānalābhīgahito.
tika-s0501t:1629_0: Samasīsī nāma iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti tividhā honti. Imesu
tika-s0501t:1629_1: tīsu samasīsīsu yo arahā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekasmiṃ iriyāpathe arahattaṃ patvā
tika-s0501t:1629_2: aññaṃ iriyāpathaṃ asaṅkamitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ iriyāpatheyeva parinibbāyati, ayaṃ arahā
tika-s0501t:1629_3: iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma. Yo arahā yasmiṃ roge uppanne arahattaṃ patvā tato rogato
tika-s0501t:1629_4: anuṭṭhahitvā tasmiṃ rogeyeva parinibbāyati, ayaṃ arahā rogasamasīsī nāma. Yo arahā
tika-s0501t:1629_6: parinibbāyati, ayaṃ arahā vārasamatāya jīvitasamasīsī nāma. Vārasamatāti ca paccavekkhaṇavīthi
tika-s0501t:1629_8: maggavīthianantaraṃ pavattāti vattabbārahā, tasmā vīthianantaratā vārasamatā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1630_0: Saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti etthapi paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-s0501t:1630_1: otaritvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya pavattavīthiyā paṭisambhidāñāṇāni pavattanti. Vuttanayena
tika-s0501t:1630_2: vīthianantaratāya vārasamatāya “saha paṭisambhidāhī”ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇampi
tika-s0501t:1630_3: paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya pavattavīthiyā
tika-s0501t:1630_4: paṭhamaṃ pavattatīti veditabbaṃ. Iminā jīvitasamasīsinā, sabbehi paccekabuddhehi,
tika-s0501t:1630_5: sabbehi sammāsambuddhehi cāti imehi navahi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1631_0: Imesaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva asekkhabhāgiyatthattā ca evaṃ
tika-s0501t:1631_1: iminā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pakārena vuttehi imehi chabbīsatiyā
tika-s0501t:1632_0: Imesaṃ chabbīsatiyā puggalānaṃ sakalalokuttarasuttatthattā ceva sattādhiṭṭhānekadesasuttatthattā
tika-s0501t:1632_1: ca lokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ. Ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena
tika-s0501t:1632_2: niyametvā vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi
tika-s0501t:1632_3: puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokiyaṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā
tika-s0501t:1632_4: puggalehi niddisitabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ. “Te ekūnavīsati lokiyā puggalā katamehi dhammehi
tika-s0501t:1632_5: niddiṭṭhā samanvesitabbā”ti vattabbattā “te caritehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Te ekūnavīsati
tika-s0501t:1632_6: lokiyā puggalā caritehi caritavisesehi niddiṭṭhā samanvesitabbāti. “Kathaṃ caritehi
tika-s0501t:1632_8: caritehi ekūnavīsati lokiyapuggalā rāgacaritā, keci dosacaritā…pe… mohacarito cāti
tika-s0501t:1632_9: niddiṭṭhā. Iti niddiṭṭhehi imehi ekūnavīsatiyā puggalehi lokiyasattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1633_0: Lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena
tika-s0501t:1633_1: niyametvā vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1633_2: katamehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “vāsanābhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Vāsanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1633_3: sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ sīlavantehi puggalehi, dhammehi ca niddisitabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1633_4: “Kittakā sīlavantapuggalā”ti vattabbattā “te sīlavanto pañca puggalā”ti vuttaṃ. “Kittakā
tika-s0501t:1633_5: dhammā”ti vattabbattā “pakatisīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pakatisīlavanto
tika-s0501t:1633_6: ca samādānasīlavanto ca cittappasādavanto ca samathavanto ca vipassanāvanto cāti
tika-s0501t:1633_7: pañca puggalā, pakatisīladhammo ca samādānasīladhammo ca cittappasādadhammo ca samathadhammo
tika-s0501t:1633_8: ca vipassanādhammo cāti pañca dhammāti imehi pañcahi puggalehi, imehi pañcahi dhammehi
tika-s0501t:1634_1: niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “lokuttaraṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1634_2: suttaṃ kittakehi suttehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1635_1: vattabbattā “lokiyañca…pe… ubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Ubhayenāti lokiyalokuttarena,
tika-s0501t:1636: “Ñāṇaṃ kittakehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “ñāṇaṃ paññāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte ñāṇaṃ āgataṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñāṇaṃ ñāṇapariyāyena paññādinā niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1637_1: vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte ñeyyaṃ āgataṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñeyyaṃ ñeyyapariyāyena niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1638_0: “Ñāṇañca ñeyyañca kittakena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “ñāṇañca ñeyyañca tadubhayenā”tiādi
tika-s0501t:1638_1: vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte ñāṇañeyyā āgatā, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñāṇañeyyā ñāṇañeyyapariyāyena niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1639_0: Dassanasutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ, tathā upadhārayitvā labbhamānato niddisitabbaṃ. Bhāvanāsutte
tika-s0501t:1639_1: yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ, tathā upadhārayitvā labbhamānato niddisitabbaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ dassanañca
tika-s0501t:1639_2: bhāvanā ca sutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ, tathā upadhārayitvā labbhamānato niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1640_0: “Sakavacanaṃ paravacana”ntiādīsupi evameva visuṃ visuṃ ca ekato ca sutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1640_1: tathā upadhārayitvā labbhamānato niddisitabbanti yojanā kātabbā. “Ettakameva niddisitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1641_0: “Vipākassa hetu kammamevā”ti vattabbattā “duvidho hetū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kilesā saṃkilesabhāgiyasuttena
tika-s0501t:1641_1: samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbā. Taṇhāsaṅkhāto samudayo vā kilesasaṅkhāto samudayo
tika-s0501t:1641_2: vā akusalasaṅkhāto samudayo vā saṃkilesabhāgiyena suttena samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1641_3: Lokiyakusalahetusaṅkhāto samudayo vā lokiyakusalasaṅkhāto samudayo vā vāsanābhāgiyena
tika-s0501t:1642_0: Kammañca vipāko ca yathārahaṃ labbhamānasuttena niddisitabboti sāmaññavasena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t:1642_1: “kusalaṃ katamena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha kusala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0501t:1642_2: tesu aṭṭhavīsatiyā sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu kusalaṃ catūhi suttehi samānatthabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1642_4: vāsanābhāgiyena niddisitabbaṃ samānatthattā, lokuttarakusalaṃ dassanabhāgiyena, vāsanābhāgiyena,
tika-s0501t:1642_5: asekkhabhāgiyena ca yathārahaṃ samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbaṃ. Kusalaṃ ettakehi
tika-s0501t:1642_6: niddisitabbanti niyametvā vibhattaṃ, “akusalaṃ katamena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1642_8: “kusalañca akusalañca tadubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte tadubhayaṃ
tika-s0501t:1642_9: āgataṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatena tadubhayena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1643_1: bhagavato anuññātāya samānatāya niddisitabbaṃ. “Katividhaṃ anuññāta”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1643_2: “taṃ pañcavidha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yaṃ anuññātaṃ yāsu yāsu bhūmīsu dissati, taṃ anuññātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1643_3: tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu āgatena samānena kappiyānulomena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1644_0: Anuññātaṃ iminā niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ, “paṭikkhittaṃ katamena
tika-s0501t:1644_1: niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ
tika-s0501t:1644_2: bhagavatā paṭikkhittakāraṇena sutte āgatena vatthunā kāraṇaphalabhāvena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1644_3: Yaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ yāsu yāsu bhūmīsu dissati, taṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu
tika-s0501t:1645_1: tadubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca
tika-s0501t:1645_2: āgataṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatena tadubhayena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1646_0: “Thavo katamena niddisitabbo”ti vattabbattā “thavo pasaṃsāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ
tika-s0501t:1646_1: yasmiṃ sutte yā yā pasaṃsā āgatā, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatāya tāya tāya pasaṃsāya
tika-s0501t:1646_2: thavo niddisitabbo. “Yo thavo pasaṃsāya niddisitabbo, so thavo katividhena niddisitabbo”ti
tika-s0501t:1646_3: vattabbattā “so pañcavidhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhagavato thavo ca dhammassa thavo ca
tika-s0501t:1646_4: ariyasaṅghassa thavo ca ariyadhammānaṃ sikkhāya thavo ca lokiyaguṇasampattiyā thavo
tika-s0501t:1646_5: cāti pañcavidhena veditabbo. Iti evaṃ vuttappakārena pañcavidhena thavo niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1647_0: Amhākācariya amhākācariyena aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti vuttā,
tika-s0501t:1647_2: Sāsanapaṭṭhāne indriyabhūmi saddhindriyādiindriyabhūmi yehi navahi padehi niddisitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1647_3: sāsanapaṭṭhāne kilesabhūmi yehi navahi padehi niddisitabbā, evaṃ iminā pakārena etāni
tika-s0501t:1647_4: mūlapadāni nava padāni kusalapadāni, nava padāni akusalapadānīti aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni
tika-s0501t:1647_5: honti. Sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbā, “kena kāraṇena aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:1647_6: daṭṭhabbāti viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathā hīti tato eva
tika-s0501t:1647_7: aṭṭhārasamūlapadānaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbattā “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
tika-s0501t:1647_8: Sāsanapaṭṭhāne”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tena vacanena viññāyatīti. “Kena mūlapadānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1647_10: vuttaṃ. Tena mūlapadānaṃ navakusalapadanavaakusalapadabhāvato āyasmā mahākaccāno –
tika-s0501t:1648: “Navahi ca padehi kusalā, navahi ca yujjanti akusalapakkhā;
tika-s0501t:1649: Ete kho mūlapadā, bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1650: Yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena “navahi…pe… padānī”ti vacanena mūlapadānaṃ navakusalapadanavaakusalapadabhāvena aṭṭhārasabhāvo viññāyatīti.
tika-s0501t:1651_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādisoḷasavidhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānañceva yaṃ yaṃ lokiyādiaṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1651_1: sāsanapaṭṭhānañca ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, ettakameva paripuṇṇaṃ, aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1651_2: niddhāretvā yuttaṃ yujjitabbaṃ natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0501t:1651_3: vuttaṃ. Yathāniddhāritasāsanapaṭṭhānato yaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāritaṃ
tika-s0501t:1651_4: atthi, taṃ taṃ aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niyuttaṃ yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yuttaṃ yujjitabbanti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1652_0: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate…pe… niyuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānanti yattako vacanakkamo bhāsito, ettakena
tika-s0501t:1652_1: vacanakkamena kiṃ netti samattā, udāhu asamattā”ti vattabbattā “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1652_2: Āyasmatā mahākaccānena yā netti bhāsitā, bhagavatā sā netti anumoditā, mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1652_3: saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi yā netti saṅgītā, sā netti “yaṃ loko pūjayate…pe… niyuttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1652_4: sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti ettāvatā vacanakkamena samattā paripuṇṇāva hoti.
tika-s0501t:1653_0: Iti samattāya āyasmatā mahākaccānena bhāsitāya bhagavatā anumoditāya mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1653_1: saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi saṅgītāya nettiyā atthavaṇṇanā saddhammapālanāmena mahādhammarājagurunā
tika-s0501t:1653_2: mahātherena racitā jinaputtānaṃ hitakarā nettivibhāvanā chabbīsādhikanavasate sakkarāje
tika-s0501t:1660: Dvisahassaṃ yadā pattaṃ, nimmalaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ subhaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1667: Yattakaṃ sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tattakaṃ racitaṃ mayā;
tika-s0501t:1669: Iti taṃ racayantena, puññaṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
tika-s0501t:1672: Sabbe rajjasukhe ṭhatvā, carantu caritaṃ sukhī.
tika-s0501t:1673: Devo kāle suvassatu, sabbo raṭṭhajano sukhī;
